play-sonic-jump.name: Play Sonic Jump
play-sonic-jump.description: New Sonic styled game. You must take hammer to break walls and get key which open the door. Hit SPACE if you want to fly!Beware of falling rocks! You need to be fast!Your enemy will try to stop you. Look for upgrade and get extra life! Enjoy in this funny adventure game with 15 levels! Good Luck!

alone-in-the-madness.name: Alone In The Madness
alone-in-the-madness.description: Alone In The Madness is a bloody game in which you have to help the main character in the game go through each area without getting killed. The only way he can survive is by killing the enemies before they get the chance to attack him. Let him pick up things from the surrounding and use them to attack the enemies.

death-arena-reality-show.name: Death Arena Reality Show
death-arena-reality-show.description: Death Arena Reality Show is a game wherein you will be in control of the main character that will be flying through some of the most treacherous areas. It will be firing shots automatically. You should help the character dodge all the enemies and their attacks while collecting all the coins and other useful things. The upgrades will be very helpful.

paris-rex.name: Paris Rex
paris-rex.description: Play this game wherein you will be seen controlling the monster being who is in the city of Paris. You have to do exceptionally well to let it survive through the 16 levels of the game. Let the monster devour all the human beings and wreck maximum damage while looking to go through each level of the game.

ninja-run.name: Ninja Run
ninja-run.description: Ninja Run is an action packed platform game in which your main goal is to get to the temple. The only way to reach the temple is by running, jumping and slashing through the red ninja defense. Slash the power ups that come in your way but the most important thing is to stay on the platform all the time.

big-bad-ape.name: Big Bad Ape
big-bad-ape.description: You are the big ape in this game that has 16 awesome levels. Unleash your fury on the humans living in the place. Break free from the custody that you are kept in and then go around destroying everything and eating up all the human beings that come in your way. Survival will become harder as the levels increase.

los-angeles-shark.name: Los Angeles Shark
los-angeles-shark.description: The shark has moved to the beaches of Los Angeles. It is very angry with the presence of the humans at the beach. In fact some of the humans are here to capture the shark. Being in control of the shark you have to unleash fury on the people by killing them and by causing massive destruction at the beach.

kingslayer.name: Kingslayer
kingslayer.description: Kingslayer is a game in which you are a poor farmer who is furious with the king of the land. He has burnt down your house and so you have made up your mind to slay the king. The quest will not be easy because there will be many enemies to kill before you can get to the king.

madness-hydraulic.name: Madness Hydraulic
madness-hydraulic.description: Madness Hydraulic is an action packed game in which you will be taking the role of the trained character who finds himself inside a facility where he is trapped and will be attacked by waves of enemies. You have to use the weapons and your fighting abilities to kill all the enemies before they take you down.

la-rex.name: LA Rex
la-rex.description: LA Rex is a game in which you are a Tyrannosaurus Rex and that justifies that you are very destructive in nature. Moreover, you are very hungry and that is what has made you very aggressive. You will have to destroy everything in each area and devour all the human beings that you see around.

gun-mayhem-redux.name: Gun Mayhem Redux
gun-mayhem-redux.description: This is a fast paced action game where you get to customize your character and control that character during the mayhem. Your character has to move and shoot effectively to take down all other characters on the play screen. Remember that the other characters will be looking to shoot you down as well and you should dodge their attacks to survive.

feed-us-lost-island.name: Feed Us Lost Island
feed-us-lost-island.description: Feed Us Lost Island is a bloody game in which the piranha is returning with more appetite for flesh and blood. You will be in control of the piranha as you play this game. Let the piranha devour everything to grow stronger and more dangerous. There will be specific objectives to accomplish in each area.

madness-lunacy.name: Madness Lunacy
madness-lunacy.description: Madness Lunacy is an action packed online game in which you find yourself inside the madness lab and you have to try to get out from there without getting killed. The enemies that you will be facing while you look to escape from the lab will not be easy to beat but there is no other way to escape.

mario-logs.name: Mario Logs
mario-logs.description: Try to keep the scales balanced while adding more and more stuff!

bash.name: Bash
bash.description: Bash the rocks on the monsters, collect the coins and avoid/jump the spikes. See if you can score high.

mario-kick-ass.name: Mario Kick Ass
mario-kick-ass.description: Your Super Mario! What does that mean? It means you gotta go kick Bowser's ass. And that's exactly what your going to do. A cool Mario fighting game! Show your Mario fighting skills against all the favorite characters from the games.

mario-new-extreme-3.name: Mario New Extreme 3
mario-new-extreme-3.description: New Mario styled game. This time you must take hammer to break  walls and get key which open the door.  Beware of falling rocks!You need to be fast! Your enemy will try to stop you. Look for upgrade and get extra life! Enjoy in this funny adventure game with 15 levels! Good Luck!

beach-fighting.name: Beach Fighting
beach-fighting.description: The world wide beach Boxing competition has started

three-kingdoms.name: Three Kingdoms
three-kingdoms.description: Three Kingdoms, legend of Huang Zhong!

winter-rush-2.name: Winter rush 2
winter-rush-2.description: You control a snowmobile which rushes down a dangerous path. On the way you will encounter various obstacles as well as bonuses and coins. For the money you can improve your snowmobile for example increase the speed, maneuverability, or fill up your gas tank. All this will help you in your adventures.

mass-mayhem-4.name: Mass Mayhem 4
mass-mayhem-4.description: Go on crazy killing sprees and destroy everything in your path. Upgrade your weapons and create total havoc! Game controls: Arrow keys to move and aim. Up key to use jet-pack. Spacebar to use or drop weapons.

ninjakira.name: NinjaKira
ninjakira.description: Ninjakira is a brave ninja warrior .Help him on his fight with his enemies.He must get back his honnor

bobby-da-arrow.name: Bobby Da Arrow
bobby-da-arrow.description: Goblin hordes have invaded the peaceful kingdom of Alreo. . . can you beat this goblin invasion?

kungfu-panda.name: Kungfu Panda
kungfu-panda.description: Help the kung fu panda to collect more coins and get ranked in the highscore list. There is no loading interface, so please be patient while the game is loading. Click left mouse button to jump, and while you are jumping click and hold on the left mouse button to use the grappler and make a super jump.

racing-cartoon-differences.name: Racing Cartoon Differences
racing-cartoon-differences.description: Racing Cartoon Differences is a game for people who love racing games and puzzle games. You have to find the things which are not the same in both racing images. Good luck.

dual-color-fairy-2.name: Dual Color Fairy 2
dual-color-fairy-2.description: The beautiful forest is polluted and destroyed, and animals lost the place they live by. So animals decide to ask help for the dual color fairy who is Neil and Paabo. Then the dual color fairy start a adventure for a new home. But there are many difficulties in the adventure. So let's help them. The second is more splendid. Instruction:P1:A. D to move，W to jumpP2：←，→to move，↑to jump

storm-atv-racing.name: Storm ATV Racing
storm-atv-racing.description: Winter it's here so if you are up for a snow racing challenge, we got the perfect game for you. Prove your   skills in this new winter driving challenge. Use arrow keys to balance and drive the unlocked ATVs. The game offers 10 intense and addicting levels  ,so do your best! Speed up and jump over obstacles on your way.And try to land safe and make it to the finish line. After each 3 levels won on first   place you will unlock a new better and faster ATV. Be the best driver from the game, and have fun!

tom-and-jerry-action.name: Tom And Jerry Action
tom-and-jerry-action.description: Tom And Jerry are now friends!  Help them to collect all cheese and reach to the finish. This time Jerry must take hammer for breaking walls.  Tom has to get keys to open doors.  You have 15 levels. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

the-grand-police-escape.name: The Grand Police Escape
the-grand-police-escape.description: You've just robbed a bank together with your partner and now the police is trying to catch you. You have to drive your red muscle car in the city and try to escape police. You have to get to the place marked on the map to get to the next level. Your partner will help you with instructions sometimes.

the-brawl-batman.name: The Brawl - Batman
the-brawl-batman.description: The Brawl is a celebrity boxing game that lets you bash the most annoying celebrities. Finally we get to kick the most annoying super-hero, Batman. Bing, Bam, pow!

udder-chaos.name: Udder Chaos
udder-chaos.description: Stop the farm animals from stealing your corn.

the-orc-slayer.name: The Orc Slayer
the-orc-slayer.description: One day our hero was walking through the forest and suddenly found the mystical weapon known as orc slayer. With its power the boy will finally be able to defeat the evil dragon king with your help.Use Z or Up to jump.Use X or Ctrl to attack.Use S or Down to slide down.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: Eruption is a mouse avoider style game, in which players have to guide their ship out of an exploding volcano. Players have to dodge fireballs which fly upwards from the bottom of the volcano and navigate around rocky outcroppings that jut out from either side of the passageway. Hitting either of these hazards results in an unfortunate explosion and ends the game. The longer the player survives the higher the score will be.

jade-wolf-2.name: Jade Wolf 2
jade-wolf-2.description: Sonic the Hedgehog meets Okami! Awesome wolf platformer

revenge-of-the-hulk.name: Revenge Of The Hulk
revenge-of-the-hulk.description: The Hulk is very angry and destroys everything that's in his way. Can you help him with destroying everything to reduce his fury?

gold-intuition.name: Gold Intuition
gold-intuition.description: How far can you get without losing your life? Play a fun mini-game try to finish the 3 levels as many times as you can.

hellgate-defender.name: Hellgate Defender
hellgate-defender.description: Save the kingdom from soldiers who awoke from death. In here you will be a knight who assigned to defend the kingdom. Kindom repeatedly attacked by soldiers who awoke from death so you must be a strong knight to block them enter the kingdom. Use special skills to beat them with spectacular attack. Buy special skills in the store.

science-connect.name: Science Connect
science-connect.description: This is a science theme connect identical items Board Game. In this game you need to clear the board by connecting identical item pairs. Each time you connect 2 items they will be removed from the board. While connecting you must obey a simple rule which says that both items must be connected via a line which should not have more than 2 turns. In other words the path of connection between 2 identical Items must not contain more than 2 turns.

transformer-2.name: Transformer 2
transformer-2.description: For saveing the last grass on the earth, the little transformer overcome the difficulties to fine the water. Control:body:A/D to move, W to hang;foot:←→ to move, ↑ to jump. When the body near the foot, E to transform.

monster-eats-food.name: Monster Eats Food
monster-eats-food.description: Meanwhile in Monsterland, a group of few hungry monsters are competing with each other in a fast food eating game, where the fastest monster could be the next eating champ. Monster Eats Food offers a relaxing 2 player gameplay.

icewalker.name: Icewalker
icewalker.description: The man was landed on an iceland. Now it is time for him to find a way to get outof this freezing place. Help him solve puzzles, collect coins and stay alive in this cold and dangerous world. use keyboard to play

santa-rocket-sledge.name: Santa Rocket Sledge
santa-rocket-sledge.description: Santa is in his Rocket Sledge racing to get from town to town. Race against his friends like The Eskimo, Snowman and reindeer. Watch out from obstacle in your path or you will crash.

empire-defender.name: Empire Defender
empire-defender.description: Your empire is under attack. Defend your empire from hordes of monster creatures, lead your warrior to beat them with dozens of weapons, spells, traps and power ups. There are 86 upgrades of items and collect challenging medals in this action defense game. Controls: Move Mouse to Target, Click Mouse/Spacebar to Shoot/Action. See ingame for shortcuts.

zombie-impaler.name: Zombie Impaler
zombie-impaler.description: Zombie Impaler is an Archery game that follows the ever-growing epidemic of Zombies that have risen from the dead within the confines of a small scenic village. Use your Bow and Arrow to eradicate the undead before they have a chance to escape. Aim for the head to boost your score. Make every shot count as the fate of the world rests on your Shoulders!

cops-and-robbers.name: Cops And Robbers
cops-and-robbers.description: Grimeport city is overrun by criminals. . your job is to chase them down, and bring them in!"Cops and Robbers" is a fun chaotic game, which is simple to play and addictive. It is a variation on the running platformer genre, with a twist - which is that you are always chasing a robber across the randomly generated scenery.

cubikill-6.name: Cubikill 6
cubikill-6.description: Take revenge on your co-worker Dave and go on a killing spree!Game controls:Mouse to move around, pick up objects and use them.

smash-the-swine.name: Smash The Swine
smash-the-swine.description: Take something heavy and try to smash the swines' heads as quickly as possible. Deal more damage than your opponent does. Have fun!Player 1: Use S key to attack, Player 2: use Down Arrow key to attack.

pirate-monsters.name: Pirate Monsters
pirate-monsters.description: Blast all monsters off the ship. Place the tools and weapons strategically and blast them away. There are 25 levels, addicting game play and different monsters waiting for you. Drag the bombs and other weapons onto the ship. Create chain reactions and get rid of all the pirate monsters.

super-mario-battle.name: Super Mario Battle
super-mario-battle.description: Mario and Luigi are the best partners in crime against the big evil boss Bowser. Again, this time Mario and Luigi team up to fight against Bowser and his army. Defeat the evil force and bring back happiness for the world. There are several levels in this game. Defeat all the monsters and bosses in each level in order to advance to the next level.

jerry-bombing-tom.name: Jerry Bombing Tom
jerry-bombing-tom.description: Jerry and Tom are rivals, they often fight. One day, Jerry got a cannon, he used the cannon to attack Tom, but he doesn't know how to control, let us help him. Instruction:Only click the mouse.

retro-gunners.name: Retro Gunners
retro-gunners.description: Guide the Retro runners as they run and jump their way through an endless horde of enemies and hazardous obstacles.

lonely-ranger.name: Lonely Ranger
lonely-ranger.description: The lonely ranger will be grateful of your hard work on those fast-pasted high-streets, making you the champion of car racing games online. Seven levels of police chase fun are waiting for you to come and join the race of a lifetime, so don't just be a lonely ranger, but rather be the champion in the police academy, that will win any racing competition, as well as establishing the order on the streets again.

no-mutants-allowed.name: No Mutants Allowed
no-mutants-allowed.description: No Mutants Allowed is a challenging, frantic, fast-paced action game! After a post-nuclear breakout, mutants are emerging from their depths, crawling to the surface and rampaging across the desert towards the city! Defend your base, using your best shooting skills, building up a small army, and learning new abilities. The safety of the city is on your shoulders!

prince-vs-samurai.name: Prince Vs Samurai
prince-vs-samurai.description: Once there were knight brothers, each of them has a magical sword. The evil wizard wanted to get them, he cheated the knight brothers into his castle and set a lot of organs, could brothers defeat the wizard and go out?control:p1 control:"ad" move, "w" jump, "s" attack, jump to switch. p2 control:"←→" move，"↑" jump，"↓" attack, attack to switch.

new-ninja-battle.name: New Ninja Battle
new-ninja-battle.description: Intense game of skill and reflexes. 15 levels of skills, obstacles to avoid and stylish moves. Some objects in the game can be broken. Prepare yourself for an action ride and try to beat all levels.

doodieman-agent.name: DoodieMan Agent
doodieman-agent.description: A group of terrorists groups and a weapons manufacturer with surface of collusion, illegal arms trade, endanger the security of the people, they are planning to attack American embassy. Agent hero DoodieMan in order to eliminate the terrorists, alone broke into the camp, and destroy the enemy. Control:Use the mouse to aim and shoot;AD/←→ to move;Double click the AD/←→ to dodge;W/↑ to jump;S/↓ to squat, hold for a period of time can reply blood.

pawn-wars.name: Pawn Wars
pawn-wars.description: Pawn Wars is a action packed strategy game. Fight the pawns of other kingdoms and capture their buildings. Build and upgrade your base and defense. Attack the enemy pawns and defeat them all. See the upgrade and achievements options in the world map. It will keep you playing for a long time, really a recommended game. Mouse, see detailed in game intructions.

get-my-pill-back.name: Get my Pill Back
get-my-pill-back.description: These are two monster born without feet。To be able to have legs like other little monster。They are going to look for a magic pill can make them grow legs。Along the way is very dangerous, come to help them.Controls:P1 use 'AD' to move, 'W' to jump, 'S' unload body, 'Q' load body;P2 use ←→ to move, ↑to jump，↓unload body，NUMPADZERO load body.

xmasters.name: Xmasters
xmasters.description: Be part of the tournament which decides who is going to deliver the presents this xmas, Use Santa Claus, Rudolph, Snow Queen, Jack Frost, Odion or Super Dude and win the tournament.

prince-of-persia-mini-game-edition.name: Prince of Persia: Mini-Game Edition
prince-of-persia-mini-game-edition.description: Conquer all five elemental trials as the Prince of Persia, testing your gaming skills in a variety of challenges.  Compete with your friends for the highest score!

snail-superman.name: Snail Superman
snail-superman.description: Two snails lost their way home because of fun.For get home before their mom back home,they must embark on a full of danger shortcut.Follow their adventure together.

sift-heads-cartels.name: Sift Heads - Cartels
sift-heads-cartels.description: Vinnie finds himself on the verge of death, pinned up against urban gangsters keeping him from his side-partner Shorty.

cyber-rush.name: Cyber Rush
cyber-rush.description: When you get trapped in your own computer game and the cyber tunnel starts to cave in, your run begins. Unlock achievements and collect powerups along the way!

bubble-pop.name: Bubble Pop
bubble-pop.description: Collect those bubbles and dodge those scary ghosts in this fun two player arcade game. More at 2pg.com

spanthera.name: Spanthera
spanthera.description: Lizard enemies are invading your kingdom. Defeat them and protect Spanthera using your holy spear vibrissa!

epic-celeb-brawl-spiderman.name: Epic Celeb Brawl - Spiderman
epic-celeb-brawl-spiderman.description: Are you ready for an Epic Celebrity Brawl? Fight the most popular celebrities, singers, actors and A-list celebs. This is no ordinary boxing game, this is a true street style fighting brawl! Give these annoying celebs a taste of your rage, get awesome combos and buy heavy hitting weapons. This Brawl features the Amazing Spider-Man. Think you can defeat him? Good luck!

ronald-the-fish-cave-escape.name: RONALD THE FISH: Cave Escape
ronald-the-fish-cave-escape.description: Ronald must to take a part in TV show to get a freedom. - 4 types of GAMEPLAY: complete the level, survive, mission, kill the boss. - 5 types of WEAPON and weapons special ABILITIES- 12 levels- very big levels

climb-or-drown-2.name: Climb Or Drown 2
climb-or-drown-2.description: Will you climb or will you drown? The action pack avalanche game returns with a GamesButler exclusive lava mode! How high can you climb before you meet your fate?

beyond-lightspeed.name: Beyond Lightspeed
beyond-lightspeed.description: Beyond Lightspeed is a flash game where you travel through space in a starship in 3D as fast as you can. Accelerate your ship until you get beyond the speed of light! But Space is filled with dangerous asteroids. How fast can you go? And how far into deep space can you travel? Play Beyond Lightspeed to find out!

king-save-princess.name: King Save Princess
king-save-princess.description: There was once a very greedy king. One day, he invited the god of wine to be his guest. The god very happy, and he promised to help the king one wish, King gained the Middas touch capability, since then, he would touch the any stuff into gold. However, human he touched will be to gold. Soon his side did not even have a living. In order to eliminate this curse, he must pass the Sacred Stone so that he could hug his daughter.

knigh-princess-great-escape-2.name: Knigh Princess Great Escape 2
knigh-princess-great-escape-2.description: The princess was locked up in the dungeon by witch, because witch envy beautiful of princess. Brave knight to rescue the princess, entered the dungeon. There are variety of risk and the witch's minions. Can he successfully rescued the princess? Knigh Princess Great Escape 2 , we go on adventures. Controls:Knight:'AD' to move, 'W' to jump, 'S' to attack; Princess:←→ to move, ↑to jump, ↓to charm enemy.

spider-stickman-4.name: Spider Stickman 4
spider-stickman-4.description: The free falling stickman returns with more obstacles to swing between. Avoid the big bad wolf in this Red Riding Hood themed game. Launch your web and swing from platform to platform without falling down down below. Perfect your skill and see how far can you travel in this addicting distance style game?

slime-prince.name: Slime Prince.
slime-prince.description: Slime brothers wanted to travel around The Alice in Wonderland. They found that there are demons everywhere. So, they decided to check it out into the depth of Wonderland. Controls:P1:'WASD' to moveP2:'←→↑↓' to move

toy-block-superman.name: Toy Block Superman
toy-block-superman.description: Superman Tom to go to desert to travel, inadvertently found that there are many gold, the depths of the desert is full of risks and challenges, but Tom brave go on to dig more gold, followed Tom and go to dig gold together. Controls:Use '←→' to move, '↑' to jump, '↓' to use key , Z' to use drill, 'X' to use fire, 'C' to use shield

magical-glory.name: Magical Glory
magical-glory.description: Shoot arrows and cast mighty spells to defense your fort! Can you stand strong in front of the none-stopping attack waves?

blade-rush.name: Blade Rush
blade-rush.description: A fast paced ninja stealth game using classic platform controls with new abilities. You are a professional killer, and you have been sent to eliminate a VIP person. Now you must go through the whole city to reach your victim. The police is warned about your intentions, thus looks like you will have to fight your way. Good luck!

gogly-2.name: Gogly 2
gogly-2.description: In this 30 levels game, you have to kill only the bad Gogly monstersRed, green, pink monsters… in the middle-ages, knights fought against the bad monsters, it is time to help them with this 30 levels game and kills the number of bad monsters you are asked for or more. It is Gogly 2.In Gogly 2, you kill the gogly monsters with your mouse.

snow-white-save-dwarf-2.name: Snow White Save Dwarf 2
snow-white-save-dwarf-2.description: Dwarf were caught by the evil dragon, with the help of prince, they decided to fine the dwarf.

2013-long-hair-trends.name: 2013 Long Hair Trends
2013-long-hair-trends.description: Hey all of you gals there, Margret wants you to join her in designer games. She is going to play long-hair trends a game which she likes the most. Just direct her when she goes wrong in the game.

politricks.name: Politricks
politricks.description: Mr. President is on the mission to deal with the US national debt once and for all. Help him to save the country from going bunkrupt!

pixel-dash.name: Pixel Dash
pixel-dash.description: Dash your way through 30 levels in this pixel platform game. Avoid obstacles and try to collect all coins to beat the level. Move with the arrow keys and use Z to dash.

kings-rider.name: Kings Rider
kings-rider.description: Ride your horse to battle in your quest to crush the dark wizard and get back the peasant treasure.

eat-rockets-2-wizard.name: Eat Rockets 2: Wizard
eat-rockets-2-wizard.description: Eat Rockets 2 is a follow-up to the first game that garnered 2 million hits. Your objective in Eat Rockets 2 is to destroy all the mindless golems by guiding your lightning bolts through a series of challenging obstacles and try to get to the target as fast as you can. Enjoy killing the golems! Good luck!

straight-to-the-exit-3.name: Straight To The Exit 3
straight-to-the-exit-3.description: The little green monster wants to escape from labyrinth shaped castle. It is not easy, because there are lots of traps in the castle. In 30 levels of the game you will help one eyed little green monster to exit from the castle and survive

flight-of-the-hamsters.name: Flight Of The Hamsters
flight-of-the-hamsters.description: Click your mouse button to start the hamster in motion. When the hamster lines up with the pillow, click again to launch the hamster. While flying, click and hold your mouse button to use Glide Power! Grab items to keep the hamster in the air for as long as possible. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Instructionsclick mouse button, when hamster going down

the-brawl-gangnam-style.name: The Brawl - Gangnam Style
the-brawl-gangnam-style.description: The Brawl is a celebrity boxing game that lets you bash the most annoying celebrities. Finally we get to kick the annoying Korean singer Psy.

devils-leap-2.name: Devil's Leap 2
devils-leap-2.description: You are the devil! And your goal is to destroy everything and everyone!

halloween-rampage.name: Halloween Rampage
halloween-rampage.description: You are locked in the cemetery, hundreds of creatures are coming from death. Use your weapons to unleash the Halloween Rampage. Play the 4 extra level to play a more challenging experience. Use mouse and WAD Keys

chicken-and-duck-2.name: Chicken And Duck 2
chicken-and-duck-2.description: Chicken and duck 2!Chicks and ducklings big adventure began, we quickly entered the game to help them two brothers!!!!If you want to use other role, need to have rescued them first!p1: AD control chicken move, W to jump, S weapon fire, the blank space key switch weapons;p2: The direction key control duck move, up to jump, down weapon fire, the blank space key switch weapons.

tomoo.name: Tomoo
tomoo.description: An adventure platformer with 20 levels. Run, jump and fly with Tomoo. Use his special ears to fly and to carry things. Your mission is to collect all the monster teeth and find the exit of each level. A challenging platformer for all ages. Arrow keys to move. A or UP to jump/fly and S to pickup items.

naruto-war-11.name: Naruto War 1.1
naruto-war-11.description: Naruto War 1.1 is a game faithful to the original anime. Players can control characters from the anime to conduct different missions, Then upgrade themselves and learn skills.

gogy-mad-launch.name: GoGy Mad Launch
gogy-mad-launch.description: GoGy must find his lover who got lost in space. launch GoGy as far as possible, upgrade yourself and the GoGy aliens to save GoGy's lover.

fire-and-ice-samurai.name: Fire And Ice Samurai
fire-and-ice-samurai.description: Blue Knight: ← → arrow keys to move around, the arrow keys ↑ jump, the number keys 1 key attack / cast skills, the arrow keys ↓ defense. Red Knight: AD keys to move around, W key to jump, J key attack / cast skills, S key defense.

defence-of-portal-2.name: Defence Of Portal 2
defence-of-portal-2.description: Back Defense of Portal with much more action than before! in this second part, you have to stop waves of monsters, giants, evil insects and giant bosses, go upgrading your equipment, properly used defense towers to ensure your world, Great shooting game!

orangutans-great-escape.name: Orangutans Great Escape
orangutans-great-escape.description: The two Oranguatans just escaped from their cage. They need to find ways to get out from the cave where they were locked up. The cave is full of traps and their are guards patrolling on the platform. Kill those guards and get to the exit on each levelto advance to the next level.

mario-xtreme-escape.name: Mario Xtreme Escape
mario-xtreme-escape.description: Help Mario to collect all mushrooms and reach to the finish. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

tramp-adventure.name: Tramp Adventure
tramp-adventure.description: Hank was a tramp. One day, he saw the reward for the eradication of Brigands Sweep groups in a city. And he wanted to get the rewards very badly. So he decided to get the reward assignment. For the rewards, let's go with him!Controls:A, D/←→ to move, ↑ to jump, press ↓to attack the enemies with the hammer.

sift-renegade-2.name: Sift Renegade 2
sift-renegade-2.description: Sift Renegade 2 features some new action packed fighting levels and intense plot-twisting storyline as Kiro meets new enemies with new rage mode, and special attacks.

boy-and-girl.name: Boy And Girl
boy-and-girl.description: “Boy and Girl” is more than just a game! It can also test your cooperation with your BFF, BF/GF and pals! The reason? Bingo! This game supports 2-player mode! Now you understand why it is called "Boy and Girl", right? Every level is designed for your collaboration. When you pass all the levels, your relationship will be closer than ever for sure! P.S  You can play 2-player mode with both your left and right hands. Warning: You might not be able to enjoy the true fun!

carrot-fantasy-extreme.name: Carrot Fantasy Extreme
carrot-fantasy-extreme.description: Carrot Fantasy Extreme is a fantasy-themed tower defense game! Protect your carrot from various monsters by placing different creatures along the path to help slow down and attack enemies. Every creature has a different ability, so place them wisely. You can also upgrade them to help make things even easier! Don't forget to destroy your surroundings so you can make more room for defenses!

spongebob-fart.name: Spongebob Fart
spongebob-fart.description: SpongeBob SquarePants eat too much junk food, he ate a bad stomach and a lot of very loud fart. He and Patrick are waiting for a bus, he can't hold to put, he will in the auto generated noise sneak out and not let Patrick heard. Control:Press the Space to fart, press '←' put fart silent leak.

speedy-the-bird.name: Speedy The Bird
speedy-the-bird.description: Help Speedy the Bird in this game to find his way back to the bird’s nest. Run through 3 different worlds and purchase upgrades after each day to complete the story in as little days as you can. Play endless mode to run for the high score.

fronts-no-retreat.name: Fronts No Retreat
fronts-no-retreat.description: The Dictator Tamerlane must fall. Lead the invasion and bring him to justice! Use all of your tactical and strategy skills to defeat him.

ground-battles.name: Ground Battles
ground-battles.description: Eat all enemies to pass through all exciting levels in single player mode, or defeat the game levels in 2 players CO-OP, or if you prefer challenges - play in 2 player VS mode with your friends. Have fun!!!Player1 : W, A, S, D keys Player2 : Arrow keys

sweetbad.name: Sweet&Bad
sweetbad.description: Try to gather as more candies as you can. Avoid monsters, try kill them with powerful Power Ups. Let the Halloween night begins. player 1: Arrowsplayer 2: WASDLife PoweUp – add one lifeGarlic PowerUp – add ability to kill monsters by collisionElectro PowerUP – creates a Electro wave, which kills monstersCandy PowerUp – transform enemies to candies for some time

leaperbot.name: Leaperbot
leaperbot.description: Save the infected bots by leaping into them

mario-alien-invaders.name: Mario Alien Invaders
mario-alien-invaders.description: Aliens is here and Mario have to save the planet.

frantic-ninjas.name: Frantic Ninjas
frantic-ninjas.description: Ancient ninjas has returned from their dark prison to the living world and as often happens you are the only one who can save the world from being destroyed and ruled by evil. So get ready to fight all evil ninjas one by one, cause only a black ninja can fight down the evil ninjas and save the world! Or just have fun with your friends in the 2 player mode.

anti-meow-force.name: Anti Meow Force
anti-meow-force.description: In the action packed Anti Meow Force game you have to help prof X to bring back fish population back to normal. An epic sidescroller shooter, featuring 7 unique weapons with upgrades, 18 stages and 1 epic boss battle. Stunning graphics and gameplay will keep you playing for hours.

avengers-comeback.name: Avengers Comeback
avengers-comeback.description: Stop and annihilate all of the robots who came from other planets and wanted to occupy the earth. Instructions: p1: W/S/A/D to move, J to fire, K to skills;P2: ↑/↓/←/→ to move, key 1 to fire, key 2 to skillsIron Man skills: K/2 to sprint. Captain America skills: K/2 to parry. Hulk skills: K/2 to jump.

zombie-apocalypse-td.name: Zombie Apocalypse TD
zombie-apocalypse-td.description: Zombies are all over the place, protect the guy in the center on the tower. Click the tunnel exits to let the trains drive when the Zombies are on the track. Buy new items after each wave to stop more zombies and unlock achievements. Try to stop all the zombies.

food-zombies.name: Food Zombies
food-zombies.description: Food Zombies is a Tower Defense Game in which you defend your restaurant against Zombies! Place down Mutated Food Towers to hold them back, complete all 16 waves and defeat the boss to complete the game!

spiderman-lizard-clone.name: Spiderman Lizard Clone
spiderman-lizard-clone.description: REMOVED FOR SUBMITTER - The Lizard has find the way to clone himself. Only Spiderman can stop him. Move around the town in 3D where you have find and destroy all the Lizard Clones by using your spidy webs to shoot at them. Hold as many waves as you can, competing for the highest score.

emo-nail-fashion.name: Emo Nail Fashion
emo-nail-fashion.description: Lorraine is very fond of all kinds of EMO fashions which include the dress as well as the nail paintings. She has learnt about EMO nail paints from fashion websites for girls. Please do help her!

hasher.name: Hasher
hasher.description: You are brave space marine lost on the surface of hostile planet and your mission is to shoot hordes of zombies using different fire modes of your rifle, try to shoot fast and collect power ups in order to survive and get the highest score. Use the mouse to play.

finger-vs-axes.name: Finger VS Axes
finger-vs-axes.description: Finger VS Axes is a funny action game where you are the big boss. Use your finger to taunt the enemy. Swipe to evade & avoid its attacks. Bash and smash it on rocks when it's time! A fun arcade game featuring awesome weapon upgrades like a ball & chain, a machine gun turret, and a resistance shield. Play in multiple worlds and levels, with a progression difficulty. A small, fun and original game made to be interactive and entertaining. Enjoy!

ng.name: NG
ng.description: Play as a fast treasure-hunter Ninja: make your way to the gold chest skipping obstacles, avoid and killing dreadly enemy ninjas, and face the terrible boss at the end of your path to win the Great Treasure.Run through 40 fast-paced levels in this 8-bit style platform game.

run-ram-run.name: Run Ram Run
run-ram-run.description: Singleplayer - Time mode: Play as long as you have enough time and reach new high scores for the leaderboard. Singleplayer - Level mode: Beat your way through 15 levels and destroy formations of bubbles. Multiplayer - Rush mode: Play locally against your friend and get the highest score in 120 seconds.

heavy-legion.name: Heavy Legion
heavy-legion.description: Take a heavy tank and go to the battlefield to test the tank abilities. Launch missiles from the cannon and kill all enemy tank units before they destroy your tank.

fruit-of-pirate-king.name: Fruit Of Pirate King
fruit-of-pirate-king.description: Function of Fruit:Pitaya--Power fruit, give you strength to kill enimies and push wood box. Banana--Air fruit, you can jump higher when eating it. Watermelon--Water fruit, give you ability to dive through the sea and stand on the cloud. Find the part of map in treasure box in each level to unlock the next level.

chicken-home.name: Chicken Home
chicken-home.description: Chicken wants to go home. Help him find it.

stop-gmo.name: Stop GMO
stop-gmo.description: Have you ever dream of fighting a salad? Here is your chance! Fight the genetically modified vegetables!

stop-gmo-2.name: Stop GMO 2
stop-gmo-2.description: Make a salad or become one! The fun game is back again!

abe-clone-wars.name: Abe Clone Wars
abe-clone-wars.description: The droid start attacking the remaining human resistance with they clone assault robot. It is controled via main server unit that deployed on each region of their attack. Your duty to disable this server unit and disarmed their clone robot.w/up arrow = upa/left arrow = leftd/right arrow = rightmouse = firespace = teleport1,2 = change gunsp,esc = pause/menu/sound

cinderella-saved-prince.name: Cinderella Saved Prince
cinderella-saved-prince.description: Settings: Someday, the prince who lived with the Cinderella happily was missed. While the Cinderella paniced, a witch came to help her. Next, what was comming ? And could they rescue the prince?Instructions:Witch: A, D to move , W to jump , S to cast Cinderella:←→ to move , ↑to jump灰姑娘救王子

furry-fighter.name: Furry Fighter
furry-fighter.description: Choose your cat and enter the wrestling league of Suntown city. Upgrade your cat's skills and buy items from the inventory to power up your hero!

snow-queen-save-princess.name: Snow Queen Save Princess
snow-queen-save-princess.description: The snow queen lives happiness after she unlock her heart, but her lovely sister has kidnaped, she has to save her with snowman, let's do it quickly. Instruction:Snow queen:AD to move, W to jump, S to skill;Snowman:←→ to move, ↑ to jump, ↓ to skill.

dino-meat-hunt-2.name: Dino Meat Hunt 2
dino-meat-hunt-2.description: The big and little dino is back to dinosaur time. This time they are powered up with new boost on armor and weapon. In the world of dinosaur, the big and little dino need to collect all the meat in the area to survive from starvation. The big dino has the ability to attack with his deadly claw, and the little dino can shoot fireball to kill the enemy. Help both of them collect all the meat on the platform. Watch out for other animals on the platform. use keyboard to play

crazy-turret-defense.name: Crazy Turret Defense
crazy-turret-defense.description: Great game is Crazy Turret Defense. Your main goal is to defend your space galactic race, from the meteor invaders. Try to destroy, as many meteors as you can. The more you destroy, the higher rank you will earn! The higher level you earn, the faster and the bigger the meteors will be, so be careful and put all your energy and concentration to destroy all upcoming space invaders.

mickey-super-adventure-2.name: Mickey Super Adventure 2
mickey-super-adventure-2.description: Help Mickey this time to find his way to home and rescue his friends. Take hammer to break walls and keys to open doors. Look for upgrades and get extra life!  You have 15 levels to complete the game.  Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

pixel-outlaw.name: Pixel Outlaw
pixel-outlaw.description: You are the outlaw who has to escape from the police, this will be though but possible. Fight yourself to the finish and do not get caught. How much chaos can you cause before they hit you? During your trip you can collect health armor and new weapons. Use them wisely! You score points by destroying the enemy. This retro pixel game is fun for everyone and reminds you of the good old days.

astro-buster.name: Astro Buster
astro-buster.description: Why travelling 500.000 million kilometres? Defend the earth from incoming astroids and comets. Test your skills in this fast and fun defense game. Collect power-ups to improve your odds. This game is a new genre defense game. Defend the earth from incoming astroids and comets like 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko (or similar). This time we don't need Philae. Save the earth and destroy (by tapping) the astroids before they hit the earth. Tap in the direction of the astroid to destroy him. Have fun and enjoy with this new NowGamez game!

half-dead.name: Half Dead
half-dead.description: Your easy mission changed to real adventure. First, you have to survive. Next, find a way to escape, but when you discover what was really happened, you realise that now you are Half Dead..

royal-knights-tournament.name: Royal Knights Tournament
royal-knights-tournament.description: Grand Royal tournament began, the winner will be the princess loved and kingdom. So brave knights hold your weapon to defeat all enemies in front of you!Control:lance restrain sword；sword restrain shield；shield restrain lance1P: W，speed up； A/S/D， Select the lance、sword and shield2P:↑，speed up；←/↓/→，Select the lance、sword and shield

epic-celeb-brawl-miley-cyrus.name: Epic Celeb Brawl - Miley Cyrus
epic-celeb-brawl-miley-cyrus.description: Are you ready for an Epic Brawl, celebrity style? Do you want to fight the most popular celebrities? Singers, actors and A-list celebs . . . will all get their butt kicked. This is no ordinary boxing game, this is a hardcore street style fighting brawl! Give these annoying celebs a taste of your rage, get awesome combos and buy heavy hitting weapons.

frantic-planes.name: Frantic Planes
frantic-planes.description: The Monkey King is desperate, very perverse planes come to steal all his gold and his most precious statue, everything seems destined to end badly on the Pacific island where everything was happiness, but the Monkey King is not alone, all his people is assembled and comes to the rescue and a very special plane, introduce them to the hard battle, raises money, improving your looks, until the end in this awesome fighting, and bring happiness to the island!

ninja-darts-and-skulllisland-2.name: Ninja Darts And Skulllisland 2
ninja-darts-and-skulllisland-2.description: "AD" to move and slide on the wall, "W" to jump from the ground or wall, "S" to use the weapon. "←→" to move and slide on the wall, "↑" to jump from the ground or wall, "↓" to use the weapon.

monsters-fight.name: Monsters Fight
monsters-fight.description: Monsters Fight is a game to fight other monsters. You can perform a lot of tricks like in the old game Mortal Kombat. You have 2 mode so if you are good at it try the hard mode, you will love it.

bheem-chocolate-world.name: Bheem Chocolate World
bheem-chocolate-world.description: Bheem loves chocolate. Help Bheem to get all chocolates in all levels. There are a total of 16 levels.

bob-the-robber.name: Bob the Robber
bob-the-robber.description: Fair robber Bob declares war on mafia and corruption and starts crusade for evidences and a new money bag! Angry dogs, watchful securities and cameras, laser gratings and doors with secrets… The path to the goal will be thorny!

bouncy-fire-fighters.name: Bouncy Fire Fighters
bouncy-fire-fighters.description: Help the brave fire fighters to rescue the people from the fire. 20 levels of fun, 12 bonuses, some are good, some are not...

wolverine-heroes-defence.name: Wolverine - Heroes Defence
wolverine-heroes-defence.description: Wolverine is on a mission to protect some very important boxes when 4 super villains jump in his way and start attacking him to steal the boxes. Help wolverine defeat the villains and protect the boxes using all his power, strength and skills.

dr-lucy-clinic.name: Dr Lucy Clinic
dr-lucy-clinic.description: Kids are playing too much on holiday and they get sick. Could you help Dr Lucy to curing unhealthy kids? Check their body temperature and heartbeat then give them some medical treatment like vitamin injection and some other medicine.

punchifier.name: Punchifier
punchifier.description: Punch, punch and punch. A stress reliever where you can expel all your fury on. Customize a (fictional) character and beat him furiously. Or try the campaign mode where there’s 50 enemies that fight back.

the-pacific-hero.name: The Pacific - Hero
the-pacific-hero.description: You are a U. S. marine hero defending liberty against the Japan Empire during World War 2. - Move the mouse then use left mouse to fire. - Key A, D to move the Hero- Key AA, DD to run fly Hero- Key W to jump, key S to use sandbag- Press R to reload, only handgun is FREE. other gun must have the money to buy ammo- Press Space key to throw grenade. you must have 1500$/a grenade

fruit-slicer.name: Fruit Slicer
fruit-slicer.description: Use the mouse to move the spinning blade into the fruit and pop them. If 5 fruit leave the playing field the game is over. As you slice more fruit, the difficulty increases, causing the fruit to move faster, and enter the screen more often.

armored-warriors-atlis.name: Armored Warriors Atlis
armored-warriors-atlis.description: Ou Kese Prince Ram, Fu Ai force occupy UCP to harm human society. so we have to call Atlis to defeat Kese and maintain world peace.

brave-hussar-2.name: Brave Hussar 2
brave-hussar-2.description: The brave hussar returns to deal more damage to the Orcish army. Now the dragon riders, archers and swordsmen of the Orcish kingdom are in full force trying to stop him.

forest-encounter-2.name: Forest Encounter 2
forest-encounter-2.description: You are the last remaining defender. Hold back the invading army until reinforcements arrive.

spring-ninja-2.name: Spring Ninja 2
spring-ninja-2.description: Green ninjas drive fancy cars and your poor ninja red jumps over the world, but this will be your best weapon, you get back at them through 32 levels, where you must destroy them and leave them ridiculous, using jumps and double jumps and more stunts with the mouse, when you are in the air press the LMB to retain ninja and give more boost, get them!

world-zombies-cup.name: World Zombies Cup
world-zombies-cup.description: Have you got the football or soccer fever? Crazy things are going down in the world football or soccer cup series. Play for your favourite team and infect all the players on the field. Be responsible for a mass zombie invasion but watch out for the vigilant referees. A funny sport zombie game with a viral twist.

dawn-of-the-ninja.name: Dawn Of The Ninja
dawn-of-the-ninja.description: Dawn of the Sniper Ninja! Do you have a Ninja in yourself? Shoot down the bad ninja's and become the real warrior!

nerds-vs-geeks.name: Nerds Vs Geeks
nerds-vs-geeks.description: Nerds fight the Geeks in a 2 player showdown in the lab. Take over the lab as you play against the CPU or against a friend in this two player game fighting game. Multiplayer action or singleplayer action. Each fighter punch each other till you KO the opponent and move level by level till the whole lab is yours.

math-tank-run.name: Math Tank Run
math-tank-run.description: Math tank run is a math based tank run game. On the way there are several minefield. With the help of math you can escape from these minefields.

magnet-man-2.name: Magnet Man 2
magnet-man-2.description: Two guys woke up in a dark basement. They found themselves are diffrent from what they were before. They have magnetism, which is however imperfect. For returning to normal, They decided to find the person who made experiments on them . We are to help them find the person. Control:Magnet Man:Press A and D to move, W to jump, S to use like poles and attackMagnet Woman: Press ← and → to move, ↑ to jump, ↓ to use unlike poles and attack

ben10-save-gwen.name: Ben10 Save Gwen
ben10-save-gwen.description: Help Ben10 this time to find his way to finish and rescue his girlfriend Gwen. Take hammer to break walls and keys to open doors. Look for upgrades and get extra life!  You have 15 levels to complete the game.  Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

ultra-truck-racing.name: Ultra Truck Racing
ultra-truck-racing.description: Ultra Truck racing is a great blend of collectibles game and racing game. The both produces a great fast paced gameplay. In this game a rabbit will be on your truck to collect different things. You can click to make the rabbit jump for collecting the things. Each time rabbit jumps it brings some useful or useless item for truck to remain in the race. Explore the game by reading how to play screen.

animal-massacre.name: Animal Massacre
animal-massacre.description: Rack up points by shooting the different animals. Use up or spacebar to shoot and the arrow keys to move.

frontline-defenders.name: Frontline Defenders
frontline-defenders.description: Frontline Defender is an action-packed strategy-shooter game! Your city is under siege from enemy troops and things look desperate as your soldiers have fallen back, with only a small barricade to protect them. Everything's on your shoulders now! Pick up the slack of your fellow soldiers and shoot any remaining enemies upon sight! It's time to shape up your soldiers, tighten up your defenses and sharpen your aim as you defend the ruins of your once glorious city!

priest-vs-evil.name: Priest vs Evil
priest-vs-evil.description: Priest Vs Evil is a crazy action game packed with holy retribution and gore galore! The evil undead have risen from their graves, taking your town by storm and infecting the locals with their grotesque disease. You're no peace-loving pastor, though; you're a vengeful priest who's not afraid to get his hands dirty to save the town! Pick up every weapon you can, from baseball bats to flamethrowers in your mission to bring evil to its knees!

ben-10-malware.name: Ben 10 Malware
ben-10-malware.description: Help Ben defeat Malware with the help of Shocksquatch and Spidermonkey!

tiny-galaxy-wars.name: Tiny Galaxy Wars
tiny-galaxy-wars.description: Lead the starship USS Horizon beyond galaxy. Defeat the enemies and respond to the call for help.

feed-us-happy.name: Feed Us Happy
feed-us-happy.description: This fish is insane. He keeps growing and growing and eats everything he saw. He upgrades his all parts of the body like jaws, spine, and even a torpedo. But watch out for the sharks and crocodiles, you're gonna be eaten by them. And also, there is a giant octopus waiting for you and ready to eat you. But fear not, because you're a PyranhaPress space to swimavoid the rockseats fishes and humans

roboghost.name: Roboghost
roboghost.description: Get all the energy seeds and go to the portal. Lead our little friend in this puzzle platform and help him to save the roboghost.

ninja-assassination.name: Ninja Assassination
ninja-assassination.description: As a successful Ninja, you always perfect to finish every task. this time you are going go destroy the all guarding soldiers of the Camp. Can you successfully to complete the task, let's wait and see. Controls:"A", "D"key to move, "W"key to jump. "S"key to attack enemy, Click the left mouse button to Launch darts.

steam-pirate.name: Steam Pirate
steam-pirate.description: Play as a legendary pirate of the 7 seas and skies! Defend your treasure maps using your dual swords and dual pistols. And if that's not enough, drop some butt-kickin' turrets on them as well! Uniqe steampunk/pirate Hack n Slash game with Tower Defense elements.

shooting-game.name: Shooting Game
shooting-game.description: The alins are invading earth kill them all

droid-hunter.name: Droid Hunter
droid-hunter.description: Droids invaded the city. You must collect energy cells, armor cells and upgrade cells. Pink cells are upgrade cells and you can upgrade your weapon with them.  Destroy all the droids.

the-boomlands-world-wars.name: The Boomlands: World Wars
the-boomlands-world-wars.description: The Boomlands: World Wars is an interesting twist on the strategy genre! Gather resources and guide your men to battle, to take over the opposing king's castle! Watch out though, they're trying to do the same to your king, and you've got to think fast to break through. The key is to build up a good rhythm between gathering resources, deploying soldiers, and allowing your resources to grow back!

war-elephant-2.name: War Elephant 2
war-elephant-2.description: War Elephant 2 is the long-awaited sequel to War Elephant! This time a new foe has invaded your borders: the formidable, bloodthirsty Crusades! Their numbers are vast, and their artillery makes them a force to be reckoned with. Guide your army to victory, with your trusty war elephant on the front line, using your wits and strategic expertise to select the right units to send forth! They might have the numbers, but you have experience and tact on your side!

mario-super.name: Mario Super
mario-super.description: The game idea is a little bit old as the old Mario Bros from NES or  Pegasus console. Nothing more to say about the idea. Play as famous red  plumber named Mario. He is on journey now and must rescue the princess  Peach to save her life. Defeat evil Bowser and his minions in colorful  adventure filled with evil minions and bonuses in free Super Mario Bros  Game by Softendo.com. One More Tip : Game difficulty is tailored to the beginners. Have a nice playing time.

ultimate-spider-man-zodiac-attack.name: Ultimate Spider-Man: Zodiac Attack
ultimate-spider-man-zodiac-attack.description: Scorpio and The Zodiac have taken control of the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier and Nick Fury has called in Ultimate Spider-Man to stop them and restore order.

iron-man-riot-of-the-machines.name: Iron Man: Riot of the Machines
iron-man-riot-of-the-machines.description: Defeat the army of War Machines! A high quality Iron Man platformer with parkour elements. X to shoot, C to melee, arrows to move, press up twice to double jump.

gem-hunter.name: Gem Hunter
gem-hunter.description: Gem Hunter is a platform game in which we play as a guy who has to collect all gems in a certain time. There are 25 levels with traps and dangers everywhere.

montys-moon.name: Monty's Moon
montys-moon.description: Help Monty reach the moon in this highly polished launcher game. With 35 upgrades, 20 achievements, 4 power ups and various special items and obstacles, Monty's Moon features addicting gameplay with a touching storyline.

mafia-the-revenge.name: Mafia - The Revenge
mafia-the-revenge.description: You belong to one of the dangerous Mafia families of the world. The day started as a normal day. The Don had a deal with another Mafia family. While waiting on the other family, the Don gets whacked by a sniper rifle. It is up to you to take revenge.

khazyle-fury-of-the-elements.name: Khazyle - Fury of the elements
khazyle-fury-of-the-elements.description: You play as Hedora; master Archer, as she protects the lands of Khazyle. Use your arsenal of weapons and manipulate the elements to fend off incoming orcs, trolls, the undead, and even dragons.

clear-skies-elite-world-war-iii.name: Clear Skies Elite: World War III

violet-nightmare.name: Violet Nightmare
violet-nightmare.description: Help Violet escape from her nightmare, fight monsters, collect powerups and survive. Use Arrow keys to move, jumpuse X to use the flashlight Use Enter to pause the game and view the menu

a-box-adventure.name: A Box Adventure
a-box-adventure.description: Little Box’s Father is taken from him. Help the box in his adventure to rescue his father. Use Arrow Keys or WASD to move the little box. Reach to the end platform to finish the stage.

baboon-attack-td.name: Baboon Attack TD
baboon-attack-td.description: Baboon Attack TD is a free online 100 level tower defense game. Save your house by killing baboons those are attacking at your houses. use heavy weapons to kill them faster in this 2 types of level based unique tower defense game.

dragon-street.name: Dragon Street
dragon-street.description: Dragon Street is a karate style fighting game. It has got different enemies in each level and three different kicks to make the game most thrilling. Game main features include:* 4 Enemies* 10 Levels* Level Locker* 3 types of kicks* Fight Either sides -

robo-clones.name: Robo Clones
robo-clones.description: Stop the attacking robo assault clones and save humanity. Controls: w/up arrow = up a/left arrow = left d/right arrow = right mouse = fire space = teleport 1, 2 = change guns p, esc = pause/menu/sound

iron-man-stark-tower.name: Iron Man Stark Tower
iron-man-stark-tower.description: New york city is being attacked by Lokis armies , they want to destroy Stark tower and the rest of city ! Fortunately Tony stark the genius one has built his new iron man mark 47 gear. Now Tony stark has to stop them with his new iron man suite. Your task now is Helping Tony stark controls the iron man suite and fights againt enemy!

gold-hunters.name: Gold Hunters
gold-hunters.description: You must throw the gold to your fellow teammates and reach the goal as quickly as possible. Use the walls to rebound or use dynamite to burst through fragile walls. Try to get 3 stars for a perfect run, collect rubies for an extra challenge and try to avoid the enemies. Good luck!► A casual game of skill and speed. ► Fun and challenging levels. ► Four different worlds to play in. ► 20 exciting levels!

submarine-path.name: Submarine Path
submarine-path.description: You control a submarine, and your mission is to kill or avoid every threat in your path. Be careful with the sea monsters and collect items to buy upgrades for your submarine.

mario-3d-world.name: Mario 3D World
mario-3d-world.description: Mario themed platformer game packed with jumping action. Jump on moving platforms, avoid cannon shots and collect coins high in the clouds! Share your highscore to impress your friends

epic-celeb-brawl-bieber.name: Epic Celeb Brawl - Bieber
epic-celeb-brawl-bieber.description: Are you ready for an Epic Brawl, celebrity style? Do you want to fight the most popular celebrities? Singers, actors and A-list celebs . . . will all get their butt kicked. This is no ordinary boxing game, this is a true street style fighting brawl. This time Bieber is back for revenge! Get awesome combos, buy heavy hitting weapons and try to beat your high score!

candy-hop.name: Candy Hop
candy-hop.description: Platformer game with candy bunny, packed with jumping action. Jump on moving platforms, avoid cannon shots and collect candy high in the clouds!

balls-and-helicopter.name: Balls And Helicopter
balls-and-helicopter.description: You control a helicopter, and your mission is to avoid the enemies and collect all the balls and coins in the levels.

mario-magic-world.name: Mario Magic World!
mario-magic-world.description: Five Magic stars had been stolen by Bowser from Peach's Castle. Four of them had been hidden in four corners of Mushroom Kingdom while the fifth is kept securely in the monster's lair. There is only one hero who can take up to such a great challenge but he also needs your help in order to complete this dangerous mission. Be aware that Bowser left behind a great number of enemies that are now bigger, stronger and more determined then ever to stop you.

slime-slayer.name: Slime Slayer
slime-slayer.description: Who’s a good little Slime Slayer? Awwwh. Yeah, jump into the world of SLIME SLAYING! Grab your sword and for no reason at all, stand in one spot and wait for these little pixel slime blobs to attack you. You must defend yourself with some huge epic sword of defense thing.

galaxy-siege-2.name: Galaxy Siege 2
galaxy-siege-2.description: Build your spaceship and go out to save your galaxy. Fight the enemies, upgrade your spaceship and win

stick-out-act-2.name: Stick Out Act 2
stick-out-act-2.description: Stick Out is fully charged to attack the enemies in it's second edition of Stick Out Act. Your main objective is to shoot all your opponents. Kill"em All, find your exit door and collect points on your way. Best of Luck!

angry-birds-bombers-christmas.name: Angry Birds Bombers Christmas
angry-birds-bombers-christmas.description: Help Angry Bird destroy all his opponents in each world. 1-player mode Arrow keys - Move. Space bar - Drop Bomb. 2-player mode Player 1: WASD keys - Move. Space bar - Drop Bomb. Player 2: Arrow keys - Move. Enter - Drop Bomb.

the-dragons-adventure.name: The Dragons Adventure
the-dragons-adventure.description: Ride a mystical dragon past flying islands to do battle with evil sorcerers and winged beasts! Only the brave and fast in flight will survive as you engage your enemy in combat, collecting bonuses to improve your armor and health, and buying power-ups for your dragon! Spare no mercy against your foes and reap the rewards of their defeat, flying farther in your quest, until you win the ultimate battle!

dig-to-china.name: Dig To China
dig-to-china.description: Can you dig straight down all of the way to china? upgrade your mining skills as you break through rock and collect resources.

deadtonatorz.name: Deadtonatorz
deadtonatorz.description: Destroy the hordes of zombies through many levels in 5 different areas. There are 5 different bomberbugs, each with its own unique ability. An awesome zombie detonating game. Mouse to play, click to release a bomberbug.

knights-vs-zombies.name: Knights Vs Zombies
knights-vs-zombies.description: Deploy and upgrade units. Use special powers, buy upgrades, win boss fights and unlock new game mode!

stickman-runner.name: Stickman Runner
stickman-runner.description: The Evil witch has kidnapped your girlfriend! You will have to run and jump through the platforms to rescue her.

chainsaw-slasher.name: Chainsaw Slasher
chainsaw-slasher.description: One hero, a 3D arena, one chainsaw and thousands of zombies! Many upgrades, weapons and power ups. Complete 10 intense levels and try to survive against hordes of enemies in survival mode!

airfield-defender.name: Airfield Defender
airfield-defender.description: Defend your airfield in this PLants vs Zombies style defense game. Collect coins, buy new airplanes for defense and shoot down all of the enemy planes advancing toward you. Place your defenses strategically for maximum results. Can you defend the city from the evil alien spaceships in this strategy notebook game?

bomb-diver.name: Bomb Diver
bomb-diver.description: Use your jetpack and grenade launcher to keep your city safe from falling bombs in this frantic retro game! Use the mouse to play, your goal is to avoid the bombs while falling and collect balloons for ammo. When you're on the ground you'll need to shoot the incoming bombs in Missile Command style.

conatc.name: Conatc
conatc.description: Collect the blue circles while avoiding the red ones, the red circle will destroy you. With each level the number of circles will increase.

eggstinction.name: Eggstinction
eggstinction.description: Let's get ready to go Jurassic on these alien invaders. Grab weapons and defend your ground.

island-runner.name: Island Runner
island-runner.description: Island Runner is a never ending running game with some awesome twists! Choose a character and try to run across as many islands as you can. Depending how far you manage to run you'll earn cash which can then be used to unlock new characters each of which have their own positive and negative bonuses! So choose a character that fits your style!

armio.name: Armio
armio.description: Sgt. John Armio fights to save the world from the dark cabal's army of black helicopters and thugs. Take down 50 choppers to complete the mission.

cubikill-5.name: Cubikill 5
cubikill-5.description: That's right, our most beloved short-tempered office worker is back and crasier than ever! He just found out that he will have to stay at work and forget about any vacation. Hit every combo move and try to survive as long as you can.

awesome-tanks-2.name: Awesome Tanks 2
awesome-tanks-2.description: Awesome Tanks is back, with more, bigger and longer-lasting upgrades!

jet-bunny.name: Jet Bunny
jet-bunny.description: Help the little bunny catch all the sweets in order to obtain energy and fly to the stars!

dino-run-marathon-of-doom.name: Dino Run - Marathon of Doom
dino-run-marathon-of-doom.description: See how long you can stay alive in this special Dino Run challenge!  The wall of doom is fast approaching...  run, jump and claw your way to survival!

lockout.name: _Lockout
lockout.description: Unlock the mystery of Anna and unveil the reason why are you in a place where death is welcomed as the main guest.

power-rangers-winning.name: Power Rangers Winning
power-rangers-winning.description: Very exiting Power Rangers platform game. They are assigned to kill all monsters. Pick up power ups to transform and use more powerful weapons!  Make their way through the enemies and get home, try to get highest scores! Prepare yourself for an action ride and try to beat all levels. Enjoy!

ben10-best-adventure-2.name: Ben10 Best Adventure 2
ben10-best-adventure-2.description: Help Ben10 to collect all coins and destroy  enemies in this adventure game.    You have 10 lives. Have Fun all the way !

super-pilot-battle.name: Super Pilot Battle
super-pilot-battle.description: Enter the Super Pilot Battle! During the World War 2, captain Joe was on a special mission, but his plane crashed among dangerous Andes. He needed to think of something fast, so he built up his aircraft - all by himself. So, he is back to the war and he needs your help to navigate him. Shoot the enemies, pick up upgrades and try to stay in the air as long as possible. Have fun!

dungeon-deadline-anniversary.name: Dungeon Deadline Anniversary
dungeon-deadline-anniversary.description: New deadline dungeons are waiting for you. Loot as much gold as you can within 10 seconds. Upgrade your hero and unlock new heroes. Will you dare entering the deadline dungeon again?

straight-to-exit-3.name: Straight to Exit 3
straight-to-exit-3.description: The main hero of this game is little one eyed green Cyclops monster, which is in Labyrinth formed castle trapped and tries to exit from here. There are are lots's of different traps in the castle.  There are 30 levels in three chapters in the game.

mario-new-extreme.name: Mario New Extreme
mario-new-extreme.description: Help Mario to collect all coins and reach to the finish.  Beware of falling rocks! Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

mickey-vs-friends-race.name: Mickey vs Friends Race
mickey-vs-friends-race.description: Help Mickey to drive his car on the track and keep crashing the target cars.  Other cars can be crashed as well, but you should not abuse it, because each crash damages your car.

mickey-and-zombies.name: Mickey And Zombies
mickey-and-zombies.description: Help Mickey to rescue his friends and reach to the finish. Watch on zombies. Look for hummer to break walls and get keys  to open cage. You have 15 levels to complete the game.  Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

15-way-escape.name: 15 Way Escape
15-way-escape.description: Greetings! We have recently released an awesome game in our portal. Your users will love playing this   game. We request you to take a look and add the game to your portal.  Find the game details below:  Name:  15 Way Escape   You were getting locked inside the house and it has 15 doors which were locked and   filled with secrets.To unlock the 15 doors you must find the secret objects and solve the   puzzles.Try it soon!  Game URL: http://www.eightgames.com/play/15-way-escape  SWF: http://www.eightgames.com/games/files/15_Way_Escape01.swf  Thumbnail1:   http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/15-Way-Escape-200x250.jpg           Thumbnail2:  http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/15-Way-Escape-160x120.jpg     Thumbnail3: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/15-Way-Escape-120x90.jpg        Thumbnail4:  http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/15-Way-Escape-100x100.jpg    Thumbnail5: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/15-Way-Escape-180x135.jpg     Thumbnail6: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/15-Way-Escape-90x120.jpg              Game Size:  683 (w) x 539 (h)  Keywords:15 Way Escape, Eight Games, Escape Games, Strange Escape, Room Escape, Puzzle Games,   Skill games.	   Category: eightgames.com  eightgames.com@gmail.com     Use Mouse   http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/15-Way-Escape-150x150.jpg

ben10-shooting.name: Ben10 Shooting
ben10-shooting.description: Ben10 take a plane. He is going to the battle to save his friends.  You must help him to breakthrough and complete his mission.  Collect power ups and increase your shooting capacity. Good Luck!

pou-xtreme-escape-2.name: Pou Xtreme Escape 2
pou-xtreme-escape-2.description: This is a very fun and addictive game!Help pou to collect all stars. Watch out for the traps and enemies. Enjoy 15 levels in this funny adventure game!

tank-storm-3.name: Tank Storm 3
tank-storm-3.description: Control a battle tank through the enemy territory, destroy all enemy vehicles and shoot soldiers . Survive in this war and destroy the main enemy base.

spongebob-crazy-adventure-2.name: SpongeBob Crazy Adventure 2
spongebob-crazy-adventure-2.description: Help SpongeBob to collect all burgers and destroy  enemies in this funny adventure game.    You have 10 lives. Have Fun all the way !

halloween-mania.name: Halloween Mania
halloween-mania.description: In this game you have to collect all the treats that are falling from the sky, whilst avoiding all the horrid pumpkins. Remember, treats keep you alive whilst the pumpkins will bring your Halloween celebrations to an abrupt halt. Always remember to have fun!

mario-new-extreme-2.name: Mario New Extreme 2
mario-new-extreme-2.description: New Mario styled game. This time you must take hammer to break  walls and get key which open the door.  Beware of falling rocks!You need to be fast! Your enemy will try to stop you. Look for upgrade and get extra life! Enjoy in this funny adventure game with 15 levels! Good Luck!

spongebob-new-action.name: SpongeBob New Action
spongebob-new-action.description: Help SpongeBob and Patrick to collect all burgers and reach to the finish. This time SpongeBob must take hammer for breaking walls.  Patrick has to get keys to open doors.  Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

dinosaur-killer-3d.name: Dinosaur Killer 3D
dinosaur-killer-3d.description: Here is a shoot em up game where you have to stave off wave after wave of Dinosaurs hungry for blood. Do you have what it takes to fend off the hungry hoard? Kill Em All.

dora-rescue-squad.name: Dora Rescue Squad
dora-rescue-squad.description: Dora is an excellent animal doctor, her daily task is to rescue the injured animals, but in the forest is a very dangerous place, there are a variety of deadly traps, you also to help Dora complete the rescue mission!Controls:Move by 'WAD' or '←→↑', use mouse to select and place item.

dungeon-hunter-joe.name: Dungeon Hunter Joe
dungeon-hunter-joe.description: Hunter Joe has to pass through a long and terrible dungeon where bloodthirsty monsters and other creatures are waiting for him. Here you can't get through without a good shotgun, but hunter Joe knows what he is doing. Your mission is to pass the dungeon to the Shining Exit, destroy monsters on your way, increase your points, and develop your hunting skills as you go.

minions-go-home.name: Minions Go Home
minions-go-home.description: Cute little Minions and comes at the same time, game player can control a plurality of Minions, through the different organs of each level, help the Minions came to the cave, can cross the border. Hurriedly about friends wits together!Instruction:Only click the mouse.

spider-monkey.name: Spider Monkey
spider-monkey.description: Take the role of Spider Monkey - the jungle superhero! Swing from tree to tree with your long arms as you grab bananas and rescue monkey friends. Slap the gorilla bosses in the head to defeat them.

wonder-rocket-2-halloween.name: Wonder Rocket 2: Halloween
wonder-rocket-2-halloween.description: Wonder rocket is back with an awesome sequel for the coming Halloween. Launch the wonder rocket as high as possible, be careful from different monsters and upgrade the rocket after each launch to fly higher.

zombies-war.name: Zombies War
zombies-war.description: Plants vs Zombies is very popular, Now zombies invade human habitation day and night, facing such strong zombies, Ultraman brothers decided to fight against them!

halloween-escape.name: Halloween-Escape
halloween-escape.description: Try to escape: find all halloween items first and then find the exit. Move and jump around with the arrow keys. Use your sword(space bar) to squas the big pumpkins below and in front of you. Avoid all enemies.

zombie-mashed-potatoes.name: Zombie Mashed Potatoes
zombie-mashed-potatoes.description: Attack a Zombie Horde with only a spoon and Mashed Potatoes! Try to fight them off long enough to earn 3 virtual zombie coins!

haste-makes-waste.name: Haste Makes Waste
haste-makes-waste.description: Try to kick the turtle as far as you can. Help him get through the forest

spartacus.name: Spartacus
spartacus.description: You play as Spartacus, as legend says: a true warrior fighting his freedom out of the gladiator arena. Fight 8 challenging levels, unique boss enemies and beat off your enemies with style in the Cinematic mode.

dont-mess-with-putin.name: Don't Mess With Putin!
dont-mess-with-putin.description: Help Mr. Putin stabilize political situations. Russian speciality includes 146% of maximal electorate support. This is a remake of Politricks. It is re-balanced so that the player can choose different tactics through the game.

mario-hero.name: Mario Hero
mario-hero.description: Get ready for the adventure of you life while helping our brave hero Super Mario to rescue his lovely princess that has been kidnapped by the evil monsters and now is being kept locked in a heavily guarded stone tower. There are four levels in this game all featuring four different types of challenges with new obstacles and more powerful enemies for you to overcome, so be warned that this won't be an ordinary job.

mini-train-driver.name: Mini Train Driver
mini-train-driver.description: Play this flash train simulation game, Stop on each station to pick up and drop passengers. Make money to upgrade your train!

jumping-box-reincarnation-2.name: Jumping Box Reincarnation 2
jumping-box-reincarnation-2.description: Jumping box with you again! New funny levels! Fun physical game. Shoot the little box and help her to fly to the finish!

brave-jungle-kid.name: Brave Jungle Kid
brave-jungle-kid.description: Jungle kid is a courageous boy living in a forest. His daily work is to protect and save the animals from the enemies. The enemies are very angry on the Jungle kid because they are suffering from hunger. Now the enemies are getting ready to attack and kill the Jungle kid. He is looking for an incredible person to assist him to kill all his enemies. Help jungle kid to collect the boomerang boxes and shoot the boomerang on his enemies and kill them. Also help to protect himself while he tries attack his enemies.

keygrappling.name: KeyGrappling
keygrappling.description: Climb up the tower by grappling to the letter hooks, collect coins to gain time bonus and open the barriers between tower floors.

miss-munch-funny-jump.name: Miss. Munch Funny Jump
miss-munch-funny-jump.description: Use your mouse movements to guide the munch. Jump on the nuts to travel higher and get more points! After you fall, you have the option to Play Again . Jump on the special nut for extra points! Press the Space Bar during the game to pause.

pitbull-dog-mudrun.name: Pitbull dog mudrun
pitbull-dog-mudrun.description: Move the Pitbull dog with UP and DOWN arrow keys. Avoid obstacles, otherwise you may risk your dogs life. Collect 10 balls to go to next level, before the energy gets over. Collect the food bags for refill yours dog energy.

fly-ladybird.name: Fly LadyBird
fly-ladybird.description: New Adventure Game Fly Ladybird ladybird is lost on the forest,please find a way to out of forest you have 4 life’s only.

chota-boy-adventure.name: Chota boy Adventure
chota-boy-adventure.description: Collect strawberry's to Fly. Press Backspace to ON & OFF the Jetpack mode. Beware of the Devils & the crocodiles . Stay alert from the fire on some steps during your voyage .

wolf-jump.name: Wolf jump
wolf-jump.description: player need to control the wolf from pits. wolf speed increases gradually when time goes

forest-kid.name: Forest Kid
forest-kid.description: Help tarzan into action and rescue the lost jungle animals. Be careful not to run into birds. Watch out for that tree!

smart-biker.name: Smart Biker
smart-biker.description: He need to collect the money bags from roadsides and escape from the obstacles . Let starts Ride....

gold-ball-journey.name: Gold Ball Journey
gold-ball-journey.description: The player should move the gold ball and make the gold ball jump escaping from the trap using the keyboard arrow keys. If the gold ball fall into the trap one live is lost so you have only 30 lives using this gold ball should move all the 25 levels. Game ends when all the lives are zero.

jungle-eagle.name: Jungle Eagle
jungle-eagle.description: Here the eagle has broad wings and great movement of wings. Eagle has to catch the little chickens in order to satisfy its hungry. In this game we can have wide verity of levels in hunting. In each level we can face different arrangements of little chickens viewed by the gamer, and without any confusion the gamer has to hunt the little chickens. The gamer can have the facility of timing, along with the level indicator.  so each level should be complete with in the time slot given.

eco-sports-drive.name: Eco Sports Drive
eco-sports-drive.description: Drive the car on the road and avoid dashing other car. Try to go as much as possible to gain score

blast-buzz.name: Blast Buzz
