blast-buzz.description: It is an authentic blasting feel with the game ‘Blast Buzz’.You have to blast the well arranged series of wine bottles with a non restricted gun named Remington-870.It has multiple levels.In each level you can be viewd by disparate and challanging arrangement of bottles.you have to make sure the angl e of shoot order to blast all the bottles with in the bullets given to you.if you are unable to blast all the bottle with the given bullets then you can click reset button to restart the blast  in the same level.

bullet-thunder.name: Bullet thunder
bullet-thunder.description: ’Bullet Thunder’ is a war environmental play,to release bullets.we can be faced with three rounds.In each round we are able to dischrge spherical shaped  bullets.Here we can align the position of  discharging bullet,depending on the anguler position the bullet will be acceralated.In between bullet travelling path the bullet will be reaccelarated by hit poins and we can get the star shaped collective points too.At the end point of bullets travel the distance,we are able to see the travelled distance in kms.

froggy.name: Froggy
froggy.description: Swim and hop your way around the pond eating bugs so you can get to the next pond. It's a frog's life! This is the exciting world of frogdom!

compass-car.name: Compass car
compass-car.description: You have been dispatched to that area in order to collect the treasure  by defusing the abnormal bombs and some nukes.you can have a compass car,which has to move in a direction shown by the compass.

flying-cars.name: Flying cars
flying-cars.description: Here we are using cars which are able to fly and shoot,like as ‘Flying Ford Anglia’ in Harry Potter. Here we can have different varieties of enemy cars comes in opposite direction to player’s car, so player have to shoot them and need to collect the coin, so that score increases. In this we have three lives for player’s car.

spongebob-slides.name: Spongebob Slides
spongebob-slides.description: Spongebob Slides is a great funny, action games.Spongebob is running to save his friend Patrick. Use mouse or keyboard (number 1-5) to eliminate all enemys. Enjoy!

im-a-supercat.name: I'm A Supercat
im-a-supercat.description: Freddy is the name of our Supercat. Today Freddy’s friends and their colony peoples were attacked and captured by aliens. Freddy wants to release his friends and people from the aliens, but the aliens are very powerful and they are armed heavily. Freddy unfortunately received energy by eating some high dose chemical and gained extreme energy and power. Come on let us help this Super cat to destroy all the aliens.

mario-running-challenge.name: Mario Running Challenge
mario-running-challenge.description: It's time for Mario to get back home after successfully retrieving the five magic stars that were stolen from his kingdom by the evil monster Bowser. He is now on a constant running getaway course with a great number of obstacles and enemies to overcome while escaping the chasing flying monster. Pay attention as some of the obstacles are higher and require double jumps to overcome also make use the fireballs when available in order in clear your way.

furyman-protect-and-serve.name: Furyman Protect and Serve
furyman-protect-and-serve.description: Today he has a lot to do with a gang of thieves called the Chilly. They are armed, dangerous and also use flying men to protect them in their misdeeds. They have just stripped the bank of Noland City (your city) and taken flight over the rooftops of the city. You Furyman, decide to terminate the actions of these thugs. There's no pity, you're not the kind of hero who doesn't aim to shed blood ... No, the only way to combat vermin is to destroy it. No need to use your super powers today, you have an arsenal of weapons at your disposal ... Noland City needs protection ... Will you measure up?

lil-red-kanoichi.name: Lil Red Kanoichi
lil-red-kanoichi.description: Lil Red Kanoichi is a challenging ninja platformer. Run, jump and climb to complete the 27 levels as quickly possible. Take down the enemy ninjas with your sword. Run and jump over obstacles and try to complete all 27 levels with 3 stars.

sweet-adventure.name: Sweet Adventure
sweet-adventure.description: Run, jump, collect sweets and escape enemies.

kill-the-graveyard-zombies.name: Kill The Graveyard Zombies
kill-the-graveyard-zombies.description: Chris is a professional shooter always busy in hunting. Chris is very skilled in shooting moving targets. Today he entered into the forest for hunting few animals in the morning and he completed his job successfully. He started to pack his items and want to leave the forest before the sun set, but unfortunately he took more time to pack and it was almost dark when he completed his packing. Chris forgot the right path and walked into the wrong direction and finally reached the zombies graveyard. The zombies were very hungry and walked towards Chris to kill him. Now Chris want to escape from this zombies and save himself. Let’s help Chris to aim and shoot all the zombies and kill them.

stick-bike-fun-ride.name: Stick Bike Fun Ride
stick-bike-fun-ride.description: Play this fun game set up in a world where there is only black and white and every thing is depicting a kids world with fun obstacles. Over come all the obstacles and also learn along the way.

ben10-best-adventure.name: Ben10 Best Adventure
ben10-best-adventure.description: Help Ben10 to collect all coins and destroy  enemies in this adventure game.    You have 10 lives. Have Fun all the way !

spongebob-crazy-adventure.name: SpongeBob Crazy Adventure
spongebob-crazy-adventure.description: Help SpongeBob to collect all burgers and destroy  enemies in this funny adventure game.    You have 10 lives. Have Fun all the way !

escape-to-live.name: Escape to Live
escape-to-live.description: You are under attack by alien from 4 sides. You need to do your best to survive longer. You can stay alive if you get shield on time. Don’t miss it. If you get the shield, enemies can't kill you, if you get the sand watch enemies will move very slow and if you get the speed icon your speed will increase 2x. Let's see how long you can survive.

super-shogun-ninja.name: Super Shogun Ninja
super-shogun-ninja.description: An action packed ninja game. Inspired by 2 famous hit games and combined the best of those into this ninja game. The goal is to reach as many floors as possible to get to the final boss. Take down the enemies to open the door to the next floor. Select one of the weapons to use for the attacks.

run-spiderman-run.name: Run Spiderman Run
run-spiderman-run.description: Spiderman needs your help. Make him to jump over the obstacles and extend his life.

the-centaur-and-his-powerful-sword.name: The Centaur And His Powerful Sword
the-centaur-and-his-powerful-sword.description: Caesar the brave warrior of Centaur kingdom. He is very angry today and he is running faster with his powerful sword to chop off the heads of wicked armies who destroyed his kingdom when he was not available in his palace. The wicked armies have killed many centaurs’ armies and their properties. The only way to take revenge and teach the wicket armies a good lesson is to destroy them. Come let’s help Caesar to destroy his enemies.

pou-mountain-adventure.name: Pou Mountain Adventure
pou-mountain-adventure.description: The male pou wants to kiss the female pou, but they are separate apart. Help the male pou kiss the female pou successful by collecting all keys. Watch out for the traps and enemies. Enjoy 15 levels in this funny adventure game!

mickey-super-adventure.name: Mickey Super Adventure
mickey-super-adventure.description: Help Mickey to collect all stars and reach to the finish. Watch on snakes and turtles. You have 15 levels to complete the game.  Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

spongebob-halloween-adventure-3.name: SpongeBob Halloween Adventure 3
spongebob-halloween-adventure-3.description: Help SpongeBob to collect all pumpkins and reach to the finish.  Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

sky-cops.name: Sky Cops
sky-cops.description: The rival army is trying to break into your country. You are a Sky Cop and your mission is to destroy all enemies in all levels. The civilians are counting on you.

run-ben10-run.name: Run Ben10 Run
run-ben10-run.description: Ben10 needs your help. Make him to jump over the obstacles and extend his life.

ones-devour-3.name: Ones Devour 3
ones-devour-3.description: A very fun fish game, big fish eat the seabed to survive. The game added a tool to enhance the playability. is not simple mouse operation!

super-mario-galaxy.name: Super Mario Galaxy
super-mario-galaxy.description: Princess Peach was kidnapped by King Koopa, Super Mario must fight hard to defeat the monsters in order to get Princess Peach back.

the-last-samurai.name: The Last Samurai
the-last-samurai.description: The Last Samurai is a side scrolling platform adventure game in which you are the main character and you have the responsibility of going through the enemy infested areas to kill all the enemies and to collect all the scrolls. Reaching the exit portal in each level will transfer you to the next one.

call-of-sword.name: Call Of Sword
call-of-sword.description: Call Of Sword is a game in which there are many levels divided into two different chapters. There is a story that forms a plot of the game. Playing as the main character of the game you have to go through each area overcoming all the hardships, collecting the useful items and eliminating the enemies.

koala-kid.name: Koala Kid
koala-kid.description: The koala kid is the character that you adore so much and that is the reason you are willing to do everything to restore the smile on the face of the poor animal. There will be so many different puzzles that you must solve but remember that the main aim objective will be to help the animal get to the end for a big party.

kill-the-plumber-2.name: Kill The Plumber 2
kill-the-plumber-2.description: This is a unique platform game in which Mario is the one that you will have to stop from reaching the princess who is under your custody. Let the other characters make the correct moves to kill Mario in each level of the game. Remember that Mario is very experienced adventurer and it will not be easy to kill him.

ayo-the-hero.name: Ayo The Hero
ayo-the-hero.description: Ayo The Hero is who you are and you have been assigned by the king of the land to find the magic sphere that has been stolen by the evil ones. There are 26 levels that you must explore successfully before you can find the sphere that you are sent out to fine. All the 26 levels are filled with a lot of danger.

home-sheep-home-2-lost-underground.name: Home Sheep Home 2: Lost Underground
home-sheep-home-2-lost-underground.description: Home Sheep Home 2: Lost Underground is a puzzle adventure game featuring three sheep who are close friends who have different advantages and limitations. Unfortunately they are lost far from home and now they have to work together to escape from that place and get back home. New players can play in the training mode to understand the basics.

vex-2.name: Vex 2
vex-2.description: Vex 2 is a run and jump platform adventure game in which you taking the role of the main character will have to overcome a serious of dangerous obstacles to reach the checkpoints and continue the adventure ahead. Try to be as quick as you can but the most important thing is to be safe.

foreign-creature-2.name: Foreign Creature 2
foreign-creature-2.description: Foreign Creature 2 is an interactive point and click adventure game in which you are a clone of an evil who has been sent on this planet for a mission. The humans will not be friendly with you and so you will have to act smartly to get through every difficult situations unharmed and without being captured.

angry-birds-go-crazy.name: Angry Birds Go Crazy
angry-birds-go-crazy.description: Angry Birds are tired of those pesky pigs and this time they found a whole new way to defeat them.

infinite-tower-rpg.name: Infinite Tower RPG
infinite-tower-rpg.description: Level up your character as he fights through skeletons, orcs and dark knights on his way to the highest floor of the tower. Carefully balance your health, attack, speed and defense to progress as far as you can.

herm-the-germ.name: Herm the Germ
herm-the-germ.description: Collect the red blood cells to replicate. Clones of yourself can jump in mid-air while spawning! Treat this like a double jump! If you get stuck restart with the R button. Reach the human's brain to infect him!

tom-and-jerry-escape-3.name: Tom And Jerry Escape 3
tom-and-jerry-escape-3.description: Tom And Jerry are friends now. Tom help Jerry to collect all cheeseand get back home. Jerry can shoot, Tom can collect cheese!Enjoy in this funny adventure game with 15 levels!

tom-and-jerry-escape-2.name: Tom And Jerry Escape 2
tom-and-jerry-escape-2.description: Tom And Jerry are friends now. Tom help Jerry to collect all cheeseand get back home. Jerry can shoot, Tom can collect cheese!Enjoy in this funny adventure game with 15 levels!

drake-and-the-wizards-2.name: Drake and The Wizards 2
drake-and-the-wizards-2.description: Drake comes back with a exciting new adventure!

water-snake.name: Water Snake
water-snake.description: This is a classic game in “snake style” in completely new release. Now you can guide little, green reptile swimming in small lake. He loves apples which fall into the water… So from time to time our snake has the chance to catch up shiny, golden apple to his mouth. Little friend won’t be fed with this ones but you’ll get more point without losing space on the board!

sonic-jump-sonic.name: Sonic Jump Sonic
sonic-jump-sonic.description: New Sonic styled game. You must take hammer to break walls and get key which open the door. Hit SPACE if you want to fly!Beware of falling rocks! You need to be fast!Your enemy will try to stop you. Look for upgrade and get extra life! Enjoy in this funny adventure game with 15 levels! Good Luck!

bummin-a-ride.name: Bummin a Ride
bummin-a-ride.description: Hitchhike your way from NY to LA.

math-leaper.name: Math Leaper
math-leaper.description: Leap and jump into power ups and candies to unlock new heights and achievements by answering math questions correctly. Test your math skills while avoiding nasty slime that will ruin your high flying adventure. Start your game by hitting play. Then select the grade and math skill you want to practice. Answer questions correctly to jump higher. Time your answers so you collect power ups and boosters while avoiding slime.

batman-dark-jump.name: Batman Dark Jump
batman-dark-jump.description: Help Batman to collect all coins and destroy enemies in this adventure game. You have 10 lives. Have Fun all the way !

elder-bear-rescue-brother.name: Elder Bear Rescue Brother
elder-bear-rescue-brother.description: Bald guy is felling in forest, young bear want to stop him. Out of exception, he was hijacked by Bald guy. Big Bear now have to save him, but bald guy set up numerous obstacles. . .

rooms-of-art-5.name: Rooms Of Art 5
rooms-of-art-5.description: Rooms of Art 5 challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a cool painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Rooms of Art 5!

skyly.name: Skyly
skyly.description: Collect the letters and reach the door

jump-sonic.name: Jump Sonic
jump-sonic.description: New Sonic styled game. You must take hammer to break walls and get key which open the door. Hit SPACE if you want to fly!Beware of falling rocks!You need to be fast!Your enemy will try to stop you. Look for upgrade and get extra life!Enjoy in this funny adventure game with 15 levels! Good Luck!

spongebob-and-patrick-escape.name: SpongeBob And Patrick Escape
spongebob-and-patrick-escape.description: Help SpongeBob and Patrick to collect all burgers and reach to the finish. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

moniduk.name: Moniduk
moniduk.description: The little girl Kitty is in the searching of her way home. This is the game about her interesting adventure through the amazeing labyrinth. On the way are many obstacles and secrets. Help Kitty to survive and to find her home!➜ Avoid the red blocks!➜ Follow the instructions of the white arrows➜ Collect hearts they will help Kitty not to lose hopeControls:Move in the corresponding direction (up, left, right)

happy-goat-guard-village.name: Happy Goat Guard Village
happy-goat-guard-village.description: Hateful wolf called a lot of reinforcemnt to defeat Happy Goat, quickly help small goat guard the goat village !

no-landing-zone.name: No Landing Zone
no-landing-zone.description: Guide your helicopter through the level. Collect items and shoot or avoid the walls. The level starts slow and easy, but speeds up as you go! Be sure to try the game together with a friend!

curse-run.name: Curse Run
curse-run.description: Under the great pyramids of Egypt lies the magic ankh of the Evil pharaoh. Use his ankh to defeat the evil mummies. Collect all the emeralds to open the gate that leads to the next adventure!

shin-chan-3.name: Shin Chan 3
shin-chan-3.description: Shin Chan in a new adventure game. Collect all milkshakes to clear the level and a lot of lollipops to get more points. Beware of the many animals that can hurt you.

furry-adventure.name: Furry Adventure
furry-adventure.description: Help Furry recover all his acorn by playing through various levels, defeating unique enemies and avoiding all obstacles! Furry is one furry squirrel that somehow managed to loose all acorns. So for every level there is an number of acorns to collect back for Furry, jump, run and aim for them all in this puzzle platformer!

flood-runner-4.name: Flood Runner 4
flood-runner-4.description: The fourth in its series. Flood Runner 4 is bigger and better than ever before. Run jump and glide, while avoiding obstacles. Unlock dragons, panthers and more.

ninja-training-worlds.name: Ninja Training Worlds
ninja-training-worlds.description: Ninja Training Worlds is a side-scrolling action platform game in which you need to complete a series of ancient Ninja challenges. Guide your Ninja through each challenge by dodging and defeating enemies, jumping from wall to wall, dashing under spikes and collecting gold coins. You'll need to collect all gold coins and defeat all of the enemies to get the highest score!

mario-candy-house.name: Mario Candy House
mario-candy-house.description: Two babies found a glowing hole at home. Curious baby crawled into the hole. They found a sweet and delicious candy house. They happily rushed past. Followed babies and go adventure together. P1:Use 'AD' to move, 'W' to jump, 'S' to use itemP2:Use '←→' to move, '↑' to jump, '↓' to use item

bear-jump.name: Bear Jump
bear-jump.description: More interesting and exciting bear adventure game is coming! Bears can adsorb on the wall , he also can launch missiles , pass a lot of difficulties. Help the to eat more fruit, complete the adventure!

snake-princess.name: Snake Princess
snake-princess.description: On this scary night, our princess is playing with her lovely snakes. Even though she has more love towards her snake kingdom, she wants to present herself in the way you like her. So, here is the chance to make our lovely snake princess look like how you want. Even choose the snake which has to be m..

desert-strike.name: Desert Strike
desert-strike.description: You are stuck in a hot desert with enemy choppers and rockets coming at you. See how far you can go.

the-lonely-king.name: The Lonely King
the-lonely-king.description: Our sad king lives alone in his kingdom, because it is cursed. Every person vanished except him. One day he realizes that he has a magical horn somewhere in the castle, which might break the curse. Help him find the legendary horn!

lapinka-and-the-hidden-shield.name: Lapinka And The Hidden Shield
lapinka-and-the-hidden-shield.description: Little Lapinka is in trouble. There are strange things happening in the forest. All the animals went into hiding and trees are gnashing their branches in horror. Find hidden locations and drive out the unwanted guests. Fire-flies and falling dewdrops will help you in your mission. Good luck.

pirate-tresaure.name: Pirate Tresaure
pirate-tresaure.description: Place bets on the tresaure chest, pull the level to open them and see many coins you winUse your mouse to play.

8-kristals-adventure.name: 8 Kristals Adventure
8-kristals-adventure.description: The Kristals have secret powers that people we searching for ages. Now Ben is getting very close to them. Help your hero to solve the mystery, enter in another dimension, and fight all your way though your victory. Collect objects, earn trophies, transform into 10 different Alien forms and much more.

drake-in-winterland-competition.name: Drake in Winterland Competition
drake-in-winterland-competition.description: Drake's back! Collect crystals and bump off the competition to pass each level of this fiery adventure game. Purchase upgrades in the wizard's store and earn medals for impressive performances. Feel free to stomp on dragons and bulls, but watch out for armadillos and other spiky obstacles! Take too much damage and you'll have to start over.

bross-adventure.name: Bross Adventure
bross-adventure.description: Mario is going on adventure again. Collect all the coins and kill your enemies. Have fun!

adventure-of-spongebob.name: Adventure Of Spongebob
adventure-of-spongebob.description: Adventure Of Spongebob is a fun adventure game with 20 levels. Support two players while the game. The double SpongeBob was caught in the castle by bad guys, they must escape from here, otherwise the consequences could be disastrous. They will encounter a lot of difficulties and challenge. In the game the double Spongebob want to work together to overcome the current difficulties. Let's help SpongeBob adventure successfully!

santa-blue.name: Santa Blue
santa-blue.description: During this Christmas Santa meets face to face with the Devil, the devil takes the Santa's gifts turns the Santa to Blue Ball. Now Santa must survive and beat the devil in order to take back gifts and give it to children.

crazy-zombie.name: Crazy Zombie
crazy-zombie.description: 1p:ASWD to move, J to attack, K to jump, UI to skill. 2p:Arrow key to move, 1 to attack, 2 to jump, 45 to skill.

wolfys-adventure.name: Wolfy's Adventure
wolfys-adventure.description: Our cute friend Wolfy has gotten lost and you have to help him find his way back to home safe.

super-sub-hero.name: Super Sub Hero
super-sub-hero.description: Guide a scared little Eskimo boy through a series of puzzles on a quest to save his grandpa.Super Sub Hero is a cute and cheerful puzzle platform game with a bit different mechanics. The main character has an ability to turn ice into water and vice versa, which brings you a dozen of mind-bending puzzles. Combine your puzzle-solving abilities with your arcade gaming skills to help this fellow accomplish his quest.

the-slob.name: The Slob
the-slob.description: The world is a psychedelic alien planet, run and jump skill game with personable alien plants, strange creatures and a slug like character.

prince-peach-adventure.name: Prince Peach Adventure
prince-peach-adventure.description: Help the princess fight the monsters in the island and bring her lover back to her castle! Jump on the head of boss to defeat it.

minion-way.name: Minion Way
minion-way.description: Minion Way is a funny adventure game. Minion is trapped in freaks world and need help to come out. Help Minion to past all levels and save him from freaks world.

geek-adventure-king.name: Geek Adventure King
geek-adventure-king.description: Adventurer "Geek" who Dress on golden armor and holding a wooden gun begins his adventure. He will meet dinosaurs, zombies, monsters, beasts, savages, robots, various engulfed, etc. If you like adventure and action games, please not to be miss this one.

iron-man-city-flight.name: Iron Man - City Flight
iron-man-city-flight.description: Fly over the city and destroy the meteor shower and the enemy ships that are terrorizing the population. You have to collect energy to charge your weapon and life to recover from the blows. Shoot against the enemies and avoid all obstacles.

shape-shifter.name: Shape Shifter
shape-shifter.description: An elephant? a mouse? a hare? or maybe all of the 3 together? the wizard cursed the hero, so it became that weird creature, but, there is a good in every bad, now you can switch forms!

hero-in-the-ocean.name: Hero In The Ocean
hero-in-the-ocean.description: Only a true hero like you can save the missing divers, so let's go to the deep ocean. You will find many unique objects on your way: spy glasses, cloak of invisibility, tin snips, laser cannon, trophies and more!

arcade-machine.name: Arcade Machine
arcade-machine.description: Help the brave viking repair the glitch in the arcade machine that turn his sword and shield into a candy and donut!

fly-with-the-bubble.name: Fly With The Bubble
fly-with-the-bubble.description: The team is including you and a cute cat discovering the palace, but they have to go through mice and ball shooting machine, to finally get to inside the candy factory. Your mission is to collect all the fruit, then the door will open and you complete the game.

miners-prince.name: Miners Prince
miners-prince.description: There is a legend that a dragon lived in caves in the Africa, countless treasures is buried inside, as the Africa prince of a poor tribal, one young boy decided to travel alone to find the legendary treasure to save the starving people. use the arrow keys to control.

mario-gold-rush.name: Mario Gold Rush
mario-gold-rush.description: Help Mario And Luigi to collect all coins and reach to the finish. 15 Levels in this funny adventure game! Have Fun!

prison-break-2.name: Prison Break 2
prison-break-2.description: The protagonist was thrown into prison because the robbery , the warden is a very scary guy, help the protagonist rescue inmates, escape this terrible prison.

mario-xtreme-escape-2.name: Mario Xtreme Escape 2
mario-xtreme-escape-2.description: Help Mario to collect all mushrooms and reach to the finish. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

pajama-boy-2.name: Pajama Boy 2
pajama-boy-2.description: New adventures from Pajama Boy! This chapter you’ll have to finish 3 new adventures: The forest, the cave and the dark. Escape all the obstacles and return Pajama to his friends.

mario-gold-rush-3.name: Mario Gold Rush 3
mario-gold-rush-3.description: Help Mario And Luigi to collect all coins and reach to the finish. Mario can shoot, Luigi can collect coins. New 15 Levels in this funny adventure game! Have Fun!

run-mario-run.name: Run Mario Run
run-mario-run.description: Mario needs your help. Make him to jump over the obstacles and extend his life.

shifting-castle.name: Shifting Castle
shifting-castle.description: Save the princess from the grasp of the evil witch by fighting through the world of randomness.

teddy-bears-adventure.name: Teddy Bear's Adventure
teddy-bears-adventure.description: Little Teddy is hungry. Like all bears, he spends most of his day to eating and hunting for more food. Collect as much food as you can!

iceboy-2.name: IceBoy 2
iceboy-2.description: After a pesky polar bear steals IceBoys fridge, it is up to you to get it back. Drop ice to solve problems in this epic platformer.

honeydew-melons-adventure-unlimited.name: Honeydew Melons Adventure Unlimited
honeydew-melons-adventure-unlimited.description: Honeydew bug is here again! Help him collect enough honeydew melons to enter next level.  Now with unlimited lifes' and ammo.

fart-king-brosss.name: Fart King Brosss
fart-king-brosss.description: One day, totem of the village was gone. The elders decided to send Jack and Tony who can fly farthest and highest by fart to find the lost totem, so they two guys begin this long adventure trip.

luke.name: Luke
luke.description: Luke, same as any ordinary rich guys, is a real magnet for trouble. Now is a target to a crazy, money seeking, ugly lady! Help Luke escape a crazy woman that wants to marry him after only one date.

hippo-the-brave-knight.name: Hippo The Brave Knight
hippo-the-brave-knight.description: Help the brave hippo to solve the puzzles and get the crown back home.

rascals-thanksgiving-dinner-adventure.name: Rascal's Thanksgiving Dinner Adventure
rascals-thanksgiving-dinner-adventure.description: Rascal is looking for a roasted turkey to bring to his family for Thanksgiving dinner! Help Rascal navigate each level and find his Thanksgiving turkey!Instruction: Use the left and right arrow keys on your keyboard to move Rascal through the levels. Use the up arrow to jump.

doors-2-daves-new-job.name: Doors 2: Dave's New Job
doors-2-daves-new-job.description: The sequel for the famous puzzle platformer ‘Doors’ is finally here, Dave found a new job but was stuck in an office, help him to find the exit door in each level!

ninja-land.name: Ninja Land
ninja-land.description: Our hero and his lovely princess lived happily in their castle, until one day vicious ninjas kidnapped her! Join a miraculous journey to save her from her kidnappers!

fur-and-furious.name: Fur And Furious
fur-and-furious.description: Are you a cat person or a dog person? Choose a side in this endless run challenge. Each character has their own special skill. See if you can catch the red dot.

little-bear-run-invincible.name: Little Bear! Run! Invincible
little-bear-run-invincible.description: This time, you can help the bear reach the destination easier than before with your unlimited life's!

pushing-bob-2.name: Pushing Bob 2
pushing-bob-2.description: Bob is a kindly creature who likes to spend his time "meditating" under trees but suddenly the night has come. Let´s help him go back home. Enjoy this second adventure from our lazy blue friend.

hidden-journey.name: Hidden Journey
hidden-journey.description: Hidden Journey challenges you to find 130 hidden objects scattered across a gorgeous painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Hurry up to get all 3 stars and bonus points!

mr-santa-the-stolen-battery.name: Mr Santa The Stolen Battery
mr-santa-the-stolen-battery.description: Nightmare makes a mess in Santa's factory. He possessed elves to do bad things and steal all batteries stocks in the factory. Santa could not delivers the toys to kids in the whole world without any battery. Let's help Santa to get his batteries back and save the Christmas night from Nightmare.

lost-astronaut.name: Lost Astronaut
lost-astronaut.description: Help the astronaut to escape from the colorful planets! 3 planets of fun. Great animations and unique style. Many passing options guarantees replay ability.

water-jet.name: Water Jet
water-jet.description: Super fun addictive action physics game. Fly on the balloons through the maze avoiding obstacles. Extinguish all fires with water.

dino-super-jump.name: Dino Super Jump
dino-super-jump.description: Someone break the dino egg and stole all the coins inside it. As the owner of those coins, the dino has to run and catch up with the thief. Help dino collects all the dropped coins on the chase and get the thief at the end.use mouse to control the dino and run

mario-new-world.name: Mario New World
mario-new-world.description: Play Super Mario styled levels with other classic game characters. You have 10 lives. Have Fun all the way !

pokemon-great-fight.name: Pokemon Great Fight
pokemon-great-fight.description: Elves forest appeared a group of evil spirit. In order to protect the forest, lovely pokemon decides to take the challenge for justice to drive out the evil spirit.

cretacic.name: Cretacic
cretacic.description: Cretacic is a game of platforms set in the epoch of the dinosaurs, the mission is to survive in nine levels that will test your skills.

carry-on.name: Carry On
carry-on.description: You are just a square, but you are not weak. You can only jump, but also climb on walls. Your meaning of life presents nothing and yet, this whole world is made just for you. Think of something good, something to keep you entertained while spikes and traps tend to kill you… Go ahead square and Carry On living! Player 1: Up Arrow key to jump, Player 2: W key to jump.

mad-burger-2.name: Mad Burger 2
mad-burger-2.description: Mad burger is back! Launch the hot burger as far as possible, new upgrades, bonuses and lots of features included!

mario-new-adventure.name: Mario New Adventure
mario-new-adventure.description: Mario is on a new adventure to save the prettiest princess in the world. Mario have to kill all the enemyand collect the coins in each level. Also, collect the key to open the door and rescue princess. Watch out for the monsters, do not let them kill you before saving the princess from the danger.

transcopter.name: Transcopter
transcopter.description: Funny smilies always dreamed of flying over the ocean! But their way isn't easy. Smilies will face to many obstacles: prickly thorns, wild birds, falling rocks and huge bombs are waiting for them! However, transcopter will help them to overcome adversity and get to the other shore. The journey begins ACROSS THE OCEAN!Look into far.

the-strangers-3.name: The Strangers 3
the-strangers-3.description: General Daniel has given orders for you to take out the hostile targets in enemy territory. You will have three weapons at your disposal,beretta, M16 and a Dragunov sniper rifle... show your team that you have the skills to meet your objectives. Make sure

zodiac-break.name: Zodiac Break
zodiac-break.description: One day, pope sent an assassin and stabbed Xiaona with the arrow of love which will make her die within 12 hours. To save Xiaona, Xiaoqiang must break through zodiac! Let's help him!

mario-and-luigi-escape-3.name: Mario And Luigi Escape 3
mario-and-luigi-escape-3.description: Help Mario And Luigi to collect all coins and reach to the finish. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

zombie-punch.name: Zombie Punch
zombie-punch.description: Your High school has been taken over, its up to you to survive. Using only your fists you fight endless waves of zombie intruders.

my-undead-neighbors.name: My Undead Neighbors
my-undead-neighbors.description: Help Mr. Clumsy to find the key in each level from a haunted house filled with zombies, traps and treasures.

crazy-fly.name: Crazy Fly
crazy-fly.description: Hey Guys, this fly is really crazy! She’s very bad in flying, but she don’t want to miss anything. She follows animal droppings, but she’s crazy for honey and strawberries. Jump on to turtles and lizards to disable them. Watch out for a dangerous frog or you will be eaten! Her enemies are also hornets and birds. Go fly, but be careful, don’t drop into the water. Have fun!

oddo.name: Oddo
oddo.description: Oddo has found himself in a odd looking world. Help him catch his spirit guide and complete over 40 missions in this endless chaser.

super-baby.name: Super Baby
super-baby.description: It ended the reign of Super Mario, it's time for Super Baby! an exciting game where you must help Super Baby defeat the great Head through 3 full Worlds of emotion, where you battle against thousands of enemies and for this you must take Baby Bottles to give you much strength and size and then some sweets rich which able to shoot with pacifiers your cruel enemies, meeting many coins and purchase upgrades, more spectacular jumps, Baby bottles wholesale, and especially life or cattle will lose everything!

candyno-2.name: CandynO 2
candyno-2.description: This is a platform's game about candyno and his trip though 10 levels.

another-life.name: Another Life
another-life.description: This is the story of 2 loves lost in a fantasy world , they need to escape from the monsters and resolve the puzzles to continue the travel in this place. PLay with the 2 characters and complete 20 puzzle levels to return home with your love in this amazing kids game

stickman-adventure.name: Stickman Adventure
stickman-adventure.description: Stickman his girlfriend has been kidnapped by an ultimate Red Stickman. The only way to rescue his girlfriend is to defeat the ultimate Red Stickman. Good luck! You will need it.

minipassage.name: MiniPassage
minipassage.description: With three passages, only a combined score will put you in the miniPassage hall of fame. It takes speed, skill, and fast reactions to beat each level in as little time as possible. Dodge lava, avoid fireballs, fly over water and zoom up ladders to get to the end of each passage. Only the tombstones will tell the tale of your history.

strikeforce-kitty.name: StrikeForce Kitty
strikeforce-kitty.description: Raise and dress up a powerful army of cat warriors! Dress up your cats to improve the strength of your army with the costumes and weapons found along the way. Try to collect full set costumes for special powers!Use the Arrow Keys to control your army of cats. Jump over obstacles and collect fish.

aboriginal-brothers.name: Aboriginal Brothers
aboriginal-brothers.description: A tribe have two aboriginal warriors, they are a pair of brothers. one day, The chieftain send them to go to the forest to collect head bones. The red aboriginal collect the red bones, The green aboriginal collect the green bones.

epy.name: Epy
epy.description: Help Epy finding the way home without falling in the path dangers, avoiding monsters of every specie!

pursuit-of-hat-2.name: Pursuit Of Hat 2
pursuit-of-hat-2.description: The pursuit continues! Tear off your own limbs to get back your hat. Use the ARROW KEYS to move. Space to tear off body parts (legs first, then arms and head), DOWN ARROW to fix them back on!

frozen-elsa-crown.name: Frozen Elsa Crown
frozen-elsa-crown.description: Elsa and Anna have a lot of crown that is their parents give them. They collect these crown together, they munst collect the color corresponding to the crown, the last they must stand to the pipeline entrance can correspond to the color of the clearance.

spongebob-bubble-world-3.name: SpongeBob Bubble World 3
spongebob-bubble-world-3.description: Help SpongeBob and Patrick to collect all food and drink to reach to the finish. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

digital-baby-invincible.name: Digital Baby Invincible
digital-baby-invincible.description: Help your digital baby defeat monsters while being invincible!

redcap.name: Redcap
redcap.description: An excellent platform puzzle game with lots of smart levels to deal with. Use the arrow keys to guide our red capped friend through some very well designed stages.

red-ball-4-volume-3.name: Red Ball 4: Volume 3
red-ball-4-volume-3.description: The final installment to the hit Red Ball 4 series. Roll and jump your way through a deadly factory, defeating enemies and avoiding deadly laser beams in the process. Have you got what it takes to save the world from turning square?

doctor-acorn-levels-pack.name: Doctor Acorn Levels Pack
doctor-acorn-levels-pack.description: Doctor Acorn is out there again. Now he has to heal the poor birds. Can you collect the hidden pills and heal the birds?

catch-up-the-freedom.name: Catch up the Freedom
catch-up-the-freedom.description: Runner game with a man who tries to escape from his 'boring' world for a better world. Can you be a faster than your enemies?

sleeping-caveman.name: Sleeping Caveman
sleeping-caveman.description: Help the kid to successfully escape the chase by a disturbed angry caveman! Upgrade different supers, earn bones, and beat the crap out of him!

nelly-2-ep1.name: Nelly 2: ep.1
nelly-2-ep1.description: Wonderful adventure of the little girl in the fairy forest.

tomjim-escape.name: Tom&Jim Escape
tomjim-escape.description: Game story:Two friends were trapped on a desert island.They occasionally get a magical can.The god of can told them,there is a monster also looking for can.They need to avoid monsters and collecting all the cans left behind on the island.So that they can leave this island.

paperplane-in-paris.name: Paperplane In Paris
paperplane-in-paris.description: He doesnt have enough time and enough money for meeting with his girlfriend.He wrote a letter to her.He wants to send this letter as a paperplane to his darling.After he sent letter you will control

baby-cats.name: Baby Cats
baby-cats.description: Baby Cats is a nice game especially for children. Cat mom has lost her babies and you must help her find them. They can be anywhere, so good luck.

jump-to-sky.name: Jump to Sky
jump-to-sky.description: Crazy robot wants to reach sky.It can't fly but it can jump through to sky.Be carefull of angry birds and don't forget to collect metals.You can buy upgrades with them and jump higher.

detective-clara.name: Detective Clara
detective-clara.description: Detective Clara, Episode 1 - The Fridge Affair with 60 fun levels. Help Detective Clara to find the thief. Connect the trials, follow the footprints and discover the many clues that will lead you to find the thief of fridge.

barik.name: Barik
barik.description: A crash into the mountain has stopped Barik from returning home after the long flight. Now he needs your help finding and collecting all the missing parts of his plain so he can continue his journey.

flower-pots.name: Flower Pots
flower-pots.description: Karen is needed help to pick all the flower that she loved. But watch out as the field were full of obstacles and danger.

hopy-paradise.name: Hopy Paradise
hopy-paradise.description: Hopy is looking for paradise, help him find it!

scribble-nuts.name: Scribble Nuts
scribble-nuts.description: Get the nuts and go to the goal. Don't run out of time and avoid all the rats and spike and get for highest score in this simple fun platform game.Left Right Arrow = moveUp Arrow = jumpP = pause

spiderman-trilogy.name: Spiderman Trilogy
spiderman-trilogy.description: Be with Spiderman in this adventure that awaits him. Help him collect all spider coins, which are owned by evil characters. You will have to pass through different obstacles one more difficult than another. You will always be in suspense, be ready for the great adventure.

alan-haunted-school.name: Alan Haunted School
alan-haunted-school.description: Alan's girl friend trapped inside the biology room at presidental schools, could alan help leesa?lets find out!

doctor-acorn.name: Doctor Acorn
doctor-acorn.description: Join the great adventure of Doctor Acorn, it is a fun adventure game, you have to solve the puzzle in order to move on in your adventure.

monkey-brothers.name: Monkey Brothers
monkey-brothers.description: Help the Monkey brothers collect bananas and avoid the bad bananas. You have 2 minutes to collect as many as you can.

yummy-panda.name: Yummy Panda
yummy-panda.description: Interact with completely interactive world around to help the panda to be in time for a dinner: change landscape, pull tails and tentacles, shoot from cannons!Please with mouse

lost-toys-of-dora.name: Lost Toys Of Dora
lost-toys-of-dora.description: Dora lost her toys and wants to find her all toys again. But there are so many freaky monsters that strikes her way so she really cannot find her toys to play and she badly needs your help to collect all the toys. Hurry! help her collect the toys and be Dora's bestfriend.

down-the-rabbit-hole.name: Down The Rabbit Hole
down-the-rabbit-hole.description: The cute rabbit is hungry and needs to reach his hole and eat all the carrots, do that by blowing up the right objects in the right time.

boonie-bears-go-home.name: Boonie Bears Go Home
boonie-bears-go-home.description: Boonie Bears lost in the forest and lost contact of each other. Please help them reunion to find the way home together!

ank-coin.name: Ank Coin
ank-coin.description: Collect as much as possible coins in this simple platform game just for fun. Don't run out of time and avoid all the spiked cactus and creatures then get for the highest score.

chicken-duck-brothers.name: Chicken Duck Brothers
chicken-duck-brothers.description: Chicken Duck Brothers are fond of adventure. This time they came to a new world to collect gems. What kind of adventure it would be? Let's quickly enter the game to help the brothers!  Be cautious of other animals!

super-gunners.name: Super Gunners
super-gunners.description: Guide the super gunners as they run and gun their way through and endless horde of enemies.WAD for player one.UP arrow, LEFT arrow, RIGHT arrow for player two.

mario-walks.name: Mario Walks
mario-walks.description: New Mario styled game. This time you must control your hero  with mouse. Find his path to doors making land for him and avoid obstacles. Some of them you can break or push it to the wright places. You have 15 levels to finish. Enjoy!

minions-adventures.name: Minions Adventures
minions-adventures.description: At the same time operating two roles. Two roles' directions of movement are opposite. Pass the level when two roles both reach the exports of the corresponding color with the dinosaur eggs of the corresponding color. Instruction:A to move left and D to move right for the role of blue pants. Meanwhile, A to move right and D to move left for the role of red pants

minion-island-adventure.name: Minion Island Adventure
minion-island-adventure.description: Minion is on the special mission! He is at the Vector's tropical island. He must collect all the diamonds and go to the raft in order to complete the mission. But, that will not be an easy job, as diamonds are guarded by evil Minions. Good luck!

papa-louie-night-hunt.name: Papa Louie Night Hunt
papa-louie-night-hunt.description: Papa Louie is going to night hunt on gold coins. Help him to collect all coins and reach to the finish. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

zombie-bros.name: Zombie Bros
zombie-bros.description: Zombie bros want to collect some mushrooms in the forest as their dinner. Please help each zombies collect their own favorite mushrooms and find the way out! Remember that different zombies eat different mushrooms!

georganism.name: Georganism
georganism.description: Help three colorful jelly creatures explore the world by working together. Combine and alternate between the jelly creatures to explore the mysterious islands.

safari-trip.name: Safari Trip
safari-trip.description: Time for an Escape Adventure in the Safari desert! During your Safari Trip capture a lion, explore the amazon jungles, find gems and treasure and most important, rescue your girlfriend who was captured by the natives! Use logic to complete each level with the correct sequence of events.

gumball-adventure.name: Gumball Adventure
gumball-adventure.description: Gumball Adventure is a great adventure-platform game. Winter is here and Gumball and darwin is going out to make some fun. Help Gumball and Darwin to collect all items and put it on the table in the sea and past all 20 levels. To control Darwin use arrows, for Gumball use WASD keys. Good luck!!!

ben10-jump.name: Ben10 Jump
ben10-jump.description: Play Ben10 styled levels with other classic game characters.   You have 10 lives. Have Fun all the way !

mine-hero.name: Mine Hero
mine-hero.description: Shoot bubbles and pop those mines in this fun two player arcade game. Instructions: ARROW KEYS for player one. WASD for player two. Brought to you by 2pg. com home of the best 2 player games

design-your-t-shirt.name: Design your T-shirt
design-your-t-shirt.description: Donna is very fond of T-shirts and she has planned how to design one during her vacation. She has also asked you to join fashion websites for girls' course so that you can help her and design your own T-shirts as well.

mario-bros-forest-adventure.name: Mario Bros Forest Adventure
mario-bros-forest-adventure.description: Koopa captured the princess Peach once again. In order to rescue the princess, Mario and Luigi began a new adventure trip. Your mission is to help Mario and Luigi get through all levels. They eat mushrooms there and they must cooperate with each other, use their different abilities to complete the levels and arrive the end! Have fun!

dwarf-snowball.name: Dwarf Snowball
dwarf-snowball.description: Dwarf Snowball is a great platform game. Evil Dwarf is take all x-mas gifts from Dwarf. Santa have assignment for you.Help Dwarf to finish all levels and collect gifts. Be the brave Dwarf.Use the LEFT & RIGHT ARROW keys to move through the platforms. Press the UP ARROW key to jump and shoot the monsters snow using the 'S' key until they turn into giant snowballs and then push them and press 'S' key again to roll them away.

mario-escape-from-hell-2.name: Mario Escape From Hell 2
mario-escape-from-hell-2.description: New 15 styled levels!Help Mario to collect all pumpkins and reach to the finish. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

pou-village-adventure.name: Pou Village Adventure
pou-village-adventure.description: The male pou wants to kiss the female pou, but they are separate apart. Help the male pou kiss the female pou successful by collecting all keys. Watch out for the traps and enemies. Enjoy 15 levels in this funny adventure game!

my-little-pony-apple-collector.name: My Little Pony Apple Collector
my-little-pony-apple-collector.description: My Little Pony Applejack feels hungry and is craving to eat some apple. But there are so many freaky monsters that strikes her way so she really cannot feed up her hungry stomach and she badly needs your help to collect all the apples. Hurry! help her collect the apples and be Little Pony Applejack's bestfriend.

blackwood-prologue.name: Blackwood Prologue
blackwood-prologue.description: Explore the dreams of a young boy, foreshadowing the events of his future. There are 6 hidden orbs that you need to find.

gunball-adventure.name: Gunball Adventure
gunball-adventure.description: Gumball Adventure is a great adventure-platform game. Winter is here and Gumball and darwin is going out to make some fun. Help Gumball and Darwin to collect all items and put it on the table in the sea and past all 20 levels. To control Darwin use arrows, for Gumball use WASD keys. Good luck!!!

1-minute-paragliding.name: 1 Minute Paragliding
1-minute-paragliding.description: Tiny Nino has decided to try something new, he wants to use his bed-sheet to go paraglide to the other side of the land. This is his first attempt and he’ll paraglide for 1 minute only. Click and hold to help Nino paraglide and release to let him fall. Avoid the enemies and collect as many coins as you can.

the-epic-escape-of-the-carrot.name: The Epic Escape Of The Carrot
the-epic-escape-of-the-carrot.description: Harry is trapped in the most haunting place for a carrot to be, a fridge. Escaping is his only option, Seek help from a cast of wacky characters, each one crazier than the last. Break free from the cold walls of hell and escape before fate catches up to you and your little friends!

kleinecastle.name: KleineCastle
kleinecastle.description: This is a story of two lucky rascals, Eine and Kleine, who set off for a trip having no special plans. Who would have known that they would have had so many adventures. . .

freeze-me.name: Freeze Me
freeze-me.description: You are a small dewdrop and you have to collect stars on different planets. You can freeze yourself and build paths to avoid the spikes. There are 28 exciting levels! Collect all stars, avoid spikes and reach the exit!

forest-buddies.name: Forest Buddies
forest-buddies.description: The horrible devil king controlled almost all the animals in the forest and it can only be killed by a sacred stone in a faraway holy mountain. In order to save their forest buddies, monkey and hedgehog begin this dangerous adventure!

gloid-the-levitation-robot.name: Gloid - The Levitation Robot
gloid-the-levitation-robot.description: The idea in Gloid - The Levitation Robot is to combine established tile-based sidescroller jump'n'run and puzzle elements with new experimental components: The levitation makes Gloid float through the levels. He does so by pushing himself away from any walls within his levitation range, which can be increased or decreased by the player. As the player advances through the levels, more and more new elements will find their way into the game.

acorn-story.name: Acorn Story
acorn-story.description: Once upon a time there was a boy who lived in a Fairy Forest. He wanted to make a great present for a special day, so he planted a small seed, that grew into a tree with a magic acorn. And when that special day came, the boy realized that the acorn disappeared, and the boy decided to go out and find it.

hero-in-the-ocean-2.name: Hero In The Ocean 2
hero-in-the-ocean-2.description: The Hero and his crew are back! This time they’re going to a treasure hunt on their yellow submarine. But this trip is not for treasures only, but for the sake of adventure, adrenaline and unrestrained movement forward! You'll meet incredible deep-ocean fishes, find yourself alone with the hungry monster and more. Be a true hero, be in a great adventure!

rooms-of-art.name: Rooms Of Art
rooms-of-art.description: Rooms of Art challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a cool painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Rooms of Art!

spongebob-in-halloween-3.name: SpongeBob In Halloween 3
spongebob-in-halloween-3.description: Help SpongeBob to collect all pumpkins and reach to the finish. Have Fun all the way in this funny adventure game!

luna-fun-farm.name: LUNA Fun Farm
luna-fun-farm.description: Lunas grandfather has went out of town, so Luna will replace him delivering livestock and dairy goods to the buyer. Her truck is kind of too old to bring heavy stuff, so Luna needs money to upgrade her truck so she can make more money. Will you help her to handle this big job?It takes time, but worth the hard work!

the-adventures-of-the-water-knight-rescu.name: The Adventures of the Water Knight: Rescue the Princess

sonic-mystery-escape.name: Sonic Mystery Escape
sonic-mystery-escape.description: Sonic is in trouble! The Egg Man imprisoned Sonic the Hedgehog in strange, Mario-like world. Find the way out through the dungeons guarded by strange creatures. Sonic must collect all the keys in order to escape. Good luck!

bob-the-cube.name: Bob The Cube
bob-the-cube.description: Help BOB!! His girlfriend is kidnapped by bad guys and you need to save her with Bob.

cargo-express.name: Cargo Express
cargo-express.description: Find your way through a bumpy road with your truck loaded of rocks. The main goal is to bring your freight to the destination with minimal loss. You must achieve goals and with money gained you can upgrade your truck. The faster you deliver your cargo, the better you get paid.

matrix-rampage.name: Matrix Rampage
matrix-rampage.description: Re-enter the matrix and face mobs of agents as you battle them unarmed, melee weapons, or ranged weapons in this exciting Matrix Beat'em up Game!

swag-man.name: Swag Man
swag-man.description: You are the most Swaggy man in the world and you are the only one to save the electronic music. Travel over the world and rescue all clubbing lovers. Swag Man is a "Pac-Man" game genre in 3D ismometric view with the jump feature. The game includes 5 different levels with 5 cool electronic musics. Get the maximum of "Music Notes" and avoid Skulls. Jump over the skulls to collect "Red Baloons". Collect a lot of "Music Notes" to turn into the SUPER SWAG MAN, invicible and faster. You have few minutes to reach the best score.

christmas-gifts-clean-up.name: Christmas Gifts Clean Up
christmas-gifts-clean-up.description: Clean up the room after the christmas eve in a minimum time delay.

nangooni-swarm.name: Nangooni Swarm
nangooni-swarm.description: Top-down shooter, in which you play as a robot dragon, shooting robot insects, while trying to avoid being hit by them and gaining fire breath upgrades. Space to Shoot and Arrows Keys for movement

audi-jigsaw.name: Audi Jigsaw
audi-jigsaw.description: A typical puzzle game in which you will have to put the pieces in their correct places to be able to complete the whole puzzle together at the end! Choose your mode to play and click shuffle. By default, the time to finish your puzzle is limited, but of course you can play without the time limitation if you want to. Relax and start enjoying this perfect game called Audi Jigsaw!

capitan-dj.name: Capitan DJ
capitan-dj.description: Dr. Noise stole music from planet earth. Captain DJ needs your help to accomplish his mission and set the music back free again.

stick-santa-gift-collect.name: Stick Santa Gift Collect
stick-santa-gift-collect.description: Some Evil Elves have stolen all the Christmas Gifts, so Stick Santa has to collect them all. Move quickly around each level avoiding the Elves and collecting the gifts. If you wil be catched, you will have to restart the level. 12 challenging levels are waiting for you to test your ability.

redneck-olympics.name: Redneck Olympics
redneck-olympics.description: Compete in the Redneck Games and claim your prize as the top Monster Truck Drivin, Hog Tossin and Pumpkin Shootin competitor ever alive!

goodgame-poker.name: Goodgame Poker
goodgame-poker.description: Welcome to Goodgame Poker! This title combines all the strategy, skill and excitement of Texas Hold em plus customisable avatars with a fresh and modern style. Raise the stakes, bluff with the best but look good while you do it! Buy exclusive items, give your buddies gifts, raise your rankings and do it in style. True Texas Hold em rules with a new twist: GoodGame Poker.

pony-care.name: Pony Care
pony-care.description: Do you like pony? I love them so much. In that game you have to take care of your own pony. You will have to brush her, wash her, take care of his teeth and way more. Have fun.

spring-backyard.name: Spring Backyard
spring-backyard.description: Rachel and Georgia are playing spring clean up games. They are cleaning their spring backyard so that when their friends come home they can have a jolly good time. You can also join them.

steel-jack.name: Steel Jack
steel-jack.description: Cartoon style level-based runner game. Run along the trail of stolen treasures controlling the brave knight to find the kidnapped king and the princess.

the-cupcake-collector.name: The Cupcake Collector
the-cupcake-collector.description: Play the role of a big fat pasty chef who is on the hunt for some cupcakes. He is always running forward so he is going to need your help. The only thing that you need to worry about is making him jump, you do this by pressing the left mouse button. The longer you press the button the higher our chef will jump in the air. In every level you have to pick up as many cupcakes as you possible can, sometimes you will have to jump a gap or an obstacle at the perfect height so that you do not miss any out.

super-mario-save-toad.name: Super Mario - Save Toad
super-mario-save-toad.description: Now Bowser has ordered Wart to kidnap Toad. You are his only hope to escape. Use all your skills and experience from the previous episode (Super Mario - Save Luigi) and beat Wart. Good luck my friend.

thanksgiving-word-search-game.name: Thanksgiving Word Search Game
thanksgiving-word-search-game.description: Sit around the dinner table with the family and play this thanksgiving word search game.

hero-word-search.name: Hero Word Search
hero-word-search.description: Find the words that relate to Super Heroes!

cool-fu-master.name: Cool-Fu Master
cool-fu-master.description: As the coolest guy in school, getting to your classroom in time can be a bit troublesome! Nice girls (not only nice ones actually..) want your attention, bullies want to beat you up and other random distractions can slow you down! Get to your class in time but be sure to keep your coolness level up!

hidden-fables-6.name: Hidden Fables 6
hidden-fables-6.description: Hidden Fables 6 features a new hidden object challenge. Choose one of the 2 difficulty modes and find all 125 hidden objects scattered across a beautiful painting. Play on the hard mode to get a higher score. Have fun playing this new hidden object game!

robo-raven.name: Robo Raven
robo-raven.description: Robo Raven is a platform type horizontal scrolling game. Where Raven is a robot and is being commanded by its boss to collect some objects from market.Raven is on mission to collect all possible objects in market.

perrot-state-park-jigsaw.name: Perrot State Park Jigsaw
perrot-state-park-jigsaw.description: Piece together three different pictures of Perrot State Park in Wisconsin.

anime-girls-jigsaw.name: Anime Girls Jigsaw
anime-girls-jigsaw.description: A jigsaw game with pretty anime girls pictures and good music.

leaves-hidden-images.name: Leaves Hidden Images
leaves-hidden-images.description: Find the hidden images in the pictures of leaves

transmorpher-2.name: Transmorpher 2
transmorpher-2.description: "Transmorpher 2" is a puzzle platformer game where you play as a shape-shifting creature. Explore an alien spaceship and absorb various creatures try to reach each exit and escape. You can use forms and abilities of absorbed creatures to pass various game levels, solve simple and interesting puzzles.

fast-food-rush.name: Fast Food Rush
fast-food-rush.description: Ray and Tina are friends who decided to find a job for this summer. As every one knows, the food industry is very stressful and people get mad pretty quickly. Your main goal is to serve as many customers as possible and collect the money before a customer gets mad and leaves. The game offers the easy and hard mode. Hope you will enjoy!

little-farmer.name: Little Farmer
little-farmer.description: Little Farmer wants to organise the farm. Can you help him? Use your mouse to place and arrange items.

lederoid.name: Lederoid
lederoid.description: Play this Arcanoid like game with 36 levels, bonuses. . . Each level is rated by stars – more lives left, more stars you get. You can play each level again and again to get best score.

penguin-brothers.name: Penguin Brothers
penguin-brothers.description: Help the Penguin brothers eat fish. Match three or more fishes to remove them from the board. Use your mouse to target and shoot.

cute-little-monster-jump-game.name: Cute Little Monster Jump Game
cute-little-monster-jump-game.description: Funnly Cute Little Monster Jump GameIf you love cute monstersyou will love this gamepress space to jumpand arrow keys to movemove your monster to his base

the-cubic-monkey-adventures.name: The Cubic Monkey Adventures
the-cubic-monkey-adventures.description: This little monkey is hungry and only you can change that! The Cubic Monkey Adventures is a funny arcade game in which you have to collect as many bananas as you can while avoiding being hit by the cocos fruit. Use the Arrow Keys in order to control the cute monkey and try to get the highest score! You can pause the game any time by pressing P Key on your Keyboard. Have fun!

yummy-drops.name: Yummy Drops
yummy-drops.description: Drops of fun are falling from the sky in this action-packed game! Defeat wacky-looking monsters and meet cute, friendly companions!

cities-hidden-numbers.name: Cities Hidden Numbers
cities-hidden-numbers.description: Pick out the hidden numbers in the pictures of the cities through 10 scenes

restaurant-rush-hour.name: Restaurant Rush Hour
restaurant-rush-hour.description: Would you take a job as a waiter/chef in one of the fanciest five star restaurants in town? Then put on your apron, roll up your sleeves and get behind the counter for there sure is plenty of cooking to do, during the rush hour, and there is a big crowd of picky upper class customers to attend to, as well!

naruto-blast-battle.name: Naruto Blast Battle
naruto-blast-battle.description: Naruto is fighting against Lee, Sasuke and Sakura in the different fields. Each field has its own advantage and disadvantage. Help Naruto use the environment and his ninja skills to defeat the enemies on the fields. You can play in 1 player or 2 player mode. For player 1 use arrows to move and press L to drop your exploding kunai. For player 2 use wasd to move and press G to drop your exploding kunai. Win 2 games and you will win the battle.

angry-birds-bubble-shooter.name: Angry Birds Bubble Shooter
angry-birds-bubble-shooter.description: A Classic Bubble Shooter game with Angry Birds, Aim the arrow to burst the matching angry bird character, in order to burst the bubbles you will need at least three of the same bird. Compete with your friends and family in this high score game.

clumsy-mechanic-laundry.name: Clumsy Mechanic Laundry
clumsy-mechanic-laundry.description: Our cutie pie here decided to step into her uber-chic, mechanic overalls today and fix her girly-girl pinkish car on her own. But don't you ladies imagine that our adorable girl spent too much time in her mechanic outfit… in a moment of negligence she managed to spill the oil all over her clothes and now cute Jolie needs to move to the laundry room to wash her dirty clothes and pick a new outfit - would you like to help her out?

forest-shelter.name: Forest Shelter
forest-shelter.description: Welcome to the “Forest Shelter”, by far all the animals' top favorite place to hang out in the woods! You're its lucky owner and all these cute baby animals' loving and caring protector, so put all the efforts for not disappointing all your sweet little incoming customers. Feed them, bathe them, cure them, help them do their daily work-outs, in one word: make all their wishes come true in no time!

magic-puzzle-naruto.name: Magic Puzzle - Naruto
magic-puzzle-naruto.description: Rearrange the pieces of this cartoon puzzle to show your favorite Naruto characters.

leather-fashion-motifs.name: Leather Fashion Motifs
leather-fashion-motifs.description: Show off your skills as a creative fashion stylist topping each one of the fashion combos that you will have put together for this teen model here, ranging from fancy stylish, to boho-chic, lovely feminine or ladylike fashion looks, with statement leather jackets!

easter-bunny-egg-rush.name: Easter Bunny Egg Rush
easter-bunny-egg-rush.description: Would you lend this utterly cute Easter bunny here a helping hand at. . . serving tables in this charming forest fruit resto and at gaining enough lovely decorated, colorful Easter eggs he needs for spreading lots of joy on Easter Day? Here you have the very first animal popping up at one of the wooden tables, hurry up to bring him exactly the kind of fruit he'd love to spoil its taste buds with and. . . help your sweet long eared friend earn his very first precious Easter egg!

feed-little-jumbo.name: Feed Little Jumbo
feed-little-jumbo.description: Help Jumbo shoot the balloons with food! Beware of the bombs in some of the balloons.

gem-rush.name: Gem Rush
gem-rush.description: Operate magic cannon and collect gems in a mouse-controlled game with realistic physics.

hidden-numbers-spider-man.name: Hidden Numbers - Spider Man
hidden-numbers-spider-man.description: Find the hidden numbers in these amazing spider man pictures.

hidden-tableaux-8.name: Hidden Tableaux 8
hidden-tableaux-8.description: Find all 125 hidden objects scattered across a cool painting in Hidden Tableaux 8. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Hidden Tableaux 8!

mario-ghosthouse-2.name: Mario Ghosthouse 2
mario-ghosthouse-2.description: Oh no, Mario took another shortcut through the Ghosthouse. Now he's trapped inside and only you can save him. Level after level of tricky courses and dangerous ghosts, including Big Boo and the Ghost of Donkey Kong Jr who both intend on stopping Mario. Collect all the coins in a room for bonus points. Escape the haunted house for a billion point bonus.

santa-pang.name: Santa Pang
santa-pang.description: In this arcade game, u need to help Santa. Santa is crushed by big round bubbles and u need to help him to destroy them. Childrens in all over the world waiting for Santa and his gifts. Past all 9 levels and make childrens happy.

man-of-steel-city-flight.name: Man Of Steel - City Flight
man-of-steel-city-flight.description: Help Superman in this game based on the movie Man of Steel. You must cross the skies of the city as fast as you can, but be careful with the asteroids and enemy ships that try to kill you. Collect the bonus that will give you more shots and speed. How far can you fly?

turbo-snails-championship-challenge.name: Turbo - Snails Championship Challenge
turbo-snails-championship-challenge.description: Turbo Snails Championship Challenge is a racing game like you´ve never seen before, Snail Racing, where the less slow will win.

search-papoy.name: Search Papoy
search-papoy.description: Help minions to collect all the banana toys, pass all the obstacles and go to the exit door in this simple platform game for kids.Left Right Arrow = moveUp Arrow = jumpP = pause

beaverz.name: BeaverZ
beaverz.description: Direct the beavers' trampoline with your mouse and bounce the bunnies to the opposite shore. Hit crows that fly by for juicy bonuses.

sly-slide.name: Sly Slide
sly-slide.description: Sly Slide were a game of skill and ski. Slide your way to all the flag and end the stage to the goal flag. But watchout as a lot of spike and obstacle along the way.Left Right Arrow = moveUp Arrow = jumpP = pause

ballsy-bird-flap.name: Ballsy Bird Flap
ballsy-bird-flap.description: Ballsy Bird is an extremely addicting, endless flying game with up to 9 playable birds! Can you unlock them all? Click to fly and see how many drums you can get past. Play this game if you dare!

desert-wonders-hidden-object.name: Desert Wonders Hidden Object
desert-wonders-hidden-object.description: Use the mouse to piece together several desert scenes

naruto-finding-fault.name: Naruto Finding Fault
naruto-finding-fault.description: Look at the two nearly same pictures and find out five differences between them! Challenge your eyesight!

shapik-the-quest.name: Shapik: The Quest
shapik-the-quest.description: This is an epic story of Shapik, traveling through magic forest in search of his missing sister. Explore a beautiful world, full of mystery, magic and danger and find your missing sister, solving puzzles on your way.

erline-adventure.name: ErlinE Adventure
erline-adventure.description: For many years this world was dark and lost in the evil , the magic starts was the light for many years but now the dark has come and the starts are lost you need to bring them back.

dont-be-late.name: Don't Be Late
dont-be-late.description: Relationships are not easy. First of all you must go to your meeting on time. How difficult can this be?

billions-of-baubles.name: Billions Of Baubles
billions-of-baubles.description: Pop those Christmas balls to get lots of presents! Remove 3 or more connecting baubles of the same color in this physics based collapse game. Pop bigger groups to get power-ups and bonuses. But do it quickly, time is very limited!

dora-the-explorer-hidden-objects.name: Dora the Explorer Hidden Objects
dora-the-explorer-hidden-objects.description: Find all the hidden characters and items in these Dora the Explorer pictures. Find all the hidden characters and items in these pictures before time runs out!

jr-alien.name: Jr Alien
jr-alien.description: The Jr Alien got missed his way back to the Flying Saucer that got him on to the earth. He needs to get back to the vehicle and got a long journey to travel across the woods, to reach. This game of platform genre is very cutely designed with cartoon look and challenging game play. Use Key board to avoid obstacles and move across to reach the destination.

balloontastic.name: Balloontastic
balloontastic.description: Colorful balloons are floating up. When 3 or more of the same color connect, you can click and pop them! Pop enough balloons before the time is up to get more time and more points! Also check out the endless Kids mode which is very suitable for the younger player. Popping balloons has never been more fun!

flower-shop-challenge.name: Flower Shop Challenge
flower-shop-challenge.description: Find the hidden objects in a flower shop!

ice-cream-for-kids.name: Ice Cream For Kids
ice-cream-for-kids.description: You opened an ice cream store and you have to serve your customer with differents ice cream and drinks for them. The weather will be really high in the south today so be prepared to server lots of clients for this beautiful day.

easter-bunny-egg-collector.name: Easter Bunny Egg Collector
easter-bunny-egg-collector.description: What would you say about teaming up with the sweet Easter bunny this year and lending him a helping hand with all that demanding and nonetheless fun-filled eggs collecting marathon just before Easter Day? Carry out all the three skills-challenging tasks prepared for you in this game, gather as many lovely special Easter eggs as you can, and impress your new long eared friend, proving him that you're skillful enough to be his new reliable little helper!

elf-jump.name: Elf Jump
elf-jump.description: Santa left his elf behind after delivering gifts to the children. Help the elf jump back to Santa at the North Pole!

jack-o-lantern-designer.name: Jack-O-Lantern Designer
jack-o-lantern-designer.description: Design and dressup a Jack O Lantern Pumpkin with a spooky style and face for Halloween. Ghosts, spiders and cute black cat kittens will help!

break-bricks.name: Break Bricks
break-bricks.description: A game of Breakout with 100 levels and cool features like power-ups, aliens, turned levels and more fun. Use the mouse to play, bounce the ball up and break all bricks in a level to continue.

tibet-jigsaw.name: Tibet Jigsaw
tibet-jigsaw.description: Put together three great pictures of Tibet in five different sizes and shape cuts.

coco-block.name: Coco Block
coco-block.description: How quick are you in your fingers and mind?Exercise your reflexes and compete on the leaderboard. Protect the hungry monkeys from the falling coconuts, but let them eat the bananas. -------------How to Play- Click on the falling coconuts before they hit a monkey. - Don't click on the bananas, let your monkeys eat them- Bananas give high scores- Increase your combo for every successful tap, increased combo gives higher score for every successful block

rocket-cheese.name: Rocket Cheese
rocket-cheese.description: You are a rat in a space ship. Fly up to the stars, avoid your enemies, collecting cheese-stars and upgrading your ship!Use mouse to guide the ship, collect stars and avoid the rocks and enemies.

tiny-balloon-fish.name: Tiny Balloon Fish
tiny-balloon-fish.description: Let's swim and fly as far as you can with this clumsy Balloon Fish. Avoid all the obstacles in your way and improve your record!INSTRUCTIONS:Press or release left mouse button to goes up. Avoid the obstacles and swim or fly as far as you can!CONTROLS:Left mouse button or Space key to goes up.

jety-the-flying-penguin.name: Jety: The Flying Penguin
jety-the-flying-penguin.description: Jety is under fire of rockets, equipped with jetpack try to avoide enemy's rockets and collect coins to get high score.

fly-birdie-up.name: Fly Birdie: Up
fly-birdie-up.description: Birdie had a difficult year full of work and decided to go on holiday he ever dreamt of. Destination where he wants to go is spectacular Seaside. Since he's a bird he doesn't want to travel usual way but fly by himself. It's not an easy thing to do and Birdie needs your help. Do you have what it takes to help him fly there? Birdie is packed and ready to fly! Be aware of all traps which you may find all around Birdie's way.

polar-trouble.name: Polar Trouble
polar-trouble.description: Be the king of the pole! Help the penguins getting rid of their enemies by throwing snowballs with a bouncing board in this physic based winter themed puzzle game! Move your mouse left/right to change the angle of the board, up/down to increase/decrease the power of the shot, then click to release the snowball.

halloween-room-hidden-objects.name: Halloween Room Hidden Objects
halloween-room-hidden-objects.description: It's time to use your observing skills to discover the hidden objects in these halloween hidden images. Find the hidden objects in short duration to get high score. Avoid clicking wrongly as otherwise you will lose 20 seconds in given time duration. Good luck and have fun!

santa-airplane.name: Santa Airplane
santa-airplane.description: Help Santa to collect as many presents as you can, and as fast as you can, to get the higher score. Do not crash against other planes. Slowdown the other planes to escape of a situation.

laser-beam-escape.name: Laser Beam Escape
laser-beam-escape.description: Escape from the laser chasing you by changing color to match the approaching blocks. Stay ahead by hitting blocks of the same color, and avoid blocks of a different color. To change direction, click the screen or press Z. To change color, press 1-3 or click on the color buttons.

pokemon-click-alike.name: Pokemon Click Alike
pokemon-click-alike.description: Click on a tile and than click on the tile with the same character to remove it. Remove all tiles to go to the next level.

classic-kof.name: Classic KOF
classic-kof.description: Iori family as the guardian of the gates of time and space, guarding the door of outsider time and space. Once the door is opened the real world will perish.

mad-worms.name: Mad Worms
mad-worms.description: Whack the mad worms and try to get the highest score. The quicker you tap more points and time you get.

puppy-beauty-spa.name: Puppy Beauty Spa
puppy-beauty-spa.description: Every one likes to have a cute puppy as a pet. But taking care of the puppy is very much important. Here Dona is cleaning her puppy. As she is having a naughty puppy she needs your help to take care of her puppy. Have a nice day with the naughty puppy.

pitbabes-slot.name: PitBabes Slot
pitbabes-slot.description: 5 Reel slot game with unlockable galleries! Addictive gameplay, play on 5 paylines and win credits to unlock the pitbabes wallpapers!

joker-babe-slot.name: Joker Babe Slot
joker-babe-slot.description: 5 Reel slot game with unlockable galleries!Addictive gameplay, play on 5 paylines and win credits to unlock the babes wallpapers!

super-mario-hidden-alphabets.name: Super Mario Hidden Alphabets
super-mario-hidden-alphabets.description: Analyze your power of observation by finding out the alphabets of Super Mario image. For each accurate click, score will get increased and for wrong click, score will get reduced.

llama-in-your-face.name: Llama in your Face
llama-in-your-face.description: You are the most awesome Llama in the Zoo! Spit on the zoo visitors to prevent them from jumping into your cage! Earn enough money to upgrade your awesome spitting powers so you can protect your cage at all costs!

super-mario-save-luigi.name: Super Mario - Save Luigi
super-mario-save-luigi.description: Luigi has big problems, Bowser locked him up. It is up to Mario to save his brother Luigi, but Bowser will not let that happen and has blocked all pipes that lead to Luigi. It is up to you to save Luigi!

super-mario-war.name: Super Mario War
