super-mario-war.description: Kill monsters and protect Princess Peach! Single Player Mode: P1: Use Arrow Keys to Move and Space to Fire. Two Player Mode: P2: Use Q = Fire Use E = Up, D=Down, S=Left, F=Right.

seafood-hidden-images.name: Seafood Hidden Images
seafood-hidden-images.description: Find the hidden images in the pictures of seafood

angela-baby-birth.name: Angela Baby Birth
angela-baby-birth.description: Finally our dear Angela is going to give birth. Everyone is looking forward to see her little sweety kitty. Let's get help Angela in packing things for the hospital, bearing a daughter and taking care of her.

giant-flappy-swine.name: Giant Flappy Swine
giant-flappy-swine.description: Guide the big fat flying swine through the cliffs without crashing into them. Hit trees, houses and planes on the way to score extra points!You click left mouse button and Keep Holding to fly up, then Release to fall

jamaica-jigsaw.name: Jamaica Jigsaw
jamaica-jigsaw.description: Use the mouse to piece together three pictures of Jamaica in 5 sizes and shape cuts.

kettle-moraine-north-jigsaw.name: Kettle Moraine North Jigsaw
kettle-moraine-north-jigsaw.description: Use the mouse to piece together three pictures of Kettle Moraine North.

thanksgiving-hidden-images.name: Thanksgiving Hidden Images
thanksgiving-hidden-images.description: Use the mouse to find hidden images in the pictures of Thanksgiving

dragon-ball-z-trivia-quiz.name: Dragon Ball Z Trivia Quiz
dragon-ball-z-trivia-quiz.description: Answer 20 questions about the Dragon Ball Z anime series and try to get a high score!

summer-typing-skills.name: Summer Typing Skills
summer-typing-skills.description: Test and improve your typing skills

shark-moto.name: Shark Moto
shark-moto.description: This shark is riding on his motor in the sea. Try to collect a lot of coins to get a good score. There are 10 levels in this Mario style game. Succes and have fun!

nickelodeon-trivia-scramble.name: Nickelodeon Trivia Scramble
nickelodeon-trivia-scramble.description: Are you the ultimate Nickelodeon fan? Unscramble the letters to answer the trivia questions in each category. If you complete all 4 puzzles, you'll earn a Certificate of Fandom!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the category you want to play. Then use your mouse or keyboard to type in the answers.

volga-jigsaw.name: Volga Jigsaw
volga-jigsaw.description: Put together three great pictures of town and scenes along the Volga River.

baby-chickens-jigsaw.name: Baby Chickens Jigsaw
baby-chickens-jigsaw.description: Use the mouse to piece together three great pictures of baby chickens.

wordle.name: Wordle
wordle.description: Wordle is a beautiful word search highscores game with new game mechanics and addicting gameplay!

jungle-gems.name: Jungle Gems
jungle-gems.description: Help the Pandas match all the Gems down in the Jungle!

super-cars-hidden-letters.name: Super Cars Hidden Letters
super-cars-hidden-letters.description: Find the hidden letters in these pictures of a car!

unlimited-cars-difference.name: Unlimited Cars Difference
unlimited-cars-difference.description: Find the differences between these images of cars!

choo-choons.name: Choo Choons
choo-choons.description: Build a train layout and control four engines. Switch on Choons to create rhythm with the scenery!

kung-fu-panda-hidden-objects.name: Kung Fu Panda Hidden Objects
kung-fu-panda-hidden-objects.description: There are three levels. Find all the hidden King-Fu Panda characters in these pictures before time runs out to advance to the next level.

bugs-in-the-factory.name: Bugs In The Factory
bugs-in-the-factory.description: The factory has taken over by bugs! You need to get rid of all the bugs so the factory can function normally again!

mickey-and-friends-hidden-objects.name: Mickey and Friends Hidden Objects
mickey-and-friends-hidden-objects.description: There are three levels. Find all of Mickey's friends in these pictures before the time runs out to advance to the next level.

tinkerbell-spot-8-difference.name: Tinkerbell Spot 8 Difference
tinkerbell-spot-8-difference.description: Look at the two images and try to find the 8 differences in each image. There a three different sets of images!

tadeo-jones-adventures.name: Tadeo Jones Adventures
tadeo-jones-adventures.description: Find out where the hidden letters are within this image, based on a cartoon film.

hidden-hills.name: Hidden Hills
hidden-hills.description: Collect 125 hidden objects of 6 different types in this colorful Dwarf Land in order to help a globetrotter who dropped his backpack and lost them. Hurry up and find the items as fast as you can to get a higher score!

blinking-blocks.name: Blinking Blocks
blinking-blocks.description: Make different shapes using basic blocks in this arcade style game. Remember, timing is the key! Game gets insanely harder at later levels.

skulls.name: Skulls
skulls.description: Clear the skulls from the board in this scary match 3 game. The game includes unique shoot-to-match gameplay and fun upgrades and power-ups to buy from collected coins. Click with the mouse to shoot the skull off, hit groups of same colored skulls to clear them from the game field. Remove all locked skulls to complete a level.

hidden-challenge-2.name: Hidden Challenge 2
hidden-challenge-2.description: Another cat threw a party and made a mess. You must help it collect all 125 hidden objects and clean the room before its owners get back home. You need to make the room look like nothing happened. Hurry up and find the items as fast as you can to get a higher score!

photon-baby.name: Photon Baby
photon-baby.description: Shoot powerful photons to burn all vampires in this puzzle platformer. Your baby son, including his playing toy a mysterious diamond, was abducted by direct order of count Dracula! Now you must visit his spooky castle and retrieve your precious diamond, including your baby.

8-bit-dash.name: 8-bit Dash
8-bit-dash.description: 8 bit style arcade runner with two player modes. Run and dash!

aagy-bones.name: Aagy Bones
aagy-bones.description: Collect all the bones in this simple platform game. Don't run out of time and avoid all the rats and obstacle and get for the highest score.Left Right Arrow = moveUp Arrow = jumpP = pause

kangaroo-adventure.name: Kangaroo Adventure
kangaroo-adventure.description: The robber stole a big bag of gold. To regain the gold, the kangaroo officer starts his great adventure. Can he find all the gold? Let's begin the adventure together!

chase-burger.name: Chase Burger
chase-burger.description: Run run run! Put your life in line to get back your burger! Avoid obstacles, upgrade your abilities, and defeat the big boss! Submit your best score and compete against the world

baby-talking-tom-bathing.name: Baby Talking Tom Bathing
baby-talking-tom-bathing.description: Your first customer has arrived in thid Talking Tom bath game and your job is to make the cute kitty be clean and fluffy once you take him through all the stations of your bathing salon.

divergent-trivia-scramble.name: Divergent Trivia Scramble
divergent-trivia-scramble.description: Are you the ultimate Divergent fan? Unscramble the letters to answer the trivia questions in each category. If you complete all 4 puzzles, you'll earn a Certificate of Fandom!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the category you want to play. Then use your mouse or keyboard to type in the answers.

kitty-grooming-salon.name: Kitty Grooming Salon
kitty-grooming-salon.description: Wash, dry, brush, and clean your kittens teeth to make her look her best. You choose what sort of collars and accessories you want her to wear to make her stand out from all the other kittens on the street.

the-pet-hospital.name: The Pet Hospital
the-pet-hospital.description: Take cake of your animals and bring them to the veterenary to know what is going on with your pet. There is several solution who will make feel your pet much better.

roadways-scenic-jigsaw.name: Roadways Scenic Jigsaw
roadways-scenic-jigsaw.description: Use the mouse to put together three scenic roadways.

piano-tiles.name: Piano Tiles
piano-tiles.description: Piano Tiles aka Don't Tap The White TilesThe mobile game that is topping all the charts of all the app stores now has a web version in unity3d!Optimize now for these massively growing searches:Piano TilesDon't Tap The White TileDon't Step the White TileTap Black Avoid White TilesTile Tap Game

garfield-family.name: Garfield Family
garfield-family.description: Garfield Family is a typical cartoon puzzle game. At this game you can choose various levels to play according to your expertise.  After selecting the difficulty level, you will move on to the gaming screen where you will find shuffled and shattered pieces of Garfield and his family. Try to solve the puzzle before time limit. If you need more time you can remove the time meter. Play and enjoy at this cartoon puzzle game.

alien-invaders-bog.name: Alien Invaders BOG
alien-invaders-bog.description: Alien Invaders takes you into the space and let you shoot down all kinds of aliens.

headsmashing-world-cup.name: Headsmashing World Cup
headsmashing-world-cup.description: Football celebrities like Messi, Ribery or Ronaldo make you frustrated? We have a cure!

mystical-forest-hidden-numbers.name: Mystical Forest Hidden Numbers
mystical-forest-hidden-numbers.description: Find the twenty Hidden object in each of the ten scenes of the Mystical Forest. Number appear in different locations each time your play

mario-zeppelin.name: Mario Zeppelin
mario-zeppelin.description: Collect as many coins as you can but be careful with the Zeppelin. Fly through 7 levels in this exciting adventure.

spiderman-jump.name: Spiderman Jump
spiderman-jump.description: Play Spiderman styled levels with other classic game characters.   You have 10 lives. Have Fun all the way !

baby-bathtub.name: Baby Bathtub
baby-bathtub.description: This cutie here adores her daily splashy, bubbly baths! Now, what would you say about turning her dear little bathtub, where she usual has so much fun, and that area close to it, into a chic, colorful dream place to be for the cute little pumpkin? Pick a new lovely design for the bathtub itself, get her a new cute bath time toy, as well, opt for a brand new colorful little rug and for some adorably shaped little bottles of baby bath products, too, then. . .

rocket-kong.name: Rocket Kong
rocket-kong.description: Rocket Kong is on a new mission in the Under World. Ride on the rocket to avoid the evil creatures and collect the bananas to earn points. Get to the bananas as fast as you can to get the most points for the high score. Have a blast in Donkey Kongs new Rocket Kong game.

hidden-fables-8.name: Hidden Fables 8
hidden-fables-8.description: Hidden Fables 8 features a new hidden object challenge. Choose one of the 2 difficulty modes and find all 125 hidden objects scattered across a beautiful painting. Play on the hard mode to get a higher score. Have fun playing this new hidden object game!

hidden-fables-5.name: Hidden Fables 5
hidden-fables-5.description: Hidden Fables 5 features a new hidden object challenge. Choose one of the 2 difficulty modes and find all 125 hidden objects scattered across a beautiful painting. Play on the hard mode to get a higher score. Have fun playing this new hidden object game!

one-direction-lyric-quiz.name: One Direction Lyric Quiz
one-direction-lyric-quiz.description: Are you the ultimate One Direction fan? Put your knowledge to the test in this lyric quiz!Instruction: Read each lyric and then use your mouse to click the answer which completes the lyric.

logo-expert.name: Logo Expert
logo-expert.description: Brain is obsessed to be a logo expert. He spends all day long reading stacks of books in his basement. He needs your companion to learn and answering question from book!

super-mario-bomber.name: Super Mario Bomber
super-mario-bomber.description: Here comes your chance to play Bomberman with all the characters from the Mario World.

tidy-bubble.name: Tidy Bubble
tidy-bubble.description: Tidy bubble is an action packed chain reaction game where you will be challenged to keep your bubble in play and burst as many microbes as you can. There are three exciting game modes to choose from:Normal - Endless rounds with no restrictionsCourse - 3, 6, or 9 rounds with shareable codes. Attack - High score challenge with only 3 lives.

lovers-garden.name: Lovers Garden
lovers-garden.description: Rebecca wants you to decorate the garden next to her house with ideas from decoration online coz she is going to meet her boyfriend in that garden today. Can you help her?

dungeon-deadline.name: Dungeon Deadline
dungeon-deadline.description: Enter the Deadline Dungeons and loot as much gold as you can. You only got 10 seconds and there are lots of monsters waiting for you. Choose out of 3 hero classes each has its own strenght and weakness. Buy upgrades and maybe you will be able to defeat the dungeon master.

monastery-jigsaw.name: Monastery Jigsaw
monastery-jigsaw.description: Piece together three great pictures of the Monastery in 5 sizes and 5 shape cuts.

lamborghini-jigsaw-game.name: Lamborghini Jigsaw Game
lamborghini-jigsaw-game.description: Another jigsaw game and this time you need to collect all pieces at right places and to get picture of Lamborghini car. Chose your mode to play and click shuffle. Press on T button to stop the time, if you need more time to finish the level.

fios-adventure.name: Fio’s Adventure
fios-adventure.description: Help Fio getting her money back from the greedy crow that steal her pouch. Explore the jungle full of mysteries and puzzles to solve.

cleopatra-bonus-slot.name: Cleopatra Bonus Slot
cleopatra-bonus-slot.description: 5 Reel slot game with classic gameplay!Addictive gameplay, play on 5 paylines and win credits!

kids-car-wash.name: Kids Car Wash
kids-car-wash.description: With the Kids Car Wash cleaning game you can easily pimp up your car and give it the best makeover in your car racing salon! Here you can easily choose your style of car from many different cars before you wash, clean, rinse, and dry your car ready for polishing!

elsa-washing-dishes.name: Elsa Washing Dishes
elsa-washing-dishes.description: Today was an amazing day - the royal ball went perfectly! But the day is going to an end and no one wants to help Elsa with dirty dishes. Elsa don’t really like it, and it’s not an easy job for her. But you won’t refuse her, would you? Together you will finish the work in no-time!

super-shinyhead.name: Super ShinyHead
super-shinyhead.description: Flappy bird was easy. Beat this. In two player mode, and annoying sounds, dodge the obstacles . . . if you can! Player one, SPACE. Player two, Mouse Click.

toledo-jigsaw.name: Toledo Jigsaw
toledo-jigsaw.description: Use the mouse to piece together three great pictures of the city of Toledo in Spain.

alpine-jigsaw.name: Alpine Jigsaw
alpine-jigsaw.description: Use the mouse to piece together three great Alpine pictures.

lake-balaton-jigsaw.name: Lake Balaton Jigsaw
lake-balaton-jigsaw.description: Use the mouse to piece together three great pictures of Lake Balaton in 5 sizes and shape cuts.

princess-shoe-repair.name: Princess Shoe Repair
princess-shoe-repair.description: Everybody knows, that your shoe salon is best in the whole kingdom! That’s why all this princess are standing in line for you to repair their shoes. Help Elsa, Rapunzel, Mulan, Cinderella and other princesses!

christmas-fairy.name: Christmas Fairy
christmas-fairy.description: On the eve the girl is getting ready to celebrate Christmas in her house. Help the girl to Dressup in a new fashion and choosing accessories..

how-to-cook-everything.name: How To Cook Everything
how-to-cook-everything.description: How To Cook Everything is a one of the strangest cooking games that you will ever play. Cooking may not be a challenging task for you but it will be here in this game. You will have to pick up the ingredients from the heap of things and use them to carry out the coking task to fulfill the orders of the customers.

papa-s-pastaria.name: Papa's Pastaria
papa-s-pastaria.description: Papa's Pastaria is a restaurant running game in which you have been given the responsibility to run the restaurant started by Papa Louie while he is gone for some other works. Take orders from the customers, prepare the items in the correct way and serve the customers to get paid by them.

healthy-bean-soup.name: Healthy Bean Soup
healthy-bean-soup.description: It’s time to cook healthy so in this game you will learn how to prepare a delicious bean soup in just a few minutes. This recipe is very healthy because it contain many vegetables like tomatoes, bean, carrots and more. You have to eat vegetables every day and this recipe is just perfect for you. Learn how to cook Healthy Bean Soup in just a few simply steps and following a precise recipe. Have fun cooking!

elsa-cooking-tiramisu.name: Elsa Cooking Tiramisu
elsa-cooking-tiramisu.description: Have a great time in the kitchen with this Elsa cooking game because she wants to make a special dessert called a tiramisu cake. It is really delicious so help her out and learn as you go along.

burger-shop-frenzy.name: Burger Shop Frenzy
burger-shop-frenzy.description: Burger Shop Frenzy is a game that will put to test both your serving and cooking skills. You will have to prepare the appropriate items as demanded by the customers and serve them. Your efficiency will surely help you grow the business.

luscious-wedding-cake-decor.name: Luscious Wedding Cake Decor
luscious-wedding-cake-decor.description: In this food decoration game, you have the task of decorating a luscious wedding cake with creamy layers, designs and toppers to present it as a gift for the wedding of your dearest friend. Make sure that you decorate it well. Have fun with this cake decor game!

sweet-poppy-cupcakes.name: Sweet Poppy Cupcakes
sweet-poppy-cupcakes.description: You want to make some delicious muffins for your guests? Nothing easier! You only need to mix all the ingredients, put it in the oven, decorate them as you like and muffins are ready to serve! Good luck and enjoy cooking games!

candy-cane-cookies.name: Candy Cane Cookies
candy-cane-cookies.description: Cook candy treats for any special occasion with this free online cooking game!

park-diner.name: Park Diner
park-diner.description: Put on your apron and walk into the shoes of the waitress working in this lovely little park diner! Attend to each one of the hungry customers and be quick to carry out their food orders, bringing them exactly the type of dishes that they'd love to spoil their taste buds with. Needless to say that you'll need to do all that in the blink of an eye!

berry-sponge.name: Berry Sponge
berry-sponge.description: In this cooking game you have to mix a few ingredients in order to make a delicious cake! After you have mixed, you have to put all this in the oven and decorate the cake as you like. Have fun!

halloween-cake-decoration.name: Halloween Cake Decoration
halloween-cake-decoration.description: Let the Halloween inspire you and make the greatest Halloween cake ever. Everybody has to make something delicious for the Halloween treats so do not worry, you are not the only one to make a cake. None of them is a stylist to decorate the cake so we trust your artist magical powers. You need to start and decorate the cake right now, so make sure it will look exceptional. Have a Happy Halloween!

almond-coconut-cake.name: Almond Coconut Cake
almond-coconut-cake.description: Carol is coming home to celebrate and make a special cake for this occasion. She is planning to make a sweet almond coconut cake. She needs your partnership to make a delicious cake. As she have a short time to make a cake, Carol wants you to be with her till she complete the cake. Have fun.

luna-steak-house.name: Luna Steak House
luna-steak-house.description: After Luna opened her bakery shop, sun bakery and sun cafe which are run pretty good, now she run her new business named Luna steak house. open from 8 to 4pm everyday. Help her to manage the kitchen, making delicious steak for customer. There are 3 steps to make a single steak. First is sauce, second is cooking and the last and important thing is plating. DO IT RIGHT and do not disappoint customers!

banana-crumb-muffins.name: Banana Crumb Muffins
banana-crumb-muffins.description: Put on your apron and get behind the kitchen counter, for Oti's cooking class is about to start! Today she'll reveal to you all her muffin baking tips and tricks, so, if you're a real desserts addict, you should no way miss her class! Select the right ingredients, mix them as indicated to you by your lovely trainer, pour, smash, sprinkle, wait for your muffins to cook, learn all about decorating them and. . . you will have baked your tantalizing banana crumb muffins in no time!

make-delicious-cookies.name: Make Delicious Cookies
make-delicious-cookies.description: Your friends are coming over for a poker night at your place so you have to think at some snacks to make. They bring the drinks so the snacks are all yours. Start with some delicious cookies because with this recipe you can not fail. The goody smell will fulfill your house so you will make it the best poker place for your friends. Mix the ingredients, prepare the oven and get started. These cookies are the best treat for your friends. Enjoy!

cooking-perfect-burger.name: Cooking Perfect Burger
cooking-perfect-burger.description: I love burger and I really like to eat them in every fast food around the world. We decided to cook an excellent burger for you and your family.

perfect-chocolate-cake.name: Perfect Chocolate Cake
perfect-chocolate-cake.description: Girls, lets make a delicious chocolate cake for our friends. This cake can be also made at weddings and you can decorate how you like it. First make sure you have the right goodies to decorate the cake then start the process of baking the bases. If your cake looks good then you can start your own bakery shop. Make wedding cakes with love for all the brides to be. Gain experience by playing this game. Enjoy this useful game and finish your cake!

create-your-pizza.name: Create Your Pizza
create-your-pizza.description: Do you like pizzas? Of course you do because everybody does. In this game you have the freedom to create any pizza you want. You can choose various types of tomatoes, sauces, bread, salami, ham and other vegetables. You can serve pizza when you are hungry, when someone is coming over or whenever you want. Follow the right steps and put the ingredients on the pizza in the right order. Enjoy playing this online pizza game for girls!

delicious-hot-spicy-pizza.name: Delicious Hot Spicy Pizza
delicious-hot-spicy-pizza.description: Who does not love pizza? Make the perfect one using some flavors and spices that will delight your taste. As an accomplished chef you should choose the best ingredients to make the perfect hot spicy pizza. Is very simple and fast! Everyone will love this dish! Have fun and good luck!

vegan-dinner.name: Vegan Dinner
vegan-dinner.description: Would you help this cutie surprise her mommy and daddy this evening with a mouth-watering, vitamins-loaded vegan dinner? Then hurry up to pick the yummiest veggie dishes and to mix and match the cutlery, the tablecloth, cups and glasses for pulling off an exquisite table setting as well!

strawberry-shortcake-donuts.name: Strawberry Shortcake Donuts
strawberry-shortcake-donuts.description: Make the best Strawberry Shortcake Donuts with Drag and drop DIY style play

make-delicious-shawarma.name: Make Delicious Shawarma
make-delicious-shawarma.description: Are you in the mood for a delicious shawarma? In this cooking lesson you will learn how to make a perfect one. It is not hard to make so dont worry if you can not cook. Make a list with all the ingredients you need and put them on the table. Follow the indications to see which you will use first. Bake the pita and put all the yummy ingredients in it. Your shawarma will be ready in just few seconds. Lets see which one is going to make it first?

apricots-cake-recipe.name: Apricots Cake Recipe
apricots-cake-recipe.description: Do you like apricots? We have a special recipe for you made with love and with the delicious summer fruits, apricots. The moment you start eating the dessert you will realize that you can not stop eating it. The taste is absolutely divine and the apricots are the secret ingredient that gives the perfect flavor. Take all the ingredients you need to make the Apricots Cake Recipe and start the cooking process by following the instructions. Serve your friends and family with the apricot cake. Enjoy!

spicy-broccoli-chicken.name: Spicy Broccoli Chicken
spicy-broccoli-chicken.description: Step into chef Oti's lovely chicken for the cooking class is about to begin! Today you'll be learning all the cooking tips and tricks that you need to know for preparing a yummy, vitamin-packed spicy broccoli chicken dish! Be quick to complete all the tasks that she'll give you, starting with the key ingredients' spotting one, continuing with the chopping, the slicing step and then. . .

cooking-cake-pops.name: Cooking Cake Pops
cooking-cake-pops.description: Come into our kitchen and take a simply cooking class! Today we are going to prepare delicious Cake Pops. It’s a dessert that looks great and taste very good. Follow the instructions in the game and you will see that is more easier than you think. Cooking is fun so let’s cook together in this great game for girls!

ice-cream-delight.name: Ice Cream Delight
ice-cream-delight.description: Do I sense a yummy ice creams addict? Then you'll surely love your new job: working in an ice cream stand where you'll be challenged to prepare the tastiest ice cream desserts and to serve them to lots and lots of customers eager to soak up the sun by getting their taste buds spoiled with these finger-licking good summery treats!

pou-ice-cream-decoration.name: Pou Ice Cream Decoration
pou-ice-cream-decoration.description: Are you crazy about ice cream? Well, who isn't? Everybody loves this tasty dessert, especially in warm summer days. What do you think about creating yourself some delicious ice cream treats decorated in a special way? If you like the idea, then go on and play this cool game! Choose the ingredients and the decorating items you prefer to make the best ice cream treats ever!

cooking-bacon-pizza.name: Cooking Bacon Pizza
cooking-bacon-pizza.description: Deana is planned to go to pizza corner to give treat for her friends. A New variety of pizza is available in Royal Pizza Corner. They had a happy treat with the Bacon Pizza. Are you interested to Make Bacon pizza in your home . Follow the instruction and have a chance to taste the bacon pizza.

asian-style-lemon-chicken.name: Asian Style Lemon Chicken
asian-style-lemon-chicken.description: It's time for lemon chicken again! This time Asian style! Follow the instructions to serve the best meal you've ever made!

cook-a-delicious-carrot-cake.name: Cook A Delicious Carrot Cake
cook-a-delicious-carrot-cake.description: Carrot cake are one of the best cake ever. I especially love them with yogurt and a delicious milk. You will have several ingredients and have several steps to have your final cake.

new-year-cheese-cake.name: New Year Cheese Cake
new-year-cheese-cake.description: This is a day to celebrate a wonderful Newyear . Reyna is planning to prepare a New year cheese cake. She alone cannot prepare a cake . She is welcoming you to prepare a new year cake . Have a New year with cute Reyna.

new-england-lobster-rolls.name: New England Lobster Rolls
new-england-lobster-rolls.description: Lobster is a real treat and something you should have for a special occasion! This is why the recipe for this gorgeous lobster roll with rich sauces and scrumptious salad should be played time and time again until you're familiar with the process of making this fine and elegant lunch. Star off by shopping for the ingredients and then follow the step by step instructions until you are a master of this yummy dish! I wonder what special occasion you can have this for!?

spicy-chicken-recipe.name: Spicy Chicken Recipe
spicy-chicken-recipe.description: Do you like to try recipes that you have never tried before? I do! Eating delicious food from all over the world is one thing I like the most. Today I want to try something from the Indian kitchen. Spicy Chicken Recipe is the answer for my require so now I am going to cook it in my kitchen. Play this game with me and lets learn together how to make a delicious dish for our families and friends. Spicy chicken is the best recipe you will ever taste. Have a good day!

sweet-gummy-candy.name: Sweet Gummy Candy
sweet-gummy-candy.description: Gummy candy are awesome and tasty. I love them specialy when they are with differents colors. Make your own gummy yourself with this good cooking game.

french-chips-recipe.name: French Chips Recipe
french-chips-recipe.description: Would you like to cook some delicious French chips? I have got his recipe from my dearest friend who happens to be also a great chef. Playing this game you will learn the secret tips about the perfect chips. You can never fail with this recipe if you follow all the indications. The French chips can be served when you are alone or when you have someone over. The best snack ever!! Play this online game for girls and try to finish it before your friends do!

pancy-cupcakes.name: Pancy Cupcakes
pancy-cupcakes.description: Ready for a new cooking session? It’s time to use your inspiration and cook delicious flower cupcakes. This is most favorite dessert recipe, there are only few instructions and you don’t need many ingredients to make it. So we have to prepare our composition first and then we need to take time and decorate these delicious cupcakes. Make some blue and pink marzipan flowers and decorate your cupcakes with them. It looks pretty delicious! Have Fun!

wedding-chocolate-cake.name: Wedding Chocolate Cake
wedding-chocolate-cake.description: Prepare a wedding cake full of chocolate. There are a lot of steps and you'll learn many aspects of cooking.

fruit-jams.name: Fruit Jams
fruit-jams.description: Get ready to challenge your creativity as a food table decorator and to come up with a jaw-dropping, mouth-watering food table décor having. . . fruit jams as the key, attention-grabbing foodies! Scan through all the delicious desserts and lovely chic cutlery and don't forget to put together some eye-tempting fruit jam jars, too!

master-pizza-maker.name: Master Pizza Maker
master-pizza-maker.description: Bring a world of flavor into your life with the master Pizza Maker game. This cooking game gives you the chance to become a professional chef and create a perfect and yummy tasting pizza each and every time.

sofia-cooking-muffins.name: Sofia Cooking Muffins
sofia-cooking-muffins.description: Get your apron on and start doing something crazy in this Sofia dessert cooking game as she will be showing you what you need to do in order to bake some delicious muffins.

great-pizza-deco.name: Great Pizza Deco
great-pizza-deco.description: You are an assistant of the famous chef. The chef made a pizza for his customer. It is your job to decorate this delicious pizza.

great-tasting-ice-cream.name: Great Tasting Ice Cream
great-tasting-ice-cream.description: Make some delicious ice cream in this cool cooking game.

pita-pizzas.name: Pita Pizzas
pita-pizzas.description: You must cook delicious pizzas by slicing red hot peppers and mushrooms. On top of that, add extra cheese and heat! Enjoy this great cooking game.

spongebob-master-chef.name: Spongebob Master Chef
spongebob-master-chef.description: Here comes a new adventure for our underwater friend. Spongebob Master Chef is a brand new challenge where you have to finish 3 simple recipes . You need to make a krabby patty, a healthy salad and a fruit salad. For every recipe you need to find 3 correct ingredients, so use your logic and think. Have fun kids!

gingerbread-cookie-decoration.name: Gingerbread Cookie Decoration
gingerbread-cookie-decoration.description: Ginger the Gingerbread Cookie is getting ready for a date with her boyfriend, Cook. Dress her up for a perfect date!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories to decorate Ginger!

elsa-cooking-gingerbread.name: Elsa Cooking Gingerbread
elsa-cooking-gingerbread.description: Elsa will be teaching you another recipe in this gingerbread cookie baking game and you will have the pleasure of savoring them with her once you are done. Keep up with the instructions though.

wedding-cake-decoration-2.name: Wedding Cake Decoration 2
wedding-cake-decoration-2.description: Decor a beautiful wedding cake for your firend who will be married this weekend.

buffalo-steak-day.name: Buffalo Steak Day
buffalo-steak-day.description: It is steak day so Mara is going to prepare a delicious buffalo steak for dinner. Her family loves this recipe because she is super talented and she makes the best of all the steaks. There are only few hours left before the entire family arrive for dinner so we have to make sure Mara is ready in time. Join her in the kitchen and do your best to help her with the fabulous dinner. Enjoy this cooking game and share it with your friends because they might need this recipe!

delish-dish.name: Delish Dish
delish-dish.description: Cute Amy's been so looking forward to hosting this super party where she could invite all her little friends living on her street, all her closest classmates, too, so, the very first impression is highly important! Do you think you could help her dazzle them away with a charming, eye-tempting table setting, selecting out of all the yum, yum foodies that her mom and granny have cooked especially for her party, and nicely displaying them on the dining table?

burger-master.name: Burger Master
burger-master.description: Are you a burger fan? Get ready to make a burger. burger master have come here to teach you about how to prepare a hot and spicy with some crispy burger. Take a bit of this tasty burger to serve your lovable friends . Indulge yourself with this delicious burger with our burger master. Yum sburger is ready to eat.

cocoa-ripple-cake.name: Cocoa Ripple Cake
cocoa-ripple-cake.description: Cocoa Ripple Cake is what you are going to be preparing here in this particular online cooking game. Get all the required ingredients as mentioned in the list and use them in proper way to prepare the very special kind of cake as mentioned above. Do everything quickly because the time is limited.

oti-carrot-cake.name: Oti Carrot Cake
oti-carrot-cake.description: Welcome to chef Oti's cooking class! Today you'll get the chance to learn all the baking tips and tricks for putting together a so very famous, delicious dessert: a yum, yum carrot cake! Follow all her priceless indications and carry out all the cooking tasks that she’ll give you, one by one. Start with the basics and break an egg or two, then. . .

kitchen-restaurant-clean-up-2.name: Kitchen Restaurant Clean Up 2
kitchen-restaurant-clean-up-2.description: The kitchen is mess and you have to clean everything in the kitchen before your mother come. You have to do this quickly because you have a time to respect. Have a good time.

make-peach-cake.name: Make Peach Cake
make-peach-cake.description: Sandy is happy. She has spring holiday from school and is at home. The sisters of Sandy are also home. Sandy just had a great idea, she wants to surprise her sisters by baking a delicious peach cake for them. This cake has been the favorite cake of the sisters since they were small. Sandy cannot do this alone. She needs your help. Help Sandy baking a delicious cake so her sisters will be very happy with this delicious surprise. Good luck!

surprise-cake-slacking.name: Surprise Cake Slacking
surprise-cake-slacking.description: You have to cook a cake for your mother and you need to do it without to be caught by your mother. Try to surprise her with a beautiful cake.

underwater-spongecake.name: Underwater Spongecake
underwater-spongecake.description: Bake a delicious Underwater Spongecake! First, follow the recipe to bake the cake, and then decorate the layers with an underwater theme!Instruction: Use your mouse to click around the kitchen and follow the steps to bake the cake. Once the cake is ready, decorate it however you like!

elsa-living-room-cleaning.name: Elsa Living Room Cleaning
elsa-living-room-cleaning.description: Frozen Elsa pays so much attention into each and every detail of her house. Right from decoration to cleaning, she wants everything up to the mark. Elsa hopes to receive some important guests soon and the living room is not in the best looking way. Some cleaning and arranging must be done. Join along with Elsa in cleaning her living room that it gets ready in time to receive the guests. Have fun playing this cleaning game!

frozen-spa.name: Frozen Spa
frozen-spa.description: Frozen Spa Game Frozen Start His Own Spa Center she need some good girls who help him in spa to makeup girls you have chance to show you makeup skills try it.

modern-christmas-tree.name: Modern Christmas Tree
modern-christmas-tree.description: On the evening of the Christmas, your Mom assigned you to decorate the modern Christmas tree. Now you need an idea to decorate the tree. Many ideas are here to create a modern Christmas tree.  You can try and enjoy the Christmas festival.

gingerbread-christmas-cake.name: Gingerbread Christmas Cake
gingerbread-christmas-cake.description: In the Christmas festival time your Mom is preparing the Gingerbread Christmas Cake. She asks to decorate the cake. Can you try to decorate the cake and make your Mom happy?

vintage-christmas-party.name: Vintage Christmas Party
vintage-christmas-party.description: Greetings! We have recently released an awesome game in our portal. Your users will love playing this game. We request you to take a look and add the game to your portal.  Find the game details below:  Name: Vintage Christmas Party    Helen is celebrating a Vintage Christmas Party in her home.Can you help her to decorate the home using Christmas tree and other party things?  Game URL: http://www.dressurgirl.com/girl-games/2737/vintage-christmas-party.html  SWF: http://www.dressurgirl.com/games/files/Vintage-Christmas-Party.swf   Thumbnail1: http://www.dressurgirl.com/images/Vintage-Christmas-Party-200X250.jpg         Thumbnail2: http://www.dressurgirl.com/images/Vintage-Christmas-Party-160X120.jpg  Thumbnail3: http://www.dressurgirl.com/images/Vintage-Christmas-Party-120X90.jpg     Thumbnail4: http://www.dressurgirl.com/images/Vintage-Christmas-Party-100X100.jpg  Thumbnail5: http://www.dressurgirl.com/images/Vintage-Christmas-Party-180X135.jpg  Thumbnail6: http://www.dressurgirl.com/images/Vintage-Christmas-Party-90X120.jpg  Thumbnail7: http://www.dressurgirl.com/images/Vintage-Christmas-Party-150X150.jpg  Thumbnail8: http://www.dressurgirl.com/images/Vintage-Christmas-Party-250X250.jpg           Game Size:  683 (w) x 539 (h)  Keywords: Vintage Christmas Party ,Dressurgirl games,Kids games,Girls Games.  Category: dressurgirl.com      webmaster@dressurgirl.com       Use Mouse

emma-stone-dressup.name: Emma Stone Dressup
emma-stone-dressup.description: Dress up Emma Stone with these clothes and accessories.

summer-cullen-dress-up.name: Summer Cullen Dress Up
summer-cullen-dress-up.description: Dress up Summer Cullen for her spell bounding night in saving her vampire friends. Click and pick the various tops and bottoms, necklaces, hair, and other accessories onto Summer to dress her up and make her over to look her best during the night in twillight! A blood tasting good time!

chic-fairyland-queen.name: Chic Fairyland Queen
chic-fairyland-queen.description: In the far away kingdom, there is a fairyland filling with all kinds of flowers. The guaredian of this land is a beauful, elegrance and graceful queen. Her appearance is kaleidoscopic. Last second, she dress long skirt but maybe next second, she wear short hair and dress short princess skirt. This moment how she looks like depends on you. Try your best to dress up a chic fairyland queen.

adele-dressup.name: Adele Dressup
adele-dressup.description: Dress up Adele with these clothes and accessories.

gangnam-style-fashion.name: Gangnam Style Fashion
gangnam-style-fashion.description: Do you know how to dance the gangnam style? This style of dance is worldwide now and everybody dance that style when they hear the famous music. Dress this girl with a good gangnam style.

amazing-sweet-lolita.name: Amazing Sweet Lolita
amazing-sweet-lolita.description: Make up and Dress up the sweet lolita princess.Choose the best cute fashion style for her every day life.

chic-little-girl.name: Chic Little Girl
chic-little-girl.description: Varietal stylish pose can bring girls more confidence. Cute girl Amelia loves to change her style, sweet, faddish, lovely, sexy and so on. Make her up and dress her with the most glamorous clothes. Help her to design her own style. Amelia is a new trendsetter!

pretty-prom-girl.name: Pretty Prom Girl
pretty-prom-girl.description: Charming girl Grace loves fashion and often goes to parties. Tonight she is going to a formal prom by invitation. She must be the most glamorous prom girl and show her unique fashion sense. Design perfect a pose for her, Grace is the gorgeous prom girl!

fashion-jeans-lover.name: Fashion Jeans Lover
fashion-jeans-lover.description: Fast cars means beautiful girls. Help this girl get ready to stand and pose for her man's car. Choose from many different fashion items, mix and match each of her clothes until you find the most attractive outfit. Take your time, rushing your outfit will show in its design. Have fun.

new-year-party-dress-up.name: New Year Party Dress Up
new-year-party-dress-up.description: It's New Year! It's also girls' night out, so dress up pretty, get onto the center stage and let's have fun!

trendy-in-black.name: Trendy In Black
trendy-in-black.description: This girl's favorite color is black and she's looking for someone to dress her up to look as beautiful as possible. Your task in this game is to help this girl look as beautiful as you can. Choose from a wide range of dresses and make the perfect outfit for her.

wolf-girl-dress-up.name: Wolf Girl Dress Up
wolf-girl-dress-up.description: Wolf girl loves to wear fancy dresses but she does not know which will suit her and which makes her look beautiful. She think you are a friend and she is waiting for you to make her fancy. Use the dreses and accessories in the game and make the wolf girl beautiful.

monster-high-fashion.name: Monster High Fashion
monster-high-fashion.description: Do you love Monster High? Let’s dress up all Monster High Girls for a Fashion Show. Create their cute fashion look by choosing amazing clothes and accessories, changing make up, hair and skin color. Have fun!

monster-high-dress-up.name: Monster High Dress Up
monster-high-dress-up.description: Have fun and dressup one of your favourite girls from Monster High, Spectra.

batman-mega-dressup.name: Batman Mega Dressup
batman-mega-dressup.description: Finally!!! Batman Mega Dressup is giving you the opportunity to change and customize the looks of Dark Knight in any way you see fit.

hulk-transformation.name: Hulk Transformation
hulk-transformation.description: Pick your favorite suit for The Hulk as he Changes.

night-party-girl-dress-up.name: Night Party Girl Dress Up
night-party-girl-dress-up.description: Check out this Night Party Dress up game, She is geting ready for the tonights party, Select what you would like for her to wear. She is beautiful but you can make her look even better.

spongebob-crazy-dressup.name: SpongeBob Crazy Dressup
spongebob-crazy-dressup.description: Another great adventure for our friend. By playing Spongebob Crazy Dressup you can become a superhero , pirate or transform him in a circus clown. Pick the outfit that you like more and show it to see the final result. Be sure to try all the posible combinations of this funny dressup game. Have fun kids.

naruto-dress-up.name: Naruto Dress Up
naruto-dress-up.description: Choose the ideal dress and style for this warrior Naruto character.

bigfoot.name: Bigfoot
bigfoot.description: Bigfoot is a big hairy creature who lives in the forest. Many believe that Bigfoot is a hoax, but others believe he is just shy and misunderstood!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Bigfoot!

monster-maker.name: Monster Maker
monster-maker.description: Step right up to the Monster Maker to create the coolest monster ever! Mash up your monster with different faces, bodies, arms, and more!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories to create your monster!

katrina-kaif-celebrity-dress-up.name: Katrina Kaif Celebrity Dress Up
katrina-kaif-celebrity-dress-up.description: Dress up the indian celebrity katrina kaif by changing the hair , cloths, jewels and even more. She is getting ready for a party, So it's on your hand to make her looking sexy and beautiful.

justin-bieber-celebrity-dress-up.name: Justin Bieber Celebrity Dress Up
justin-bieber-celebrity-dress-up.description: Dress up your favorite celebrity Justin Bieber with latest fashionable costumes and stylish accessories like caps, glasses, and more.

anna-and-kristoff-wedding.name: Anna And Kristoff Wedding
anna-and-kristoff-wedding.description: Anna and Kristoff are going to get marry today. There are so many things to be done before the wedding. But the most important one is to think through the wedding style. Help Anna and Kristoff to become the most beautiful couple ever!

selena-gomez-celebrity-dress-up.name: Selena Gomez Celebrity Dress Up
selena-gomez-celebrity-dress-up.description: Dress Up your cute Selena Gomez with fashionable costumes and trendy Accessories. In this New Year this is the first time Selena Gomez appearing first time in front of media. So your make up skills should be a rock for Selena!

chef-boy-dress-up.name: Chef Boy Dress Up
chef-boy-dress-up.description: In a restaurant the cooking must be at the best quality, but so is the costumes that the chefs are wearing. Here you will have to take care of their appearance and make sure they wear the right dresses in order to be elegant and serve the clients in the appropriate manner.

fashion-week-trends.name: Fashion Week Trends
fashion-week-trends.description: Being one of those fashion stylists to present their collections during the New Work Fashion Week sure is a major challenge! Since your own show is just about to begin, unleash your fashion creativity and put all the efforts to give this model a fabulous, spectacular catwalk look to impress the picky audience with. Look for the perfect haute couture dress, then glam it up with the perfect extravagant accessories, next. . .

cute-party-girl-dress-up.name: Cute Party Girl Dress Up
cute-party-girl-dress-up.description: Lola is throwing a surprise birthday party for her sister. Everyone is invited so make sure you buy a present for the birthday girl. Help Lola decide what to wear at the party. She is thinking to chose between a gorgeous dress and her favorite skirt. Dress her up with both her options and tell her which one you like the most. The hairstyle is also important so after you choose the outfit help Lola to make her hair look stunning with the chosen outfit. Enjoy our online dress up game for girls!

valentines-day-stars.name: Valentines Day Stars
valentines-day-stars.description: It is Valentine's Day and your boyfriend surprises you after class! He takes you in his car and next thing you know, you guys are in the mall! First comes shopping, and then movies. After movies he takes you to watch the beautiful stars while sitting on the hood on his car. After that, he prepares a romantic picnic dinner on the grass. What an amazing Valentine's Day, best ever!!!

the-school-teacher.name: The School Teacher
the-school-teacher.description: Since the school bell is about to ring and, most of all, since it's this young lady's very first day as a teacher today, you should really help her come up with a pulled-together, polished chic look to impress her pupils with! Scan through her ladylike dresses, preppy chic tops, skirts and classic chic accessories and come up with some confidence-boosting looks for her!

pokemon-trainer.name: Pokemon Trainer
pokemon-trainer.description: Dress up Amy, the newest Pokemon trainer to join the team! She is ready for battle but is she ready for tonight's date with Ash? She is depending on you!

fashion-studio-cheerleader-outfit.name: Fashion Studio - Cheerleader Outfit
fashion-studio-cheerleader-outfit.description: Design the dream cheerleader outfit for this beautiful girl! You start by choosing 3 outfit parts and 1 pom pom design. You can even give each piece a color and pattern. After that you must cut and sew your dress. In the end you can add some lovely accessories like hairstyles, socks, earrings and shoes.

princess-bubblegum-dressup.name: Princess Bubblegum Dressup
princess-bubblegum-dressup.description: Princess Bubblegum is the ruler of the Candy Kingdom. She loves science, adventures, and is a fearless leader!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Princess Bubblegum!

doctor-pet-nose.name: Doctor Pet Nose
doctor-pet-nose.description: Take care of your pet by cleaning out its nose to help it breathe better. Here you get to wipe your pet's nose, open it up and use cotton buds, scissors, spray water, and tweezers to help remove hairs, stains, waxy build up and extra dripping. You also get to play doctor and treat the sores on it nose as well as pull the pus from the inside of the nose to help your pet breathe clearly.

fishing-for-cuties.name: Fishing For Cuties
fishing-for-cuties.description: What a beautiful day today, but what is there to do? All your friends are either at work or in summer school. Aha!! Lets go fishing!! Fishing is a great activity where you can relax your mind and think of all the good memories. You can put your mind into peace and relieve your stress. It is also a plus if you catch some fish! If you do, bring it home to papa so he can cook it for dinner =p

kitty.name: Kitty
kitty.description: Kitty loves playing with yarn and sleeping on the windowsill. Dress her up for a day of kitty cat fun!

the-halloween-fairy.name: The Halloween Fairy
the-halloween-fairy.description: Believe it or not, but Halloween is celebrated in the fairytale world, too! That's right, take this sweet looking fairy here, for instance, who has a huge dazzling chic witch dresses collection, a fancy stylish witch hats one, too, and lots and lots of other spooky posh, glam-scary Halloween costumes. Would you like to help her steal the spotlight with her fancy Halloween look this year?

fashion-studio-swimsuit-design.name: Fashion Studio - Swimsuit Design
fashion-studio-swimsuit-design.description: Summer is finally here so it's time to go swimming! But which swimsuit are you going to wear? How about designing your own dream swimwear? In order to design your own bathing suit you must first choose 4 different garments. Then pick a nice color for each item. You can even select a lovely pattern. After that you must prepare the fabrics. In the end you can show off your creation at the pool area!

skater-girl-dress-up-2.name: Skater Girl Dress Up 2
skater-girl-dress-up-2.description: It makes a great sunny summer weather today, the perfect one for a fun day spent in the skate park for this non-conformist teen girl here! Would you like to help her add some edgy fashion to all her future adrenaline-pumping, spectacular performances on the skate ramp, mixing and matching her urban cool, funky chic skater outfits with some of her bold, statement accessories putting together some attention-grabbing outfit combos for her?

barbie-flower-fashion.name: Barbie Flower Fashion
barbie-flower-fashion.description: Dress up Barbie for her flower fashion time! Wear colorful dresses, choose fancy red shoes, gather a flower or two, and have fun playing this new dress up game with Barbie. Use the Mouse to drag and drop items and fashion accessories.

fashion-studio-bridesmaid-dress.name: Fashion Studio - Bridesmaid Dress
fashion-studio-bridesmaid-dress.description: This girl is going to the wedding of her bff. She's the bridesmaid so she wants a unique dress for this important event. That's why she decided to come to your famous fashion studio. Can you design her dream bridesmaid outfit? First select a nice body, waist and bottom part. You can also add some sleeves if you want. After that you can select a color and pattern for each garment. Then prepare your fabrics and show off your beautiful creation!

monster-gigi-charisma-dressup.name: Monster Gigi Charisma Dressup
monster-gigi-charisma-dressup.description: GIGI Grant is all about charisma and style but she is more of a comfy girl than a strutting diva, she likes to keep it fashionable but comfortable. She loves natural fabrics, especially silk, in bright pretty colors.

barbie-goes-to-beach.name: Barbie Goes To Beach
barbie-goes-to-beach.description: Barbie goes to Beach game is part of Barbie Games, Dress up Games, Games For Girls category. Very Beautiful barbie girl wants to go to the beach. You should help her to prepare for the beach

snow-angel-cutie.name: Snow Angel Cutie
snow-angel-cutie.description: Diana just woke up and looked out the window. Oh my god, its snowing! Her mom comes in and tells her that school is canceled for the day. Diana calls out her friends to play in the snow. She wants to make the perfect snow angel to show her mom. Help dress up Diana so she will stay warm and look stylish at the same time. You don't want her to catch a flu!

bohemian-style.name: Bohemian Style
bohemian-style.description: Bohemian style is THE rising fashion trend! Be super relaxed and dress up with flower prints, cotton clothes, denim items and maxi dresses! Don't forget the GAL twist: the cute rabbit-eared headband featured in this game!

zombie-creator-halloween-2009.name: Zombie Creator Halloween 2009
zombie-creator-halloween-2009.description: In this nifty 2 in 1 Halloween game, you create a scene and then create a scary zombie! Even though it is supposed to be scary, there is still a touch of cuteness in this game =) Don't forget to play both of the games! Enjoy and get ready for Halloween!!

summer-breeze.name: Summer Breeze
summer-breeze.description: Enjoy the last breeze of summer, don't miss it! Get dressed and go out to enjoy the summer air. Play this game and get inspired- create a nice outfit for this occasion and add some accessories that match!

fluffy-kitten-dressup.name: Fluffy Kitten Dressup
fluffy-kitten-dressup.description: Fluffy is an adorable kitten who loves playing with strings. He loves to get dressed up and pretend he's going on a big kitten adventure!

ever-after-high-ohair-babies.name: Ever After High OHair Babies
ever-after-high-ohair-babies.description: Playing the ‘Ever After High O'Hair Babies’ game for girls you ladies are getting the unique chance to spend the day with the adorable baby Poppy or with the sweet baby Holly, change their diapers and dress them up as cute as possible, how cool is that? Get it started, put your babysitting skills to a major test and see if you've got what it takes to look after one of these two royal blooded cuties. Good luck and have a great time, ladies!

cupcake-girl-dress-up.name: Cupcake Girl Dress Up
cupcake-girl-dress-up.description: Cupcake lives in Bakery Land, a world made entirely of pastries and sweets! Dress her up for a day of delicious fun!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Cupcake!

fantasy-land-of-elves.name: Fantasy Land Of Elves
fantasy-land-of-elves.description: Every June, the elves will invite some girls in the earth to the fantasy land help them dress up. I want to go there this June, do you want to go with me. You will have a chance to take part in their big party. Come on, Let’s go! There will be a big surprise.

fairy-under-the-sea.name: Fairy Under The Sea
fairy-under-the-sea.description: I still often dream of myself turning into a mermaid, like in the fairy tale, to be wearing a lot of costume. Help dress me up!

safari-fun.name: Safari Fun
safari-fun.description: Looking for something new and exciting? Try out game and image you're in a safari adventure! Pick up a nice outfit for this new occasion by selecting from a variety of clothes and accessories!

barbie-design-studio.name: Barbie Design Studio
barbie-design-studio.description: Fashionistas like Barbie don’t just follow fashion – they create it! All Barbie’s famous dresses were created in her very own design studio. Today you get a chance to visit it and even take part in the design process! Find a perfect combination of the four garments, pick the best fabrics and decorate the dress for Barbie’s next fashion show.

santas-little-helpers.name: Santa's Little Helpers
santas-little-helpers.description: It's madness in Santa's toy factory these days you know! All his little helpers are working so hard to get all those lovely Christmas presents ready by Christmas Eve, but they sure need another helpful elf to help them with their toys selecting and gifts wrapping “marathon”! Will you be Santa's new helper?

santa-claus-makeover.name: Santa Claus Makeover
santa-claus-makeover.description: Christmas time is a fun time of the year and with the festive season right around the corner there is plenty of fun to be had. This Santa makeover Christmas game allows you to help Santa get ready for the festive season by giving him a brand new makeover. Here you can clean and dry Santa’s hair ready for his new look.

redhead-princess.name: Redhead Princess
redhead-princess.description: There is something special about the girls who have red hair. Our princess happens to be a redhead and today she needs your help to pick up a dress for a special occasion. Today she has to meet the prince from their neighbor kingdom and wants to make a good impression on him. Use your fashion skills to create a charming outfit for our princess!

fashion-studio-air-hostess-outfit.name: Fashion Studio - Air Hostess Outfit
fashion-studio-air-hostess-outfit.description: You need to design the most beautiful work outfit for this lovely flight attendant. Can you do that? This air hostess will be part of a new cabin crew today and she wants to impress her colleagues. To design the perfect stewardess dress you need to select 3 garments: body, sleeve and bottom. You can also add a cap. Then you must cut and sew the outfit. In the end you can select some nice accessories. Have fun!

naruto-and-friends.name: Naruto And Friends
naruto-and-friends.description: Dress up Naruto, Sasuke, and Gaara. Mix and match, get them ready for battle!

super-maria-dress-up.name: Super Maria Dress Up
super-maria-dress-up.description: Dress up Super Maria for a fun filled adventure in the Mushroom Kingdom!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up the Super Maria!

best-friends-dressup.name: Best Friends Dressup
best-friends-dressup.description: What can be better than meeting your best friend for a fun walk? Play this game and help our girl to pick up a nice outfit. She is very excited and needs your knowledge in fashion to help her look chic. Have fun!

sllay-making-cake.name: Sllay Making Cake
sllay-making-cake.description: Sllay likes cooking. She thinks that cooking is a very interesting and creative job which brings people joy from the dishes. She is good at making cakes and today she is invited to a birthday party to make some cakes today. She is happy and excited, but she is too busy to dress up. Will you help her dressup?

dressup-princess-wedding.name: Dressup Princess Wedding
dressup-princess-wedding.description: It is an important day for our girl, she is getting married! She needs your help to choose a dress for her royal wedding. Try on different, unique dressed and pick up the best one! Don't forget to match it with sparkly, diamond jewelry.

paper-turkey.name: Paper Turkey
paper-turkey.description: Check out the lovely dresses, go through all those cute tops, lovely pleated miniskirts, ripped jeans and hot looking, leather tights, doll-like shoes and glittering jewelries available at your disposal in Sally's wardrobe, mix and match them and select your favorite combination to dress her up with for her Thanksgiving themed, Kirigami class! Have fun, girls!

dance-with-the-swans-dress-up.name: Dance With The Swans Dress Up
dance-with-the-swans-dress-up.description: Felicia is in the magical land of swans . Tonight is going to be very auspicious night as Felicia gets to dance with the swans . This is a magical night which comes only once every decade. So Felicia has to dance her best and look incredibly graceful. Help Felicia get ready for this magical event. Give her the best possible dressup and make her look as alluring as possible.

frankenstein-halloween-dress-up.name: Frankenstein Halloween Dress Up
frankenstein-halloween-dress-up.description: Frankenstein is tried of wearing the same outfit year after year, see if you can give Frankenstein a new wardrobe for Halloween.

winter-penguin-adventure.name: Winter Penguin Adventure
winter-penguin-adventure.description: Mr. Popper is collecting fish before the harsh winter storm. Help him collect the fish from the bucket and bring them to the other side of the river. Instruction: Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to help gather all the fish from the bucket and bring them across the river. Save baby penguins for extra lives and bonus points!

dressed-for-shopping.name: Dressed For Shopping
dressed-for-shopping.description: This fashion teen adores clothes shopping, as a matter of fact, she spends ages on her outfits before she even goes shopping for new ones! She likes being daring and experimenting with fashion combinations like high fashion dresses mixed up with sneakers and big accessories. Have fun with this teen fashion queen by rummaging through her closet and coming up with cool fun outfit combos!

lipy-halloween-doll-party-fashion.name: Lipy Halloween Doll Party Fashion
lipy-halloween-doll-party-fashion.description: It's the month of Halloween once more and things are beginning to stir! The children are becoming excited the shops are being decorated with spiders, pumpkins and simmering pots! Costumes are being sold but there are always so many choices, I never know what to go trick-or-treating as, do you girls know what you will be wearing!? If you're like me and need a little inspiration, then you might find it in this game. Mix and match the items available and you may think yourself up a unique costume idea!

cowgirl-dressup.name: Cowgirl Dressup
cowgirl-dressup.description: Wendy is a cowgirl! She wrangles cattle, rides horses, and loves to go to the rodeo!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Wendy!

puppy-the-cutest-dog.name: Puppy The Cutest Dog
puppy-the-cutest-dog.description: Puppy, is the name of the most cutest dog you ever saw. A very nice dog, who likes to play with children. Very playful Puppy is very much loved by children. Now, Puppy prepares for a new fun day for him and you can prepare him as you wish using all available items in this nice game for girls. Choose the color you like for Puppy coat, color and shape of eyes and nose. You can select the house you like for Puppy, and can also give him different toys to play with. It's time to dressup the dog!

love-for-spa.name: Love For Spa
love-for-spa.description: With just a few days left till Valentine's Day, this charming young lady here is starting to get nervous for she still hasn't decided what gorgeous, stunning look she should impress her boyfriend with on their highly romantic date to come. Try a few make-up looks on her, help her style up her hair in several different, equally stylish, hairdos, help her try on different evening dresses, too, ranging from fancy gowns to lovely chic evening dresses and help her pick. . . her final Valentine's Day look!

fantasy-forest.name: Fantasy Forest
fantasy-forest.description: Go ahead and venture yourself into the fantasy forest where this gorgeous nymph here lives! Once there, be quick to cast your fashion spell upon her and get ready to. . . get dazzled away as you browse through all her superb fantasy outfits and exquisite accessories! Mix and match them to your liking pulling off the looks that will help her stand out from the crowd of ravishing fairies living in this magic forest!

cooking-mama-dress-up.name: Cooking Mama Dress UP
cooking-mama-dress-up.description: Cooking Mama is getting ready to throw a dinner party for all her friends and family. Dress her up for a day of cooking fun!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Cooking Mama!

cute-baby-dress.name: Cute Baby Dress
cute-baby-dress.description: Shelly is a very cute and obedient baby in the nursery. Do you want to help the nurse take care of her today? You will have a good time to spent the day looking after her. But be careful to be a good nurse, give her what she needs and keep her happy!

nerdy-boy-dress-up.name: Nerdy Boy Dress Up
nerdy-boy-dress-up.description: Dress up this Nerdy Boy in this great Dress up game. You can make this nerdy boy turn into a stud. Select what you would like for him to wear from shoes, shirt, pants and more!

baby-luana-spring-dress-up.name: Baby Luana Spring Dress Up
baby-luana-spring-dress-up.description: Baby Luana Spring Dress Up - the sun is shining and it is time for a good spring walk . Have fun helping Baby Luana pick the right outfit for a beautiful day in the park. After you are ready click the Done button to show your creation.

baby-emma-bridesmaid-outfits.name: Baby Emma - Bridesmaid Outfits
baby-emma-bridesmaid-outfits.description: Caring Carol is getting married and she asked baby Emma to be her bridesmaid! Can you select a lovely outfit for this important day? And don't forget a nice tiara or hair flower! After that you must also choose a beautiful wedding location. Have fun!

spring-princess.name: Spring Princess
spring-princess.description: Step into the “Kingdom of Eternal Spring” and work your magic on this lovely spring princess here, mixing and matching all her ravishing fantasy gowns and dresses with dazzling jewels and exquisite, charming flower-made accessories and get her a new. . . breathtaking beautiful springy look!

white-horse-princess-2.name: White Horse Princess 2
white-horse-princess-2.description: This beautiful princess dress up game allows you to click on the icons on the right hand side of the screen multiple times to shuffle through the different styles of clothing and accessories that can be mixed and matched to complement your princess’s beautiful face.

dora-in-the-crystal-kingdom-dressup.name: Dora in the Crystal Kingdom Dressup
dora-in-the-crystal-kingdom-dressup.description: This time dora in the crystal kingdom and found some new dresses and make up item there and she is very happy about it, lets try new dresses and make up items on her to make her look fab

autumn-lady.name: Autumn Lady
autumn-lady.description: This charming mademoiselle won't miss the chance of taking a long, relaxing walk in the park since it makes a gorgeous sunny autumn weather today! Help her turn all those leaves-covered alleys in the park into her own fashion catwalks by mixing and matching ladylike chic, warm fashion items from her wardrobe and pulling off some head-turning fall fashion looks for her!

summer-ants.name: Summer Ants
summer-ants.description: Summer time is all about fun in the sun and the beach!!! Mary is invited by her friends to go to the Park, but she is scared of big red Ants. Those Ants are everywhere in the Park. Help Mary dress up for the adventures in the park. Don't forget to give her the magnifying glass so she can protect herself from those ants!!! (^_^)

christmas-get-together-dressup.name: Christmas Get Together Dressup
christmas-get-together-dressup.description: Use your mouse to create several Christmas outfits for the party girl.

little-angel-girl-dress-up.name: Little Angel Girl Dress Up
little-angel-girl-dress-up.description: Meet Gloria the forest fairy angel! She is related to the forest fairies but she is their guardian and helps take care of them, she guides them through each day with a watchful eye and makes sure they come to no harm. Most of the time they are not even aware that she is there, she floats nearby and uses her angelic abilities to give them a shield from any danger that may come their way. Dress up the fairy angel along with a stunning makeover and beautiful angel wings!

baking-muffins-with-jane.name: Baking Muffins With Jane
baking-muffins-with-jane.description: Put your apron on because it is time to bake some muffins with Jane! These muffins will be the dessert that will be served at tonight's barbeque! It is up to you to make some amazing muffins and dress up Jane to be ready for the night. Decide what tools to use to bake her muffins. Don't forget to give an apron to Jane because it is going to get messy in this kitchen! Mommy will be proud of Jane and you. =)

pokemon-trainer-cutie.name: Pokemon Trainer Cutie
pokemon-trainer-cutie.description: Dress up this cutie with plenty of pokemon costumes available here.

pika.name: Pika
pika.description: Dawn is the shy girl of the class and also the campus crush. Despite her shyness, her grades are always excellent. She is humble and clueless that most boys in school admire her. Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Dawn!

fashion-studio-farm-dress.name: Fashion Studio - Farm Dress
fashion-studio-farm-dress.description: This girl will be working on the farm today and she asked you to design her a new farm outfit! Can you help her out? Start by choosing 4 clothing items. Then pick a nice color and pattern for each garment. Next you will have to cut and sew the dress. In the end you can give her a lovely makeover by selecting a nice hairstyle, hat, a pair of shoes and some farm accessories. Have fun!

sweet-like-candy.name: Sweet Like Candy
sweet-like-candy.description: This dress up game is full of cute, delicious outfits. The range of clothes comes from a candy land and are brought for you to match them and make our pretty girl look deliciously fashionable! Have fun!

fantasy-hairstyle-show.name: Fantasy Hairstyle Show
fantasy-hairstyle-show.description: Many famous hair stylists will attend the Fantasy Hairstyle Show in NewYork tonight. It is really a big fashion hairstyle show and the famous hair stylists will bring people a lot of surprises. Alisa was invited to the show, and she also bring her works. Do you want to know what she prepared for the show? Now please help her and see.

pretty-dish-washer.name: Pretty Dish Washer
pretty-dish-washer.description: You have not went shopping on the longest time because you are broke!!! What to do! Aha, there is a job posting for a restaurant looking for dish washers. . . hmmm. . . is it worth it? why not? Anything is worth it for some pretty clothes. Dish washing is going to be hard and tiring. Just keep on thinking of the clothes you can buy for motivation. Oh, and don't forget to wear your rubber gloves so you hands will stay nice and soft. And wear an apron so your clothes won't gt dirty! Good luck and wash away!!!

dog-walk-fashion.name: Dog Walk Fashion
dog-walk-fashion.description: If it makes a wonderful weather and school it over for today it can only mean one thing for this lovely teen girl here: it's time for her to take her beloved pooch out for some fun in the park! Help her put together an effortlessly chic summer fashion look that will add lots of style to her fun time spent with her puppy and which will help her set herself apart from all the dog owners in the park!

summer-picnic-dressup.name: Summer Picnic Dressup
summer-picnic-dressup.description: Let's enjoy summer and go for a picnic! Our girl has called her friends to go out and rest in the beautiful nature. Have a look at her wardrobe and pick a nice outfit for this occasion! Play and enjoy this game.

hippie-party-fashion-game.name: Hippie Party Fashion Game
hippie-party-fashion-game.description: Your friend just invited you to a "Dress like a Hippie" party tonight!!! Sounds like fun, but what will you wear? Don't forget, the cute boy from school is going too. ;) Well it is time to visit grandma's thrift store! Grandma's store has a lot of hippie clothing that you can choose from. Bring your friends too so they can give you some opinion. =) Get going now before it is too late!

frozen-school-dress-code.name: Frozen School Dress Code
frozen-school-dress-code.description: Since Elsa show her powers, there’s no reason to hide her in castle. So Elsa and Anna decided to go to school. But that’s not an ordinary school - it’s only for princesses! So, Frozen sisters must proove their sence of style!

rockstar-teen.name: Rockstar Teen
rockstar-teen.description: It has always been you dream to perform on the big stage jamming an electric guitar. Your mom wanted you to be a doctor so you never had a chance to pursue that dream. Here is your chance!!! Being a Rockstar is not easy though, before every show you must do a lot of preparing. But the best part is choosing your outfit, choose something outrageous, something extraordinary, something that will shine!

monster-valentine-creator.name: Monster Valentine Creator
monster-valentine-creator.description: Valentine's Day is right around the corner! Create your very own lovable Valentines Monster as a unique gift for your friends and loved ones!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and create the monsters!

trollz-dressup.name: Trollz Dressup
trollz-dressup.description: Amethyst van der Troll loves hanging out with her friends. Her and her friends use their Spell Phones to cast spells on anyone who picks up the call on the other end. Dress up this Trollz doll like your favorite character!

tourist-dress-up-game.name: Tourist Dress Up Game
tourist-dress-up-game.description: Winnie is going on a tour around the world, she is stopping by several places! Help her decide what she should wear on these trips. Remember, she will be taking a lot of photos!

ballet-princess.name: Ballet Princess
ballet-princess.description: Our princess has been practicing ballet since she was little and she loves it! Today she needs your help to choose a beautiful outfit for tonight's spectacle. Come on, have a look at her wardrobe and choose from a variety of colors and sparkling jewelry!

cd-shop-love.name: CD Shop Love
cd-shop-love.description: You go shopping in a Cd Shop for your favorite music and you see this really cute guy. He comes over and talks to you but doesn't bother to get your number. He leaves and gives you a wink! The next day you go there again hoping to see him again. This time you won't such a great opportunity slip away. . if you see him that is! Dress to impress this cute boy and hopefully you guys can get some coffee afterward! Good Luck!

gingerman.name: Gingerman
gingerman.description: Decorate your very own gingerbread man! Give him a super cool look and don't forget to eat him!

trained-dragon.name: Trained Dragon
trained-dragon.description: This cute baby dragon is training for that big skateboard competition that will take place in the animals' world in a couple of days. Meanwhile, how about getting him an eye-catching chic, comfy, yet so very adorable and trendy fashion look to boost his self-confidence and steal the audience's attention with, too?

basketball-player-dressup.name: Basketball Player Dressup
basketball-player-dressup.description: Shawna is a basketball player on her high school team. She is hoping to make varsity next year, so she practices every single day. One day she hopes to get a basketball scholarship!

balloon-girl.name: Balloon Girl
balloon-girl.description: Emily was at the carnival and her boyfriend won her many balloons. She is now at the park taking a stroll. You decide what to wear at the park! It is a perfectly sunny day today! =)

cheerleader-dressup.name: Cheerleader Dressup
cheerleader-dressup.description: Krystal is the cheer captain on her middle school cheerleading squad! Dress her up in the perfect outfit to support her school spirit!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Krystal!

amusement-park-wedding.name: Amusement Park Wedding
amusement-park-wedding.description: You are a wedding planner and your client wants to do her wedding at somewhere unique and crazy! You came up with the crazy idea of having a wedding at the amusement park and your client loves it!! Now the planning will begin! Start with planning with what the bride will wear. Just imagine all the funky possibilities you can have at this amusement park wedding!

color-splash.name: Color Splash
color-splash.description: Have a look at this game and discover a colorful wardrobe with unusual dresses and cute skirts. Match accessories with clothes to create unique outfit!

swimming-beauty.name: Swimming Beauty
swimming-beauty.description: Step down Sleeping Beauty. . . because DressUpWho presents Swimming Beauty!!! Meet Swimming Beauty, she loves the sand and water. Most importantly, she loves to look good in the water! After building some beautiful sand castles and collecting seashells, Swimming Beauty is in a mood for some intense swimming! Help Swimming Beauty pick what to wear in the water. Don't forget your floatation device, there may be some strong waves out there! Lets swim!

my-cat-jerry.name: My Cat Jerry
my-cat-jerry.description: This sweet cat needs your help to choose the outfit that matches his personality.

pool-party-dress-up.name: Pool Party Dress-Up
pool-party-dress-up.description: This gorgeous socialite here couldn't have missed the Hollywood glamorous pool party of the year! Some of the best known red carpet beauty goddesses will be attending it, as well, so she simply can't afford showing up there looking less than. . . fabulous! Scan through her stylish, boldly colored, dazzling beach outfits and statement summer accessories and get her that stylish look with a twist of luxury that will help her steal the spotlights tonight!

kendall-and-kylie.name: Kendall And Kylie
kendall-and-kylie.description: Seize the chance of being the two famous, dashing Kardashian/Jenner sisters', Kendall and Kylie, new fashion stylist! Feel free to dig through their stylish designer outfits and fabulous accessories, and to get them the new diva fashion looks that they will sport in front of the cameras during their new TV show!

anna-frozen-pregnant.name: Anna Frozen Pregnant
anna-frozen-pregnant.description: There’s great news in the kingdom. Princess Anna is Pregnant! And you can you believe it? - she’s asking you to become her stylist. Anna and Kristoff will soon become happy parents - help Anna to look properly!

diy-monster-high-rain-boots.name: DIY Monster High Rain Boots
diy-monster-high-rain-boots.description: Let’s get this fun shoes decoration game started and first of all, let’s go to a local shop to buy the needed items that you are going to need for this creative task: spot a pair of pink boots, some Monster High stickers, a blade and a pair of scissors, a big bowl, a bottle of collage pauge, a brush and a ultra dry spray.
