Great job, ladies! Now move on the next page of the game, step into the shoes of a super talented shoe designer and learn how to decorate these pinkish boots step-by-step.

create-a-creature.name: Create A Creature
create-a-creature.description: Create your own creatures! Choose the styles that you want for your little creatures and then change their face, smile, hat, eyes and more!

baby-madison-space-adventure.name: Baby Madison Space Adventure
baby-madison-space-adventure.description: Baby Madison is back with a brand-new challenge, ladies! Today she needs your assistance to prepare herself for a magical trip through the space as her dream is to be the first baby in the world to discover a new planet, how cool is that? Join her in getting the 'Baby Madison Space Adventure' game started and help our cutie pie prepare herself for the big adventure though space. Have a great time, girls!

teddy-snowman-dressup.name: Teddy Snowman Dressup
teddy-snowman-dressup.description: Teddy Snowman Dress Up! In this game you first get to actually build your snowman like you would in real life! Roll the snow until you have formed the main look of him

cute-pet-dog.name: Cute Pet Dog
cute-pet-dog.description: Tiny is a famous pet dog. Today he needs to get ready for an appearance on TV. Help him get ready!

barbies-date-with-ken.name: Barbie's Date with Ken
barbies-date-with-ken.description: Barbie is going on her first date with Ken. He is taking her for a candle light dinner at the beach. Dress Barbie up with some classy gowns or choose between the various tops and skirts. Enjoy your date with the lovely sunset in the background!

lolita-elf-dressup.name: Lolita Elf Dressup
lolita-elf-dressup.description: Nixie is a beautiful winter elf. She is in charge of gathering food, wood, water, and other necessities to help her and the other elves make it through the winter season. Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Nixie!

rainbow-girl-with-lollipop.name: Rainbow Girl With Lollipop
rainbow-girl-with-lollipop.description: Do you think you could help this cutie express her “guilty” weakness for tasty, eye-tempting lollipops through an eye-catching, multicolored fashion look? Git it a try and, scanning though her boldly colored, girly chic fashion items and through her mouth-watering lollipops collection, too, and come up with an attention-grabbing, rainbow-inspired fashion combo for her!

elsa-dress-up-for-school.name: Elsa Dress Up For School
elsa-dress-up-for-school.description: Frozen Elsa will go to school and must prepare extensively for this. Frozen Queen needs your help to dress and to dress and makeup, as worn in this year 2014. Let's see how well you deal in arranging a princess Elsa Frozen rank. Do not forget the accessories books and school needs of Arendelle queen. Have fun in preparing for school Elsa.

sweet-dog-day-out.name: Sweet Dog Day Out
sweet-dog-day-out.description: This sweet dog needs your help to choose the outfit for his day out.

tuning-my-motorcycle-makeover.name: Tuning My Motorcycle Makeover
tuning-my-motorcycle-makeover.description: Deck out your motorcycle with all sorts of cool styles!

anna-dancing-party.name: Anna Dancing Party
anna-dancing-party.description: Elsa will hold a grand ball at the palace, invited people from all walks of life to participate in, Anna is one of them, she wants to dress nicely, can you help her?Control:Use the mouse.

labor-day.name: Labor Day
labor-day.description: Along with the joyful atmosphere to welcome Labor Day, Tom and his dog named Bobby prepared the loveliest costumes of workers. Let's help him select the most beautiful and prominent outfits to join in this anniversary party with the workers he loves.

elsa-shopping.name: Elsa Shopping
elsa-shopping.description: Elsa wants some new dresses, shoes , jewelry and accessories, so she must go at shopping. Help her and choose the most beautiful dresses that you can find so she keep up with latest fashion trends.

dancing-spring-girl.name: Dancing Spring Girl
dancing-spring-girl.description: Spring is coming. For a dancing girl, Spring is the best season. She can dress up well and go to the nature to enjoy the bright sunshine and easy breeze. Now choose the most beautiful clothes and accessories for her!

santa-chic-model.name: Santa Chic Model
santa-chic-model.description: In the Christmas morning Helen is enjoying the festival and getting ready to go church.  Help her to select the festival dress and match accessories.

very-pretty-girl-dress-up.name: Very Pretty Girl Dress Up
very-pretty-girl-dress-up.description: Today, our beautiful girls going to a birthday party friends, come to this lovely beautiful girl to dress up and let small partners who shines it!

supermarket-girl.name: Supermarket Girl
supermarket-girl.description: Jenny and her friends are planning to go on a trip when summer comes. But there is one problem. . . Jenny doesn't have enough money! Luckily shes finds a job at the supermarket near her house. Dress Jenny up for her first day of work at the supermarket. There might be some cuties shopping there, so try to look nice!

fancy-socialite.name: Fancy Socialite
fancy-socialite.description: There's no exclusive, fancy social event in the city that his gorgeous socialite here would miss! Her agenda is incredibly busy, with all the receptions, parties and extravagant balls that she has to attend, so she's counting on you to help her look jaw-dropping stylish, standing out from the crowd of VIPs, at each one of them. Dig through her super diversified designer outfits and accessories collection and pull off some fabulous fashion looks for each one of those events!

junior-high-dress-up.name: Junior High Dress Up
junior-high-dress-up.description: Emily is getting ready for another day at school. When she's not at school, she loves to have sleepovers with her friends. Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Emily!

barbie-princess-high-school.name: Barbie Princess High School
barbie-princess-high-school.description: This semester is going to be a very special one for Barbie. No more ordinary school for her, she is going to a Princess High School! It’s a special high school where girls are taught to become true princesses. They learn to walk, to talk and to dress with royal glamour. Join Barbie and her BFFs on their first lesson!

backyard-barbecue.name: Backyard Barbecue
backyard-barbecue.description: Spring time is here!!! And it is time to host a barbecue in your backyard. You want to invite all your friends and family to enjoy this beautiful spring day. There are birds chirping and a slight breeze. Lets not waste this day! OH, the boy you have a crush on is also coming!!! So dress to impress ;)

baby-elsa-bathing.name: Baby Elsa Bathing
baby-elsa-bathing.description: Baby Elsa bathing game is a really fun way to spend a bit of your free time making her go through all the stages of the bath process and also have a great deal of fun along the way.

pageant-fashion.name: Pageant Fashion
pageant-fashion.description: In this game the model is entering a fashion pageant but before that she has to have a realistic makeover with gorgeous shimmering tans, lip plumping lipstick, and cheek shaping blusher! Next go on to give her an elegant beautiful flowing gown to match the beauty makeover you just gave her, add sparkling accessories and pretty heeled shoes. I think in your hands she could become the winner!

goth-lollita-dress-up.name: Goth Lollita  Dress Up
goth-lollita-dress-up.description: Kelly is trying to mix the style of lolita and goth at the same time. Help her mix and match these crazy clothes!

clawdeen-wolf-flirting-dressup.name: Clawdeen Wolf Flirting Dressup
clawdeen-wolf-flirting-dressup.description: Clawdeen Wolf is a fierce feisty fury Fashionista! She loves to look hot as she tends to do a lot of flirting around those Monster High ghouls! She likes to look confident and alluring so I know you girls will not let her down!

bikini-season.name: Bikini Season
bikini-season.description: Summer is not over yet. Quick, take you bathing suit and go to the beach! Enjoy the waves, the summer breeze and the magnificent smell of the sea. This game will inspire you how to dress for this occasion. Have fun!

good-morning.name: Good Morning
good-morning.description: It is time to make brushing teeth fun! Enjoy the music and have different toothbrushes. Make a mundane activity like brushing teeth an enjoyable experience everyday! Also dress up yourself in the mirror. Choose from different clothes and towels. You can also change her face by clicking on her face.

barbies-sisters.name: Barbie's Sisters
barbies-sisters.description: Have you already decided how to spend your winter holidays? Barbie and her sisters Skipper, Stacie and cute little Chelsea are going to a tropical resort! Let us help them pack up. Barbie really needs your help, because she is not sure if her three little sisters will pack what they really need. Help the four Roberts sisters pick the best beach outfits that they will take to the tropical island.

barbie-princess-club.name: Barbie Princess Club
barbie-princess-club.description: Barbie Princess is enjoying her holidays with her friends in the club. Can you dressup Barbie Princess with comfortable dress and accessories?

bead-smith-jen-frozen.name: Bead Smith Jen: Frozen
bead-smith-jen-frozen.description: Here is your chance, ladies, to put your jewellery designer skills to a major test again and create your very first Frozen necklace of the Bead Smith Jen series. Get this fun jewellery decoration game started and begin by spotting out all the needed items and once you have everything prepared you can move to the nest page of the game and create your statement accessory as you wish. Good luck and have a great time!

sports-star-dressup.name: Sports Star Dressup
sports-star-dressup.description: Our girl is very much into sports! It is good for both her physical and mental state. Now, she needs your help to get dressed for riding her bicycle in the park. Choose from a range of sport clothes and enjoy dressing her up!

parisian-love.name: Parisian Love
parisian-love.description: Paris-the city of love. Play this game and dress our girl for a special and romantic dinner with her boyfriend. Love is in the air!

going-to-be-late-to-class.name: Going To Be Late To Class
going-to-be-late-to-class.description: Emma is a girl who loves beauty very much. However, today is Monday and time is limited for her to dress up. You know for a girl who loves fashion very much, it is really very terrible for her not to dress up with her most beautiful clothes. Please help her dressup and try your best not be late.

dinner-date.name: Dinner Date
dinner-date.description: You've just got hired at one of the newly opened luxurious restaurants in town, lucky you! Now, make sure you make the best first impression by attending to all the customers coming in to enjoy their lovely, highly romantic dates here, in a cozy stylish ambiance. Be efficient when it comes to carrying out their orders and make sure you don't spoil these couples' special evenings by leaving them waiting too long or. . . messing up their orders!

date-dress-up.name: Date Dress-up
date-dress-up.description: In this girl game, you need to dress-up and get ready for a date with your dream boy. Choose your dress, matching shoes, and hand bag to look stunning. Don’t forget hair and make-up. Have fun and play some games!Another great game brought to you by agames. org. Enjoy and share with your friends. Follow us, like us, G+ us.

cute-winter-dress-up.name: Cute Winter Dress Up
cute-winter-dress-up.description: Amanda is getting ready to go sledding with her besties! Dress her up in cute winter clothes so she can go play with her friends!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Amanda!

spongebob-works.name: Spongebob Works
spongebob-works.description: Spongebob is going to his first day of work today. Help him find the perfect outfit for The Krusty Krab. Make sure Spongebob looks his best so the customers will like him! Do you want him to look wacky or formal? It is your choice! Don't dissapoint Mr. Krabs because he is a very strict boss! Weeeeee! Time to cook some Krabby Patties!

monster-high-cute-brides.name: Monster High Cute Brides
monster-high-cute-brides.description: Each girl likes to imagine herself in a sparkling wedding gown and a veil. So do Monster High girls, but their monster tastes in wedding fashion are a very much different from what common brides prefer. Find out what Cleo, Clawdeen, Lagoona and other ghouls would like to look like on their wedding day.

frozen-princess.name: Frozen Princess
frozen-princess.description: Step into Frostyland and start working your magic fashion skills on this ravishing frozen princess here! Put together one of her stunning, dreamlike sheer blue royal gowns with some of her glittery crystal jewels, get her a gorgeous hairstyle, as well, some fairytale-inspired heels, too, and turn her into the most stylish beauty in Frostyland!

magazine-designer.name: Magazine Designer
magazine-designer.description: Have you ever dreamed of working for big magazine companies such as Vogue and Elle? Well now you can! Here at DressUpWho. com, you can design your own magazine cover! Design what you want your front cover model to wear. Make sure she wears something that is in season and will attract people or else no one will buy the magazine! Also you can design the color of the background. Make sure it goes well with what she is wearing!

gnomette.name: Gnomette
gnomette.description: A play off from the movie Gnomeo & Juliet. Gnomette is Gnomeo's sister. She has just been bought by a new owner from a yard sale. Will she find her true love in this new environment? Well, the first step is to look pretty! Dress Gnomette up with new clothes and hats and make her the prettiest gnome out there! Hopefully she will meet Mr. right soon!

emo-baby-rosie.name: Emo Baby Rosie
emo-baby-rosie.description: Rosie the baby is going to the playground with her mommie after lunch. You want to dress Rosie up with some emo clothes. Select from a variety of emo clothes for your baby. She will be the coolest baby in the playground! Lets go!!!

pretty-girl-dress-up.name: Pretty Girl Dress Up
pretty-girl-dress-up.description: Hey girls! Are you enjoying summer? Elisa, this pretty girl, does! She loves everything about summer. In this fun online game for girls she will teach you how to be fashionable. Play with Elisa and enjoy a day together at the mall. Shop with her and note everything that seems interesting for you. Take her advises and consider to follow them. By the moment the game ends you will be able to dress up alone and to look fashionable at every time. Enjoy!

summer-party-dress-up.name: Summer Party Dress Up
summer-party-dress-up.description: Rochelle is a brilliant student, she studied all school year for good grades, but now that summer is here she wants to relax and enjoy the summer. She is throwing a huge party in her garden and as a host, she wanna look breathtaking; Her secret crush is going to be there too, and she wants to blow him away with her look. Take her shopping and try sophisticated outfits, trendy haircuts, fabulous makeups and sparkling jewelries. Buy the ones that fit her the best and get her ready for the party. Enjoy!

the-india-princess.name: The India Princess
the-india-princess.description: Challenge yourself in this India Princess games and help her dress up more pretty than usual!You check out her fancy wardrobe and make the best choice in picking up the best clothes, accessories, shoes and hairstyles. She is waiting for you! Come on !

new-year-new-clothes-2011.name: New Year New Clothes 2011
new-year-new-clothes-2011.description: Alice is so excited for the New Year of 2011!! She has a whole new wardrobe from Christmas gifts and shopping. She wants to show off her new clothes to her friends as soon as possible. Help Alice put together an outfit with her new clothes. Remember, it is still very cold outside so keep her warm and stylish at the same time. DressUpWho wants to wish everyone a Happy New Years!! 2011 is going to be a great year for all of us!

movie-star.name: Movie Star
movie-star.description: Have you ever dreamed of becoming a movie star? Our girl is getting ready for the premiere of a movie where she is playing the main character! She needs you advice on what to wear and what make up should she have. Help her look stunning!

emma-in-the-shopping-mall.name: Emma In The Shopping Mall
emma-in-the-shopping-mall.description: Swupi Character Emma is in the shopping mall to buy new clothes and apparel. As you are the top stylist in the city, she asked you to help her. Its time to make decisions, show your skills and make new style for Emma. Game controls: Mouse button to select styles and color. Dimensions: 700x500px

santa-nails.name: Santa Nails
santa-nails.description: Santa nails are dirty and untidy. Clean the Santa nails to decorate the nails to celebrate the Christmas festival and make here to feel happy.

sofia-shopping.name: Sofia Shopping
sofia-shopping.description: Princess Sofia wants to keep the pace with the latest trends in fashion, so she decided to have a relaxing day shopping. Sofia can choose from lots of dresses, cool shoes, jewelry and trendy accessories. Go ahead girls and relax with Sofia in the castle shop .

making-the-cut.name: Making The Cut
making-the-cut.description: Greetings!We have recently released an awesome game in our portal. Your users will love playing this game. We request you to take a look and add the game to your portal.

cocktail-fashion.name: Cocktail Fashion
cocktail-fashion.description: Even though its a little old fashion, many teens love the style. Get this girl on that fashion and go with the best suits.

lisa-is-a-pretty-lady.name: Lisa Is A Pretty Lady
lisa-is-a-pretty-lady.description: Dashing socialite Lisa's getting ready for a fancy high society party and she's nervous that she won't be able to stand out from the crowd of posh chic young ladies attending it! Help her steal the spotlights with one of her lovely full-skirt chiffon dresses or with a fashion combo made of a pretty corset bodice and a flouncy or ruffled skirt, then see what glittery diamond jewels, luxury heels and exquisite head accessory would best upgrade her fancy look!

tricycle-baby.name: Tricycle Baby
tricycle-baby.description: Take your cute little niece out for some exercise at the park. You bring your bicycle and your niece brings her tricycle. Awww. . . how cute! But wait! before you guys go out, you have to dress her up! Here is your chance to play some dress up, make her cute and pretty. Don't take too long though, you have to make it home for dinner!

barbie-murderer.name: Barbie Murderer
barbie-murderer.description: She is a murder on a dancefloor, but this is just a game, Barbie, you are about to have a great Halloween party! Prepare Barbie for another Halloween party where she acts as a murderer, the notorious Barbie Murderer! Happy Halloween!Use the Mouse to drag and drop items and fashion accessories.

cute-barbie-fashion.name: Cute Barbie Fashion
cute-barbie-fashion.description: Barbie is back and looking for a fashion makeover. Set her up with a perfect day at the spa. Do her hair, makeup and even her nails before dressing her up in the latest fashion.

loot-heroes-2.name: Loot Heroes 2
loot-heroes-2.description: Loot Heroes 2 is an action packed game that you can start playing after selecting your favorite character from the given options. Your task in the game will be to let your chosen character kill all the enemies in each area. Make sure that you pick up all the useful things from each area.

towel-fighter.name: Towel Fighter
towel-fighter.description: Towel Fighter is a funny fighting game. The fighters in the game will be using towels to attack the opponents and you are going to be playing this game as one of the fighters. Move well, jump with timing and attack effectively to beat down the opponents that you face.

2d-boxing.name: 2D Boxing
2d-boxing.description: This is a 2D boxing game wherein the boxer controlled by you will be stepping inside the ring where he will be facing some tough opponents. Are you good enough to let your boxer move well, attack effectively and dodge attacks to beat all the opponents in all the matches to eventually win the title and become the champion boxer?

toast-in-space.name: Toast In Space
toast-in-space.description: Toast In Space is a game with a very simple concept. You will be playing the game to set high records and replay the game to outperform yourself. The toast on your screen must be moved up and down to collect the useful things floating in space. There may be certain things that ought to be avoided.

superstar-beatdown.name: Superstar Beatdown
superstar-beatdown.description: Superstar Beatdown is a game that allows you to choose your favorite celeb from the given options to start playing the game. Use the gorilla hand to launch the celeb that you have chosen to let the celeb go flying as far as possible. Play to earn maximum score within the given time.

angry-red-button.name: Angry Red Button
angry-red-button.description: The red button that you see in the game is very furious for being pushed at by everyone. He leaves the crowd to find an isolated place to get some rest but you follow him wherever he goes. Just go on clicking on the red button and see how furious he can get.

kick-out-ytroll.name: Kick Out Ytroll
kick-out-ytroll.description: This is a very funny distance game in which you will be launching the troll out of the window with the intention of letting him go as far as possible. There will be special boosters and upgrades that can be used to boost the launch and let the funny faced character go even farther.

trump-donald.name: Trump Donald
trump-donald.description: This is a hilarious game featuring a very popular leader. The game is supposed to be played for fun purpose only. You will have a trumpet that you can blow right on the face of Donald Trump and you will see his hair fly in a very funny way. Do not be afraid, there are no bodyguards.

sushi-cat-2-the-great-purrade.name: Sushi Cat 2: The Great Purrade
sushi-cat-2-the-great-purrade.description: The purple cat in the game is very hungry and he is here at the parade to find enough food for itself. Help the cat fall in the best possible way to eat up all the yummy items to fill its belly and to complete each level of the game. The bonuses in the game make the game play even more exciting.

kakato-otoshi.name: Kakato Otoshi
kakato-otoshi.description: The girls will be coming to you to get rid of the extra layers on their shoe soles. You will have limited time within which you must you should remove all the extra layers. Be careful while hitting at the extra layers because you should not hit on the feet of your customers.

beat-up-trump.name: Beat Up Trump
beat-up-trump.description: Beat Up Trump is a game that is to be played for fun purpose alone. You will have a lot of options available to vent out your frustration on the otherwise loud mouthed celeb and political leader. Use the various options to beat him up. Just go on clicking on the icons on the play screen to see funny things happen.

bubble-breaker.name: Bubble Breaker
bubble-breaker.description: Bubble Breaker is a very nice online game and the task in each level of the game is to click on the clusters of two or more same colored bubbles to remove them from the play area. This has to be continued until there are no more bubbles left in the play area.

rocket-toilet.name: Rocket Toilet
rocket-toilet.description: Rocket Toilet is a very funny game in which the main character who will be sitting on the toilet must be launched to go as high and as far as possible. There will be things including your clicks on the toilet that will boost the launch. The money earned from each attempt can be spent on upgrades.

sheep-pimpimp.name: Sheep Pimpimp
sheep-pimpimp.description: Sheep Pimpimp is a colorful game that you will be playing for high score. You are supposed to click and drag the objects on the sheep to pimp it. There are many options and so you have to continue mixing and matching to find the best possible combination to give the sheep an attractive look.

haunted-restaurant.name: Haunted Restaurant
haunted-restaurant.description: Haunted restaurant is running by a witch. The witch having a problem, she lost her magic power slightly. She wants to regain her power back, for that witch has to make hundreds of haunted foods with her small magic power to bring back her full magic power. Help the witches to complete the task within the time duration. Unlock the food one by one and go on to further stages to complete the game.

zoo-frenzy.name: Zoo Frenzy
zoo-frenzy.description: One of zoo in town has run into bankruptcy, you have been chosen to save the zoo financial before its collapse.

perfect-hairstyle-designer.name: Perfect Hairstyle Designer
perfect-hairstyle-designer.description: Most of all girls love to change her hairstyle often.Give you a Hairstyle studio,do the best hairstyle for them and to be a perfect hairstyle designer.

sheep-come-home.name: Sheep Come Home
sheep-come-home.description: Help the sheep get home by controlling them with different commands. Pass obstacles and herd all the sheep safely back to the house.

virtual-marriage.name: Virtual marriage
virtual-marriage.description: Every girl has fantasized about their marriage like, when dress beautiful wedding, Face will be a happy smile.If the one stand by my own is my Prince Charming, that will be more perfect.Now give you a dream come true opportunity, You can enter your name in the game, and then enter his name, so that you can give yourself a virtual marriage.Don 't you can't wait to see your expression of happiness was!

dancefloor-girls.name: Dancefloor Girls
dancefloor-girls.description: Throw your hands in the air and get down to the beat, it's a game about dancing.

leaper.name: Leaper
leaper.description: "Leap and jump into power ups and candies to unlock new heights and achievements by answering math questions correctly. Test your math skills while avoiding nasty slime that will ruin your high flying adventure. "Instructions: "Start your game by hitting play. Then select the grade and math skill you want to practice. Answer questions correctly to jump higher. Time your answers so you collect power ups and boosters while avoiding slime. "

anime-angel-aliana.name: Anime Angel Aliana
anime-angel-aliana.description: Help this beautiful Anime Angel find her wings!  What a lovely Anime Gal she is.   What kind of Anime Angel are you?   If you love angels, anime, and if you are pure of heart and love to dress up, then this game is for you.

hip-dance.name: Hip Dance
hip-dance.description: Panda and Rabbit are on the college cheerleaders team and are in a contest. You dance as Rabbit, follow after the black pandas moves then start your routine to get the highest score

flour-factory.name: Flour Factory
flour-factory.description: Rabbit is impossible to work for! Forcing panda to collect the flour in the factory in the most ridiculous way just for his own entertainment. None the less help Panda collect as much flour and sweets as possible and gain the highscore.

pou-easter-egg-decoration.name: Pou Easter Egg Decoration
pou-easter-egg-decoration.description: This Easter, Pou decided to create a personalized basket for his loved ones, using cute decorations, plenty of colored ribbons, beautiful designs for the eggs, all put together in a lovely basket. Join Pou in this fun activity and choose any design that tickles you, create beautiful and fun Easter eggs with these great tips and ideas.

doli-fun-clean-up.name: Doli Fun Clean-Up
doli-fun-clean-up.description: The four DoliDoli buddies are ready to embark on a major “autumn cleaning marathon”! If you'd like to join them on their tidying up, their sweeping, sorting and mending little activities, indoors and outdoors, feel free to get this fun clean-up game started and lend them a helping hand or two!

hair-salon.name: Hair Salon
hair-salon.description: A new Hair salon is opened in new york area and Emily has to attend a birthday party. Let’s help her to have a nice hair look.

mary-flower-spa.name: Mary Flower Spa
mary-flower-spa.description: Considering the busy schedule during the week, Mary decided to take a break at the spa. Here, she will be treated like a princess. After receiving a treatment for relaxation, she will enjoy an entire change! She will receive a new look and a change of outfit! You will help her and everyone will be happy! Enjoy!

doctor-elsa-emergency-room.name: Doctor Elsa - Emergency Room
doctor-elsa-emergency-room.description: Welcome to Doctor Elsa emergency room. You are now on good hands and our patience for today is Anna that had a skating accident. Give her a full consultation and treatment and she will feel much better for sure. Enjoy

little-baby-care-2.name: Little Baby Care 2
little-baby-care-2.description: A baby is crying and nobody take of her now. Can you help her? Come on, let's help her and make her happy! First, we should change her diapers; It's smell unpleasant. Then, rub her with baby oil and dusted him all over with talcum powder. Thus, she will feel better. If we give her a cut toy, she will very happy. Don't dress up her cute! She has a lot dresses and cute accessories! Come on, let's go!

pou-bathing.name: Pou Bathing
pou-bathing.description: It is evening in this Pou bathing game and time has come to get clean and go to bed soon. Take him through all the stations to make sure you scrub out all the dirt off the cute creature.

puppy-spa.name: Puppy Spa
puppy-spa.description: Welcome to the CDE Puppy Spa! Follow the steps to bathe the puppy, dry it off, clip it's nails, and give it an overall wonderful spa experience! When you're done, dress it up however you like for a day of puppy fun!Instruction: Follow the steps to give the puppy a perfect spa experience. Click on the objects with your mouse.

facial-skin-doctor.name: Facial Skin Doctor
facial-skin-doctor.description: Kim had some problem with his face and she wants to see a doctor. Bring her to the doctor to solve his facial problem.

angela-ginger-birthday-surprise.name: Angela & Ginger Birthday Surprise
angela-ginger-birthday-surprise.description: Tomorrow is Tom's birthday! Which means a big party needs to be organized. And who else could be in charge for Tom's surprise party but Angela and Ginger? Join them in their shopping tour and buy everything one needs for a perfect birthday party. Let's make Tom happy!

sofias-party-cleanup.name: Sofias Party Cleanup
sofias-party-cleanup.description: Oh no! Looks like Cedric makes Sofia another trouble. There’s such a mess all over the castle, and the royal party is going to start very soon. Hurry up to clean up all the three rooms before the guests arrive!

sofia-head-injury.name: Sofia Head Injury
sofia-head-injury.description: There was a small accident at the castle and Princess Sofia needs medical assistance. You are the doctor that will help Sofia heal her head injury. Use all the medical tool that you have at your disposal and make Sofia feel better. Good luck with this operation.

enchanted-unicorn-spa.name: Enchanted Unicorn Spa
enchanted-unicorn-spa.description: Zoey the unicorn is coming home from a day of exploring and magic. Help her get clean by giving her a shower and then decorate her anyway you like!Instruction: Follow the steps to help clean the unicorn. Move your mouth left and right to scrub and blow dry. Click the categories to decorate.

dora-healty-food.name: Dora Healty Food
dora-healty-food.description: Help Dora find 3 plates with healthy food for each meal of the day. Find out what Dora likes to eat in the morning, afternoon and at dinner. All looks yummy but if you give Dora 2 unhealthy food plates the game will be over.

shelby-cobra-jigsaw.name: Shelby Cobra Jigsaw
shelby-cobra-jigsaw.description: Put the pieces in their right places to form the puzzle. Time is running out, so if this is too much for you, simply turn it off.

jennifer-rose-puppy-grooming.name: Jennifer Rose: Puppy Grooming
jennifer-rose-puppy-grooming.description: Jennifer Rose is excited about working at the puppy-grooming studio where she will get the opportunity to spend time with her favorite pets. Jennifer is supposed to look after these puppies but she should also be able to make time for her boyfriend without neglecting her job.

skate-and-eat.name: Skate and Eat
skate-and-eat.description: Skate on the road and jump for the bones and other food. Look out for the Bees.

school-girl.name: School Girl
school-girl.description: You're Sarah, a cute little school girl. Help her collect all her lost stuff in the school. Cross the path carefully by avoiding obstacles. Every level is addicting and has new enemies coming up. Enjoy!

ice-cream-doctor.name: Ice Cream Doctor
ice-cream-doctor.description: Eating ice cream can be lots of fun, and what better way to enjoy ice cream than by cooking it. With this free cooking game online, you can easily prepare the ingredients and create a masterpiece ice cream that everyone will love.

halloween-cookies.name: Halloween Cookies
halloween-cookies.description: Cute chef Oti's getting ready to bake some of her famous spooky-delicious Halloween cookies that she will treat all her trick-or-treaters with this year! Would you care lending her a helping hand and learning some of her cooking secrets and Halloween special cookie decorating tips and tricks, as well?

rapunzel-princess-fantasy-hairstyle.name: Rapunzel Princess Fantasy Hairstyle
rapunzel-princess-fantasy-hairstyle.description: As we all know, a good hairstyle can make you look great no matter what you wear. If hair is amazing, then the whole looking is amazing. So a good hairstyle is very important for your overall appearance. Rapunzel Princess likes making new hairstyle too. Can you help her? Considering that her hair is going through so many changes it needs special attention. Let's begin.

are-you-nick-or-disney.name: Are You Nick Or Disney?
are-you-nick-or-disney.description: Are you more Disney or Nick? Find out in this fun quiz!Instruction: Read each question and then use your mouse to click the answer that best fits your personality!

lazy-princess-weight-loss.name: Lazy Princess Weight Loss
lazy-princess-weight-loss.description: Because of snacking habits, Princess Yada is so fat that affects her image. Then the queen orders Yada to lose her weight undera severe fitness coach's supervision. But Yada is so naughty. Let to see her doing what to be lazy while the coach doesn't pay attention to her. Instruction:only click the mouse.

sofia-skating-accident.name: Sofia Skating Accident
sofia-skating-accident.description: Today is such a good day! And Sofia The First decided to learn to skate. But she fell, and her injuries looks really bad! She urgently needs your help! Make Sofia feel better and you’ll become an awesome paramedic!

clean-a-house-with-frozen-elsa.name: Clean A House With Frozen Elsa

dog-health-care.name: Dog Health Care
dog-health-care.description: On the street in front of your house was an accident due to careless and a poor dog was injured and needs care. You must help him recover and he will reward you and will bring you only joy. Take care of it and everything will be fine! Good luck!

pony-makeover-hair-salon.name: Pony Makeover Hair Salon
pony-makeover-hair-salon.description: Your pony need a little makeover and have to be clean for a big event. Bring your pony for a beautiful hair salon and makeover.

crown-cake-topper-decor.name: Crown Cake Topper Decor
crown-cake-topper-decor.description: Decorate a lovely crown cake with wonderful designs and make it look beautiful in this cake decoration game.

heart-theif-cupid.name: Heart Theif Cupid
heart-theif-cupid.description: In order to punish human's greed, god decided to recovery his heart, so that they can not love each other, thus unable to reproduce, Cupid dislike god's decision, they plan to steal all the heart back to human.

nose-doctor-game.name: Nose Doctor Game
nose-doctor-game.description: Alexia have some problem with his nose and she have to go to the doctor. Take care of her and take her to the hospital.

kids-bedroom-decoration.name: Kids Bedroom Decoration
kids-bedroom-decoration.description: I wish I had the chance to decorate my own bedroom when I was a kid! I would of had it all pink and yellow with cool patterns and girly soft furnishings making it the perfect place to chill and relax! If you could create your very own bedroom girls, how would yours look! You can get a few ideas from playing this fun bedroom decoration game. Create your perfect bedroom and maybe your dream will come true in real life!

princess-aurora-cleanup.name: Princess Aurora Cleanup
princess-aurora-cleanup.description: Help princess Aurora from sleeping beauty clean up her room before the queen and king comes to visit. Have fun play princess cleanup game.

hand-turkey-design.name: Hand Turkey Design
hand-turkey-design.description: Gobble Gobble! what better way to celebrate Turkey Day than with a totally nostalgic Hand Turkey? Design it any way you want and then share it with your friends and family as a Thanksgiving surprise!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and decorate your Hand Turkey!

decorate-your-walk-in-closet-3.name: Decorate Your Walk In Closet 3
decorate-your-walk-in-closet-3.description: You can now decorate 4 beautiful closet. There is a girly style, classic style, boy style and luxury style. Choose the one you prefer the most.

frenzy-babysitter.name: Frenzy Babysitter
frenzy-babysitter.description: Monday all moms and dads go back to work, it promises to become a busy day for Lisa's baby care center. Help her to take good care of all babies, returning them healthy and happy to their parents at the end of the day. Take care of the babies and entertain them for a good result.

princess-anna-gorgeous-makeover.name: Princess Anna Gorgeous Makeover
princess-anna-gorgeous-makeover.description: Anna wants to looks gorgeous as her sister Elsa. She needs a makeover with your help. Help her look stunning in this spa game!

princess-elsa-bedroom-cleaning.name: Princess Elsa Bedroom Cleaning
princess-elsa-bedroom-cleaning.description: Princess Elsa has a lovely bedroom filled with lots of toys. She plays with her toys in her room often and due to this the bedroom gets messy. Today, Elsa is going to clean up her bedroom and she surely needs your hand in cleaning it. Help her out!

snowman-panic.name: Snowman Panic
snowman-panic.description: Lilly has a snow day and she is building snowmen in Central Park! Help give the snowmen the missing items before they reach Lilly!Instruction: Help Lilly complete the snowmen before they reach her! Move Lilly using the up and down arrows on your keyboard. Press spacebar to serve the snowmen.

olaf-catching-nuts.name: Olaf Catching Nuts
olaf-catching-nuts.description: Olaf loves nuts very much. He has heard from his friends that nuts are falling from the sky and therefore, he has set out to catch the nuts in his bag. But there is a problem and that is he can’t catch all the nuts, only the nut that is shown at the top. Can you help Olaf collect the right nuts and avoid the wrong ones as it would reduce the score? Finish the task in the given time and move to next level. All the best!

babyhood-days.name: Babyhood Days
babyhood-days.description: Aubrey is an army soldier. After a long time he returned his parental home and very glad to memorize the childhood and teenage. So please help him to find some items to recollect his sweet memories.

pretty-jane-room-cleaner.name: Pretty Jane Room Cleaner
pretty-jane-room-cleaner.description: Jane's cousins are arriving and her mom wants to clean up the mess before they arrive, Jane is very lazy and does not want to clean up her room, but her mom is very strict she has asked Jane to clean all the mess in her room. Help Jane clean up all the mess, you have to pick and put the object at right place , make sure you do this in the given time, if you fail to do so you will have to try again. The faster you do the more points you get

fun-mouth-doctor.name: Fun Mouth Doctor
fun-mouth-doctor.description: Becoming a dentist can be a fun and rewarding career, and with this fun mouth doctor game you get to have the chance to see what a dentist gets to do in their practice.

baby-tooth-problems.name: Baby Tooth Problems
baby-tooth-problems.description: This baby is having some tooth problems and in this girl dentist game you will need to sort them out and giver her a nice smile with some really white teeth so they will shine in the TV show.

kitchen-ninja-2.name: Kitchen Ninja 2
kitchen-ninja-2.description: Time to cook, but we must cut into products first. Use your ninja instincts!

minion-kart.name: Minion Kart
minion-kart.description: Every three years the World Cup race started, is located in the desert and forest zone, the game difficulty. All of the players are ready, they experienced countless games, racing technology is very good, do you can beat them defending champion? Instruction:W/S/A/D or ↑/↓/←/→ to move, Space to brake;

barbie-the-pearl-princess-spa-day.name: Barbie The Pearl Princess Spa Day

baby-princess-birthday.name: Baby Princess Birthday
baby-princess-birthday.description: In this fun game help the little princess arrange for her birthday bash. Help her out with making the birthday card and then also help her out in the kitchen with making some tasty ice creams for her friends. Then make sure you clean the rooms properly and after that be ready to serve the friends on the dinner table. The game has several interesting levels and really amazing graphics that your kids will surely enjoy, make sure to watch out for updates as well.

find-the-kitties.name: Find The Kitties
find-the-kitties.description: Girls can you help Angelina to find the kitties at her pet shop. This is a kind of puzzle and skill games for you to test yourself. Try now and see how many kitties you can find before the clock ticks away!

halloween-pumpkin-decoration-challenge.name: Halloween Pumpkin Decoration Challenge
halloween-pumpkin-decoration-challenge.description: Lilly, Sarah, Gabby, and Ella are having a pumpkin decorating contest at their Halloween party! Help them make their pumpkins the fastest so they can win lots of candy!Instruction: Create the pumpkin in the picture by clicking the boxes and choosing the correct items from the menu. When your pumpkin is complete, hit done!

little-ninja.name: Little Ninja
little-ninja.description: Your fierce ninja is on the job to annihilate every bad ninja on sight! Use your weapons or teleport anywhere in order to smash them all!

my-cute-room-decor.name: My Cute Room Decor
my-cute-room-decor.description: Susan is having a sleepover tomorrow, her best-friends are coming and she is super hyped! She wants her bedroom to look great with cuddly toys, big cosy bed and gorgeous fixtures and fittings, to be honest, I think she is hoping you girls will help her get the bedroom ready! Can you help Susan out, give her a bedroom she and her friends can relax in and love hanging out in. When you have finished Susan may even tell you what she thinks of her new room. So cool!

messy-thumper-makeover.name: Messy Thumper Makeover
messy-thumper-makeover.description: Thumper was wandering in the forest in search of food. He went everywhere looking for food but he couldn't find anything except that he got very messy as a result of fruitless search. He is now hungry and looks dirty too. Have pity on him and clean him up first, then give him a shower. After that, feed him some vegetables and fruits that he gets some energy to stand. Finally, give him a stylish makeover by choosing cool accessories and an outfit. Have fun playing this pet grooming game!

flawless-beauty-frankie-stein.name: Flawless Beauty Frankie Stein
flawless-beauty-frankie-stein.description: Monster Ghoul Frankie Stein is going to meet her friends at monster high. She wants to make sure that she looks in her flawless self when she meets her friends so that they will envy her beauty. Therefore, she is leaving no stone unturned for that impeccable makeover. You can also play a role in her makeover just by applying facial creams and makeup to face. Let everyone be captivated by Frankie Stein’s beauty at monster high. Have fun with this facial spa game.

baby-anna-flu-caring.name: Baby Anna Flu Caring
baby-anna-flu-caring.description: Anna and Elsa in the snow and make a snowman is fun, suddenly Anna catch a cold, Elsa will check for Anna, to help her treatment of colds. Instruction:Only use the mouse.

doras-dashing-makeover.name: Doras Dashing Makeover
doras-dashing-makeover.description: Dora wants to leave behind her usual look and sport a cool and dashing look. For that she needs a makeover. Will you help Dora get that much needed makeover in this spa game? Apply cosmetics creams and clean her face that she gets a charming look. Say good bye to the short hairstyle and let her sport a long hairstyle that she looks very stylish like you in a fancy outfit along with her accessories. Enjoy!

anna-wedding.name: Anna Wedding
anna-wedding.description: Anna fell in love with Kesituofu, Elsa for they held a grand wedding, to give them a lot of dress, choose the clothes you like to dress up for them, as you and your beloved people get married. Control:Only click the mouse;

get-rid-of-cellulitis.name: Get Rid Of Cellulitis
get-rid-of-cellulitis.description: Hanna is the happiest girl in the world! Her boyfriend made her a proposal, and they’ll have wedding on Hawaii. But everything can be ruined - Hanna has a lot of cellulitis, and she can’t let her fiance see her like this. Help her to get rid of cellulitis!

marvellous-monster-high-cake.name: Marvellous Monster High Cake
marvellous-monster-high-cake.description: Here is an awesome monster high cake décor game for all the monster high fans! Let’s decorate a monster high inspired cake covered with colorful creams and detailed designs. Let each layer stand out different from other layers in terms of design and decoration. Make the cake look marvelous with your creativity. Have fun with this cake decoration game!

ant-kissing.name: Ant Kissing
ant-kissing.description: These ants are in love and love kissing each other. But there are other animals who are looking at them. Give those animals food so they get distracted and don't pay attention to them.

princess-at-the-crazy-dentist.name: Princess At The Crazy Dentist
princess-at-the-crazy-dentist.description: With this crazy dentist fun game you can be in the doctor's chair and transform a smile right in front of your eyes

draculaura-mansion-cleaning.name: Draculaura Mansion Cleaning
draculaura-mansion-cleaning.description: Monster Ghoul Draculaura lives in a huge mansion with her father. It is very difficult for her to clean up the mansion on her own. Help Draculaura clean up the mansion and arrange the things in the proper places by throwing away the trashes in the dust bin. Have fun playing this cleaning game!

princess-anna-river-cleaning.name: Princess Anna River Cleaning
princess-anna-river-cleaning.description: Princess Anna is on a picnic by a river side and she enjoyed the picnic a lot but at the end of the picnic she noticed that the river is polluted badly. Hence, Anna wants to do some cleaning in and around the river. Join Anna in this cleaning job and make the river clean and pure. Have fun playing this cleaning game!

anna-manicure.name: Anna Manicure
anna-manicure.description: Anna is a beauty girl, she likes to give yourself a manicure, can you help her become beautiful hands?Instruction:Only use the mouse.

nefera-de-nile-real-spa-makeover.name: Nefera De Nile Real Spa Makeover

first-aid-fracture-and-bleeding.name: First Aid: Fracture And Bleeding
first-aid-fracture-and-bleeding.description: Oh, have you seen that? The boy has just fallen off his bike! Looks like he is badly injured! Let's call the ambulance! But before the doctors come we should try to help him. Let's sterilize his wounds and immobilize the injured limbs.

kids-classroom-decoration.name: Kids Classroom Decoration
kids-classroom-decoration.description: School can become a little dull and mundane! Only if we could change up the classrooms, bringing a little brightness into the place with fun colorings and furnishings! Just like in this game we get the chance to decorate a classroom just how we would like it. Pick out a fun chalkboard, brightly colored flooring and funky looking desks and chairs. I know if school looked like this you would all like to go everyday, right kids!

princess-ariel-bathroom-cleaning.name: Princess Ariel Bathroom Cleaning
princess-ariel-bathroom-cleaning.description: Clean up princess Ariel's bathroom as she is taking a bath in her tub because the bathroom is very messy.

anna-clean-kingergarten.name: Anna Clean Kingergarten
anna-clean-kingergarten.description: After schoool, Anna's Kingergarten is in a mess. Could you help her to clean up the classroom and the playroom?Have fun!Control:Use your mouse to drag items to correct position. Dress HINT button if you need some clues.

snow-cone-stand.name: Snow Cone Stand
snow-cone-stand.description: Welcome to the CDE Snowcone Stand! Take care of each customer by memorizing their order and serving it to them as quickly as possible!Instruction: Memorize the order that each customer requests. Once their order disappears, use your mouse to click the items to create their order. If you see a token appear, click it to go to the toy machine mini game!

sumptuous-sofia-cake-decor.name: Sumptuous Sofia Cake Decor
sumptuous-sofia-cake-decor.description: For all the fans of Princess Sofia, here is a lovely Sofia themed cake décor game. Get this decoration game started and decorate a sumptuous cake and top it with a Sofia topper. Make the cake look so real and tasty by carefully choosing the color, and designs for it. So, girls! Why are waiting? Decorate the cake and enjoy!

nurse-anna.name: Nurse Anna
nurse-anna.description: Our favorite character from the Frozen cartoon, princess Elsa got the flu and she need medical help. Nurse Anna is here to help Elsa get better so she will use all her tools to make her sister feel better.

baby-monster-bathing.name: Baby Monster Bathing
baby-monster-bathing.description: It is bath time for the cutie in this baby monster bathing game and you will be the one in charge. Clean her up really well and go through all the steps to make it an awesome experience for both.

princess-jasmine-facial-makeover.name: Princess Jasmine Facial Makeover
princess-jasmine-facial-makeover.description: The Princess Jasmine needs a nice makeover to get a bright full face. Help her through your facial tips and make happy.

strawberry-shortcake-foot-doctor.name: Strawberry Shortcake Foot Doctor
strawberry-shortcake-foot-doctor.description: Strawberry Shortcake has serious foot injuries and there is no way to save her foot without surgery .Try to help her recover and feel better once again. Have fun playing our new doctor game featuring Strawberry Shortcake.

elsa-head-injury.name: Elsa Head Injury
elsa-head-injury.description: The snow queen Elsa fell while ice skating and now she is in the hospital because she got a serious head injury. You will have to use all the medical tools at your disposal to help Elsa feel better. Good luck.

pou-bithday-party.name: Pou Bithday Party
pou-bithday-party.description: Pou is hosting a fabulous party to celebrate his birthday and is looking for some great ideas to decorate his room. Use your imagination, choose beautiful and cozy furniture, a big fancy table, colored curtains, and create one-of-a-kind party with funny party decorations, such as balloons, hats, garlands, whistles. Pou and his guests will have a fantastic party thanks to you.

baby-boy-care.name: Baby Boy Care
baby-boy-care.description: Jenny has to babysit tonight. Her parents are gone and she has to take care of her little brother Ben. This is the first time that Jenny has to take care of her brother while she is alone. Jenny is nervous and she needs your help with this. Help her taking care of her baby brother by changing the diaper of baby Ben, wash him and play with him. Make sure he is happy and does not cry. Good luck!

dora-go-camping.name: Dora Go Camping
dora-go-camping.description: Dora is a very brave girl. She likes to go camping and she often goes camping by herself. She often encourages her friends to go camping by themselves. Girls, have you ever gone camping by yourself? Do you want to have a try? Play the Dora go Camping game and see what Dora prepares before getting off and what difficulties she will meet in the road. Then you will know what you need to prepare before the camp. Girls, come on! I believe you will have a good time.

elsa-hair-salon.name: Elsa Hair Salon
elsa-hair-salon.description: The rain ruined her hair so in this Elsa hair salon game, she will be walking inside for shelter and while she is at it, you will get to make her hair look amazing by styling it beautifully.

studious-dora-library-cleaning.name: Studious Dora Library Cleaning
studious-dora-library-cleaning.description: Help Dora clean up her library where she spends most of her free time.

mina-the-leather-fashionista.name: Mina, The Leather Fashionista
mina-the-leather-fashionista.description: Rock diva Mina is ready to step into the spotlights, on the stage, shortly and she's counting on you to help her look spectacular for her fans! Quick, dig through her edgy chic leather outfits, mix and match them to your liking putting together some jaw-dropping, statement punk-rock stage looks for her and keeping in mind to upgrade them with statement leather boots, bold jewels and funky hats, too!

dentist-fear-2.name: Dentist Fear 2
dentist-fear-2.description: Do you have a fear of a dentist? If yes, you are not the only one. With dentist fear 2 you can choose the person of your choice and take care of your teeth properly. Make sure to kill the multiple bacteria too.

sofia-the-first-bathing.name: Sofia The First Bathing
sofia-the-first-bathing.description: It is late in the evening and in this Sofia the first bathing game you will need to take her through the stations and give her a nice warm bath before bedtime which is right around the corner.

cute-octopus-care.name: Cute Octopus Care
cute-octopus-care.description: Kids! What would you do if you get an octopus as your pet which usually lives at the bottom of the sea? Well, it is a rare thing in real but in this pet care game, you can have this octopus as your pet and pamper it. You can give a bath, apply facial creams and give spa treatments to it. But it doesn't stop there. You can also accessorize your cute pet and make it look cool. Have fun with this pet care game!

princess-elsa-kitty-room-cleaning.name: Princess Elsa Kitty Room Cleaning
princess-elsa-kitty-room-cleaning.description: Princess Elsa has lots of kitties in her room and she is very fond of them. But it is not an easy task for her to maintain the kitties and the room as the kitties turn the room upside down. You can see it for yourself from the way the room looks now and it is in a bad condition. Help Elsa clean up the room and arrange the things in proper order. Have fun with this cleaning game!

delicious-cake.name: Delicious Cake
delicious-cake.description: Grab your apron, roll up your sleeves for cute chef Toto's cake baking class is about to begin! He's ready to share with your all his best hidden cake cooking secrets, so be quick to carry out all the tasks he'll give you, which will help you prepare and decorate a finger-licking good dessert to impress him with in no time!

elsas-baby-birth.name: Elsas Baby Birth
elsas-baby-birth.description: Elsa's daughter always wanted to have brother or sister. And now her dreams are coming true - it's time for Elsa to give birth! Let's go to the hospital! And help Elsa with bearing a child and taking care about the newborn

princess-party-cleanup.name: Princess Party Cleanup
princess-party-cleanup.description: After a big party princess Amelia had with other princesses of her age, the palace lies in a horrible mess. The king is about to return home from a hunt in some few minutes! Help Princess Amelia to clean everything up, so that the king doesn't find out that she threw a party without his permission!

barbie-tribal-makeover.name: Barbie Tribal MakeOver
barbie-tribal-makeover.description: Barbie wants to present their dressup and hair style in different ways like tribal. Here are some tips and models. Can you help her to choose the dress and accessories?

barbie-swimming-pool-cleaning.name: Barbie Swimming Pool Cleaning
barbie-swimming-pool-cleaning.description: Barbie had a party by her swimming with her friends and they had a whale of a time. The way the swimming pool and the place around it look can stand as a testimony to how well they enjoyed their party. Now that all the fun is over, Barbie has to clean up the place and the pool. She is really tired of the party and you need to assist her in cleaning up the things. Have pity on Barbie and help her in cleaning!

princess-tiana-pond-cleaning.name: Princess Tiana Pond Cleaning
princess-tiana-pond-cleaning.description: Princess Tiana is very worried about the health of the frog prince as the pond in which the frog prince is living is infested with litters and rubbishes. These unwanted things are polluting the pond and princess Tiana wants to do something about it. She is going to clean up the pond by removing all the rubbishes from the pond. She surely needs your helping hand in her big task of cleaning the pond. Have fun!

party-on-beach.name: Party On Beach
party-on-beach.description: There is a night party at the beach. The girl wants to dress up as beautiful as possible so she can attractall the men in the party. Help her choose the right accessories and dress to go the party.

pou-eye-doctor.name: Pou Eye Doctor
pou-eye-doctor.description: Pou will need his eyesight fixed in this Pou eye doctor game and he is hoping that you are a great doctor because he has visited quite a few in the past but they all failed in front of the challenge.

sofia-foot-doctor.name: Sofia Foot Doctor
sofia-foot-doctor.description: The Princes Sofia had an terrible accident when she tried to go in the park with her dog at the foot. Sofia feels very bad andneeds your help. All you have to do in this amazing game is to clean Sofia's foot and make her to heel better. Sofia is your friend and you willtry to help her. Good Luck!

princess-merida-palace-cleaning.name: Princess Merida Palace Cleaning
princess-merida-palace-cleaning.description: Princess Merida is not the kind of princess you would think of; rather she is very simple and even does the household works on her own. Sometimes she indulges in cleaning the palace too. There was a heavy wind in the kingdom and it caused a mess in the palace. Hence, Merida is cleaning up the palace but it is too much for her. It would be nice if you help her clean up the palace that she can finish it up fast and go for horse riding. Have fun playing this cleaning game!

princess-tiana-cleanup.name: Princess Tiana Cleanup
princess-tiana-cleanup.description: Help princess Tiana from The Princess and the Frog clean up her room.

queen-elsa-cake-decor.name: Queen Elsa Cake Decor
queen-elsa-cake-decor.description: Your best buddy is an ardent fan of The Snow Queen Elsa ever since she watched the movie Frozen. Why don’t we surprise your friend with a Snow Queen Elsa themed cake on her birthday? Let’s decorate a colorful and yummy cake with a topping of Queen Elsa. Have fun playing this cake décor game!

jumbo-day-care.name: Jumbo Day Care
jumbo-day-care.description: Hi kids, meet our little jumbo, who had some fun in the mud after the rain. Now it is al messed up. So help the little one to get washed and fresh, then to do some gardening work by collecting all the fruits lying on the ground. The next level of the game is to collect all the falling fruits, without missing any. You need to move fast and use all your skills to succeed. Play the game and have fun!

egypt-princess-makeover.name: Egypt Princess Makeover
egypt-princess-makeover.description: Greetings! We have recently released an awesome game in our portal. Your users will love playing this game. We request you to take a look and add the game to your portal.  Find the game details below:  Name:Egypt Princess Makeover     Egypt Princess has some changes in the face makeup and she wants them to be permanent. Choose the best makeover and make her happy.   Game URL: http://www.makeupgames.com/egypt-princess-makeover  SWF: http://www.makeupgames.com/games/files/Egypt_Princess_Makeover.swf   Thumbnail1: http://www.makeupgames.com/images/Egypt-Princess-Makeover-200X250.jpg         Thumbnail2: http://www.makeupgames.com/images/Egypt-Princess-Makeover-160X120.jpg  Thumbnail3: http://www.makeupgames.com/images/Egypt-Princess-Makeover-120X90.jpg     Thumbnail4: http://www.makeupgames.com/images/Egypt-Princess-Makeover-100X100.jpg  Thumbnail5: http://www.makeupgames.com/images/Egypt-Princess-Makeover-180X135.jpg  Thumbnail6: http://www.makeupgames.com/images/Egypt-Princess-Makeover-90X120.jpg  Thumbnail7:  http://www.makeupgames.com/images/Egypt-Princess-Makeover-150X150.jpg          Game Size:  683 (w) x 539 (h)  Keywords:Egypt Princess Makeover,Makeupgames,Makeover Games,Fashion Games,Kids Games,Girl Games. princess-room-cleanup.name: Princess Room Cleanup
princess-room-cleanup.description: A princess had some friend in their room and she need to clean it before his mom come out. Clean the room and make sure it is clean before your mom arrived.

frenzy-airport.name: Frenzy Airport
frenzy-airport.description: Lisa found a new job as a stewardess. assist Lisa to guide the passengers on the airport during they are in transit. take their luggage, and offer other ground services until their plane is ready to depart. on such a busy airport, you wonder where everyone is going.

abbey-bominable-cool-makeover.name: Abbey Bominable Cool Makeover
abbey-bominable-cool-makeover.description: Monster ghoul Abbey Bominable may have a fierce personality but you can make her look cool and be friend with her. Yes, she has a soft side too. In this facial beauty game, you are going to explore her feminine side by giving her a cool makeover whom others think as an uncool person. Start this makeover game and clean her face by repeatedly applying facial creams and then add makeup to it while choosing a hairstyle and accessories. Enjoy playing this makeover game!

baby-emma-laundry-time.name: Baby Emma Laundry Time
baby-emma-laundry-time.description: Baby Emma is going to wash some clothes today! Emma is playing outside with her dog Max. But she got dirty so now needs to wash her clothes. But first you need to help her sort the clothes by color. After that, Emma will need to wash the white and colored clothes. After the washing, it's time to dry the clothes. Help Emma to put the clothes in the right place on the clothesline. Finally choose some a lovely new outfit for Emma!

pet-hospital-doctor.name: Pet Hospital Doctor
pet-hospital-doctor.description: Your best pet have injuries and you need to bring him to the hospital. Make sure to find the best doctor for him. Take care!

hula-hoop-sara.name: Hula Hoop Sara
hula-hoop-sara.description: Sara is going to participate in a dance competition, she has been looking forward to that the whole summer. The show will be on TV tonight, As her stylist, your job is to help her pick the perfect outfit for her big day. She is doing her daily hula hoop exercise, and is waiting for your advice. Hurry! The show will start in a few hours.

da-best-gaem.name: Da Best Gaem
da-best-gaem.description: Da Best Gaem is a very exciting game in which the colorful cat will need to be controlled to let it fly as far as possible. There will be certain things that can be collected by the cat but there will also be other things in the sky that the cat must dodge or destroy.

super-heroes.name: Super Heroes
super-heroes.description: How much do you know them? Now it is time to learn this. Test yourself by answering the questions in the shortest time.

spongebob-run.name: Spongebob Run
spongebob-run.description: In Spongebob Run Your goal is to survive, but it won’t be so easy, collecting all the hamburgers and avoiding all those obstacles and make a high score have fun!

dora-pizza-delivery.name: Dora Pizza Delivery
dora-pizza-delivery.description: Dora just made herself a homemade pizza. She wants to share the pizza with her friend around the area. So she takes out her bike and drive around the area to delivery the pizza to each of her friends. Complete each level mission in order to advance to the next level.

wild-sheep-coloring.name: Wild Sheep Coloring
wild-sheep-coloring.description: Color the forest where there are some Wild Sheep and pigs in the background. Color them according to your taste and preference to make them look their best.

ben-10-halloween-costumes.name: Ben 10 Halloween Costumes
ben-10-halloween-costumes.description: Help Ben selecting his costume for this halloween and make like look terrific!

magic-puzzle-ben-10.name: Magic Puzzle - Ben 10
magic-puzzle-ben-10.description: Rearrange the pieces of this cartoon puzzle to show your favorite Ben 10 characters.

alan-4x4-road-trip.name: Alan 4x4 Road Trip
alan-4x4-road-trip.description: Alan, Smith and Mr Cak are doing their daily activity, Off Roading on the hills together! Let's go have some fun with them!

spongebob-hidden-treasure.name: SpongeBob Hidden Treasure
spongebob-hidden-treasure.description: Spongebob Squarepants was with his friends enjoying a watery day, when they stumbled upon a great treasure, but they are having a hard time finding all the ancient sheriff badges. Try to use the magnifying glass and look thoroughly for them. Each one will be a few extra points for you and if you find them all you will pass through to the next level. If you get stuck and cannot find any more of them, use the three hints you have available to discover them.

the-alan-show.name: The Alan Show
the-alan-show.description: Desert kingdom is attacked by Mr Streoid and his troops! Alan, Mr CAK and Smith are the only three who are able to stop him. Let's help them to defend Dessert Kingdom!

dora-box-delivery.name: Dora Box Delivery
dora-box-delivery.description: Dora needs your help to deliver boxes to people at fairly town.Everybody lets go!

tom-and-jerry-iceball.name: Tom and Jerry Iceball
tom-and-jerry-iceball.description: The famous cartoon characters Tom and Jerry have come back with a new game. In this game, Jerry needs your help, because Tom and his friends captured him and will throw him about. But you must help Jerry to catch many rockets and water bullets to fly high to the sky and escape.

spongebob-food-skewer.name: Spongebob Food Skewer
spongebob-food-skewer.description: Spongebob is so hungry that he wants to eat anything he sees. Here he stops by a BBQ shop where he can put different foods on a stick and eat it as a whole. Help Spongebob grab three identical foods at once and eat them together. Good Luck. Use mouse to play. You must put three identical foods together to clear them on the stick.

naruto-ramen-express.name: Naruto Ramen Express
naruto-ramen-express.description: Naruto has got a mission to deliver ramen! Let's help Naruto to deliver ramen quickly!

dr-dora-saves-the-dog.name: Dr Dora Saves The Dog
dr-dora-saves-the-dog.description: Dora is invited to dog shelter to take care of the dogs, there are so many dogs there, unfortunately it does not have enough doctor/nurse to take care all of them . Some dogs are not healthy and need special attention. Could you help Dora to treating sick dogs?

ben-10-partner-adventure.name: Ben 10 Partner Adventure
ben-10-partner-adventure.description: Ben 10 and his partner is on adventure to kill the enemy and hope to wide them out forever. The adventure is full ofdanger. Use both ben 10 and his partner special ability to across different traps and platform in order to advanceto the next level.

spongebob-foot-doctor.name: Spongebob Foot Doctor
spongebob-foot-doctor.description: A loud voice is heard outside your office door and in this SpongeBob foot doctor game you will soon realize what hurts him because he is making quite a good case about it.

spongebob-crazy-run.name: SpongeBob Crazy Run
spongebob-crazy-run.description: Help Spongebob run as fast as you can and collect all the coins. Arrow keys to move, space bar to jump.

spongebob-jet-bubble.name: Spongebob Jet Bubble
spongebob-jet-bubble.description: Collect as many coins as possible, avoid sharks, divers and many other obstacles. Play with your friends to make this game more exciting!

squidward-the-lost-clarinet.name: Squidward the Lost Clarinet
squidward-the-lost-clarinet.description: HELP SQUIDWARD TO FIND HIS FAVOURITE CLARINET. BE CAREFUL WITH THE BAD BUBBLE POPPIN BOYS,DONT GET CAUGHT BY THEM!

ben-10-spot-the-not.name: Ben 10 Spot the Not
ben-10-spot-the-not.description: Spot the differences in these almost identical images with Ben 10 and a few of his most renown aliens. Heatblast, Diamondhead and others are waiting to see how well you do.

spongebob-crab-delivery.name: Spongebob Crab Delivery
spongebob-crab-delivery.description: Let's help Spongebob to deliver fresh crabs to Patrick, the crab burger seller!Be careful don't let any crab fall out from the boat or Bob will get mad!

spongebob-get-the-license.name: Spongebob Get The License
spongebob-get-the-license.description: Hey spongebob ! you have never past the driving test before , today is your last chance to get your driving license, do your best!

doraemon-and-the-bad-dogs.name: Doraemon And The Bad Dogs
doraemon-and-the-bad-dogs.description: Doraemon was kidnapped by artificial dogs from the 21st century! Let's help Nobita to save Dorameon from them!

diego-tractor.name: Diego Tractor
diego-tractor.description: Let's help Diego to clean all the trash off the street, so our world will be more green!

power-rangers-dino-ranger-atv.name: Power Rangers-Dino Ranger ATV
power-rangers-dino-ranger-atv.description: New ATV Madness from Red Dino Ranger!

run-naruto.name: Run Naruto
run-naruto.description: Run Naruto is a great funny, action games. Naruto is running to save his friends Saske and Sakura. Use mouse or keyboard (number 1-5) to eliminate all enemys. Enjoy!

naruto-match.name: Naruto Match
naruto-match.description: This is a free "match 3" game of naruto characters. exchange two adjacent thumbs to make 3 same characters in a line!

simpson-battle.name: Simpson Battle
simpson-battle.description: Homer and Maggie vs Bart and Lisa. . . Play against CPU or your friends. You have to eliminate all the enemy on each level in order to advance with your campaign. Good Luck. . .

plasticine-mickey-mouse.name: Plasticine Mickey Mouse
plasticine-mickey-mouse.description: Plasticine is one of the most fun toys, it not only can exercise our creativity, you can also exercise your memory. Mickey Mouse is very cute, let us create it with plasticine, each mold made of different parts, it can test your intelligence. Control:only click the mouse.

mario-world-cup.name: Mario World Cup
mario-world-cup.description: Mario World Cup is a great sport game. Mario from 32 worlds countrys is on the one place and trying to win the cup.

spongebob-bubble-pop.name: Spongebob Bubble Pop
spongebob-bubble-pop.description: Help Spongebob shoot the bubbles and break them down. Arrow keys to move, space bar to shoot.

smurf-sniper.name: Smurf Sniper
smurf-sniper.description: Smurf Sniper is a point and click style smurf game. Use your mouse to zoom in on Smurfette and click until you find them all.

garfield-find-the-numbers.name: Garfield Find The Numbers
garfield-find-the-numbers.description: Test your power of observation by finding the numbers which are in various forms in this Garfield Find the Numbers game.

tom-and-jerry-find-the-numbers.name: Tom And Jerry - Find the Numbers
tom-and-jerry-find-the-numbers.description: Test your power of observation by finding the numbers which are in various forms in this Tom and Jerry Find the Numbers game.

squidward-trishaw.name: Squidward Trishaw
squidward-trishaw.description: Squidward works as a taxi driver in Bikini Bottom, can he take all the passengers to their destination? Let's make sure!

spongebob-missing-recipe.name: Spongebob Missing Recipe
spongebob-missing-recipe.description: Plankton has stolen mr krab's secret recipe ! spongebob and patrick must take it back before its to late , hurry up !

spongebob-the-pirate.name: SPONGEBOB THE PIRATE
spongebob-the-pirate.description: Bikini bottom is invaded by pirates, They are kidnapping half of Bikini bottom citizen. Spongebob square pants is the only person who can handle this situation. He is using a new air gun which is invented by Spongebob best friend, Sandy. Aim and hit the bad guy! Help Spongebob save Bikini bottom from pirates!

ben10-city-protector.name: Ben10 City Protector
ben10-city-protector.description: Our city is being attacked by swampfire. Could BEN10 stop them? Let's help him!

spongebob-and-jellyfish.name: Spongebob And Jellyfish
spongebob-and-jellyfish.description: Spongebob needs your help to catch jellyfish on the field and give them to sandy as a present.

the-smurfs-adventure.name: The Smurfs Adventure
the-smurfs-adventure.description: The Smurfs are planning to get a big party for papa smurf because it's almost his birthday. Try to collect as many presents as you can and all cakes.

diego-4x4-offroad.name: Diego 4x4 Offroad
diego-4x4-offroad.description: Diego has a new adventure with his 4x4 car!

patrick-cheese-bike.name: Patrick Cheese Bike
patrick-cheese-bike.description: Patrick is starving , lets help patrick to find cheese in bikini bottom .

ben10-sky-battle.name: Ben10 Sky Battle
ben10-sky-battle.description: Aggregor is back with his massive troops. Ben10 must save the planet from them!

spiderlad-vs-batsman.name: Spiderlad vs Batsman
spiderlad-vs-batsman.description: This is a super heroes themed hockey-pinball game where you have to fight against the computer.

save-mario.name: Save Mario
save-mario.description: Save Mario is an exciting new strategy game. You have to run to a safer place before the Mario World crushes you. Keep on trying until you get a high score. Best of Luck!

ben-10-fireman.name: Ben 10 Fireman
ben-10-fireman.description: Kill all unwanted aliens through each level. Please remember that your  bullets are limited.

mario-great-adventure-7.name: Mario Great Adventure 7
mario-great-adventure-7.description: Mario and Yoshi are together again to rescue the princess from the evil Bowser hand. In order to savethe princess, Mario and Yoshi would have to cross different platform and reach Bowser at his castle. Collect mushroom and coins on the way. Yoshi eggs will be available along the way. Collect it, and mario wouldbe able to ride yoshi. Use fireball to kill the enemy.

batman-dangerous-buildings.name: Batman Dangerous Buildings
batman-dangerous-buildings.description: Help your favorite hero Batman climbing the five dangerous towers. Beware of the Joker who will try to make your mission fail.

mario-room-decoration.name: Mario Room Decoration
mario-room-decoration.description: This is such a cute game and a must for all fans of the Super Mario Bros! These little Italian guys are so fun and if you are a fan of them, then you would love all the merchandise too! Get this game started and discover all the great items and accessories to create the best Mario bedroom decor ever. From wardrobes to Mario dressed beds, there is a lot to choose from and so much fun to be had, play around until you have the perfect look and style for you!

mario-acrobatic-bike.name: Mario Acrobatic Bike
mario-acrobatic-bike.description: Mario is having fun with his acrobatic bike. Help mario drive his bike around theplatform and activate all the flower in order to advance to the next level. Kill allthe monsters on the way to gain extra points. use arrow to drive and space to make turn around

ben-10-robot-war.name: Ben 10 Robot War
ben-10-robot-war.description: Ben 10 is on a war with the army who are trying to invade the land where people live. Ben 10 is riding on a robotto fight with the enemy. The robot is very powerful that it can fly and shoot down the enemy. Help Ben 10defeat the army using the robot.

ariana-grande-skin-care-spa.name: Ariana Grande Skin Care Spa
ariana-grande-skin-care-spa.description: Ariana Grande is one of the leading singers of your country. She has many friends. The reason behind is that she is very affable and charming. We know that you want to be her friend. You have a chance to become closer to her. She is at your beauty parlour now. If you give her good spa and adorn her fabulously, she will like you. Do not worry about the facial creams and cosmetics. You have plenty of them in the parlour. Make her relax and do the spa. After the spa you are supposed to do the makeover. After the spa, she is going for the wedding of her cousin. Embellish the lady with the expensive adorable costumes and give her a ravishing look. We are pretty sure that she will become your bosom friend. Have a good time with the charming lady. Make use of the trendy accessories.

princess-rapunzel-room-cleaning.name: Princess Rapunzel Room Cleaning
princess-rapunzel-room-cleaning.description: Princess Rapunzel is the only child in the family. She will rule the country after her father. She is a matured girl. She always would empathize with others. She has been the source of inspiration for her friends. I am here to proclaim the good news. That is the princess Rapunzel celebrates her birthday tomorrow. The king and the Queen have already made the arrangements. Still one work is in pending. It is nothing but cleaning the room of the princess. All the servants have already slept off. You give your helping hand to the princess. She needs some rest. Only then she will look rejuvenated tomorrow. Rearrange things as they should be. Place all the waste items in the garbage. You are doing a great job for the princess. Thank you so much.

aloha-burger.name: Aloha Burger
aloha-burger.description: Have you seen a monkey cooking? The name of the monkey is ‘Tom’. It resides in the woods, which is adjacent to your house. Tom is very good at cooking. When he cooks monkeys will become gluttons. They would eat as much as they can. Tomorrow the relatives of Tom are coming. He is very busy preparing food for them. Tomorrow’s piece de résistance would be aloha burger. The kith and kin of Tom are fond of eating Burgers. The world ‘Aloha’ itself would keep them mouth-watering all along. Help the poor monkey prepare the burger. All the monkeys have kicked the sack already. If you do not help him, it would a long time to finish cooking. Tom is indebted to you throughout the life. If you want to know more about the celebration of the creature, be there at 6.30 in the evening. They are very hospitable. Thank you so much for helping Tom.

dora-bubble-pop.name: Dora Bubble Pop
