dora-bubble-pop.description: Dora just received a new giant cannon from her friend. Dora found out that her bestfriend Boots is surround by swiper and other monsters. Help Dora use cannon topop those bubble and kill swiper and monsters in order to save boots. use mouse to aim and shoot

spongebob-eye-doctor.name: Spongebob Eye Doctor
spongebob-eye-doctor.description: The action in this Spongebob eye doctor game takes place in Bikini Bottom, where you will need to take a look at his eyes and see what the problem is. Once you spot it, fix it!

garfield-solitaire.name: Garfield Solitaire
garfield-solitaire.description: Classic Solitaire card game with a Garfield Theme Twist.

spongebob-flying-plates.name: Spongebob Flying Plates
spongebob-flying-plates.description: Help Spongebob matching color blocks of 2 or more to clear the board. Press space bar to use special plates which could clear even single color of block.

scoobydoo-wrestlemania-rush.name: ScoobyDoo Wrestlemania Rush
scoobydoo-wrestlemania-rush.description: ScoobyDoo Is is on his way to Wrestlemania, help your favorite scoobydoo to drive his van to Wrestlemania, collect all the burgers in the middle to earn more points have fun.

beautiful-ride-coloring.name: Beautiful Ride Coloring
beautiful-ride-coloring.description: Color in this Beautiful Ride Coloring game where two small girls having fun in the car while going out on picnic in the wonderful weather.

talking-tom-tooth-problems.name: Talking Tom Tooth Problems
talking-tom-tooth-problems.description: In this Talking Tom dentist game you will be dealing with his tooth problems because lately he has been complaining about some nasty toothaches that he cannot get rid of.

talking-tom-nose-doctor.name: Talking Tom Nose Doctor
talking-tom-nose-doctor.description: You have a very special patient in this Talking Tom nose doctor game as he came to you with a serious problem. His voice sounds funny because of his cute nose so now you have to make him feel like new.

flyer.name: Flyer
flyer.description: The primary objective of the game is to make the flyer cartoon to move around and keep alive without colliding with enemies. You can click to shoot and collect coins. Health packs, Power mode enabled game. The first sponsored game from dhoola.com

kiss-me-softly.name: Kiss Me Softly
kiss-me-softly.description: Adam and Eve are in love. They go for a boat trip along the river. You need to help them to kiss each other. Hold down your mouse button to fill their love meter. Be careful, don't let others see you while kissing.

movie-theater-kissing.name: Movie Theater Kissing
movie-theater-kissing.description: There have been songs made about kissing in front of the big screen. Since it is so special, you and your love have decided to see how special it really is. Make sure you kiss more than once to get the real special feel of it. There is only one thing you need to worry about and that is the other people in the cinema, make sure they do not spot you kissing or your will get kicked out.

hulk-kissing.name: Hulk Kissing
hulk-kissing.description: Hulk and his Lover are in their first date in a wonderful place. Help them make their first Kiss without getting caught by their enemies. Be careful when someone watched them, stop kising, you will have to fill the kissing bar before the time runs out. Good Luck

nerd-lovers.name: Nerd Lovers
nerd-lovers.description: Nerd lovers couple are busy reading romantic novels in their high school library. They got so much involved on the story and so forgot that there are bunch of other nerds around. As they read the romantic novel, they try sharing kisses. Help them with that so other nerds and librarian do not catch them while they kiss. There are multiple level of challenges waiting for you.

my-lovely-neighbor.name: My Lovely Neighbor
my-lovely-neighbor.description: Here is this romantic online game in which you will be helping this young couple get involved in intimate kissing while always making sure that the no one sees them kissing. The game can be played with the mouse.

desert-kissing-2.name: Desert Kissing 2
desert-kissing-2.description: Desert is the most romantic place. This young couple loves to spend time together in desert. But wherever they are, there are always people that people that prevent them to have a kiss. This couple is really in love with each other. Kissing in the public place is strictly prohibited make sure the people around them not to watch.

royal-love-cupid.name: Royal Love Cupid
royal-love-cupid.description: Tonight there is a ball in the royal palace, and tonight Princess Aurora is going to meet her prince charming for the first time. You and I know that they were destined for each other, but they don't know it yet. What kind of love is going to happen between them? Let the Love Cupid decide!

love-cupid.name: Love Cupid
love-cupid.description: Do you see this lovely young lady sitting all alone at the bar? And do you see the handsome boy staring at her, too shy to offer her a drink? These two need some Cupid's help! Mix five love ingredients to determine the type of love that is going to happen between them and shoot the Cupid's arrow!

kinder-garten-kissing.name: Kinder Garten Kissing
kinder-garten-kissing.description: Hey!!! The Kindergarten warden has given Lisa the responsibility to look after the babies for a while,surprisingly Lisa finds her boyfriend near to the place and makes love with him,now we have to make them enjoy their romantic kisses at the same time should keep an eye on the naughty babies from escaping help Lisa...have fun.

first-recording.name: First Recording
first-recording.description: Lara and her boyfriend Leoney are going to record their first every duet songs. Both of them are meeting on the stage after a long time and Leoney wants to kiss his beloved. Can you play the flirting games?

window-shopping.name: Window Shopping
window-shopping.description: Dorthy is going out for window shopping with her husband. She has requested you to take over her coffee shop management for today till she comes back and also asked one of you to help her exchange kiss with her hubby without being noticed.

four-seasons-kiss.name: Four Seasons Kiss
four-seasons-kiss.description: It is a new addicting kissing game where you will be able to spend romantic time with your sweetheart all over the year in all seasons. You can choose what season to play: summer, autumn, winter or spring, and start kissing while nobody is looking at you. But be aware of others who can notice you, because you will loose lives.

fairy-love-cupid.name: Fairy Love Cupid
fairy-love-cupid.description: This beautiful fairy and the handsome elf here are both lonely and looking for love. Why don't you help them fall in love with each other? In their magical lives a tiny love Cupid who can make these two lonely hearts beat together! Pick up five ingredients for the potion and let the magic happen!

rainy-big-dam-bridge.name: Rainy Big Dam Bridge
rainy-big-dam-bridge.description: As the weather is rainy today, Rebecca and Roberts are going to the big dam bridge for kissing and dating games. All you have to do is to see that when they are kissing no one should be there. Try!

secretary-kissing.name: Secretary Kissing
secretary-kissing.description: Jack is in love with his secretary, Julie, They both want to kiss each other, but unfortunately they are in the office, don't let people watch them while kissing, trick the people and start kissing. . . Use the mouse to start kissing, and don't let people watch them while kissing, trick them to return to their task and start kissing. . . . Solve all the 5 puzzles before the heart fills up fully to win the game. . . Have fun!!

scuba-lovers.name: Scuba Lovers
scuba-lovers.description: This is a puzzle and skill games for you gals and guys out there to solve. Help the lovers under water to kiss each other without being caught in a camera. Use all the skills you have in three stages of the game.

8-ball-pool.name: 8 Ball Pool
8-ball-pool.description: Ruben and Robert are lovers and they are playing the 8 ball pool game. Both are in different tables but they are also playing kissing and dating games. Help them to exchange kisses without being noticed.

bedroom-kissing-3.name: Bedroom Kissing 3
bedroom-kissing-3.description: The new lovers fall in love. They want to kiss each other in the girls bedroom, but there are many disturbance. please help to solve them and let lovers kissing all the time.

naughty-boy-kissing.name: Naughty Boy Kissing
naughty-boy-kissing.description: He is the most naughty boy around and kissing his 2 friends at the same time help him to have some good time.

neighborhood-kissing.name: Neighborhood Kissing
neighborhood-kissing.description: Woo…the girl next door is the hottest chic I have ever seen and on top of it she likes me… so I took this chance to kiss her, but unfortunately there are many distractions and I just have 60 sec to succeed. So please do help me to evade the trespassers.

baby-emma-at-dentist.name: Baby Emma At Dentist
baby-emma-at-dentist.description: Baby Emma has teeth problems and she must make a visit to the dentist cabinet. You will repair her teeth and make her a great smile with white and helthy teeths.

abigail-breslin-celebrity-makeover.name: Abigail Breslin Celebrity Makeover
abigail-breslin-celebrity-makeover.description: Abigail Breslin, one of the youngest teen actresses ever nominated for competitive academy award, is now looking forward to delivering a matured appearance in her next film. All she needs is a good makeover, a good selection of dress and a cool hairstyle that will suit her best.

hair-salon-game.name: Hair Salon Game
hair-salon-game.description: Fashionable hairstyles are a modern girl's pursuit. This salon is the right place to get one. There are lots of hairstyles, colours and decorations to choose from. A stylish girl is in sight! Have fun!

fashion-studio-ice-queen-outfit.name: Fashion Studio - Ice Queen Outfit
fashion-studio-ice-queen-outfit.description: Your fashion studio has an amazing new client today! You must design a new dress for this beautiful ice queen! Are you up for this challenge? Start creating the perfect winter outfit with 4 garments. Give them all a nice color and pattern and them cut and sew them up. Finally give this lovely snow princess a makeover by giving her a new hairstyle, crown, necklace and a pair of shoes. Have fun!

summertime-makeover.name: Summertime Makeover
summertime-makeover.description: Jillian is getting ready to go to the beach with her friends. Give her the perfect summertime makeover!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and give Jillian the perfect makeover!

teens-choice-awards.name: Teens Choice Awards
teens-choice-awards.description: You have been invited to the Teen's Choice Awards. . . Oh my god!!! You are going to see all your favorite teen celebrities!!! Justin Bieber, Selena Gomez, Miley Cyrus, and more! It is probably going to take you forever to get ready, so start early! First do your makeup and pick your favorite jewelry. And then find the perfect outfit! Tonight is going to be a good night!

frozen-elsa-fire-makeover.name: Frozen Elsa Fire Makeover
frozen-elsa-fire-makeover.description: Play this brand-new Frozen makeover game and help the gorgeous Snow Queen with her total transformation process which will turn her into a passionate Fire Queen. Use the right tools to change the color of her yes, hair and even the shade of her clothes. Do her make up, choose a more daring haircuts, dress her up as nicely as possible and make sure to pick the right accessories as well for a successful final look. Enjoy it!

last-minute-makeover-actress.name: Last Minute Makeover - Actress
last-minute-makeover-actress.description: This lovely celebrity has won an Oscar for best actress this year. She now has to go to the Academy Awards to receive her award but she is running a bit late because her limo is stuck in traffic. Can you give her a quick last minute makeover in the limousine? First give her a short facial treatment and then dress her up with a lovely outfit.

talking-angela-great-makeover.name: Talking Angela Great Makeover
talking-angela-great-makeover.description: Prepare to start playing this talking Angela makeover game and she will surely be happy to see that her look will be changed by someone with a great sense of fashion and style.

draculas-dentist.name: Draculas Dentist
draculas-dentist.description: Dracula family members needs your partnership to clean their teeth. Help Dracula family members to clean their teeth’s without much pain. This a new type of dentist game. This game contains four steps. Enjoy the game

santa-makeover.name: Santa Makeover
santa-makeover.description: Our Lovable santa has brought many gifts to give to children for Christmas. This is a day for santa claus to meet the children. Santa suppose to be cute and neat to impress the childrens. So he has come to parlour. Makeup him brightly and dress him to celebrate a chirstmas with childrens. Have a fun day with Cute santa.

santa-at-the-doctor.name: Santa At The Doctor
santa-at-the-doctor.description: Santa Claus had an accident while trying to enter the chimney to leave presents for good kids. He slipped and suffered a few scratches and bumps, you must heal them before christmas so he can go and and deliver the presents in good time.

santa-claus-beardy-makeover.name: Santa Claus Beardy Makeover
santa-claus-beardy-makeover.description: Santa Claus needs your help, girls! Because he had to prepare all the presents and double check the list, he forgot to groom himself and now he looks a bit of a mess. Maybe you could help him restore his great jolly looks with a special Christmas makeover, can you?

ever-after-high-madeline-hatter-makeover.name: Ever After High Madeline Hatter Makeover
ever-after-high-madeline-hatter-makeover.description: Madeline's hair is curly and comes in three colors: dark turquoise, light turquoise and purple. She has bright blue eyes and light skin. And her main fashion motif is tea. But today she wants to have a complete makeover. Can you help her out? First give her some facial care and then choose a new outfit. And don't forget to select some new makeup!

zendaya-coleman-makeover.name: Zendaya Coleman Makeover
zendaya-coleman-makeover.description: Accept the challenge of being gorgeous Zendaya Coleman's beautician and personal stylist and get her the fabulous, stunning look that will help her stand out from the crowd of beauty goddesses on the red carpet today! Start with the skin perfecting ritual, then do your best to enhance her radiant beauty with a sophisticated, polished make-up look and keep in mind to help her select the stylish haute couture evening dress that will put her right into the spotlights, as well!

rosa-mistica-spa.name: Rosa Mistica Spa
rosa-mistica-spa.description: In this game you have to take care of Rosa, to help her look perfect! First, we must take care that her face and body look perfect, and then we will find a suitable makeup for her. Finally we find the right outfit for her to look fabulous. Good luck and have fun with Rosa!

mercy-beach-spa.name: Mercy Beach Spa
mercy-beach-spa.description: In this game you have to take care of Mercy. After a week of work, Mercy needs an oasis of relaxation on the beach. After you have applied several masks and creams on the face, you need to get the makeup and her clothes. You have to choose something suitable for a day at the beach and she will be very happy. Good luck!

sassy-curls.name: Sassy Curls
sassy-curls.description: Gorgeous, natural curls have always been a problem for those girls with straight hair! They simply couldn’t find the right tools or the needed hair styling products that could help them flaunt the most beautiful, long-lasting curls! DressUpWho’s personal stylista took some time to try out different methods and now her top three favorites feature our brand-new hair game for girls called ‘Sassy Curls’! Are you ready to find out how to make some stunning curls on your own?

frozen-elsa-tattoo.name: Frozen Elsa Tattoo
frozen-elsa-tattoo.description: Frozen Elsa decided to add a bit of fun to her look, and she decided to make an amazing tattoo! She knows, that you’re the best tattoo artist in the kingdom, so she came to your salon. Create for her the prettiest tattoo ever!

spring-wedding-makeover.name: Spring Wedding Makeover
spring-wedding-makeover.description: Kate's wedding function is set in the springtime season. Can you match the correct spring wedding dresses and accessories for the wedding girl?

maid-rockstar.name: Maid Rockstar
maid-rockstar.description: You are working part time as a maid at your mom's friends house to earn some extra money. Lately it has been pretty boring. . . always cleaning and cooking. It is time to have some fun when you are in the house alone. Pretend that you are a rockstar! Pick up the mic, pick up a broom, a comb, anything! Sing and dance your heart out!! Weeeee!

alice-in-wonderlands.name: Alice In Wonderlands
alice-in-wonderlands.description: Alice in wonderland, Alice is invited to the magical party by his wonderland friends. She wants his traditional dresses and makeover back. Give her a new look through your magical makeover and fit out the nice traditional dresses

selfie-makeover.name: Selfie Makeover
selfie-makeover.description: This lovely teen has a big, big crush on that new cute boy in her class and she's planning to win his attention (and hopefully his heart, too), with a breathtaking selfie! Help her look stunning during her fun photo shoot, pulling off the perfect make-up look to enhance her natural beauty with and a stunning, dazzling fashion look to sweep him off his feet with, as well!

make-up-studio-glitter-eyes.name: Make-Up Studio - Glitter Eyes
make-up-studio-glitter-eyes.description: This girl is going to a glamorous cocktail party and she needs your help for the perfect eye make-up. She knows you are the best beauty guru in the world and that's why she came to your make-up studio. First start off with a good skin prep. Then choose the right color combinations to achieve the perfect glitter eyes. And finally you must help her out with a lovely dressup.

baby-elsa-butterfly-face-art.name: Baby Elsa Butterfly Face Art
baby-elsa-butterfly-face-art.description: Baby Elsa is such a restless inventor! Today she decided to celebrate a butterfly holiday. So, all the preparations are ready and now it’s time for the most fun part - face art! Help Baby Elsa to make the most beautiful Butterfly Face Art ever!

talking-tom-great-makeover.name: Talking Tom Great Makeover
talking-tom-great-makeover.description: This is a great makeover game with Talking Tom and you will surely find some awesome stuff around to make him look great. Do not forget to wear some stylish accessories as well.

maleficia.name: Maleficia
maleficia.description: You'd better live up to this witchy queen's expectations, as her make-up artist, for she's really revengeful, you know! Step into her spooky kingdom and, scanning through her make-up case and spectacular fantasy wardrobe, too, get her a new Gothic-glam, dark-fabulous look!

frozen-anna-spa.name: Frozen Anna Spa
frozen-anna-spa.description: Anna is the sister of the ruling queen and as a princess that never found out her sister's secret about having special powers, Anna always felt a bit left out and in search for love. She is seeking affection mostly from her sister, but she also dreams about a fairytale love. Maybe a frozen spa day will relax her! Olaf will be your assistant while playing this fun Spa Game so the fun is guaranteed. Have a blast!

christmas-prom-makeover.name: Christmas Prom Makeover
christmas-prom-makeover.description: Would you help this charming teen girl steal all the spotlights at her prom ball, right on Christmas Eve? Pick the perfect, jaw-dropping haute couture dress for her, style it up with some fancy heels and a lovely corsage and then upgrade her prom beauty queen look with a gorgeous make-up look and a picture-perfect hairdo, as well!

fabulous-back-to-school-hairstyles.name: Fabulous Back To School Hairstyles
fabulous-back-to-school-hairstyles.description: Step in getting this brand-new hairstyling game started and first of all prepare Lina’s hair for the fun styling part. Wash it with a delicate cleanser, use a nourishing conditioner and a hair mask too… this way you will obtain the right, glowing look for her hair. Great job, ladies! Now check the three different hairstyles she picked for this special occasion, have her try all of them by following the step-by-step instructions and then feel free to pick the one you find more appropriate. Enjoy it!

pony-dental-care.name: Pony Dental Care
pony-dental-care.description: Our cute pink pony needs to visit a dentist, it will be his first visit to a dental cabinet. The dentist will help him recover and have healthy teeth again. Take care of pinkie pony teeth.

hand-doctor.name: Hand Doctor
hand-doctor.description: This hand looks just horrible. Do you think something can be done to fix it and look pretty again? I desperately need your medical skills, so help me out.

baby-emma-hair-care.name: Baby Emma Hair Care
baby-emma-hair-care.description: Welcome to our first "Baby Emma game"! It's time for Caring Carol to give baby Emma a nice hair care. First she needs to wash her hair. But Emma doesn't like water so you need to calm her down with some of her favorite toys. In the next step you will need to cut and dry her hair to give her a lovely new haircut. And finally you will have to dress up Emma with her favorite clothes.

trendy-braces.name: Trendy Braces
trendy-braces.description: Would you help this teen sweetie turn her new braces into her new chic key accessory, that one that will upgrade and take her look out of anonymity? Then scan through all these fabulous braces and come up with the perfect make-up look, hairstyle and stylish accessories for complementing each one of them with!

anna-frozen-hairstyles.name: Anna Frozen Hairstyles
anna-frozen-hairstyles.description: Unlike her sister Elsa, Princess Anna is very cheerful and happy-go-lucky. She is all about fashion and style. A new hairstyle for each event for her is a must. And tonight a big ball is going to take place in the Frozen Palace! Anna wants her hair to look amazing. Will you style her up?

debby-princess-makeover.name: Debby Princess Makeover
debby-princess-makeover.description: Debby princess is attending a big prom, but she is not sure about her looks. She needs your help! Make Debby a true beauty by starting with makeup. Clean her face with facial cleanser, then apply facial beauty mask. Continue with makeover products and hairstyling. You need to clean her hair first, then choose the skin colour, eye colour, eye shadow, eye makeup and lipstick for her. Finish it with your personal touch of clothing, accessories and various decorations. . . Come on! Have fun!

ellen-degeneres-show-makeover.name: Ellen DeGeneres Show Makeover
ellen-degeneres-show-makeover.description: Ellen DeGeneres is hosting a show tonight and she wants a new look for her show. Can you give this celebrity television host a makeover that makes her looks smart and stylish? Use various facial treatments to get her that makeover she deserves. Have fun!

princess-and-baby-hairstyle.name: Princess And Baby Hairstyle
princess-and-baby-hairstyle.description: Princess Catherine came again to your royal hair salon. Look, she brought her daughter Sandra for the first time! I'm sure, you will have no problem styling Catherine's hair, but little Sandra is afraid of scissors. Give her toys to distract her while creating a pretty hairstyle for baby princess.

sofia-the-first-great-makeover.name: Sofia The First Great Makeover
sofia-the-first-great-makeover.description: Sophia the First is looking for someone that can help her in this princess makeover game and you will need to try and give her a totally new look that she can be proud of.

new-look-makeover.name: New Look Makeover
new-look-makeover.description: Candy is tired of her bad look. She want to be a new one!Well, now please help her makeover and choose the best style for her. Could you give her a wonderful makeup?

lovely-autumn-makeover.name: Lovely Autumn Makeover
lovely-autumn-makeover.description: Fall is here, and it's time to bundle up in scarves, jackets, and sweaters! Give Lana a lovely makeover to get ready for fall!Instruction: Use your mouse to click the categories and dress up Bella!

halfling-tycoon.name: Halfling Tycoon
halfling-tycoon.description: Halfling Tycoon is a game that has a unique farming concept and strong management game elements. Here you have to go around exploring, interactive and making the correct moves to get richer little by little. You will need to think and act smartly in order to be successful. Your ultimate objective during the game play will be to become a tycoon.

grepolis.name: Grepolis
grepolis.description: Are you ready to conquer the Olympus following in the footsteps of Ulysses, Achilles and the Greek heroes? A tiny settlement in ancient Greece awaits its new leader to develop it into an empire and take on the world!

wheely-7.name: Wheely 7
wheely-7.description: Wheely 7 is a game in which the red buggy will be carrying out an investigation. You as a player of this game must help the red buggy move through each area solving the puzzles by manipulating the things in the surrounding in the correct way. The levels keep getting difficult as the game play goes on.

mario-match.name: Mario Match
mario-match.description: Help Mario match 3 or more identical color items to clear the board as fast as you can before times up.

zombie-tormentor.name: Zombie Tormentor
zombie-tormentor.description: Why kill these dumb zombies when you can torment them? Torment the Bieber lookalike zombie.

p-cat.name: P-Cat
p-cat.description: A fun and exciting puzzle game with cat and dogs. Help the cat grow and don't let the dogs catch it. Click and hold the left mouse button to make the cat grow. Release to stop.

fish-clix.name: Fish Clix
fish-clix.description: Clear groups of matching fish to score big before the board fills up!

glowy-stonys.name: Glowy Stonys
glowy-stonys.description: Mosaic style tetris with glowing stones

mahjong-christmas-puzzles.name: Mahjong Christmas Puzzles
mahjong-christmas-puzzles.description: This is a Christmas theme Mahjong game where you need to solve some Mahjong boards. Click 2 Identical Items to remove them from board. The both items must have 2 adjacent sides open. It means that item should not be blocked by any other item from its left top sides or right top sides or left bottom sides or left top side.

math-balloons-addition.name: Math Balloons Addition
math-balloons-addition.description: A combination Match 3 game and an addition game rolled into one. Use your addition skills to remove balloons to make groups of same colored balloons. Make matches over all of the colored squares to complete a level.

hypertube.name: Hypertube
hypertube.description: Elevate yourself into the sky by dropping balls onto the turning cylinder to match 3 or more of the same color in this 3D action puzzler. Choose between the normal game with levels, or the Survival mode!

pyramid-solitaire-ancient-egypt.name: Pyramid Solitaire: Ancient Egypt
pyramid-solitaire-ancient-egypt.description: Help Pharaoh build the spectacular pyramids of Ancient Egypt in this atmospheric pyramid solitaire game.

square-breaker.name: Square Breaker
square-breaker.description: Square Breaker is a simple, yet challenging puzzle game where you eliminate blocks to get the high score. When the bar is filled twice, you get a coin that can help you in later levels.

fly-away-rabbit.name: Fly Away Rabbit
fly-away-rabbit.description: Remove the blocks and help the rabbit rest peacefully on the cloud.

doodle-physics.name: Doodle Physics
doodle-physics.description: Use all shapes to build a stacked stable construction and keep its balance. Two shapes of the same color will explode on contact. Red dotted shapes have an anti-gravity property.

chick-cannon.name: Chick Cannon
chick-cannon.description: A physics based puzzle game, Get the chick into the coop by firing rocks from your cannon

easter-physics.name: Easter Physics
easter-physics.description: Easter themed physics game. Get the eggs to fall into the baskets of the same color.

flipping-fantastic.name: Flipping Fantastic!
flipping-fantastic.description: Flip and spin on pegs with your wand through the field of obstacles. Object of the game is to arrive safely to the goal peg and gain as many bonus points within the time given. There are 25 levels with 3 different modes of difficulty Easy, Normal and Hard. It would just be Flipping Fantastic if you could beat all the levels and get the highest score possible

hall-of-arts-9.name: Hall Of Arts 9
hall-of-arts-9.description: Hall of Arts 9 challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a cool painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Hall of Arts 9!

sharpshooter-jerry-2.name: Sharpshooter Jerry 2
sharpshooter-jerry-2.description: Jerry is a sharpshooter, he had a pistol. He used a Tom bubble to shooting practice, hit all the Tom bubble can pass. Instruction:Only Click the mouse.

jewel-crush.name: Jewel Crush
jewel-crush.description: Jewel Crush is a game of match 3. All you have to do is clear the field of gems and don't let them reach the top. Score double points in the red zone. HaveFun.

minions-bubble-shooter.name: Minions Bubble Shooter
minions-bubble-shooter.description: The Minions where a big hit in the movie Despicable Me. Here is your chance to play with them in this bubble shooter game. Aim the arrow to burst the matching Minion characters, in order to burst the bubbles you will need at least three of the same characters. Compete with your friends and family in this high score game.

are-you-stupid.name: Are You Stupid?
are-you-stupid.description: Think outside the box to solve 50 puzzles and 20 achievements to get. Test how stupid you are. Not seriously taken :p

cheese-barn.name: Cheese Barn
cheese-barn.description: The mouse is hungry! Can you help him get his favorite cheese? Play a fun puzzle/mind game.

fish-net-matching.name: Fish Net: Matching
fish-net-matching.description: These little cute fishes have been trapped in an electronic net!Match at least 3 or more of the same fishes to save them off the electronic net. Match for more bonuses. You have to make 60 successful moves to reach next level. Each Level will give you an additional 3 minutes with the new fish in the net! The 4th Level has total 8 different fishes.

shape-matcher-2.name: Shape Matcher 2
shape-matcher-2.description: The sequel to the popular swap and match game Shape Matcher has arrived! Once again you'll have lots of challenging levels to complete, as you line up the gem stones and break the grey and black blocks and chains. Hours of fun guaranteed!

party-at-the-zoo.name: Party At The Zoo
party-at-the-zoo.description: Those cute animals at the zoo are planning a cool find the difference themed party today and you're their guest of honor! You won't decline their invitation, will you, and you will do your best to be the life and soul of this party, impressing them all with your great skills as a detective, spotting all those differences hidden in each one's cage in no time, right?

art-villages-spot-difference.name: Art Villages Spot Difference
art-villages-spot-difference.description: Spot 7 difference between two images of the art villages.

large-insects.name: Large Insects
large-insects.description: Many worms dropping from roof, they are running to the cake, use your hammer hit them, and protect the cake.

my-uncles-farm.name: My Uncle's Farm
my-uncles-farm.description: Uncle Steve invited me over to his farm and asked me to help him out with his plans to renovate. This place is a mess! There's a lot of work to do so I'd better get started.

cheese-barn-levels-pack.name: Cheese Barn Levels Pack
cheese-barn-levels-pack.description: Be nice, help a hungry mouse. New levels of the successful game "Cheese Barn"

room-expedition-3.name: Room Expedition 3
room-expedition-3.description: Room Expedition 3 challenges you to find 130 hidden objects scattered across a hotel room. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Hurry up to get all 3 stars and bonus points!

bike-stunts-hidden-letters.name: Bike Stunts Hidden Letters
bike-stunts-hidden-letters.description: Bike Stunts Hidden Letters is a game of genre puzzle. Choose one of three images and start to play. Try to find all 26 letters and have fun.

toilet-success.name: Toilet Success
toilet-success.description: Needing the toilet is a natural thing, but what if there are obstacles on your way? hurry before it will be too late. . .

farm-clix.name: Farm Clix
farm-clix.description: Here is a game of match 3. All you have to do is click on 2 or more pieces of fruit to clear the grid, but remember, its a race against time to clear the grid before the time runs out or the fruit reaches the top of the grid.

candy-shooter-2.name: Candy Shooter 2
candy-shooter-2.description: Candy Shooter 2 is an action-based puzzler that puts players to the task of tossing colored candy up to a stack of other colored candy. You need to clean the candy off the field. Just point the mouse to where you want the next candy to go, and if three or more of them came together.

garbage-collection-hidden-numbers.name: Garbage Collection - Hidden Numbers
garbage-collection-hidden-numbers.description: Collect the numbers hidden in the garbage for points in Garbage Collection - Hidden Numbers, a hidden object game by HiddenObjectGames. TV

doeo.name: Doeo
doeo.description: Touch all of the Doeos before the time runs out.

escape-from-mazenstein.name: Escape From Mazenstein
escape-from-mazenstein.description: Find your way through the Labyrinth as soon as possible, remember to pick up the key first.

black-widow-solitaire.name: Black Widow Solitaire
black-widow-solitaire.description: Classic Spider Solitaire game variation. This game has 4 different suits. Try to get cardson the tableau in sequence down from King to Ace and with the same color. Such a sequence isthen removed. You can move single cards or sequences (independent of color) on the tableauif it creates a new valid sequence down (independent of color). You can click on the stock(top left) to get new cards on the tableau.

mario-physics-puzzle.name: Mario Physics Puzzle
mario-physics-puzzle.description: Help Mario collect all the gold coins in this addictive and fun physics puzzle game!

super-mario-puzzler.name: Super Mario Puzzler
super-mario-puzzler.description: An action-puzzler where you have to swap picture pieces to restore Mario's pictures

where-is-my-puppys-belt.name: Where is My Puppys Belt
where-is-my-puppys-belt.description: Where is My Puppy's Belt is another new hidden objects and escape game.

good-fish-bad-fish.name: Good Fish bad Fish
good-fish-bad-fish.description: There are Good Fishes and Bad Fishes, Good Fishes must survive!Slice the obstacles to leave the good fishes in the water while bad fishes should not! There are 20 fun filled levels and 4 badges to achieve!

room-expedition.name: Room Expedition
room-expedition.description: Room Expedition challenges you to find 130 hidden objects scattered across a hotel room. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Hurry up to get all 3 stars and bonus points!

mate.name: Mate
mate.description: A great physics puzzle, get the mates together. Protect the mates from bees and other enemies. Click the objects and try to get the mates together. Click the green to grow and click red to shrink. Help the mate to find his partner. Move the mouse to shoot bees, click on objects to solve puzzle.

patrick-wedding-jigsaw.name: Patrick Wedding Jigsaw
patrick-wedding-jigsaw.description: In Patrick Wedding Jigsaw there are four difficulty modes to choose from. Easy, which provides a puzzle with 12 pieces, medium with a puzzle of 48 pieces, hard with a puzzle of 108 pieces, and finally expert, a grandiose puzzle containing exactly 192 pieces. There is a time limit, but if you want an experience that is a bit more relaxing, you can remove it.

valentines-day-special-spot-the-differen.name: Valentines Day Special Spot The Difference
valentines-day-special-spot-the-differen.description: In this game you get to see a romantic couple set in several different scenes, each one harder than the next! Your job is to find the differences in each scene, some are in one picture and some are in the other. Concentration skills and a keen eye are what you need to play this game girls and I know you all rock, so I know you can do it!

blocks-and-stars-2.name: Blocks And Stars 2
blocks-and-stars-2.description: Not your usual match three game.

naruto-bubble.name: Naruto Bubble
naruto-bubble.description: Shoot the Naruto balls at the upper falling balls to make at least 3 of a kind in order to clear each level.

cheese-collection.name: Cheese Collection
cheese-collection.description: Cheese Collection is another point and click hidden objects game.

tnt-zombies-arsenal.name: TNT Zombies: Arsenal
tnt-zombies-arsenal.description: The zombies are back and ready to be blown up again. Use new TNT to defeat new zombies in even more challenging levels in this installment of the TNT Zombies series. 28 exciting, dynamic physics-based puzzle-levels with comic style graphics, dynamite explosions and funny zombie characters. Control: Mouse

angel-of-the-battlefield-2.name: Angel of the Battlefield 2
angel-of-the-battlefield-2.description: The rabbit is back for more! Help him save the wounded pilots and take them to the doctor's tent

cardmania-golf-solitaire.name: Cardmania Golf Solitaire
cardmania-golf-solitaire.description: Enjoy 30 levels of golf solitaire, in this stunningly simple, addictive card game with a fun theme. There are also three difficulty levels to pit yourself against.

snow-white-see-the-difference.name: Snow White See The Difference
snow-white-see-the-difference.description: Find differences in five pictures of Snow White and her friends. The picture on the left is the original and the picture on the right will have five differences. Find all five differences in five levels to win the game.

cat-around-asia.name: Cat Around Asia
cat-around-asia.description: Help a hungry cat!Our cat travels around the world and now he got to Asia, help him get his favorite food.

mystery-iq-test.name: Mystery IQ Test
mystery-iq-test.description: You wake up in a mysterious place without a clue how you got there. Were you abducted, or are you stuck in a twisted mind game?

bejeweled-goat.name: Bejeweled Goat
bejeweled-goat.description: By matching three or more of the same kind to eliminate background color. You can click on a group or swap the position of the two to match the jewels. When all of the background color were eliminated, the key needs to be put into the hole.  Click the  Rotate button to rotate the panel.

dream-exit.name: Dream Exit
dream-exit.description: Dream exit is a cute puzzle and brain game where you have to help the little characters to get their dreamed exit along several levels.Use the different arrows and paths to find the best way to save all the characters.

thomas-transport-differences.name: Thomas Transport Differences
thomas-transport-differences.description: Find all differences between two pictures with Thomas transport. Your job is to find five differences at each picture for 2 minutes. If you wrong five times the game will over for you. On T button on your screen you can turn off the time meter. Try to pass all five levels fastest as you can. Enjoy!

skeletons-extermination.name: Skeletons Extermination
skeletons-extermination.description: Two popular physics games in one, Slicing and Destroying. Easy control , click drag to slice, hold space+mouse click to explode. 30 mind draining levels. Cartoon graphics.

cut-the-monster.name: Cut the Monster
cut-the-monster.description: No one likes monsters, therefore, we give you a chance to cut them using lasers!

despicable-me-2-find-the-differences.name: Despicable Me 2 - Find The Differences
despicable-me-2-find-the-differences.description: Find the differences in three different levels in this Despicable Me 2 Game. You can use hints, can you do it before time runs out?

grabacat.name: Grabacat
grabacat.description: Drag and drop cats and match 3 or more of the same color, vertically or horizontally. Free all caged cats in Levels mode or beat your own high score in Endless game. Use your mouse to play Grabacat.

bubble-shooter-halloween.name: Bubble Shooter Halloween
bubble-shooter-halloween.description: On the occasion of Halloween, FreeMatch3. com brought to you a complete '2 in 1' pack of bubble shooter game. In regular mode you will be able to play a challenging and funny bubble falling escape match with 4 different powerups. In puzzle mode you will be able to play 12 different challenging levels. Just select your favorite mode and start celebrating Halloween with your favorite Bubble Shooter!!

tom-and-jerry-hidden-alphabets.name: Tom and Jerry Hidden Alphabets
tom-and-jerry-hidden-alphabets.description: Analyze your power of observation by finding out the alphabets in this image of Tom and Jerry. For each accurate click, score will get increased and for wrong click, score will get reduce.

grav-escape.name: Grav Escape
grav-escape.description: Mr. Bunny was captured and given experimental gravity controlling powers by an evil corporation! Try to escape from the confines of the mad science laboratory and discover the truth!Controls are visually covered in the beginning of the game, which includes moving with the arrow keys, and jumping with space. When encountering gravity, you can also reset gravity to normal with S.

orbox-c.name: Orbox C
orbox-c.description: Bounce orbox from block to block to get to the exit or complete other missions. Excellent puzzle game when you want some mind challenge! Move in 4 directions. What's the catch? Orbox will keep move untill it hits the wall. Sounds simple? It starts simple but every level will be more difficult and intresting!

frozen-clix.name: Frozen Clix
frozen-clix.description: Classic match two game with Frozen theme! Click on matching items to score points

balloons-match.name: Balloons Match
balloons-match.description: Balloons Match is a classic match-3 game like Bejeweled. Make the all tiles black to clear levels. Challenge against time to get highest score!.

toetrix.name: Toetrix
toetrix.description: Toetrix is a fast-paced simple puzzle with unique gameplay, simple control and hundred challenging level. In order to complete the level, you must slide all circles to the right places and form a box. Collect all stars and get all golden trophies from the game!

spheres.name: Spheres
spheres.description: A physics based match style game with two modes where you destroy spheres for points. Use the mouse to aim and shoot at spheres within the containment tank.

toon-clix.name: Toon Clix
toon-clix.description: Classic match two game with toon theme, click on matching items to score points!

2014-halloween-spot-difference.name: 2014 Halloween Spot Difference
2014-halloween-spot-difference.description: Magic spot difference games with 5 levels. Spot 7 differences between the two pictures of the 2014 halloween.

spongebob-the-rock-star-puzzle.name: SpongeBob The Rock Star Puzzle
spongebob-the-rock-star-puzzle.description: Click Shuffle and start the game. Then drag the pieces into right position with your mouse. When you a done you will get a nice picture of SpongeBob as rock star. You can choose one of four modes to play.

angry-birds-pigs-out.name: Angry Birds Pigs Out
angry-birds-pigs-out.description: Angry birds are still mad at green pigs who stole their eggs, so they decide to make a final victory in the air this time!

hidden-pokemon.name: Hidden Pokemon
hidden-pokemon.description: There are three levels. Find all the hidden Pokemons in these pictures before time runs out to advance to the next level!

planet-adventure.name: Planet Adventure
planet-adventure.description: Discover the amazing world of Planet adventure! In this epic journey you will need to guide 4 little heroes through 45 levels. Use abilities of the heroes to obtain every key and unlock the exit. Controls: Arrow keys or WASD - move. Space - use ability. Tab - change hero. R - reset.

hidden-challenge-4.name: Hidden Challenge 4
hidden-challenge-4.description: Help the lazy cat collect all 125 hidden objects in order to clean the room. The cat threw a party while its owners were away and made quite a mess. Now you need to make the room look like nothing happened. Hurry up and find the items as fast as you can to get a high score in Hidden Challenge 4!

indian-mahjong.name: Indian Mahjong
indian-mahjong.description: Discover India Culture playing this mahjong game. The game includes large set of numbers and letters symbols, your goal is to clear the playing area of tiles by matching pairs in the shortest time possible.

valentines-day-memories.name: Valentines Day Memories
valentines-day-memories.description: Valentine's Day is fast approaching and you can just tell love is in the air! Why don't we also get in the mood girls by playing this fun love memory game. Turn over the pretty cards to find items belonging to Valentine's Day, then try and find another to match it, each level becomes harder and harder as you match up the pairs. I wonder how far you can go, I hope your memory skills are up to scratch!

elemental-balance.name: Elemental Balance
elemental-balance.description: Explode bombs to burn wood with fire and rust metal in water. The Fire, Sky, Water, and Earth worlds feature unique gameplay elements for a total of 48 addictive and challenging levels.

word-quest.name: Word Quest
word-quest.description: The future of the letters rests on your hand!Choose your letters and rely on luck! With letters at hand create as many as you can within 90 seconds! Each word created will increase a limit! The longer the words you give the higher your score will be! Go for highscores!

quad-bubble-extreme.name: Quad Bubble Extreme
quad-bubble-extreme.description: Quad Bubble Extreme a new kind of Bubble Shooter from Bit of Game! Pop the bubbles with clicking on them, try to click as fast you can before all tubes are full and the level stops!

pandesal-boy.name: Pandesal Boy
pandesal-boy.description: Help a jinxed bread peddler (Pandesal Boy) retrieve his buns thendeliver them to his clients' houses by rearranging platforms, handling cannons, dodging ghosts, controlling clones, avoiding poison spits, and defeating the fearsome cause of it all.

furries-revenge.name: Furries Revenge
furries-revenge.description: Help the Furries knock down all the bees and take back the forest.

apartment-match.name: Apartment Match
apartment-match.description: Stack floors on both sides and match 3 or more of the same apartements to remove them.

crazy-eights.name: Crazy Eights
crazy-eights.description: Classic card game for 4 players. Be the first to discard all of your cards. If it is your turn take a card from the closed stack or place a card on the open stack. You can only place a card on the open stack if the color or number match with the top open card. An 8 can be played on any card and you can choose the color.

king-of-the-swamp.name: King Of The Swamp
king-of-the-swamp.description: Your task is to eliminate the frogs in the swamp to be able to become The King Of The Swamp. Use your slingshot to wreck down the structures the frogs built.

daydream-forest.name: Daydream Forest
daydream-forest.description: Daydream Forest challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a spectacular painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Daydream Forest!

ice-penguin.name: Ice Penguin
ice-penguin.description: The Penguins are captured in ice cubes. Can you free them all? Connect all cubes via horizontal, vertical or diagonal lines only. Click on a cube to start.

fruit-flip-mahjongg.name: Fruit Flip Mahjongg
fruit-flip-mahjongg.description: Flip the tiles and remove all fruit. Combine 2 of the same free tiles to remove them. A tile is free if it is not covered and if it has at least 1 free side (left or right).

mahjong-rain-of-tiles.name: Mahjong Rain Of Tiles
mahjong-rain-of-tiles.description: It is raining tiles. Combine 2 of the same visible mahjong tiles te remove them. Avoid new tiles raining down my matching more then the indicated within the time limit.

bubble-shooter-exclusive-level-pack.name: Bubble Shooter Exclusive Level Pack
bubble-shooter-exclusive-level-pack.description: A magnificent Bubble Shooter game with deluxe levels design. Each level is a new challenge. Shoot bubbles into clusters of bubbles of the same color.

daydream-forest-2.name: Daydream Forest 2
daydream-forest-2.description: Daydream Forest 2 challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a spectacular painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Daydream Forest 2!

hex-match.name: Hex Match
hex-match.description: Connect 3 or more of the same hexes. Try to remove all dark backgrounds from the game to advance to the next level.

kings-klondike.name: Kings Klondike
kings-klondike.description: Klondike Solitaire game with hidden cards and 2 decks. Try to move all cards to the 8 foundations on top. Foundations need to be stacked from Ace to King. On the tableau you can place cards in descending and alternating order. Click on the stock (left) to get a new open cards.

potion-magic-extended.name: Potion Magic Extended
potion-magic-extended.description: Match three game with three game types and a lot of special potions. No ads, no external api and no misleading links.

despicable-me-2-find-the-hidden-letters.name: Despicable Me 2 - Find The Hidden Letters
despicable-me-2-find-the-hidden-letters.description: Find the hidden letters in the Despicable Me 2 image. Can you do it before time runs out?

cool-cars-spot-difference.name: Cool Cars Spot Difference
cool-cars-spot-difference.description: Magic spot difference games with 5 levels. Spot 7 differences between the two pictures of the cool cars.

mushroom-clix.name: Mushroom Clix
mushroom-clix.description: Mushroom Clix is a new addicting puzzle game. Find similar mushrooms and with one click explode them!

man-of-steel-find-the-differences.name: Man Of Steel - Find The Differences
man-of-steel-find-the-differences.description: Find the differences in three different levels in this Man Of Steel Games. You can use hints, can you do it before time runs out?

mr-spilbox.name: Mr. Spilbox
mr-spilbox.description: Funny platformer about Mr. Splibox. He can split himselfand create spliboxes who help him in his adventures!Controls:AD or Arrow key - moveW or Up - create cloneS or Down - Remove last cloneM - muteR - restartP - pause

rustled-jimmies.name: Rustled Jimmies
rustled-jimmies.description: The gorilla meme is now an online game!

catwoman-spot-the-numbers.name: Catwoman - Spot The Numbers
catwoman-spot-the-numbers.description: Remember Catwoman from the Movies? Michelle Pfeiffer played Catwoman in Batman Returns in 1992 and Halle Berry had her own movie as Catwoman in 2004 but most recently Anne Hathaway appeared in the movie The Dark Knight Rises, well here is a Catwoman Spot the Numbers game with an image from each of these movies. Do your best to Spot the Numbers in this Catwoman numbers game.

aeolus-shift.name: Aeolus Shift
aeolus-shift.description: Fill up the darkest squares with the colored cubes. Color is Infectious, some squares will only be satisfied by certain colors. Activate buttons with boxes or crates to activate gates. Push about crates with your boxes. Gravity Zones will push you about. Use the mouse to create 100's of small colored boxes which you can then move about with the WASD or Arrow Keys.

ninja-turtles-find-the-differences.name: Ninja Turtles - Find the Differences
ninja-turtles-find-the-differences.description: Help the Ninja Turtles to figure it out the differences between the Images. Play the 3 levels and use the hints if you think is too difficult.

satellite-landind.name: Satellite Landind
satellite-landind.description: This is a Physics and strategy game where your task is to make sure the Satellite lands correctly in the platform. Destroy the geometric forms in the right order to complete each of the 40 different levels.Collect the 3 stars on all levels to finish the game.

flooded-village-xmas-eve.name: Flooded Village Xmas Eve
flooded-village-xmas-eve.description: Dig a river through the village to grow Christmas trees and help the pirates set sail! During the Xmas Eve and under strong influence of the heavy snow, lots of pirate ships stayed docked, making their crew unable to enjoy and celebrate Christmas. Good for them that you can dig a hole or two and guide the water to help the pirates set sail!

wake-up-dad.name: Wake Up Dad
wake-up-dad.description: Wake Up Dad, I'm hungry! Help baby teddy and his dad collect honey in the forest. Solve funny puzzles, run ladders, jump on the catapult.

room-expedition-2.name: Room Expedition 2
room-expedition-2.description: Room Expedition 2 challenges you to find 130 hidden objects scattered across a hotel room. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Hurry up to get all 3 stars and bonus points!

funny-animals-match.name: Funny Animals Match
funny-animals-match.description: An addictive little puzzle game especially for animal lovers! Swap the different animals. Switch the animals around to match them up in rows or columns of three or more.

assembots.name: Assembots
assembots.description: A modern take on a classic puzzle game. You must guide you robots from their work place back home to safety after a long shift at work. You must use the robots skills in engineering to bash through wall, blast through rock, dig down through earth, bridge over ravines an swim through oceans in order to save them.

roll-the-monster.name: Roll The Monster
roll-the-monster.description: Exciting and funny physical puzzle where you have a goal – to roll road monster with road roller.

gogo-eat-fruit.name: Gogo Eat Fruit
gogo-eat-fruit.description: The gorilla is hungry and needs to eat fruit, or he would be out of mind. Then gogo will be in danger. Let's get as many fruits as we can to feed him!

express-train.name: Express Train
express-train.description: This is a fun and challenging train puzzle game, in which your goal is to fix the train tracks and route the trainto various stations. You have 30 quick levels of progressively increasing difficulty to solve. Watch the timer and Have Fun!

dino-home.name: Dino Home
dino-home.description: Two dinosaur live happily in the forest. They gave birth to a dinosaur egg. However, one day, they went out for searching food and their baby was STOLEN! Go get it!

oh-my-candy-level-pack.name: Oh, My Candy! Level Pack
oh-my-candy-level-pack.description: This little hamster loves candies. You should push them through different puzzles to feed this candy-lover. This is a levels pack to the original Oh, My Candy.

catch-the-bones.name: Catch The Bones
catch-the-bones.description: Help Jack and Jessie collect all the bones and return to their doghouse!

billiards-bubble-shooter.name: Billiards Bubble Shooter
billiards-bubble-shooter.description: Bubble Shooter Billiards style, Shoot the balls and create groups of 3 or more of the same balls to remove them. Each level adds another ball, so play fast.

iceland-puzzle.name: Iceland Puzzle
iceland-puzzle.description: An addictive little puzzle game especially if you're Iceland lover! Swap the different iceland animals.Switch the animals around to match them up in rows or columns of three or more.

physics-fall.name: Physics Fall
physics-fall.description: Get the Bold as fast you can to the Fan so it repairs. Use wood boards to repair the track and Nitro arrows to move faster. Make sure you spend not to long on solving because you earn Stars for your time.

museum-hall-hidden-objects.name: Museum Hall Hidden Objects
museum-hall-hidden-objects.description: Find all the hidden objects in this  Museum Hall room.

flowers-match-3.name: Flowers Match 3
flowers-match-3.description: Addicting and fun bejeweled like game. Swap flowers to make rows or columns of three of a kind.

room-expedition-4.name: Room Expedition 4
room-expedition-4.description: Room Expedition 4 challenges you to find 130 hidden objects scattered across a hotel room. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Hurry up to get all 3 stars and bonus points!

winter-blocks.name: Winter Blocks
winter-blocks.description: Winter-themed puzzle game. Click on blocks to remove them.

go-home-block-3.name: Go Home Block 3
go-home-block-3.description: The poor little cube boy wants to go home! Can you accompany him?

pokemon-crazy-story-link.name: Pokemon Crazy Story Link
pokemon-crazy-story-link.description: Match pairs of similar pictures by either clicking two adjacent, or two which have a free path between them.

save-the-dummy-holidays.name: Save The Dummy Holidays
save-the-dummy-holidays.description: Save The Dummy is back again with holiday theme. Even the dummy has to get into tricky situations in these holiday season. So get the poor dummy out of its bonds and release him in all kinds of 25 levels of physics puzzles. Click on the red objects and other gadgets to get the dummy in each level off of the screen.

coca-cola-truck-jigsaw.name: Coca Cola Truck Jigsaw
coca-cola-truck-jigsaw.description: Coca Cola Christmas truck is the most popular truck at this time of the year. At this truck jigsaw game your job is to solve the pieces at right place and to get the image of Coca Cola Truck. Choose your mode to play and click Shuffle. Watch on time meter, but if you need more time you can always turn off the time meter.

chickens-come-back.name: Chickens Come Back
chickens-come-back.description: Hen is so careless that leaving her eggs outside. There are many dangers, so the hen needs to find them and take them home.

soccer-puzzle-game.name: Soccer Puzzle Game
soccer-puzzle-game.description: Soccer Puzzle Game Football edition: games for kids 5 five years old and over. Are you a fan of FIFA or football soccer? We bring a brand new soccer puzzle challenge for you and your friends. Show your passion for soccer and sports and solve this football soccer puzzle in a record time. Share your results with your best friends. This is a free football game to play. Enjoy it!

mercedes-truck-hidden.name: Mercedes Truck Hidden
mercedes-truck-hidden.description: At this game choose your favorite picture of Mercedes Truck and try to find all 26 hidden letters. Your time is limited but you have enough time of 5 minutes to find them all.

rio-and-kong-hidden-alphabets.name: Rio and Kong Hidden Alphabets
rio-and-kong-hidden-alphabets.description: Can you find all 26 of the hidden letters in this picture?

match-my-jelly.name: Match My Jelly
match-my-jelly.description: The goal of this game is to get a red jelly by getting two of the same number next to each other and add them together. Match My Jelly is played on a simple 4x4 grid and there are 4 types of jellies: violet, green, yellow and red. The score is displayed in the upper-right part of the screen and it starts at zero and is incremented whenever two jellies of the same number combine. Pay attention that when there aren't any legal moves left (no empty spaces and no adjacent similar jellies), the game ends.

shape-grid.name: Shape Grid
shape-grid.description: Place the shapes onto the grid and create groups of 4 or more of the same color. Use the space bar to rotate the current shape

alien-killer.name: Alien Killer
alien-killer.description: Shoot the aliens save the world. Throw grenades and launch rockets. All sorts of mechanisms to help you.

mario-back-home-2.name: Mario Back Home 2
mario-back-home-2.description: Mario Back Home 2 -- Mario and Louis is outside and lost. Clear the obstacles and help them back home. It is a funny physics game.

ibrain-box.name: IBrain Box
ibrain-box.description: You need to pay attention to this game while playing because it can go fast. Can you guess how many blocks are on the table?

mario-mirror-2.name: Mario Mirror 2
mario-mirror-2.description: Mario Mirror 2 , has more monsters . It is a mario funny game. The game use the mouse to click and adjust the direction.

jim-loves-mary.name: Jim Loves Mary
jim-loves-mary.description: This is a story about true love between Jim and Mary! Help them to meet each other on every of 20 fun levels. The game can be played by 2 players on one keyboard.

facebookeria-level-pack.name: Facebookeria Level Pack
facebookeria-level-pack.description: Shoot Mark Zuckerberg and feed greedy capitalists with equities and money! This is a level pack to the original Facebookeria game.

warfare-1945.name: Warfare 1945
warfare-1945.description: In the Second World War, the Nazi weapons are very advanced, so the Union Army sent a spy to perform a task，and the task is to destroy the enemy's new tanks. Controls:click the mouse.

spongebob-hidden-letters.name: SpongeBob Hidden Letters
spongebob-hidden-letters.description: In SpongeBob Hidden Letters each picture contains a 26 hidden letters, and there is a total of three pictures for you to make your choice from. When you find a letter, simply click on it. There is a time limit of 300 seconds for each image, however you can choose to turn it off if you want to take it a bit more relaxed. Have Fun!

hall-of-arts-2.name: Hall Of Arts 2
hall-of-arts-2.description: Hall of Arts 2 challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a cool painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Hall of Arts 2!

berts-brain.name: Berts Brain
berts-brain.description: Enlighten Berts Brain, in this brainy, tile rotating puzzle game. Bert needs help to get his old grey cells working at a higher level. Direct the energy charges to Bert's brain. Connect all 4 nodes to the power to electrify Bert's brain to clear each level!Click to rotate a tile.

find-your-valentines-gifts-hidden-object.name: Find Your Valentine's Gifts Hidden Object
find-your-valentines-gifts-hidden-object.description: I get excited near every Valentine's Day girls as I wonder what little sweet gifts I will get! But I have to confess, sometimes I'm bad and cave in to the temptation and I start rummaging around to see if I can find anything! I think this game must of been specially made for me and if you're also like me girls then playing this game might satisfy our need to find our own gifts! Have fun searching around for those extra special presents!

bubble-matcher.name: Bubble Matcher
bubble-matcher.description: A great aqua themed bubble match 3 plus game. Contains worldwide high score integration for the kings and queens of bubble shooters. This game is for all ages and a great way to pass time. The goal is to clear all bubbles from the screen. Do this by matching 3 or more bubbles of the same color. You add bubbles by shooting them from beneath. If you fail to match bubbles more bubbles are add to the field. The game ends when the bubbles reach the bottom or all bubbles are cleared.

pretentious-game-4.name: Pretentious Game 4
pretentious-game-4.description: Award winning sequel is here with a fourth chapter. This time its about the divorced childrens experience and how the love between a brother and sister is a never fading fact. Help them both accomplish this chapter together.

diamond-crown-build.name: Diamond Crown Build
diamond-crown-build.description: Diamond Crown Build is another point and click hidden objects and mind game.

polly-folds-amazing-toys.name: Polly Folds Amazing Toys
polly-folds-amazing-toys.description: This time Polly has a really good idea how to have fun! She found a book on origami and now she’ll make them on her own! A swan, a plane, a boat! Wow! Let’s help her to make and decorate paper toys.

princess-rapunzel-hidden-objects.name: Princess Rapunzel Hidden Objects
princess-rapunzel-hidden-objects.description: Play a relaxing flash princess hidden objects of Tangled online.

animals-connect-3.name: Animals Connect 3
animals-connect-3.description: Connect all animals 2 by 2 and remove all animals. You need to connect 2 of the same animals with a 1 line with no more then 2 angles of ninety degrees.

tarantula-solitaire.name: Tarantula Solitaire
tarantula-solitaire.description: Classic Spider Solitaire game variation. This game has 4 different suits. Try to get cards on the tableau in sequence down from King to Ace and with the same color. Such a sequence is then removed. You can move single cards or sequences (in color: red or black) on the tableau if it creates a new valid sequence down (independent of color). You can click on the stock (top left) to get new cards on the tableau.

oh-my-candy-players-pack.name: Oh, My Candy! Players Pack
oh-my-candy-players-pack.description: This little hamster loves candies. You should push them through different puzzles to feed this candy-lover.

spongebob-squarepaints-jigsaw.name: SpongeBob Squarepaints Jigsaw
spongebob-squarepaints-jigsaw.description: This time we offer you a picture of SpongeBob Squarepants, and he is happy again. Choose your mode to play and just click shuffle. Then put all pieces of image at right place to get the image of SpongeBob Squarepants. Your time is limited but you can turn off the time whatever you want. Enjoy at this jigsaw game.

z-infect.name: Z-Infect
z-infect.description: Turn the world upside down and help Zombies reach their target. . . (Humans of course) In this funny puzzle game that will make your head spinning. Dodge spikes, avoid pits and blow up explosives as you infect all humans.

goat-love-candy.name: Goat Love Candy
goat-love-candy.description: In this game, he want to eat delicious candy, but before eating , he have to pave the road. Come and help him eat candy!

paint-world-2-monsters.name: Paint World 2 - Monsters
paint-world-2-monsters.description: Help the good paint guys save their world from the bad monsters

starspop.name: StarsPop
starspop.description: StarsPop is fun collapse game with a twist. Actually the whole game is twisted.

hidden-clubs.name: Hidden Clubs
hidden-clubs.description: This game belongs to the genre of hidden objects, where to you need to find all hidden clubs. Find out the hidden object in the specified images. Each level has 16 hidden object. Use the mouse and keep clicking on the image to find hidden object. You have a 3 minutes of each image. If you make a mistake 5 times, the game will be over. Button with the letter T uses to turn off time. Have fun!

all-in-one-mahjong.name: All-in-One Mahjong
all-in-one-mahjong.description: Mahjong is an addicting solitaire game where player is challenged to eliminate all pieces from the board. Two game modes:• Time mode (with shuffle ability, match all pairs as soon as possible)• Score mode (no shuffle, play until you win or lose)42 different layouts!Global leaderboard with people playing all over the world. Big selection of backgrounds.

steampunk.name: Steampunk
steampunk.description: Your objective is to place the good heroes on the saving surface, and to throw out the bad heroes by destroying the wooden boxes and bombs etc.

city-numbers.name: City Numbers
city-numbers.description: Search and find all the numbers hidden on the city images. Click all numbers as fast as possible. Use the hint button to reveal numbers you can't find.

blocks.name: Blocks
blocks.description: Tetris-like puzzle game. Drop down blocks and match the lines horizontally or vertically. A line of 3 or more in length is removed and also empty blocks are removed. You control the game with the arrow keys (move and rotate) and the space bar (keep pressed down to let the blocks fall).

toys-hidden-alphabet.name: Toys Hidden Alphabet
toys-hidden-alphabet.description: Can you find all the letters of the Alphabet? Get a higher score by finding the letters faster.

mahjongg-memory.name: Mahjongg Memory
mahjongg-memory.description: Train your memory in this Mahjongg and Memory Game. Combine 2 of the same tiles to remove them. Click on a tile to reveal it. The faster you remove the tiles the higher your score.

hexmatch.name: HexMatch
hexmatch.description: Relaxing hexagonal match 3 with colorful tiles.

ancient-rome-mahjong.name: Ancient Rome Mahjong
ancient-rome-mahjong.description: Discover Ancient Rome and the famous spots in this Mahjong Solitaire game. Combine 2 of the same free tiles to remove them from the game. A tile is free if it's not covered and if it has at least 1 free side (left or right).

3-keys-solitaire.name: 3 Keys Solitaire
3-keys-solitaire.description: Variation on the classic Tripeaks Solitaire Game. Try to unlock the special keys to get more open cards to play on. Remove cards by selecting cards that are 1 higher or 1 lower in value then the open card(s) (top right). Click on the stack (top left) to get new open cards. Move a joker to the open cards to use it.

treasure-sweeper.name: Treasure Sweeper
treasure-sweeper.description: P. Booty has got his hands on a stolen treasure map. Find all the treasures hidden on the island before he gets caught! Treasure Sweeper is a minesweeper game with a twist. Instead of tagging mines, you dig treasures. Retrieve all the treasures before time runs out to win. Can P.Booty count on your help?

merry-xmas-hidden-objects.name: Merry Xmas Hidden Objects
merry-xmas-hidden-objects.description: HoHoHo! This is Santa here! I need a break from all the present deliveries and what better way than to play a little hidden object game boys and girls! I have hidden a ton of fun presents around this beautiful festive room all you need to do is to find them all within the time limit of five minutes! Do you have what it takes to beat Santa's fun object game!?

coach-vs-players.name: Coach Vs Players
coach-vs-players.description: A day of soccer practice with a strict coach and mischievous players! Cause trouble, pull pranks and have fun by irritating the coach in each funny point and click level. How many clicks will it take you to win the game?

christmas-fun-spot-the-difference.name: Christmas Fun Spot The Difference
christmas-fun-spot-the-difference.description: Play Christmas Fun Spot The Difference and find 100 differences in all 3 levels find them as fast you can to make maximum score.

monster-wake-up.name: Monster Wake Up
monster-wake-up.description: Hover over the platforms to make them either solid or not. Make quick switches to guide the monster to the sleeping monster in this physics based

hidden-journey-3.name: Hidden Journey 3
hidden-journey-3.description: Hidden Journey 3 challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a cool painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Hidden Journey 3!

bull-blast.name: Bull Blast
bull-blast.description: Place your bombs carefully, then detonate them to destroy the evil bulls - but watch out, because you don't want to hurt the cute little piggies, do you?!

lollipop-craze.name: Lollipop Craze
lollipop-craze.description: Use your Mouse and physics skills to help our cute boy reach his lollipop. Avoid fire and deadly sharp objects on his way to craziness.

parking-hooligan-2.name: Parking Hooligan 2
parking-hooligan-2.description: In this crazy parking game you have to destroy everything! do not leave any tree standing or any car with no hits.

astrodigger.name: Astrodigger
astrodigger.description: This is an arcade/puzzle game where you collect diamonds on levels. You can dig only down, never up.Spend your score to buy temporary upgrades and protective suits in a shop. Collect precious minerals for additional score.

fanged-fun-players-pack.name: Fanged Fun Players Pack
fanged-fun-players-pack.description: This is a puzzle physics based game. Change shape of colored fanged figures to help them to get to the corresponding platforms.

note-match.name: Note Match
note-match.description: Connect a line of three or more identical figures to reduce them. Use bonuses to increase the points, gained from reducing of lines or for getting the extra time. There are two game modes appearing of new figures.

kolorz.name: Kolorz
kolorz.description: Switch colors and use your brain to find your way through 20 colorful levels. Collect as many stars as possible to increase your score and unlock new achievements.

smart-birds.name: Smart Birds
smart-birds.description: Help the birds unlock nesting boxes with magic lanterns. Place birds on screen so all the locks are highlighted to complete level.

flappy-chicken-3d.name: Flappy Chicken 3D
flappy-chicken-3d.description: Control the chicken and jump , jump! Jump over the pipes, our friend wants to be free. . . to infinity and beyond!

my-big-friend.name: My Big Friend
my-big-friend.description: Wondeful quest where you control a little man with rounded head. Your hero has to help Big Green Dragon return to his homeworld. Solve puzzles, collect crystals and travel in time to find way to help friend.

candy-thieves.name: Candy Thieves
candy-thieves.description: Beware of candy thieves! These two cute creatures are really hungry and now they are heading to candy factory to steal bunch of sugar candies. Help them to eat enough candies across 25 interesting puzzle levels.

match-daft-birds.name: Match Daft Birds
match-daft-birds.description: There are lots of daft birds around your house. They are cute but also noisy! Clear these birds by swapping them!

the-pirates-booty.name: The Pirate's Booty
the-pirates-booty.description: Play Pirate's Booty and help the pirate find his treasure, this is the best most fun filled pirate game that you will play for a long time to come.

magic-well.name: Magic Well
magic-well.description: A funny crazy water-physics game. Defend the Magic Well from colorful invaders! Click on groups of monsters with three or more creatures of the same color.

caribbean-beach-escape.name: Caribbean Beach Escape
caribbean-beach-escape.description: A crew of people was celebrating the party in a beach and late after the party a person has locked inside the beach resort. They could not find the ways to escape from the beach resort.  Help him to find the clues and object to open the doorway.

halloween-escape-2014.name: Halloween Escape 2014
halloween-escape-2014.description: Immediately you have to move from here and want to go to the Halloween Party? Just find the hidden objects and secrets using Skill and puzzle.  Escape and enjoy!

tractor-differences.name: Tractor Differences
tractor-differences.description: You have 60 seconds for each level. You get 10 points for every correct click and you lose 8 points for every wrong click.

triple-mahjong-2.name: Triple Mahjong 2
triple-mahjong-2.description: A mahjong solitaire game with a twist. Combine three instead of 2 of the same mahjong tiles to remove them from the game. You can only combine free tiles. A tile is free if it is not covered and has at least 1 free side (left or right).

happy-easter-spot-difference.name: Happy Easter Spot Difference
happy-easter-spot-difference.description: Magic spot difference games with 5 levels. Spot 7 differences between the two pictures of the happy easter.

bubble-shooter-valentine.name: Bubble Shooter Valentine
bubble-shooter-valentine.description: This is a classical Bubble shooting game where you need to get a match of three same colored hearts

2048-game.name: 2048 Game
2048-game.description: In this sliding puzzle game 2048, you need to combine two tiles with the same number. Try to create a tile with the number 2048! Use your arrow keys to move the tiles.

bubble-dropper.name: Bubble Dropper
bubble-dropper.description: This time the bubbles stack at the bottom of the ocean. Launch and match the right bubbles from the top toward the ocean floor. The goal is to clear all bubbles from the screen. Do this by matching 3 or more bubbles of the same color. You add bubbles by shooting them from the top. If you fail to match bubbles more bubbles are add to the field. The game ends when the bubbles reach the top or all bubbles are cleared. Try to set a new high score.

back-in-time-2.name: Back In Time 2
back-in-time-2.description: Join Daniel on his journey back to the '90s in order to get his revenge on the famous boy band that kicked him out a long time ago.

raptor-taxi-jigsaw.name: Raptor Taxi Jigsaw
raptor-taxi-jigsaw.description: At this jigsaw game we offer you are image with popular Raptor Truck as Taxi. Your job is to choose the mode to play and to get all pieces at right place. You need to get the picture of Raptor Taxi before time is out. If you need more time just click on T button and the time will be disabled. Click Shuffle and enjoy at the game.

monster-concentration.name: Monster Concentration
monster-concentration.description: Match pairs of monsters by clicking on two cards, one at a time, to reveal the monster they contain. Keep concentrating to know where the matching pairs are and try to complete the level as quickly as possible. Three difficulty levels featuring a variety of monsters, zombies and scary Halloween monsters!

legend-of-crazy-monk.name: Legend of Crazy Monk
legend-of-crazy-monk.description: There will be 5 differences between two pictures, find them out in a limited time!

fruit-connect.name: Fruit Connect
fruit-connect.description: In this game there are a lot of our favorite fruit, now let's destroy it!Use the left mouse button, click the same two pictures, with three straight lines together can eliminate.

flat-mahjong.name: Flat Mahjong
flat-mahjong.description: Flat Mahjong is a simple designed game that features 10 challenging levels with increasing difficulty. The game is easier than the classic mahjong games because you can also collect pieces that are near each other. Make the highest score possible by finishing levels as fast as you can! All levels are unlocked from the beginning and you can play them in what order you want.

haunted-house-tours.name: Haunted House Tours
haunted-house-tours.description: Take a tour inside the haunted house of The Great Cormac, but once you're in, you'll need to solve Cormac's riddles in order to get out.

harley-davidson-jigsaw.name: Harley Davidson Jigsaw
harley-davidson-jigsaw.description: Collect all pieces in right place to get the picture of Harley Davidson motor bike. Choose your mode to play and click shuffle. Finish the game before time is out. If you need more time, turn off the time meter.

turbo-find-the-hidden-letters.name: Turbo - Find The Hidden Letters
