turbo-find-the-hidden-letters.description: Find the hidden letters in the Turbo image. Can you do it before time runs out?

monsters-university-find-the-differences.name: Monsters University - Find The Differences
monsters-university-find-the-differences.description: Find the differences in three different levels. You can use hints, can you do it before time runs out?

the-lone-ranger-hidden-numbers.name: The Lone Ranger - Hidden Numbers
the-lone-ranger-hidden-numbers.description: Find the hidden numbers in the image. Can you do it before time runs out?

disaster-will-strike-2.name: Disaster Will Strike 2
disaster-will-strike-2.description: The power of destruction is in your hands! Create earthquakes, landslides, viruses and other crazy disasters to destroy all the eggs in each level.

mouse-house.name: Mouse House
mouse-house.description: Little mouse can not get to the cheese. Help the mouse! Be careful, because the cat guards the last piece of cheese! Wisely create and remove shelves, use air bubbles, forks, trampolines and many other things to deliver the cheese to the little mouse!

weirdo-xmas.name: Weirdo Xmas
weirdo-xmas.description: Play your favorite game Weirdo in this Christmas season. Shoot the weirdo with your cannon to complete each level. Collect stars to score high points. Have a merry Christmas!

transmorpher.name: Transmorpher
transmorpher.description: Find the way to escape from laboratory, use your ability to change shape and abilities...

cookie-needs-jam-2.name: Cookie Needs Jam 2
cookie-needs-jam-2.description: Freshly baked cookie is looking for some jam to become complete. Help them unite! Remove the crisps and other tasty things that are in they way with your mouse. Easy!

submarine-escape.name: Submarine Escape
submarine-escape.description: Being a Marine Engineer you started traveling into sea for a trip. After a long travel,submarines gets repair so you cant move further escape from the submarine. Try to collect the appropriate objects need to escape the submarine.  Lets see if you have it what it takes to escape from this dark submarine.

mechanical-prince.name: Mechanical Prince
mechanical-prince.description: Mechanical Prince lived in a peaceful planet. But the greed of the enemy launched a war on the planet. The prince is determined to protect his planet, so he dived into the enemy's ship to blow up the engines. The prince can rely on only his magic arm which can emit magnetic force. You can help him to install bombs in the right place?Control:W/A/D to moveUse mouse to Control emit magnetic force

leaf-blower-madness.name: Leaf Blower Madness!
leaf-blower-madness.description: This place is such a mess! Use your trusty leaf blower to strategically displace all of the leaves! But watch out! This is much more than your ordinary daily chore.

tractor-hidden-numbers.name: Tractor Hidden Numbers
tractor-hidden-numbers.description: Find all hidden numbers in this sweet tractor game. You have to find 20 numbers to complete the game. Have fun!

cover-orange-journey-pirates.name: Cover Orange Journey Pirates
cover-orange-journey-pirates.description: The Journey continues! Protect your Pirate oranges from the acid rain.

spider-freecell.name: Spider Freecell
spider-freecell.description: Spider Freecell is a combination of Spider Solitaire and Freecell Solitaire. Move all cards to the 4 foundations top right from Ace to King. Build in descending order on the tableau. Only sequences in alternating color can be moved. Use the four freecells top left to temporarily store cards.

red-warrior.name: Red Warrior
red-warrior.description: Hey, warrior! Do you expect to free up your friends! Use your skill with mirrors to complete levels. Make crazy jumps, climbing walls, solve puzzles and more! One of the best platform games and Puzzle of the year! with lots of fun guaranteed through 20 awesome levels.

teddy-match-3.name: Teddy Match 3
teddy-match-3.description: Teddy Match 3 is a modern match 3 game based on teddies as the matching item. You will find quite challenging new levels in this game. A cool high score recording feature will increase the challenge for this game.

deluxe-block-matching.name: Deluxe Block Matching
deluxe-block-matching.description: Deluxe Block Matching is a high scoring game where you will destroy the adjacent similar blocks by clicking on them. There will be many power-ups which will help you in critical situations.

letter-pop.name: Letter Pop
letter-pop.description: Welcome to Letter Pop! A fun puzzle game where you need to click away the letters the computer is asking you.

mathdoku.name: Mathdoku
mathdoku.description: Can you solve this double puzzle game? Set your own difficulty and train those brains!

path-finding-match-3.name: Path Finding Match 3
path-finding-match-3.description: This is a unique match 3 game where you will get the pair of match 3 items by shifting them from one location to another. First click an item to select it, and then click blank tile to shift the selected item to that tile. Shift the items in order to create a horizontal or vertical row of 3 identical items. There must be non diagonal path between the clicked blank tile and selected item. Use as less moves as possible for more score.

spook-house.name: Spook House
spook-house.description: Evil real estate manager wants to sell the haunted house! Don't let her do that! Spook her away by interacting with haunted objects of the house and three cute ghosts living there. Thank you for helping out!

iron-robotic-sapper.name: Iron Robotic Sapper
iron-robotic-sapper.description: Disarm bombs by dropping robot on them to clear the level with exploding chain reaction! Find new fun challenges while you progress in the game. Original physics-based puzzle with amazing graphics, fun gameplay and easy controls.

sweet-floyd.name: Sweet Floyd
sweet-floyd.description: Floyd likes sweet things. Use buttons, rockets to guide him to his cake.

gnome-garden.name: Gnome Garden
gnome-garden.description: Help the gnomes manage their garden through the seasons in this match 3 game. Use the mouse to play, click groups of at least 3 same colored tiles that connect with each other. Every season has different objectives.

tow-truck-letters.name: Tow Truck Letters
tow-truck-letters.description: Tow trucks are not very popular trucks between car drivers. This game is a great game that can be best described and categorized as a hidden object type of game. At this game your job is to find all hidden letters at one of three pictures. Choose the image you want and start to play.

the-end-of-the-sheep.name: The End of the Sheep
the-end-of-the-sheep.description: Black Wolf is evil-minded. This time, he secretly go to the sheep village and set many traps. He wants to eat all the sheep! Will he succeed? Your task is to use your intelligence and wisdom and make good use of props in the game so that the Black Wolf can eat the sheep.

a-bugs-life.name: A Bugs Life
a-bugs-life.description: Find all the hidden icon of the bug in this image of A Bug's Life the Movie.

king-rolla.name: King Rolla
king-rolla.description: With the help of his round belly, King Rolla is on an epic quest to rid his castle of....sheep!

despicable-me-2-see-the-difference.name: Despicable Me 2 See The Difference
despicable-me-2-see-the-difference.description: Find differences in five pictures of Gru, Margo, Edith, Agnes, the Minions and other characters in their second movie, Despicable Me 2. The picture on the left is the original and the picture on the right will have five differences. Find all five differences in five levels to win the game.

outrageous-garage-escape.name: Outrageous Garage Escape
outrageous-garage-escape.description: You have been Outrageous Garage and its locked by someone locked, You have to get out of here.Your mission is to escape from the garage. Come up with a clever escape plan. However, to do this, you'll need to gather some items and use those items in solving puzzles. Be careful when you do all the activities, the kidnappers are on guard outside the garage. This game will give you a garage experience and action.  Carefully plan out your escape from the garage room.

go-home-block-2.name: Go Home Block 2
go-home-block-2.description: The sequel for the 1. 2 million-hits game is here! Join again our little cube fellow in his quest to find a new home. The controls are pretty much the same but the puzzles are more challenging than ever. So, stay sharp, wear your thinking cap and prepare for problems along the way! Good luck and have fun!

droptheblock.name: DropTheBlock
droptheblock.description: Drop the block is a beautiful physics game. You control the magnet that moves the blocks. You need to place the blocks in the goal zone. As close you place bloсks to center more stars you get.

dora-differences.name: Dora Differences
dora-differences.description: We all love to play Dora games therefore we have a new game for you called Dora Differences. You will need to find all the differences between the 2 given pictures in order for the fiesta to begin. If you find yourself in trouble you can use the hint button after its charged. Enjoy and good luck finding all the differences.

rooms-of-art-2.name: Rooms Of Art 2
rooms-of-art-2.description: Rooms of Art 2 challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a cool painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Rooms of Art 2!

room-expedition-5.name: Room Expedition 5
room-expedition-5.description: Room Expedition 5 challenges you to find 130 hidden objects scattered across a hotel room. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Hurry up to get all 3 stars and bonus points!

cool-tractors-7-differences.name: Cool Tractors 7 Differences
cool-tractors-7-differences.description: You have 60 seconds for each level in this game. You get 10 points for every correct click and you lose 8 points for every wrong click. Enjoy!

nonogram.name: Nonogram
nonogram.description: Japanese Paint by Numbers game. Solve the puzzle and reveal an image. The numbers on top of columns or on the left of the rows indicate how many seried cells of the indicated color there are.

makeup-puzzle-game.name: Makeup Puzzle Game
makeup-puzzle-game.description: What do you say about a new puzzle game? We have prepared for you a new exclusive Makeup Puzzle Game. Step into our puzzle world to discover the great makeover tips and tricks. Te goal in this game is to make all the puzzles at each level. The theme of the puzzle game is gave by cool makeover games and makeup features. Every girl would love this game so hare it with all of your friends. Enjoy the game and have fun!

jewel-physics.name: Jewel Physics
jewel-physics.description: Roll, drop or push the beautiful diamond jewel into the gift box so it can be delivered to your loved one. Just make sure that jewel doesn't fall into the ground. If it does, it's game over. Try to beat all levels

easter-bunny-puzzle.name: Easter Bunny Puzzle
easter-bunny-puzzle.description: An addictive little puzzle game especially if you're easter lover! Swap the different easter objects. Switch the easter objects around to match them up in rows or columns of three or more.

no-halo-no-entry.name: No Halo No Entry
no-halo-no-entry.description: Cupido has been tasked with the mission of killing everything without a halo, that is invading the kingdom, No Halo No Entry. Free the trapped Angels and destroy the evil demons through 24 challenging levels, shoot them directly or use items to start a chain that will end in demon destruction, rolling balls with spikes and many other interactive objects will keep you on your toes throughout.

chevrolet-camaro-jigsaw.name: Chevrolet Camaro Jigsaw
chevrolet-camaro-jigsaw.description: Take part in this excellent puzzle game and relax yourself. Choose your mode to play and try to solve this puzzle before time is out. Complete the whole puzzle by placing the pieces in their right places. Turn the time of if you have problems finishing the puzzle with a limited amount of time. Only the better ones can play with the time limitation, so try to be one of those.

spot-the-differences-circus.name: Spot The Differences Circus
spot-the-differences-circus.description: Welcome to the circus!!! Our circus is very fancy and colorful. Let’s take a tour. Let’s see what all we have here at the circus. Make sure you see everything. And get ready to spot the differences.

pumpkin-matcher.name: Pumpkin Matcher
pumpkin-matcher.description: Pumpkin matcher is a great seasonal match 3 game. Match all the different colored pumpkins to score points. Your goal is to clear all pumpkins from the screen. Do this by matching 3 or more pumpkins of the same color. You add pumpkins by shooting them from the top. If you fail to match enough pumpkins more pumpkins are add to the field. The game ends when the pumpkins reach the top or all pumpkins are cleared. Try to set the high score.

toilet-success-3.name: Toilet Success 3
toilet-success-3.description: The nerds are paralyzed and their stomach is not in good condition! Bring out the good-samaritan in you and make them roll their way to the toilet!

my-little-pony-puzzle.name: My Little Pony Puzzle
my-little-pony-puzzle.description: Put together several Little Pony themed puzzles. Choose from 9 different Little Pony pictures and then solve the jigsaw puzzle.

sineas-farm-hidden-objects.name: Sinea's Farm Hidden Objects
sineas-farm-hidden-objects.description: The game which is called Sinea's Farm Hidden Objects is on the stage! It is awaiting you and allows you tou find the hiden objects. In the first part of the game, you need to find objects from the farming environment. To find a object, use your mouse which can be seen as lens and click on the object. When you find, you will get points. If not, you will get minus point.

find-the-pearl.name: Find The Pearl
find-the-pearl.description: Hi Friends, we are how here to test your concentration power. Hit up on the crab, which is having the pearl. Reach consecutive levels and earn more by betting. Have fun!

cute-dinosaur-rescue-lover.name: Cute Dinosaur Rescue Lover
cute-dinosaur-rescue-lover.description: In the game you have to break all the dinosaur eggs to help two people can come together, if you fail in game farms may be towed away balloons, can be taken to help two people can come together. Move your mouse to control possible orientations for the eggs you can shoot most accurately, pay attention to the next egg you can use.

candy-match-online.name: Candy Match Online
candy-match-online.description: Candy Match is a match-puzzle game. Make a row or column of three or more candy of the same type to make them disappear. Break all the candy in time to complete the level. You have 10 hard levels to past. You can move the candy by using the mouse to click and swap adjacent candy. Enjoy Candy Match. . .

little-candy-factory.name: Little Candy Factory
little-candy-factory.description: Sorry, we have removed all our games from this forum

hall-of-arts-5.name: Hall Of Arts 5
hall-of-arts-5.description: Hall of Arts 5 challenges you to find all 130 hidden objects scattered across a cool painting. Choose between 2 difficulty modes and collect all the lost items. The hard mode will give you more points for each found object. Enjoy Hall of Arts 5!

camp-nou-locker-room-escape.name: Camp Nou Locker Room Escape
camp-nou-locker-room-escape.description: Greetings! We have recently released an awesome game in our portal. Your users will love playing this game. We request you to take a look and add the game to your portal.  Find the game details below:  Name: Camp Nou Locker Room Escape    You are a Football player. While keeping your playing kits in the locker the door is automatically locked.Does not scare.You have an option to escape. Note the room keenly, at that place is some clues and traces are hidden. Some simple puzzles will guide you to fetch the keys.  Try it and escape freely! cubes-strategy.name: Cubes Strategy
cubes-strategy.description: Cubes Strategy is a point and click puzzle game that you should solve by turning the cubes green.

free-online-sudoku-online.name: Free Online Sudoku Online
free-online-sudoku-online.description: If you’re looking for a free to play Sudoku puzzle then they don’t come much better than this. With 3 difficulty settings for all levels of skill this brain game will really get your thinking and change with your ability.

ibrain-colour.name: IBrain Colour
ibrain-colour.description: Try in just a few clicks to make the whole board the same color.

qubilz.name: Qubilz
qubilz.description: Qubilz is a fun, challenging, physics-based puzzle game; in which your goal is to build a structure from a limited number of jello blocks... and then endure a pummelling from those devious black balls! Stack your tower as high as possible for an even better score, just make sure to make it as stable as you can; you might be able to build a tower, but there's no guarantee that it'll survive the rain if it's not structured properly!

maximum-frustration-2.name: Maximum Frustration 2
maximum-frustration-2.description: The sequel of a very frustrating and fun platformer. New levels, new graphics and a brand new level editor!

annebelle-room-escape.name: Annebelle Room Escape
annebelle-room-escape.description: Greetings! We have recently released an awesome game in our portal. Your users will love playing this game. We request you to take a look and add the game to your portal.  Find the game details below:  Name: Annebelle Room Escape    Unfortunately, you trapped in the way which is a monastery of Annebelle. That chick is trying to overtake you. When you lay out fire to that, then only it will be giving way to death. Now you can understand the clues and hints around the room to demand action.  Without fear burn the Annebelle and escape from the horrible room!   Game URL: http://www.eightgames.com/annebelle-room-escape  SWF: http://www.eightgames.com/games/files/Annebelle_Room_Escape01.swf  Thumbnail1: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/Annebelle-Room-Escape-200X250.jpg         Thumbnail2: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/Annebelle-Room-Escape-160X120.jpg  Thumbnail3: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/Annebelle-Room-Escape-120X90.jpg     Thumbnail4: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/Annebelle-Room-Escape-100X100.jpg  Thumbnail5: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/Annebelle-Room-Escape-180X135.jpg  Thumbnail6: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/Annebelle-Room-Escape-90X120.jpg  Thumbnail7: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/Annebelle-Room-Escape-150X150.jpg  Thumbnail8: http://www.eightgames.com/distribution/images/Annebelle-Room-Escape-250X250.jpg           Game Size:  900 (w) x 600 (h)  Keywords:Annebelle Room Escape,Eight Games,Escape Games,Room Escape Games,Skill Games,Puzzle Games,Boys Games.   Category: eightgames.com      eightgames.com@gmail.com     Use Mouse

wheely.name: Wheely
wheely.description: Help wheely to get to the race!

angry-birds-find-treasure.name: Angry Birds Find Treasure
angry-birds-find-treasure.description: In the Antarctic snow, there are many treasures in here. The angry birds came to the snow for find the treasure, let us to help the angry birds. Control:A/D/W/S or ←→↑↓ to move.

mahjong-in-the-garden.name: Mahjong In The Garden
mahjong-in-the-garden.description: It is a board game in which you have to remove all the items with 3 rules. 1. You can remove 2 Items at a time 2. Both Items must be identical 3. Either 2 adjacent sides of both items must be open.

ghoulia-yels-room-clean-up.name: Ghoulia Yels Room Clean Up
ghoulia-yels-room-clean-up.description: Monster Ghoul Ghoulia Yelps is not good at keeping her room in perfect order. She just leaves her belongings wherever she wants. Today, you are going to teach her how to clean up the room and the importance of cleanliness. Throw the unwanted things in the dust bin and arrange the rest of the things in the most suitable places. Have a great time playing this cleaning game.

school-bus-parking-frenzy.name: School Bus Parking Frenzy
school-bus-parking-frenzy.description: School Bus Parking Frenzy is a game in which you are hired to be a school bus driver. Drive around very carefully and get the bus parked perfectly in the designated parking spots in each level of the game. Do not hit other vehicles or people while trying to complete the parking tasks.

monster-trucks-rampage.name: Monster Trucks Rampage
monster-trucks-rampage.description: Monster Trucks Rampage is a monster truck driving game that has 20 incredible levels. The task in each level is to drive the monster truck to get across all the challenging areas overcoming all the hurdles on the tracks to safely reach the end. Crush the other vehicles under the huge wheels of your truck.

parking-lot-3.name: Parking Lot 3
parking-lot-3.description: Parking Lot 3 is a car driving game in which it is your responsibility to drive the cars to get them parked perfectly in the highlighted parking spots. Mind you that you will have limited time and you must complete the parking tasks within the given time and without letting the cars get damaged.

tg-motocross-3.name: TG Motocross 3
tg-motocross-3.description: TG Motocross 3 is an extreme bike riding game that features tracks that are extremely uneven. You will be required to ride your bike with very good balance to surmount all the hurdles on the tracks without losing balance to ultimately reach the end of each track. Completion of each level in minimum time will earn you maximum score.

moto-racing.name: Moto Racing
moto-racing.description: This is a bike riding game that you can play alone, play against your pal or play against the computer controlled rivals. In all the cases the task will be to ride the bike with very good control and speed to reach the end in first place or at least in least possible time.

car-eats-car-2-deluxe.name: Car Eats Car 2 Deluxe
car-eats-car-2-deluxe.description: Car Eats Car 2 Deluxe is a side scrolling driving and shooting game in which you will be driving an armored car through some of the most dangerous areas. You must eliminate all the zombie vehicles, surmount all the obstacles and avoid becoming victims of the zombie vehicles. The upgrades will prove to be helpful.

duck-life-3.name: Duck Life 3
duck-life-3.description: Play this unique online game in which the duckling must be helped to train hard and evolve correctly to eventually become the champion racer. There will be many in game options available to you during the game play but how well you use them is a thing that will make all the difference.

car-eats-car-2.name: Car Eats Car 2
car-eats-car-2.description: Car Eats Car 2 is a thrilling car driving game in which you drive your car to reach a land where there are mutant cars that will be looking to devour your car and devour you as well. You must escape the pursuers by driving through to the end of each area. Perform stunts, launch attacks, dodge attacks and most importantly avoid crashes during the drive.

police-pursuit-3d.name: Police Pursuit 3D
police-pursuit-3d.description: Police Pursuit 3d is an action packed car driving game in which you have to drive the police car to take out as many criminals as possible within the given time. Slam the vehicles of the criminals or grind them against the walls. Watch out because the roads will have many obstacles that you must avoid.

star-cars.name: Star Cars
star-cars.description: Star Cars is a fictional racing game that takes place in space. You can choose your hero from the given options and let the hero drive his unique car to get to the end as fast and safely. The hero can also be made to shoot and use turbo booster very effectively. There will be many things to collect and many obstacles to dodge during the speedy journey.

bike-champ-2.name: Bike Champ 2
bike-champ-2.description: Bike Champ 2 is a bike riding game in which you are not only going to be riding your bike to reach the end of each track within the given time but you are also going to be required to perform a lot of tricks and stunts during the ride.

king-of-drift.name: King Of Drift
king-of-drift.description: King Of Drift is the title that the champion of this racing event will earn for himself. Do you have it in you to earn this title? The tracks in the game have many turns and the competitors are seasoned drivers. You will have to drive your car as fast as possible to leave the other racers behind to be the first to cross the finish line on each track.

super-bike-gp.name: Super Bike GP
super-bike-gp.description: Super Bike GP is a bike racing game that has 9 different tracks on which you will be riding your bike to compete with other racers. Ride as fast as you can to try and be the first one to cross the finish line. The money that you earn from your participation can be spent on upgrading your bike.

violet-parking-dinosaurs.name: Violet Parking Dinosaurs
violet-parking-dinosaurs.description: Parking is hard in the prehistoric era too. Help Violet avoid pedestrians and dinosaurs across 25 challenging levels.

canyon-race.name: Canyon Race
canyon-race.description: Get behind the wheel of this amazing terrain car and start your great adventure racing in the legendary Grand Canyon of US. Drive it staying on the road and avoiding the sides as they will slow you down and you´ll lose precious time. Finish each lap in the shortest time possible and try to beat your previous time. Start the race and have fun!

ultimate-street-car-racer.name: Ultimate Street Car Racer
ultimate-street-car-racer.description: Choose one of three modified road cars to race down the drag strip and see if you have got what it takes in the Ultimate Street Car challenge. Wait for the green light, then use SPACE to accelerate and UP and DOWN arrows to shift through the gears. You’ll need to get your timing right to run the 1/4 mile Santa Pod drag strip in the shortest time possible. Total time is made up of Reaction Time to the lights and Elapsed Time of the run.

mad-trucker-2.name: Mad Trucker 2
mad-trucker-2.description: Upgrade your truck and make your way to your destination no matter what gets in your way, and don't forget to stop for food and gas! Try to set your own record in survival mode.

moto-trial-fest.name: Moto Trial Fest
moto-trial-fest.description: Show your skills and drive your motorbike through rough terrain in desert, at the mountains and even in the city. Keep balance, don't turn round and watch your head. The less you crash the higher score you will receive. Use boost to get over some obstacles.

thomass-trip-to-egypt.name: Thomas's Trip To Egypt
thomass-trip-to-egypt.description: Thomas drives to Egypt for a fortune adventure. Help him collect as many golden coins as possible!

cool-racing-2.name: Cool Racing 2
cool-racing-2.description: 'Fastest driver in the world' has a whole new meaning! Compete against the fastest of the fast. Practice, race and challenge the world or your Facebook friends. Controls 1: Arrow keys to drive; Up/Down - Accelerate/Decelerate; Left/Right - Turn; Controls 2: Left click to drive; Accelerate Steering - Car turns towards mouse pointer.

ben10-drift.name: Ben10 Drift
ben10-drift.description: Ben 10 has got himself a new cool ride, time to show what his car has got and drift it around the tracks, remember to knock over as many cones as you can to unlock the next level and gain a high score!

cars-3d-speed.name: Cars 3d Speed
cars-3d-speed.description: Check out this new 3D driving game! Test your driving skills in difficult levels. Collect coins to upgrade, avoid obstacles and other cars, keep your car undamaged in given time to win the game, enjoy!

thomas-the-train-s-trip-to-egypt.name: Thomas The Train's Trip To Egypt
thomas-the-train-s-trip-to-egypt.description: Take a ride with Thomas The Train to Egypt. Drive on a bumpy course and balance the train gently over and around the obstacles. User the arrow keys to maneuver.

thomas-training-the-southpole.name: Thomas Training The Southpole
thomas-training-the-southpole.description: Drive Thomas through bumpy tracks in the Southpole. Use arrow keys to control.

spongebob-motorbiker.name: Spongebob MotorBiker
spongebob-motorbiker.description: Help sponge bob get to the Finish. Collect all the crabburgers

death-delivery.name: Death Delivery
death-delivery.description: Death Delivery: In this game your task is to deliver loads from the helicopter to the arsenal. Travel the dangerous Mountain path, without losing your bomb! See how well you can drive the truck.

survive-the-night.name: Survive The Night
survive-the-night.description: Drive through a scary graveyard at night and try to escape the creatures that will attack you. Drive them over with your car and you will get points to your score. Use your arrow keys to control your car and the X key to activate turbo. Be careful not to crash, because the road will not be smooth. Your goal is to get at the castle in all nine levels. Have an amazing time!

truck-launch-maniac-2.name: Truck Launch Maniac 2
truck-launch-maniac-2.description: Upgrade and launch a monster truck off a ramp into a valley filled with obstacles in this sequel of the game which has been played more than 18 millions times.

red-driver-2.name: Red Driver 2
red-driver-2.description: Red Driver 2 is an amazing 3d racing game with 4 different game modes. There is a high score mode, nitro speed mode, crash test mode, and cone catch mode! There are 3 stages which include Miami, Bronx, and Chinatown. Buckle up and get ready for some extreme racing!

moto-trial-fest-2.name: Moto Trial Fest 2
moto-trial-fest-2.description: More new challenges await you. 20 new levels now even larger and more interactive. Complete them, get badges and enter the top moto trial racers ranking board.

uphill-rush-5.name: Uphill Rush 5
uphill-rush-5.description: Uphill Rush 5, Slide, ride, and gallop your way to the ultimate racing title!

mario-vs-zelda.name: Mario vs Zelda
mario-vs-zelda.description: It is a race between mario and zelda in a fantastic landscape.

batman-trail-ride-challenge.name: Batman Trail Ride Challenge
batman-trail-ride-challenge.description: Help this Super hero Batman ride his bike off the rough terrains for a spin.

test-drive-3d.name: Test Drive 3D
test-drive-3d.description: This here is a good old school car game in 3D. Will you be the one that wins the race?

cycling-challenges.name: Cycling Challenges
cycling-challenges.description: This is a fun challenging game in witch you are playing the role of a manger, your aim is to win the cycling tournament with the help of your animal friends, each race you win will give you money that you can use to upgrade your bike and win achievements along the way

shady-biker.name: Shady Biker
shady-biker.description: Get racing in shady biker, do you have what it takes as a dark rider? Do spins and tricks as you work your way to the end of each level. Get racing and show what you can do as a dark and dingy racer.

motorbike-feats.name: Motorbike Feats
motorbike-feats.description: Work your way through 12 action packed levels while performing crazy real life in air stunts on your motorbike! Each level will have a target of how many stunts and coins you need to collect before you are able to move onto the next!

skid-mk.name: Skid MK
skid-mk.description: Ladies & Gentlemen, start you engines! Buckle up and brace yourself for the most intense racing action you will find this side of sanity! Crazy tracks, freakish drivers and some of the grossest power-ups you have ever experienced. Its not just racing - its a way of life!

moto-x-dare-devil.name: Moto X Dare Devil
moto-x-dare-devil.description: Its time to perform some crazy stunts, get on your dare devil bike and show some dare stunts.

hulk-ride.name: Hulk Ride
hulk-ride.description: Hulk is prepared to smash everything and whatevercomes his way. Help him ride through the obstacles and reach his goal to finish the level.Collect the points on your way to score.

speedway.name: Speedway
speedway.description: See how fast you can complete 3 laps on a very curvey track.

hulk-truck-rush.name: Hulk Truck Rush
hulk-truck-rush.description: Help the Hulk drive his truck as he try to get away from the military General Thaddeus Ross who wants to destroy him.

london-taxi-madness.name: London Taxi Madness
london-taxi-madness.description: Try to reach the next checkpoint within the given time limit. Be careful as other cars will block you. As you progress the time for passing a waypoint will steadily decrease. Later in the game you will be able to pick up clocks which will add 5 seconds to your time. There are also turbo items on the track. Collect 3 of them to activate the turbo. Unlock secret cars if you are able to beat very high scores. While other taxi drivers may get bored you will certainly like your duty!

fuse-man-bike-ride.name: Fuse-Man Bike Ride
fuse-man-bike-ride.description: Take a ride on Fuse-Man Bike, cruise through 10 levels and complete for the best score, switch up your bikes for more power, run over the obstacles in your way. Don't crash or you will have to start the level again.

patrick-roadster.name: Patrick Roadster
patrick-roadster.description: Spongebob? NO its Patrick his show this time! In this crazy bike game with color full levels you are driving with Patrick thru Bikini Bottom across Octo his house and many other objects! Show us how fast you are and don't crash!

ragdoll-truck.name: Ragdoll Truck
ragdoll-truck.description: Your mission is to drive a few rookies to the camp. It's ok to throw and smash them, you can even drop them or run them over. The only point is to bring someone alive!

mustang-race.name: Mustang Race
mustang-race.description: Did you ever wanted to drive a Mustang? This is your chance! Jump in and have fun! But please bring the car back undamaged.

2-players-challenge-racing.name: 2 Players Challenge Racing
2-players-challenge-racing.description: Get ready for a 2 Player Challenge game, this car game is a mix between a racing and drifting car game. Can you beat the AI's and your friend?

stuck-in-traffic.name: Stuck in Traffic
stuck-in-traffic.description: Get ready for the biggest challenge ever. This game will test your parking skills and your patience. Park your car in very busy traffic!

3d-taxi-racing.name: 3D Taxi Racing
3d-taxi-racing.description: A 3D taxi racing game with cool tracks and different game types. Start driving in an amazing 3D race game, beat the opponents and win the races. Unlock new tracks in the career mode.

midnight-racing.name: Midnight Racing
midnight-racing.description: Choose your favourite car, and then modify it and beat your opponents!

spiderman-super-bike.name: Spiderman Super Bike
spiderman-super-bike.description: Spiderman is testing his brand new super bike, Help spider-man to test his super ride speed and do not crash spiderman super bike collect all the web power-up and make a high score.

flintstones-fun-ride.name: Flintstones Fun Ride
flintstones-fun-ride.description: Join Fred in The Flintstones Fun Ride, cruise through 10 levels to complete the game. Say Hi to his friends like Barney, Dino, Betty and Wilma on your way and watch out for the obstacles in your paths. Use the left and right keys to tilt up and down and maintain balance and get over large obstacles.

beetle-showoff.name: Beetle Showoff
beetle-showoff.description: We know you love Beetle cars, so why not race them?Choose from a wide selection of shapes and colors and customize to your desires, and then see which one is the best.

army-race.name: Army Race
army-race.description: Race with your army truck and push your driving skills to the limit!

formula-legend.name: Formula Legend
formula-legend.description: Race around the 3D tracks as you try and pass 6 other racers. You have to qualify 4th place or higher to unlock next cup!

uber-car-parking.name: Uber Car Parking
uber-car-parking.description: Drive your car into its parking lot without hitting too many obstacles!

bart-simpson-atv-drive.name: Bart Simpson ATV Drive
bart-simpson-atv-drive.description: Help Bart rides this cool ATV bike over the hills as each new level presents you with a new challenge to accomplish.

popeye-bike-driving.name: Popeye Bike Driving
popeye-bike-driving.description: Popeye is riding his bike in difficult tracks. Try to help him. He must manage to take as many plants as possible. The road become more and more difficult and you should ride carefully. Try not to crush your bike.

bus-controller.name: Bus Controller
bus-controller.description: Bus Controller is a chaotic management game in which you're in control of a bustling city's bus interchange! Guide the fleet of buses to their respective stations without causing a crash! The more buses there are on the road, the crazier things get, so be sure park the buses as soon as you can, otherwise you'll lose control, and it'll all end in disaster!

ford-gt-cup.name: Ford GT Cup
ford-gt-cup.description: Ford GT Cup is a great 3D racing game. Your objective is to beat out all of the other racers and finish first in the race. You must complete all 5 level to win the Cup!

desert-monster.name: Desert Monster
desert-monster.description: Choose your monster truck then race through desert, avoiding obstacles and sand ramps. Can you drive right through to the end and survive? Play and unlock the other monster vehicles to win all the levels!

the-green-v12.name: The Green V12
the-green-v12.description: Prove your driving and parking skills in this new car parking challenge. Use arrow keys to driveand Space to brake your powerful Lamborghini. The game offers 18 hard parking spots and 10 intense levels. Test and improve your parking skillto the max. Play, have fun and enjoy the game. Good luck!

military-mission-truck.name: Military Mission Truck
military-mission-truck.description: Join the military and transport some important cargo from one unit to the other. Your truck is fully loaded when you begin the game, and you have to make sure you take at least one box to the end. Be very careful how you drive, you have to keep your balance at all times in order not to crash or lose your load. Hurry up, because time is an important component to your score. Have a great time!

super-bikes-track-stars.name: Super Bikes Track Stars
super-bikes-track-stars.description: Take to the tracks on your superbike, turbo your way through 20 racers over 8 exciting tracks.

highway-rider.name: Highway Rider
highway-rider.description: We are in the future and only a few can have fuel, get to the checkpoint to get more fuel and continue your way. Be careful with the TNT boxes and pick up missiles to shoot the other racers.

nascar-racing-2.name: Nascar Racing 2
nascar-racing-2.description: Nascar Racing It is all about speed and skills.

pokemon-catch-journey.name: Pokemon Catch Journey
pokemon-catch-journey.description: Ash is on a mission to catch as much pokemon as much. He is driving his truck out in the forest to catchall kind of pokemon and drive back to professor Oak lab. Use the correct pokeball to catch each pokemon. use arrow to drive the truck, number key to select pokeball and press space to catch the pokemon

parallel-car-parking.name: Parallel Car Parking
parallel-car-parking.description: You try to master the parallel parking before taking the driving test. Try to park your car in the designated parking spot but avoid damaging other cars. Furthermore, between the two yellow lines, there are water drain holes, try to avoid it.

christmas-race-tournament.name: Christmas Race Tournament
christmas-race-tournament.description: Race with your christmas car and push your driving skills to the limit!

crash-watersk.name: Crash Watersk
crash-watersk.description: Crash bandicoot is hitting the beach, racing his jet ski. Hit the ramps and collect the coins! Can you complete all 8 levels?

kamaz-delivery-2-arctic-edge.name: Kamaz Delivery 2: Arctic Edge
kamaz-delivery-2-arctic-edge.description: It's time for new challenges. Test your driver skills in Snow Mountains, Frozen Tundra or even at Arctic Edge. Unlock new trucks, tune them up and try to gain maximum score as you race against time and trying to deliver cargo safely.

awesome-truck-parking.name: Awesome Truck Parking
awesome-truck-parking.description: This is a different truck parking game. You can customize your truck with cool vinyls and spoilers and also you can build your own customizations with few clicks. The gameplay is very addictive, you will have to first collect coins in order to be able to park. Park with less damage and you will get a bonus score. Good luck!

hot-rod-master.name: Hot Rod Master
hot-rod-master.description: Hot Rod master is a racing game with the fastest Hot Rod in the world, cross around this bumpy landscape and finish as first!

marios-world.name: Mario's World
marios-world.description: Mario's World is a funny, driving game. Mario is on the trip araound the world. Swerve to avoid other cars. . . or just jump right over them! Help Mario to past all levels.

winter-bike-challenge.name: Winter Bike Challenge
winter-bike-challenge.description: You need to improve your driving skills on snow in this new winter bike game, “Winter Bike Challenge” at VitalityGames. Game offer you 10 hard levels with 3 bikes to drive. Driving on winter time it won’t be easy, but try to jump over the obstacles and get the best time to finish line. Prove you got what it takes to bethe best driver online and have fun at the same time!Good luck and have fun!

stone-transporter.name: Stone Transporter
stone-transporter.description: Drive your truck loaded with stones to the destination. It's not going to be easy since the road is really dangerous, but with your exceptional driving skills you are going to drive over all the hills and boulders and get to the destination before the time runs out, with all your cargo.

4x4-soccer.name: 4x4 Soccer
4x4-soccer.description: What's more exciting than soccer? 4x4 soccer! Pit your skills against the world's greatest in this clever twist on the classic sports game, and drive your way to victory!

kamaz-delivery-3-the-country-challenge.name: Kamaz Delivery 3: The Country Challenge
kamaz-delivery-3-the-country-challenge.description: It is summer and it's time for new challenges. Country challenge is most popular in this season. Race against time or deliver cargo in the remote villages getting score points and money. Upgrade your Kamaz and turn it into the most powerful truck.

parking-mania.name: Parking Mania
parking-mania.description: Quickly park your car in the parking space without hitting anything.  Race against the clock to see if you can beat the high score!

motocross-destruction.name: Motocross Destruction
motocross-destruction.description: The ultimate bike drag racing contest is here. Join your speed drag racing world and become one of the most well known driver of the world. Forget about fast cars or speedy vehicles, your are now up to a different challenge. You must go on this drag race with nothing but a bike, so make it worth and check a great selection of fast and furious bikes. Each win will make our profit to grow, so use your speed and driving skills to win the game. Good luck!

extreme-drifting.name: Extreme Drifting
extreme-drifting.description: Would you dare responding to this extreme drifting challenge here? You have an increasing number of challenging, intricate laps to complete, a speedy, lightweight drift car to control along those tricky curves there, several locations in which those maze-like drift circuits are placed and. . . loads of adrenaline for you to handle. Prove that you're the king of drift!

ben-10-quad.name: Ben 10 Quad
ben-10-quad.description: Who does not know him? Ben 10 is one of the famous Hero in the world! Now you need to help him collect his magic coins and drive him as fast as you can to the other side of the planet! Good luck with this cool mission!!

buggy-traffic-madness.name: Buggy Traffic Madness
buggy-traffic-madness.description: You are in control of an intersection where only buggy cars are crossing. You have to let them cross successfuly without crashing in order to win the game. You can see your target number in the upper left corner of the screen. Once you complete a level, you will unlock it in survival mode and you will have the next level available. There are six incredible levels waiting for you, each more challenging than the previous one. Have fun!

red-cross-rush.name: Red Cross Rush
red-cross-rush.description: Drive your RCR and destroy anything that stands in your way.

emergency-driver.name: Emergency Driver
emergency-driver.description: This is a speedy game, so get ready to fly on the road, collisions are not permitted. Try to collect as many bonus or helping objects as you can! Can you win?

patrick-the-post-man.name: Patrick the Post Man
patrick-the-post-man.description: Patrick works as a post man in bikini bottom. He has to send all the mail to bikini bottoms citizens without losing any mail. Let's help Patrick to complete this task!

world-rally-championship.name: World Rally Championship
world-rally-championship.description: Race a car in a world rally championship!

kamaz-delivery.name: KAMAZ Delivery
kamaz-delivery.description: Take part in competition called Russian Bear Driver in the Annual Tundras Racing. Your goal is to deliver as many crates with cargo as possible to the finish. Also you will be awarded with "Stay in Air" and "Maximum Speed" bonuses as well. Configure your truck adjusting different parameters of the vehicle and start your challenge.

monster-wheelie.name: Monster Wheelie
monster-wheelie.description: Select your favorite monster truck and start race through the obstacle course without crashing.

carbon-fiber-showdown.name: Carbon Fiber Showdown
carbon-fiber-showdown.description: Pick the car you like the most, change the color and the hot vinyls. Your car has to be the coolest on the tracks. Some starting money is given to do upgrades with. Acceleration and speed are crucial.

racing-tractors.name: Racing Tractors
racing-tractors.description: Looking online for a new challenge with farm racing tractors? Then test your driving and racing skillsin 10 intense levels the game offers. Use arrow keys to balance, drive and brake the tractor. Unlock new tractors afteryou win 3 times on first place. So do your best and master your driving skills and your opponents in becoming the best driver in the game. To be able to finish the game you must win first place in all 10 levels and unlock all tractors. Good luck with all the levels and have fun!

speed-rivals.name: Speed Rivals
speed-rivals.description: Don't underestimate your rivals, give it you best and have fun playing this high speed racing game. Driving skills, drifting skills and a small doze of pure madness sf what will make you stand out from the crowd

wario-bmx.name: Wario Bmx
wario-bmx.description: Get on a Bmx with Wario by performing mad tricks. The more flips and massive stunts you perform the better you score and the more points you will gain.

monster-truck-maniac-3.name: Monster Truck Maniac 3
monster-truck-maniac-3.description: The third installment in the award winning monster truck series. With a total of 12 games, 12 variations and 8 obstacle courses, this is the longest monster truck maniac game ever!

halloween-pumpkin-delivery.name: Halloween Pumpkin Delivery
halloween-pumpkin-delivery.description: Test your driving skills in the Halloween night through the cemetery. Deliver some pumpkins in 12 intense levels the game offers. Use arrow keys to balance, drive and brake the tractor. Try to maintain the right speed and the right distance between the tractor and the trailer to make it in one piece to the destination. To be able to finish the game you must deliver the indicated number of objects to the finish. Good luck with all the levels and have fun

winter-bike-stunts.name: Winter Bike Stunts
winter-bike-stunts.description: Prove your skills in this new challenge we prepared for you. Drive your dirt bike in winter time on some of the hardest obstacles you ever seen. Use arrow keys to balance and drive the bikes and press Space to jump over the hardest obstacles. There are 10 nice looking levels to test your driving skillsto the max. Prove you got what it takes to be the best driver online and have fun at the same time!Good luck and have fun!

real-monster-truck.name: Real Monster Truck
real-monster-truck.description: Real Monster Truck gives u a whole lot of experiencing the thrille and power of driving a monster truck, choose your favorite monster truck between this 4 crazy trucks and complete all the 10 levels in first place to win the game, use nitro to speed up your truck and second is never an option for winners

midnight-drift-race-miami.name: Midnight Drift Race: Miami
midnight-drift-race-miami.description: Midnight Drift Race: Miami is a complex free car drifting game with 12 intense levels. Your goal is to drive fast, drift your car and make sure you'll be the first who touches the finish line. Do that and you'll prove that drifting is running through your veins.

moon-truck-challenge.name: Moon Truck Challenge
moon-truck-challenge.description: Fly to the moon for a new truck challenge! You have to drive fast, keep your truck damage as low as possible and stay away from the big surprise! The lasers can damage your truck to maximum. Use your arrow keys to control your car. Finish every level in time to prove you're the best truck driver in the universe. Enjoy the game!

donkey-kong-car.name: Donkey Kong Car
donkey-kong-car.description: Drive over the hills with Donkey Kong in a car. Be very careful and you can win every stage your extreme driving skills can help you. Collect all the points to increase your score.

simpsons-3d-kart.name: Simpsons 3D Kart
simpsons-3d-kart.description: Race as Bart, Homer, Lisa or Marge. Beat your fellow racers by using your weapons. Try to finish first in each crazy track!

circus-ride.name: Circus Ride
circus-ride.description: Ride and show your skills in this fun circus driving game. Collect all the coins to get a highscore. Finish before you run out of time.

racer-kartz.name: Racer Kartz
racer-kartz.description: Win the race in the great Kartz battle, challenge your friend or play by yourself. Rule the leaderbord playing with your friend!1player mode: mouse or keyboard ARROWS, SPACE to activate protection 2player mode: player 1: LEFT and RIGHT ARROWS to move, UP arrow to activate protection player 2: Z and X keys to move, S key to activate protection

rivals-in-fire-race.name: Rivals in Fire Race
rivals-in-fire-race.description: Come and play the Rivals in fire race game, find your enemies and destroy their cars. Don't let any of your opponent escape, follow them as fast as you can! You can win if you have one purpose, always being the best!

billys-truck-adventure.name: Billy's Truck Adventure
billys-truck-adventure.description: Billy needs to deliver some trash. Try to deliver it as fast you can, but becareful that you don't lose too much stuff.

busy-restaurant-parking.name: Busy Restaurant Parking
busy-restaurant-parking.description: Help the visitors to park their cars while the visitors go off for a great evening!

halloween-racer.name: Halloween Racer
halloween-racer.description: This is your chance to drive the devil's car! Happy Halloween!

the-real-trial.name: The Real Trial
the-real-trial.description: Are you prepared for the extreme biking thrill? Here in this game, you will have to ride your bike on challenging tracks, perform spectacular jumps and use boost effectively to earn maximum scores possible. There are 12 awesome levels featured in the game.

santa-fun-ride.name: Santa Fun Ride
santa-fun-ride.description: Santa is on his ride giving away presents to kids around the world, Help Santa to complete the level without falling down, Collect all the gifts in the middle of the level and make a high score have fun, Happy Christmas.

mario-skate-ride.name: Mario Skate Ride
mario-skate-ride.description: Mario has taken up a new favorite activity, its Skateboarding. Help him to collect coins and pull some insane jumps in his awesome adventure. He is fast, don't let police to get him! Enjoy!

3d-pipe-racing.name: 3D Pipe Racing
3d-pipe-racing.description: Race with a space ship through tunnels. Avoid all the obstacles and try to complete all the 25 levels. Buy upgrades for better handling and a better shield etc. A futuristic racing game, each level will become more difficult to complete.

stickman-freestyle-bmx.name: Stickman Freestyle BMX
stickman-freestyle-bmx.description: Stickman Freestyle BMX is a bike racing game in physics world inspired by old school freestyle games like Tony Hawk's Pro Skater or Dave Mirra BMX. Game has elaborate combo system, sophisticated ride rating and lots of content.

lipy-fun-ride.name: Lipy Fun Ride
lipy-fun-ride.description: In Lipy Fun Ride the girls are doing it for themselves! Instead of staying at home, feeling all lonely because they haven't got a date for Valentine's Day they have decided to do something fun instead and I know you girls will be up for some of that fun too! Pick a cute pink vehicle of choice then ride the fun tracks doing fabulous spins, summersaults and stunts along the way as you collect the big red romantic hearts. Who said girls needed boys to have a good time!

city-alien-chase.name: City Alien Chase
city-alien-chase.description: Chase the aliens who are driving the fast car and trying to escape. Complete all levels by chasing them down. Watch out for all the other cars. The alien car is marked with an arrow. Start the racing challenge and get those aliens before they escape.

rocket-2020.name: Rocket 2020
rocket-2020.description: Let's drive your rocket that trapped in the ravine to fly into space. In 2020 the Gorgon station sent a rocket to adventure the zorons planet. They roam to find retolith gems that very difficult to obtain. But suddenly the rocket got hit by meteor rain and get stuck in the abyss. You should be able to control the rocket to fly back to the sky again. But the good news in the ravine there are many gems that you can take. Reach the sky and let's get the score as much as possible.

driving-class-parking.name: Driving Class Parking
driving-class-parking.description: Get your driving license by taking this intense driving class.This is a VIP driving school be the best to obtain your license.

city-traffic-parking.name: City Traffic Parking
city-traffic-parking.description: Park your car in the traffic city into the marked zone. dont hit other cars, motors and obstacles. Each level have 150 second if you completed within limit get bonus socre. Use arrow keys to steer and move forward and back

bus-madness.name: Bus Madness
bus-madness.description: Bus racing games have become very popular and we’re proud to introduce to you a new fun and realistic bus madness game. The surroundings of the city are probably the most realistic you have ever seen to get you in the atmosphere of this thrill and exciting race of these buses. Have fun playing this bus madness game.

monster-hummer-2.name: Monster Hummer 2
monster-hummer-2.description: Monster Hummer 2 is back with new level of excitement. Cruise through the cars and drive your hummer upon to complete each level. Collect coins to score points. Enjoy!

stickboy-bike.name: Stickboy Bike
stickboy-bike.description: Help stikboy in this extreme ride game, you have new challenges in every level and various obstacle to clear. prove you can win under any conditions

car-yard.name: Car Yard
car-yard.description: You are a little car on the way to the junk yard, but, for you it is too soon. Fight for your life!

heavy-wheels-on-snow.name: Heavy Wheels On Snow
heavy-wheels-on-snow.description: Prove your skills in this new driving winter challenge. Use the arrow keys to balance and drive the red truck. The game offers 10 intense and addicting levels, so do your best! Always buy nitro and keep the bottle filled, and use it when you needto speed up and jump over the endless holes! When you speed up on the levels you will hit frozen boxes and they will overturn your truck so slow down. Be the best driver from the game, and show your friends how's the boss! Good luck and have fun!

baby-dino.name: Baby Dino
baby-dino.description: Ride baby dino and cross the path without falling down. Be steady and avoid crash to finish the level. Collect bananas to score points. Have Fun!

drive-and-drift.name: Drive And Drift
drive-and-drift.description: Drive and drift your car to win the exciting race. Collect power-ups on the way and try to get your best lap time in the record book. Once you master the car handling, that is when the real fun begins!

crushing-cars.name: Crushing Cars
crushing-cars.description: This big construction monster truck is capable of amazing things! Smashing other cars and things in your way. Nothing can stop you now!

circuit-super-cars-racing.name: Circuit Super Cars Racing
circuit-super-cars-racing.description: Have you ever wanted to drive a super car on a circuit? And race some of the fastest cars and compete with your friends? Then try this new challenge we offer you. Use arrow keys to steer and drive the cars. Press Space to brake the cars and make them slide. Win first place in all 8 levels and earn as many money as you can. Buy new better cars, upgrade them with new engine, rims an tires. And have the best time. Unlock and buy new better cars to have more fun! Good luck and be the best!Enjoy!

awesome-parking-3d.name: Awesome Parking 3D
awesome-parking-3d.description: Play 3d parking game, In this game you have to collect 5 coins before parking to make maximum score. . . there are 12 levels in this game and you have to complete all of them to complete the game dont for forget to collect all the coins in the game.

school-bus-racing.name: School Bus Racing
school-bus-racing.description: School Bus Racing is a fun racing game that shows you just what school bus drivers get up to once their work is done! Weld on your nitro boosters, and race your way through ten increasingly challenging courses on your road to being the king of school bus racers! Buses aren't as nimble or manoeuvrable as your average car however, so take care when turning those tight corners!

ben-10-vs-skeletons.name: Ben 10 VS Skeletons
ben-10-vs-skeletons.description: Skeletons are coming to kill Ben! Protect your fortress, upgrade your weapons and kill all skeletons!

ben-10-truck-rival.name: Ben 10 Truck Rival
ben-10-truck-rival.description: Ben10 is driving his cool truck out to the street and racing with his alien friends. His alienfriends will try everything they can to get to the final line before ben10 does. Help Ben10get to the final line before everyone do. Collect coins along the way to make upgrade on the truck capacity. use arrow to drive the truck

new-york-taxi-parking.name: New York Taxi Parking
new-york-taxi-parking.description: The yellow taxi drivers dont have the time for a new parking game but you will so hopefully you will do their job for them as they are having just a five minute break in which you need to park their cars in the spots.

pokemon-bike-game.name: Pokemon Bike Game
pokemon-bike-game.description: Ride with Ash and misty over hills and objects and as you try to stay balanced without tipping over.

ebog-race.name: Ebog Race
ebog-race.description: Drive your ferrari and win 5 tracks. An awesome 3D racer where the best driver wins on 5 fantastic tracks.

winter-parking.name: Winter Parking
winter-parking.description: Park your car in the right place with out hitting other cars

nascar-racing.name: Nascar Racing
nascar-racing.description: Nascar Racing is all about speed and skils. Try to place first in every race

pokemon-bmx.name: Pokemon BMX
pokemon-bmx.description: Ride your favorite Pokemon on his bmx at the busy street. Avoid obstacles and balance your bmx carefully. Collect points to score high. Have Fun!

heist-driver-3.name: Heist Driver 3
heist-driver-3.description: Race with the car to the finish. Race over all kinds of obstacles. There are some hard obstacles so make sure you won't crash.

test-drive.name: Test Drive
test-drive.description: Complete three laps in a test car on this race track.

caras-dune-buggy-dash.name: Cara's Dune Buggy Dash
caras-dune-buggy-dash.description: Outrun the sandstorm in Cara's Dune Buggy Dash! Perform incredible stunts and jumps across the dunes whilst avoiding any obstacles in your way. Collect stars to build your points as well as bonuses to boost your score, increase your speed and bump up your health bar too!

naruto-bike-mission.name: Naruto Bike Mission
naruto-bike-mission.description: Naruto has received a new mission from his teacher Kakashi. He is to drive his bike and delivery the scroll back to kakashi without falling off from the bike. The road is crappy and narrow, help naruto drive the bike using the power from the nine tail to keep his balance on the bike.

international-airport-parking.name: International Airport Parking
international-airport-parking.description: Trying to park your car at the International Airport before your plane leaves is not really an easy task. Try to win gold trophies in twelve amazing levels, by getting a good score. In order for this to happen you need to make it as fast as you can and without damaging your car. Use your Arrow keys to handle your car and the Space bar to brake. Have fun and catch your plane!

naruto-biker-game.name: Naruto Biker Game
naruto-biker-game.description: This year Naruto is training for the biggest bikes competition, a lot of bikers from all over the world will come here to compete for the title, but only one can take it, the biker who has been training a lot, the biker who is the best from all. Help Naruto to take this chance and prove he deserves to compete, he deserve to win and that he deserves to take the title home.

naruto-winter-motocross.name: Naruto Winter Motocross
naruto-winter-motocross.description: Naruto will have a lot of fun if you join him in this new motorcycle game and help him collect all the stars you can find on the track. You must be cautious when you ride the challenging tracks as many bumps and dips will be obstacles that can stop you from reaching the finish line. Try to give it lots of throttle and maintain a good speed all way along the track in order to get good times at the end of each race.

naruto-bike-skills.name: Naruto Bike Skills
naruto-bike-skills.description: How amazing it is that you can finally join Naruto in a biking race and feel all the challenges! It is exciting indeed but is not easy at all! Try to drive and climb all the cars and other obstacles which are on the road. Keep your driving position and control Naruto! Do not let him fall down!

around-the-world-parking.name: Around The World Parking
around-the-world-parking.description: Are you ready for a new intense parking challenge? To park some of the fastest super cars all around the world? See how good you are in 20 intense parking spots and10 levels. Park fast and safe in each level and compare your time with others. Avoid moving cars and other drivers to survive. Have patience and see the right time to act when youhave to slip between cars. Always follow the arrow to the parking destination. Have fun and improve!

forest-ride.name: Forest Ride
forest-ride.description: Drive your bike in the forest through a wide variety of obstacles on your way. Beautiful graphic, excellent physics, and a lot of fun. Good luck !

mario-adventure-ride.name: Mario Adventure Ride
mario-adventure-ride.description: Help Super Mario Bros ride his truck to the end of all levels without losing control. Try not to flip over, make it all the way to the end to advance. You have limited lives. Have Fun all the way !

super-mario-motorcycle-rush.name: Super Mario Motorcycle Rush
super-mario-motorcycle-rush.description: Start your engines and let's have fun. Help Super Mario drive his Motorcycle and collect all the star along the way. Try not to flip over and avoiding crash, complete all 8 levels to win the game.

santa-mario-delivery.name: Santa Mario Delivery
santa-mario-delivery.description: It is Christmas time for the year 2013. Mario once again, dressup like Santa and riding on his lovely kart to delivery gifts for all of his friends. His friends are seeking different type of gifts. Helpmario delivery the right gifts to for each of his friends. use arrow to drive and space to delivery the gifts.

4x4-tractor-challenge.name: 4x4 Tractor Challenge
4x4-tractor-challenge.description: Looking for a new challenge with farm tractors and loaded trailers? Then test your driving skillsin 12 intense levels the game offers. Use arrow keys to balance, drive and brake the tractor. Try to maintain the right speed and the right distance between the tractor and the trailer. To make it in one piece to the destination with the cargo. To be able to finish the game you must deliver the indicated number of objects to the finish. Good luck with all the levels and have fun!

industrial-site-stunts.name: Industrial Site Stunts
industrial-site-stunts.description: Get ready for a new intense dirt motocross challenge. If you think you got what it takes to master the dirt bike in 10 intensive levelsand make it to the finish in one piece, then we dare you to see how good you are. Use arrow keys to drive and balance the bike. And space barto make the bike jump over obstacles. Pay attention to the moving objects and have fun! Improve your driving and have fun at the same time. Good luck and have patience!

the-great-robbery.name: The Great Robbery
the-great-robbery.description: Steal the gold and find the key to escape from police.Find the space to park your car to hide from police.Your objective is to open the the exit gate after stealing gold.All the best!

city-car-racing.name: City Car Racing
city-car-racing.description: Race your car through the city and earn points on the way. Beat your opponents and get as many points as possible.

boat-parking.name: Boat Parking
boat-parking.description: Park your boat at the parking area. Get as many points as you can while avoiding the stuff!

speed-friends.name: Speed Friends
speed-friends.description: Win races to unlock more tracks! Be first and unlock secrets!

rome-parking-frenzy.name: Rome Parking Frenzy
rome-parking-frenzy.description: They say, all roads lead to Rome, well here you will have the chance to see those roads. Park your cars in crowded parking lots in Rome!

atv-pizza-delivery.name: ATV Pizza Delivery
atv-pizza-delivery.description: Deliver the Pizza on your ATV to people! The roads are crowded, the traffic is at its peak, and you will have to dodge every obstacle to get to the client. On the street you will be able to collect, by driving through them, bonuses like life, shield, turbo or power turbo.

mini-race-challenge.name: Mini Race Challenge
mini-race-challenge.description: Mini race challenge is a car racing game.Select your favorite car to race with other opponents.Win the lap to qualify for the next race. Your score depends on the best lap time. All the best!

batman-monster-truck-challenge.name: Batman Monster Truck Challenge
batman-monster-truck-challenge.description: Help Batman to steer the monster truck on a junkyard full of rusty things, old cars and water obstacles. It's not easy to stay behind the wheel of such powerful machine and keep balance while the truck is going up and down the road. There are 10 levels ahead all with different backgrounds and arrangement of obstacles.

carplane-parking.name: Carplane Parking
carplane-parking.description: Enjoy the time you spend driving the carplanes in this free parking game because today you have to try and park them in the spots. Show everyone you are a great driver and you are precise with the steering wheel.

mario-best-drive.name: Mario Best Drive
mario-best-drive.description: Terrorists are in the city. Mario has mission to stop them. Shoot the enemies as they pull up beside you. Dodge other cars on the street.

moto-stickman-3d.name: Moto Stickman 3D
moto-stickman-3d.description: Participate in an endurance 3D race as Stickman biker on one of the most dangerous motorcycle tracks through the desert. Sport stickman motorcycle racing game consists of single track with 5 checkpoints. Make sure you get to the checkpoint before time runs out or the race is over.

18-wheels-driver.name: 18 Wheels Driver
18-wheels-driver.description: Try your skills and practice in driving and parking the real 18 Wheeler in 18 Wheels Driver flash game. Complete all missions to get 18 Wheeler Truck Lincense and welcome to our Truck Drivers Club.The aim of the game is to park truck into designed place without crashing.

green-city-parking.name: Green City Parking
green-city-parking.description: Park your can as accurately as possible into the marked space. Do not hit other cars and obstacles. Each level has 150 seconds if you complete within time limit get bonus score. Use arrow keys to steer and move forward and back.

monster-trucker-3d.name: Monster Trucker 3D
monster-trucker-3d.description: Nothing puts on a show like a stampede of Monster Trucks tearing up the terrain! Bash your opponents into submission as you race towards the finishing line, flattening cars, flying over insane ramps, and navigating rough tracks! It's every man for himself, so watch your back if you want any chance of coming out on top!

wheelie-king.name: Wheelie King
wheelie-king.description: Wheelie King is the ultimate wheelie endurance game! Keep your balance and manage your pace as you aim to perform the longest wheelie of all time! Endure humps and drops as you struggle against gravity. One false move and you'll be crashing into the ground! Lucky for you however, you have three lives at your disposal, so make the most of them!

crazy-jumping-cars.name: Crazy Jumping Cars
crazy-jumping-cars.description: Lightning Mc Queen is crazy jumping driver against the clock! Swerve to avoid other cars...or just jump right over them!

motorcycle-parking.name: Motorcycle Parking
motorcycle-parking.description: Drive your motorcycle to the parking space as quickly as you can before time runs out.

3d-speed-driver.name: 3D Speed Driver
3d-speed-driver.description: With 3d cool graphics and 10 impressive challenging levels to choose from, the 3d speed driver game will show you a great time behind the wheels.

penguins-super-kart.name: Penguins Super Kart
penguins-super-kart.description: The Penguins have taken a break from all out war to compete in the formula penguin championships. Take control and win the gold.

sonic-road.name: Sonic Road
sonic-road.description: Sonic Road is a funny, driving game. Sonic is going for a cruise down the highway but he's facing the wrong way! In Sonic Road you'll have to dodge incoming traffic and still make sure to collect both energy and extra gas! Make sure to watch your fuel as you dart around the cars. Grab the red gas containers to replenish your fuel. How many levels can you get to before it's game over?

bike-explorer-3.name: Bike Explorer 3
bike-explorer-3.description: Ride through a vulcano and explore new parts of the earth on your motorbike. Watch out! Don't fall into the lava

death-race-arena.name: Death Race Arena
death-race-arena.description: The death race is an unforgiving competition where only the strongest and the more skilled survive. Join the arena and drive your car, crashing into the others and destroying their vehicles, before they get the chance to destroy yours. Pick up power ups that will help you, buy upgrades and repair your car between levels and try to complete them all, so you can be the last one standing. Have a wonderful time playing this awesome game!

extreme-stunts-2.name: Extreme Stunts 2
extreme-stunts-2.description: Perform extreme stunts to complete each level. Each level that is assigned has new targets. Complete the task to unlock other stunts. Unlock new bikes after every two levels.

dump-truck-4.name: Dump Truck 4
dump-truck-4.description: The Dump Truck is back and the main truck driver has called in sick, you need to fill his space as you are the only one on the site that has the skill to drive this great big beast, make sure you meet the demands of the site manager and maybe you will get a bonus.

moon-offroad-race.name: Moon Offroad Race
moon-offroad-race.description: Explore the moon in this great new off-road car game in which you will have loads of fun challenging both yourself and the awesome car you are given, in order to pass all the obstacles that the terrain provides.

road-cross-bikers.name: Road Cross Bikers
road-cross-bikers.description: You don't need to know how to ride a bike in order to enjoy Road Cross Bikers. Drive your bike all over!

circus-caravan-parking.name: Circus Caravan Parking
circus-caravan-parking.description: Join the incredible world of the circus and move the caravans around by attaching them to your truck and parking them in the right place. You have limited time to finish each level, so hurry up, but be careful not to crash into anything because you may damage your truck or the caravan. Keep your eyes on the damage bar in the upper left part of your screen and the timer in the upper right corner of the screen. Complete all eight levels with the highest score and have an amazing time playing this game!

alfa-cup.name: Alfa Cup
alfa-cup.description: Alfa Cup is a great 3D racing game. Your objective is to beat out all of the other racers and finish first in the race. You must complete all 5 level to win the Cup!

pit-bike-x-moto.name: Pit Bike X Moto
pit-bike-x-moto.description: Dare to compete in the most extreme driving circuits and you can do a variety of tricks. Complete all levels of the game and get your best times in each of the circuits. Become a true champion of free style.

master-blaster-2.name: Master Blaster 2
master-blaster-2.description: Master Blaster 2 was recently released as a new Monster Truck Game and this means that you get to jump over the other cars or smash them down. Finish all the 5 levels in order to win the game.

funky-racers.name: Funky Racers
funky-racers.description: Check out  this new funky game called Funky Racers! How good are you in this racing games?  Do you think you can defeat your opponents and finish the race? Play this game to find out!

ben-10-car-chase.name: Ben 10 Car Chase
ben-10-car-chase.description: Ben 10 must save the Earth again! Dangerous aliens, disguised as humans, are on their way to capital city. Ben 10 must chase them and destroy their cars. Drive your car carefully because each time you hit another car, you lose energy. Try to collect as much energy on the way as you can. Good luck with your Ben 10 Car Chase!

the-simpsons-parking.name: The Simpsons Parking
the-simpsons-parking.description: Park homer and his car in the parking area.

parking-place.name: Parking Place
parking-place.description: Park your car in the right place without hitting other cars

asphalt-kings.name: Asphalt Kings
asphalt-kings.description: Race around the tracks and come in first to win money! Use your money to upgrade your car and more! Can you win all the races?

wario-bike-adventure.name: Wario Bike Adventure
wario-bike-adventure.description: Ride with wario and waluigi over hills and objects as you try to stay balanced!

desert-jogo-racer-v101.name: Desert Jogo Racer V1.01
desert-jogo-racer-v101.description: Drive through 10 courses with your motorcycle without falling.

nypd-takedown.name: NYPD Takedown
nypd-takedown.description: This is a job for the New York Police Department and for the best officers. Are you ready for some hard core car chase in the crowded streets, in the middle of the rush hour? Catch the bad guys, put them behind bars. Try to avoid bumping into cars and the side of the street.

ice-cream-racing.name: Ice Cream Racing
ice-cream-racing.description: Explore the sweet and colourful worlds of candies and ice creams in this fun racing game. It's place where you’ve never seen them before! Pick up the bonuses (rockets, bubbles and jelly) and use them to your rivals. Finish first, complete different missions to win a level. Remember! Your car so tasty! Don’t stop! Dangerous crocodile can eat you!

mixygames.name: mixygames
mixygames.description: Sonic Road is a funny, driving game. Sonic is going for a cruise down the highway but he's facing the wrong way! In Sonic Road you'll have to dodge incoming traffic and still make sure to collect both energy and extra gas! Make sure to watch your fuel as you dart around the cars. Grab the red gas containers to replenish your fuel. How many levels can you get to before it's game over?

bmw-master.name: BMW Master
bmw-master.description: BMW i8 is a great 3D racing game. You have chance to drive first in the world new BMW sport car, fantastic BMW i8.Drive your BMW i8 on the 5 different destinations and win all cup. You can drive in America, Spain, England, Germany and Russia. Become a BMW Master! Good luck.

heavy-trailers.name: Heavy Trailers
heavy-trailers.description: Prove your driving skills online in this new challenge with 2 heavy loaded trailers. Get behind the wheels of a big monster truck and deliver barrels tothe destination. Use arrow keys to drive and balance the truck. There are 12 intense levels for you to drive and test and improve online. Enjoy this heavy cargo driving game and become the best player in the game. Good luck and have a blast!

city-block-racing-3d.name: City Block Racing 3D
city-block-racing-3d.description: Drive and race in a city block against different cars earn money by winning level, there are total 12 levels in this game play today and win all the level

moto-x-jump.name: Moto X Jump
moto-x-jump.description: The most jumpy moto-x racing game on the internet. It is fast, jumpy and full of action on multiple tracks with different motors. Step on that bike. Move the arrow keys and change lanes to avoid crashing into other bikes or jump gaps. Beat your opponents on the track and get a position on stage.

stickman-skateboard-bike-challenge.name: Stickman Skateboard-Bike Challenge
stickman-skateboard-bike-challenge.description: Stickman is back for a new challenge, choose his bike or skateboard for this game, do tricks for bonus points and compete all 10 levels for the high score in this Stickman Skateboard-Bike Challenge.

the-chopper-ride-2.name: The Chopper Ride 2
the-chopper-ride-2.description: Ride your chopper bike around the town to explore your driving skills. Ride down the hills, beautiful city and drive through the amazing valley. Experience the real ride with new bikes and upgrades.

3d-urban-madness-2.name: 3D Urban Madness 2
3d-urban-madness-2.description: Are you one of those daring 3D racing games fans who would always, with no exception, go only for the most challenging ones, for the high speed-packed and adrenaline-overloaded ones? Then 3D Urban Madness is the game for you.

canyon-parking.name: Canyon Parking
canyon-parking.description: If you like parking games and you're an addict too, than the Canyon Parking game is perfect for you. This game is an new online parking game featuring six intense levels.
