Try to avoid damaging your car, complete all  game levels, and you will earn your title of the ultimate parking driver in the entire online world! Enjoy!

batman-hunt-the-penguin.name: Batman Hunt the Penguin
batman-hunt-the-penguin.description: Help Batman to hunt the the Penguin, it is not easy at all because he is using the helicopter to shooting you

jumping-monster-beetle.name: Jumping Monster Beetle
jumping-monster-beetle.description: Weirdly shaped trees, huge gears in the ground and wonderful landscapes. Escape the real world in this pretty green, blue, white. . . uh. . . red car, you name it. Collect coins so you can buy the jump boost. Each leaf unlocked means a leap higher in this wonderful fantastic world.

formula-11-micro.name: Formula 11 Micro
formula-11-micro.description: Play formula 11 micro racing game. It is fast, full of action and tracks across the world. Multiple racecars to unlock and boosts on the tracks. Will you set the new high score?Move the arrow keys and change lanes to avoid crashing into other race-cars. Beat your opponent race cars on the track and get a position on stage. Finish the game and unlock other cars.

desert-atv-challenge.name: Desert ATV Challenge
desert-atv-challenge.description: Get ready for a new desert racing game. Pick up your ATv and race it in the heat of the desert. There are 10 intense levels for you to test and improve yourdriving and racing skills. Unlock new ATV and win all levels to be the best. Upgrade and tune your engines to make each ATV go faster. Adjust your speed and try to jump over the obstacles on your way. Use arrow keys to balance and drive over the obstacles and land safely to the ground. Do your best and have fun! Good luck!

new-motocross-forest-challenge.name: New Motocross Forest Challenge
new-motocross-forest-challenge.description: Get ready for a new adventure with this forest racing challenge. Use arrow keys to drive and balance the motorbikes. Prove your driving skill in10 intense levels unlock new better bikes and be the best driver in the game. Adjust your speed to be able to jump over the obstacles and land safe on wheels. Set difficulty to easy or hard and have a lot of fun!Good luck and have fun!

orange-motorbike-racing.name: Orange Motorbike Racing
orange-motorbike-racing.description: Drive a mini car, atv, or motorbike and collect coins, do tricks, and more fun stuff!

jungle-rush.name: Jungle Rush
jungle-rush.description: Excellent arcade truck game with nice graphics and addictive gameplay. It's more a skill game than a racing game! Who grabs the highscore?

madness-on-4-wheels.name: Madness On 4 Wheels
madness-on-4-wheels.description: Prove your skills in this new winter driving challenge. Use arrow keys to balance and drive  the red truck and space to activate nitro. The game offers 10 intense and addicting levels,so do your best! Always buy nitro and keep the bottle filled, use it when you need to speed up and jump over the endless holes! When you speed up on the levels you will hit frozen boxes that will overturn your truck! Be the best driver from the game, and show your friends who's the boss! Good luck and have fun!

car-rider.name: Car Rider
car-rider.description: Car Rider is a driving based game with aesthetically designed 10 levels. The game is not just about driving but filled with objective of collecting coins as well on its way to destination. Game includes* 4 Cars* 10 Levels* Level Locker* 5 Unique Circuits

3d-speed-bike.name: 3D Speed Bike
3d-speed-bike.description: Test your skills as a motorcycle driver against the clock and the traffic in 3D Speed Bike extraordinary game. In this free 3D game you drive a beast of a bike called Augusta F4, which is one of the most powerful bikes ever made, it's a challenge controlling this monster. Enjoy!

sim-taxi-london.name: Sim Taxi London
sim-taxi-london.description: Sim Taxi London is bringing the classic taxi-driving game to an all-new location! Drive passengers to their destination, dodging cars, weaving past buses and taking tight turns! Make sure you take the shortest route you can, because if you take too long, your passengers won't pay you, and worse still, you'll waste precious gas! Best be careful too, because if your taxi takes too much damage, you'll have to pay for the repairs, too!

break-the-speed-limit.name: Break The Speed Limit
break-the-speed-limit.description: Get in your brand new car and try to win all the races. Set the high scores and finish first to get to the next level. But try not to break the car or lose the race. We are sure that you are able to prove that you are the best once again.

fast2speed-most-wanted.name: Fast2speed Most Wanted
fast2speed-most-wanted.description: Drive your car with maximum speed and be the winner on the finish pole , Avoid highway patrols don't let them catch you . Use Nos when needed !

just-park-it-6.name: Just Park It 6
just-park-it-6.description: Are you ready for a new fun and intense parking challenge? The try this new parking game called Just park it 6. And see if you got what it takesto drive and park a huge 18 wheeler in 30 parking spots the game has to offer. Use arrow keys to drive and balance the truck and if you think driving forward it's hard, just try backwards! Improve your driving skills in becomingthe best driver in the game and online. Have fun and good luck!

parking-lot-madness.name: Parking Lot Madness
parking-lot-madness.description: A parking challenge for experienced drivers, test your parking skills.

hello-kitty-car-driving-challenge.name: Hello Kitty Car Driving Challenge
hello-kitty-car-driving-challenge.description: Have fun, relax and help Hello Kitty drive the car through eight fun courses to reach the finish line.

monster-buggy-madness-descripti.name: Monster Buggy Madness  Descripti
monster-buggy-madness-descripti.description: Get behind the wheels of a powerful modified monster buggy and race other drivers in some cool futuristic landscapes the game has to offer.Test and improve your driving skills on some of the hardest lands a buggy has ever been. Steer just right the monster buggy and use arrow keys to drive and make it to the finish line in one piece.Learn how to drive in 10 levels and remember that patience it’s the key to survive and win the levels. Have fun!

park-my-suv.name: Park My SUV
park-my-suv.description: Start your engines and get to that parking spot. After all that racing you should prove your skills in parking too. So show us that you have what it takes to be the champ. Your mission is to find the parking spot and complete the quest. Try to avoid the obstacles and try not to crash into other cars.

downhill-rush.name: Downhill Rush
downhill-rush.description: Drive this buggy over the hills and reach the finish without crashing. Crush cars and collect special items for extra bonus points.

desert-bike-challenge.name: Desert Bike Challenge
desert-bike-challenge.description: Collect letters while driving the bike to make maximum score in this Desert Bike Challenge game, you can always play the level again to collect all letters and make maximum scores.

4x4-gclass-racing.name: 4x4 GClass Racing
4x4-gclass-racing.description: 4x4 GClass is a new racing game based on Stage 3D platform. There are six challenging tracks. You need to find the way to the top and collect all available coins in order to buy upgrades. There are different upgrades. Try to pay attention to the engine and repair upgrades, because due to extremal tracks you will need them. Select the color for your truck and start driving. An exotic place and extremal tracks will give you the chance to fill the adrenaline.

dark-roads-bike.name: Dark Roads Bike
dark-roads-bike.description: Have a look at this new dirt bike challenge and try it out in 20 intense levels. Use arrow keys to steer and balance the bike. Change the beam from the bike and adjusted with your speed. To be able to survive the obstacles on your way. Avoid bombs and if you get blown try to balance the bike to land on the wheels. Enjoy and have fun with this night challenge and prove you are the best player in the game. Good luck and have fun!

ferrari-enzo.name: Ferrari Enzo
ferrari-enzo.description: Ferrari Enzo is a great 3D racing game. Your objective is to beat out all of the other racers and finish first in the race. You must complete all 5 level to win the Cup!

cartoon-parking.name: Cartoon Parking
cartoon-parking.description: Do you want to have some fun ? Get your car customized with the latest vinyls and spoilers and then start driving through the city in the search of some coins. Collect them all before you are able to find a parking space. The graphics are really cool and will give you the felling of a funny cartoon city. Enjoy

crazy-jumping-santa.name: Crazy Jumping Santa
crazy-jumping-santa.description: Crazy Jumping Santa is a funny driving game. U need to pass all over the world and make childrens happy. Drive Santa car, jump over the other cars and complete all 5 levels.

tic-tac-bomb.name: Tic Tac Bomb
tic-tac-bomb.description: Drive The truck loaded with bombs to the destination point before they explode. Drive quickly, but carefuly, and keep an eye on the the timer. Watch out for the steep hills and bumps. Upgrade your truck with the cash you collect.

cool-farm-tractor-parking.name: Cool Farm Tractor Parking
cool-farm-tractor-parking.description: Can you park a tractor in the farm? Our farmer needs your help to park his tractor. Can you help him? But be careful! There are so many blocks on your way. When you park the tractor, don't try to move the damper. It will not move.

just-park-it-7.name: Just park it 7
just-park-it-7.description: Prove your skills online in this new challenge we have prepared for you. Get behind the wheels of a big 18 wheeler and prove your driving and parking skills  in 20 challenging parking spots and 10 hard levels. Use arrow keys to drive or steer the truck.  Press Space to break the truck. If you think driving a big truck with a heavy load it’s easy, forward and backward then prove it in this intense parking challenge.   Good luck you will need it!

station-wagun.name: Station Wagun
station-wagun.description: Take the dare of master driving a powerful, fierce… station wagun along a hostile, abandoned stone quarry! Strive to keep it well balanced as you make it climb those massive boulders and high platforms and to use the machine gun that your powerful off-road truck comes equipped with for firing at all those explosive barrels lest they should… blow up your powerful truck!

rapid-motorcycle.name: Rapid Motorcycle
rapid-motorcycle.description: After loading, click SKIP-PLAY-CLICK SCREEN-CHOOSE MODE to enter game. this is an exciting motorbike racing game. show your excellent skill to your friends now!

zombie-xride.name: Zombie Xride
zombie-xride.description: Zombie is on a path of destruction, ride through each level running over obstalces and creatures in the forest. Earn points for a high score and have a blast on Zombie Xride game.

monster-truck-challenge.name: Monster Truck Challenge
monster-truck-challenge.description: You need to get to the end of the track in the quickest time possible. Find the best way to navigate some of the what look like impossible boulders to get over. The foreground though covers some of the smaller boulders so you will have to edge forward carefully so that you do not flip your truck over and wreck the level.

the-zombie-smasher.name: The Zombie Smasher
the-zombie-smasher.description: Zombies attack on the city and you are the only one alive and if you want to keep alive you need to smash them to get out of the city

monster-truck-obstacle-course.name: Monster Truck Obstacle Course
monster-truck-obstacle-course.description: This Monster Truck have different obstacles on the road after the earthquake, Drive it properly over these obstacles to reach his destination in this monster truck game

street-challenger.name: Street Challenger
street-challenger.description: Weave down city streets knocking down as many green cones as you can!  Play Street Challenger and see if you can make it through all 10 difficult levels!

highway-driving.name: Highway Driving
highway-driving.description: Drive the car on and endless highway while avoiding other vehicles. Keep collecting the coins for best scores and fuel canes for long run.

skateboard-first-race.name: Skateboard First Race
skateboard-first-race.description: How good are your skateboarding skills? Demonstrate your abilities with the skateboardand overcome the obstacles and collect items along the way. Stay away from puddles and obstacles, it will make the power fell. Have Fun!

cars-3d-speed-3.name: Cars 3d Speed 3
cars-3d-speed-3.description: Check out the new game Series 3 of Cars 3d Speed! Let's test ourselves' driving skills in difficult levels. It can bring you more speed and passion.

school-bus-license-3.name: School Bus License 3
school-bus-license-3.description: Are you ready to advance your license in School Bus License 3? Passing the test is now even trickier in this driving simulation. Test your skills through 17 challenging levels, ranging from picking children up from a variety of bus stops and dropping them at school to avoiding road blocks and even making sure the ride is smooth enough so the kids are not sick in the bus. Go get your personalised license now.

drifters.name: Drifters
drifters.description: Drifters, where it's not just about your ability to race but how well you can drift the corners and keep control of the car. Do you have the patience and skill to become the ultimate drifting champion, through 5 action packed 3D levels. Take on other racers competing for the same cup and the same glory, but remember only one of you can take it. So leave them in the dust and prove you really are the best out there.

police-interceptor.name: Police Interceptor
police-interceptor.description: Have you ever wanted to train as a Police Interceptor? Well your time is here! See if you can complete all the set tasks, everything from driving at speed without hitting anything to performing the pit manoeuvre and driving on ice. You can get some real speed and even try hand break turns and blast your sirens to let the people know you're coming.

valet-parking-3d.name: Valet Parking 3D
valet-parking-3d.description: Valet Parking 3D is a 3D parking game! The goal of the game is to park as many cars as you possibly can before the timer runs out! The more cars you park, the more money you make. Just make sure you park the car where the customer asks you to, or you'll forget which car to bring back when the customer returns to pick it up!

quad-trials-2.name: Quad Trials 2
quad-trials-2.description: Quad Trials 2 is the second instalment of the popular physics-based quad-bike driving game! With tracks more dangerous and challenging than ever, you'll have to test your skills to the limit to get to the finishing line quickly. Timing is key when there's moving platforms around, and keeping an eye on your surroundings is essential, so stay sharp!

rodent-racer.name: Rodent Racer
rodent-racer.description: A mouse and some everyday objects is all you need to make a fantastic game. You play as a mouse driving a car, trying to complete each track before running out of time. On the way though, be careful not to get crushed by a brick.

spiderman-driver-2.name: Spiderman Driver 2
spiderman-driver-2.description: Spiderman Driver 2 is a driving game. An ultimate racing game is up to ride now, ride all the urban tracks with the latest ATV and finish all the four levels. Collect the coins and reach the finish without crashing your ATV. Be careful while racing on the deadly levels, they will be confusing and with double paths, catch the right path to clear the level. Use spase bar for turbo.

stickman-harley-ride.name: Stickman Harley Ride
stickman-harley-ride.description: Take a ride on Stickman's Harley, Ride up and down the roads and jump the ramps. His goal is to complete 10 levels with out crashing. Be careful and watch out for obstacles in your path, take your time and don't tip over.

crazy-jeep-parking.name: Crazy Jeep Parking
crazy-jeep-parking.description: Crazy Jeep Parking is a parking game in which you control a jeep instead of a car. And yes this game is really crazy. Keep an eye on the road to avoid the traffic, and be careful not to crash into parked vehicles. Drive and park your way through all six levels and it's really so hard to park this crazy jeep. Enjoy

super-bike-stunt.name: Super Bike Stunt
super-bike-stunt.description: you have to collect diamonds to increase your score. Enjoy Every Stunt & Drive like a man

fmx-team.name: FMX Team
fmx-team.description: A sweet game of performing motorcycle stunts over jumps as you compete on each level for a high score.

uphill-rush-4.name: Uphill Rush 4
uphill-rush-4.description: Can you survive this extreme uphill battle to the finish line?

spiderman-rush.name: spiderman-rush
spiderman-rush.description: You have to help Spiderman in his ride and perform thrilling stunts with perfect balance and control. Clear obstacles and collect points to finish the level.

uphill-rush.name: Uphill Rush
uphill-rush.description: Uphill Rush, Race your bike, truck, quad or skateboard over hills and obstacles and finish each level without falling.

3-little-heroes.name: 3 Little Heroes
3-little-heroes.description: 3 Little Heroes is a game in which the heroes that you choose to play as are on a quest to free the land from evil. You have to go through each area avoiding all the traps and dangers while killing all the evil ones. Collect the useful things that appear on the screen. Be quick because they will soon disappear.

specter-knight.name: Specter Knight
specter-knight.description: This is a game in which you play as the knight who has come back to life for the final time. The world needs you and that is the reason you have been brought back to life. You have to go through each area interacting with characters, finding useful items, killing enemies and accomplishing various quests.

papa-louie-2.name: Papa Louie 2
papa-louie-2.description: Papa Louie 2 is a game where all the food items at the restaurant has trend into mutants. You as the manager and the chef of the restaurant will not be cooking and serving today. Instead you will be going around eliminating the mutants, collecting the coins and other useful items while trying to get to the end safely.

kim-taser.name: Kim Taser
kim-taser.description: Kim Taser is a side scrolling game in which you play as the cartoon character of a popular leader who has to escape from the cop who is after him. Help him move very watchfully to avoid the obstacles that come in his way and to collect the useful items scattered along the road.

zombies-in-the-shadow-the-saviour.name: Zombies In The Shadow - The Saviour
zombies-in-the-shadow-the-saviour.description: The third installment of the successful Zombies in the Shadow saga. Help Jim to rescue his family during the zombie apocalypse!

armored-warfare-1917.name: Armored Warfare 1917
armored-warfare-1917.description: Armored Warfare 1917 is a game in which you will be leading your troops from the front during the ongoing war. You and your soldiers are supposed to kill specific number of enemies in each stage of the game. Some very useful upgrades can be unlocked and availed during the game play because these upgrades will help you match up with the increasing difficulties.

dawn-of-the-sniper-2.name: Dawn Of The Sniper 2
dawn-of-the-sniper-2.description: Dawn Of The Sniper 2 is a game that starts off with a very engrossing intro. Once the main game play begins there is only one thing that will really matter and it is your sharp shooting skill. Shoot down all the zombies in order to protect the humans in each stage of the game.

bullet-fury.name: Bullet Fury
bullet-fury.description: Bullet Fury is a game that lets you choose your preferred difficulty level at the start of the game play. Once you have done that you will be required to infiltrate the huge facility shooting down all the enemies that you face. Shoot fast and accurately because the enemies have the orders to shoot you at first sight.

ragdoll-cannon-4.name: Ragdoll Cannon 4
ragdoll-cannon-4.description: Ragdoll Cannon 4 is a game with a sketchy graphics and 50 fantastic levels. You will have a cannon that you can use to launch the ragdoll missiles to shoot at the targets in each level of the game. Always try to clear each level using minimum number of shots. More types of ragdoll missiles will be made available as the game progresses.

strike-force-heroes-3.name: Strike Force Heroes 3
strike-force-heroes-3.description: Strike Force Heroes 3 is the third game of the series and just like in the earlier editions you are once again going to be customizing your soldier and arming him with weapons before letting him go out t take on the bad guys. The soldier has to destroy all the enemy troops and survive.

stick-squad-4.name: Stick Squad 4
stick-squad-4.description: Stick Squad 4 is the fourth game in the series and you being a member of an elite assassin squad will be needed to accomplish some challenging missions. Follow the briefings mentioned before the start of each mission. You are expected to shoot at the targets with deadly accuracy to complete all the missions.

super-zombie-smasher.name: Super Zombie Smasher
super-zombie-smasher.description: You will find 36 levels in this fantastic online game. There will be different types of weapons available in each level of the game. They will be limited though. You should be able to use them in the most effective way possible to eliminate all the zombies in each level.

13-more-days-in-hell.name: 13 More Days In Hell
13-more-days-in-hell.description: 13 More Days In Hell is a game in which you get pushed inside a very dangerous place. There are evil ones in that place and they will be looking to kill you. Can you survive the next 13 days in this place? The best option for you will be to go around killing all the evil ones before they make you their victim.

tactical-assassin.name: Tactical Assassin
tactical-assassin.description: Tactical Assassin is a stickmen shooting game in which you are a professional assassin and you will be hired to carry out some missions. Follow the briefings and do what is needed to be done. Always make sure that you do not hit the wrong targets because that will fail the mission which is a shame.

heru.name: Heru
heru.description: The line of colored marbles will be trying to reach the hole at the end of the path and your task is to stop them from reaching the hole. You must launch the colored marbles to make clusters of three or more same colored marbles to remove them from the line.

gun-game.name: Gun Game
gun-game.description: This is a game in which the play area is divided into two parts, one where your guns get activated and the other where you can see your targets approaching. Your task in the game is to use the guns to shoot and destroy all the targets before they reach your zone that must be protected.

gibbets-2.name: Gibbets 2
gibbets-2.description: Gibbets 2 is a very popular online game in which your archery skills be tested as you try to complete the tasks in each level of the game. You have to shoot at the ropes on time to save the lives of the people. You should not miss the target because that can harm the people that you will be trying to save.

six.name: Six
six.description: Battle a boss who refuses to go down across six stages of bullet chaos as you overcome the rewarding challenge of 40 unique attack patterns.

mr-bacteria.name: Mr Bacteria
mr-bacteria.description: Killing bacteria has never been so fun! Kill some microorganisms in this fun and addictive game. If you die you can continue playing Mr. Bacteria and if you want to just look at what you killed, you can also do that, in the Bacteria Gallery. You have to kill all the bacteria on the screen. Use your arrow keys or WASD to move and fire with left mouse button.

hitstick-6.name: Hitstick 6
hitstick-6.description: Be the assassin in Hitstick 6. Use clever disguises, customize your weapons and use stealth modes to identify and eliminate your targets.

bullet-overflow.name: Bullet Overflow
bullet-overflow.description: Bullet Overflow is a first person shooter game, can you beat the highscore and become the ACE of killers? Shoot your way through 10 large levels, unlock 12 trophies and kill every gangsta!

swat-unit.name: SWAT Unit
swat-unit.description: S.W.A.T. Unit is a great first person shooter game.You are US Army special forces soldier and your  mission is to use your weapon aim skills to  shoot enemy terorist  and survive in this  shooter game. Terrorists are steal S.W.A.T. uniforms and attack some civil locations. Your target is to eliminate all terrorists on three different location. Good Luck!

ben-10-kills-zombies.name: Ben 10 Kills Zombies
ben-10-kills-zombies.description: Ben 10 needs to protect the barricades from zombies. Shoot the zombies and kill them to earn money and buy new weapons or repair your barricade.

swat-rescue-team.name: SWAT Rescue Team
swat-rescue-team.description: The government officials were kidnapped by terrorists during a congress in the Caribbean Islands. You must not bow to the terrorists. Rescue the hostages!

math-missile.name: Math Missile
math-missile.description: Defend your base from invaders and stray asteroids! Answer Math Questions correctly to defeat your enemies and level up your planetary presence! Collect gold by answering questions correctly to build your defences, but be careful every 3 wrong answers will spawn more attacks!Start the game by hitting play. Then select the grade and math skill you want to practice. Afterwards answer questions correctly to gain gold you can use for power ups and other items.

shape-em-up.name: Shape Em Up
shape-em-up.description: Battle in 2d space against wave after wave of enemy shapes. Shoot and destroy them all as fast as you can to increase your combo multiplier and upgrade your weapon. Watch out for the black holes and destroy them before they suck you in.

special-trooper-forces.name: Special Trooper Forces
special-trooper-forces.description: You are the trooper forces sergeant and your mission is to use different types of weapons to shoot lots of enemy soldiers and find a way to the exit on each level in this intense 3D shooter game. Instructions: Arrow keys – Move. A,D – Step left/right. Ctrl – Shoot. Mouse – Aim. Space – Jump.

dino-attack.name: Dino Attack
dino-attack.description: The dinosaurs are attacking the village from both air and ground. Help them defense their village and kill all incoming dinosaurs. Play with mouse.

hell-on-duty.name: Hell On Duty
hell-on-duty.description: Fun cannon shooting game with ragdolls and 60 levels! Help hell inhabitants to get all demons into boilers.

sift-renegade-3.name: Sift Renegade 3
sift-renegade-3.description: A bloody platform game where we revisit Kiro's past, before his partnership with Vinnie and Shorty, when his brother Keinji was still alive.

batman-3-save-gotham.name: Batman 3 - Save Gotham
batman-3-save-gotham.description: The Joker is attacking Gotham and only you can stop him. Help Batman to defeat the Joker by using your aiming and shooting skills. Get all Trophies by completing the different tasks. Get accurate shots to get more points and beat the high score.

deadly-venom-2-origins.name: Deadly Venom 2 - Origins
deadly-venom-2-origins.description: Action prequel to the original stealth assassin game. Eliminate enemies with close combats, knife throws and strategic weapons. Hack the mainframe of this evil empire and take down their security system!

bubble-shooter-christmas.name: Bubble Shooter Christmas
bubble-shooter-christmas.description: Let's go and play classic addictive game with a goal to connect three and more same Christmas decorations. Bubble Shooter Christmas is themed to Christmas holiday with nice graphics and visual effects. The game has endless gameplay. Each 25000 points you reach, level is increased and game became faster.

aero-frenzy.name: Aero Frenzy
aero-frenzy.description: Be a strong robot named Aero to crush the evil aliens who want to rule the earth. You will be aero to kill any aliens that fly in the sky. Upgrades aero weapons so that it becomes more violent. Try to move as far as possible so that you can utterly destroy all the aliens. Reach the highest score so that you become the winner among the other players.

kill-the-wabbits.name: Kill The Wabbits
kill-the-wabbits.description: The nice and fluffy little creatures invaded every little place in the green nature. There is no single place left to go and enjoy the quiet. Kill the wabbits!!!

bear-attack.name: Bear Attack
bear-attack.description: Stop the bears from stealing your honey pots

wild-pixel-west.name: Wild Pixel West
wild-pixel-west.description: It's a busy day for the sheriff: bad guys to catch, stolen gold to collect. Oh, and your girlfriend has been kidnapped. Rescue her! Run and gun your way through the desert, high street and canyon - pixel style!

crash-minions-rockets-zombies.name: Crash Minions Rockets Zombies
crash-minions-rockets-zombies.description: Crash Minions Rockets zombies is an action game that the mission were to rescue all the minions that taken by the enemies. Blow enemies rockets and blast through all obstacles. Just beware some of the minions were already transformed to zombies.w/up arrow = upa/left arrow = leftd/right arrow = rightmouse = firespace = teleport1,2,3 = change gunsp,esc = pause/menu/sound

paintball-hero.name: Paintball Hero
paintball-hero.description: Paint ball hero is a fun shooting game with paint. Your objective is to shoot the opponents with paint ball. Use the same color ball as their cap.

world-of-tanks-the-crayfish.name: World of Tanks The Crayfish
world-of-tanks-the-crayfish.description: World of Tanks The Crayfish is another very interesting fighting type shooting game that challenges you to destroy dangerous creature in each level to successfully accomplish the mission. In order to shoot your enemies, you have to use your mouse, operate your tank by using WASD group of keys. As dangerous creatures has invaded into your region, so now you have to stand alone and fight with them to make things better. Don't get touched to these dangerous creatures to avoid health damage. Kill all dangerous enemies to make the region peaceful place as before.

doomsday-shooter.name: Doomsday Shooter
doomsday-shooter.description: Inferno army invaded the earth. The survival of mankind faces significant challenges. Energy of the inferno comes from devil crystal. Humans also hope to be able to harness the power of the devil crystal to fight demons. You're the only one who can afford such a powerful energy. Go to Fight! Warrior! Savior!

the-sniper-traning.name: The Sniper Traning
the-sniper-traning.description: The Sniper Traning - It is a movement base shooting game. In the game, the enemy will fire and move quickly. You have to shoot as quickly as you can. The game has six map. One map you have 60 seconds to shoot and 5 lives. Use Mouse to shoot and Space to aim.

captain-nutty.name: Captain Nutty
captain-nutty.description: Captain Nutty is a fun, frantic shooting game, in which you must guide an eager, adventurous squirrel on his quest for the golden acorn! Blast through the skies, shooting all obstacles in your way, collecting coins, power-ups, acorns and fuel to keep you going. Use your coins to buy upgrades; better weapons, better fuel consumption and faster rockets will go a long way to help you achieving your goal!

jack-the-zombie.name: Jack The Zombie
jack-the-zombie.description: Can you help Jack the Zombie who has survived to rescue his friends from all nasty people?

guns-of-apocalypse.name: Guns Of Apocalypse
guns-of-apocalypse.description: Mother Earth is invaded by a civilization of aggressive ganged up robots. They already exterminated the majority of humans, nevertheless here and there desperate guys are struggling with them in guerilla warfare. And you are one of them. . .

city-at-combat.name: City at Combat
city-at-combat.description: A dangerous group of gangsters have been messing around in town. As the top combat officer, you have been appointed to kill the gangsters and eliminate the gang using your superior tactical combat skills!

spwars.name: Spwars
spwars.description: Jump into this action packed space shooter. Can you last through the waves and progress onto the next level? See just how far you can get and how long you can last in this epic space shooter.

4th-of-july-clix.name: 4th Of July Clix
4th-of-july-clix.description: 4th of July Clix a cool kind of bubble shooter game here on www. agames. org! This game you should collect as many same bubbles together and click them away at once!Have fun and play some games on Agames. org.

desert-squad-3d.name: Desert Squad 3D
desert-squad-3d.description: 3D First Person Shooter set in a desert military base, Control the area and eliminate invading enemy squad units, Create your own tactic to successfully defend your base, earn a highscore and share it with world.

counter-shooter-2.name: Counter Shooter 2
counter-shooter-2.description: You are elite strike force officer and your mission is to use your assault rifle to shoot all enemy forces in order to secure the area and get the highest score.

biochemical-crisis-2.name: Biochemical Crisis 2
biochemical-crisis-2.description: Biochemical crisis, you are responsible for blocking a tunnel to prevent biochemical zombie , shooting head cancause more damage and get more points. Don't stop moving around to avoid the zombie attack. After success, game player can use points to purchase a variety of weapons, ammunition and medicine bag.

undead-invasion.name: Undead Invasion
undead-invasion.description: Undead Invasion is amazing game, you are in zombie zone and must survive. Play this exciting fps with fantastic 3D graphics.

spongebob-shoot-jellyfish.name: SpongeBob Shoot Jellyfish
spongebob-shoot-jellyfish.description: Fire your limited bullets as you get them to ricochet around kill all the jellyfish.

medieval-gunpowder.name: Medieval Gunpowder
medieval-gunpowder.description: Use the cannon to break the castle throught 25 levels, with 5 kind of cannons.

terror-combat-defense.name: Terror Combat Defense
terror-combat-defense.description: The terrorist are attacking U.S army base. you are responsible to defense the base without let it fall into hand ofterrorist hand. Kill as many terrorist as you can to collect money to buy upgrade on your weapon,defense wall and reinforcement.Dont shoot the doctor as they will give you jewel in return.use mouse to aim and shoot

anti-invasion-force.name: Anti Invasion Force
anti-invasion-force.description: Aliens are attacking Earth, defend the planet.   Full upgrade store with unlockable secret levels.

hitstick.name: Hitstick
hitstick.description: Homage to Hitman, Hitstick is a shooter game with awesome graphics and 4 exciting settings around the world. Select between two guns, your choice of difficulty and try to sift as many heads as possible!

batman-wanted.name: Batman Wanted
batman-wanted.description: Batman is the most wanted in the city! Shoot the enemies as they pull up beside you. Dodge objects on the street.

boorish-monster-world.name: Boorish Monster World
boorish-monster-world.description: This is a tricky shooting game in which you need to destroy all monsters appearing on the screen. For each level you will get fixed amount. The amount will be reduced each time you shoot a missile. When a monster kills, you will get some reward money. You must complete a level before your money finishes. Use less missiles to get more score points. You can shoot a missile using the mouse.

gangsta-killa.name: Gangsta Killa
gangsta-killa.description: You’ve gotten in trouble and now it escape the neighbourhood band. Run as fast as you can and kill all your enemies to come after you on motorcycles, cars, 4×4 and even helicopters and armed to the teeth. Shoot them with your equipment and collect all the bonuses you can to get more points.

zombo-buster.name: Zombo Buster
zombo-buster.description: Line up your anti-zombie squad and protect Medan City from the awful zombification in this strategy game.

mario-world-invaders.name: Mario World Invaders
mario-world-invaders.description: Mario World is about to get destroyed by sky invaders so he needs your help in order to overcome this imminent threaths. Join him in this epic battle where danger lies ahead with every step you make. Watch closely for the hidden enemies that also come from underneath like the mole and lava monster. Collect all the items that are dropped by the invaders in order to earn extra lives or fire upgrades.

zombies-in-the-shadow-the-saviour-2.name: Zombies In The Shadow The Saviour 2
zombies-in-the-shadow-the-saviour-2.description: During the Zombie apocalypse, Jim saved his daughter Alice, but his wife Claire is still trapped in the bank: go and save her!

naruto-ninja.name: Naruto Ninja
naruto-ninja.description: You are Naruto on a mission to survive enemy attack. Battle through multiple waves of ninja action and unlock unique trophies.

hugo-with-ak47.name: Hugo With AK47
hugo-with-ak47.description: You are homeless guy named Hugo and you must use your assault rifle to defend youself from hordes of crazy attacking enemies and bosses, try to aim and shoot fast in order to survive and complete each level.

grand-theft-counter-strike.name: Grand Theft Counter Strike
grand-theft-counter-strike.description: Play as a grand theft in the counter strike game. Shoot with accuracy and speed to kill all opponents in each level.

violent-block-5.name: Violent Block 5
violent-block-5.description: Shooting game, earn points to defeat an enemy!

reddye-1000-kills.name: RedDye 1000 Kills
reddye-1000-kills.description: Battle in the blood spill arena with your custom warrior and stay alive! Reach 1000 total kills while upgrading your weapons and health to win the game! Various types of new enemies will challenge you to the death as the game progresses.

blak-sampson-and-the-swarms-of-mars.name: Blak Sampson and the Swarms of Mars
blak-sampson-and-the-swarms-of-mars.description: A platoon of Universal Patrol Troopers (UPT) get sent to the planet Mars on intel that a group of child slaves will be traded there. The UPT infiltrate the slavers fortress and rescue the orphans, but only trooper Blak Sampson makes it out alive. While he waits in the barren deserts of Mars for his rescue ship, he defends the orphans from the slavers swarms of rabid alien grubs.

duck-tub-battle.name: Duck Tub Battle
duck-tub-battle.description: Fight your way to waves of enemies and bosses. In this action survival shooter game.

fortress-defense.name: Fortress Defense
fortress-defense.description: Protect your fort and make sure they do not reach it and get the change to destroy it. Upgrade your Fort, Sniper, Health and make sure you hold the attack! Hold on as long you can and become the real hero in Fortress Defense!

awesome-mushroom-hunter.name: Awesome Mushroom Hunter
awesome-mushroom-hunter.description: What an awesome day for mushroom hunting! Nothing can possibly go wrong, yeah?

pursuit-special.name: Pursuit Special
pursuit-special.description: Game have more level. and you can upgrade your weapons or buy . Special Forces shoulder the mission of safeguarding regional security. We must remember, special forces dispatched a helicopter to arrest warlord leader. Mouse to aim, click to shoot.

united-force-2.name: United Force 2
united-force-2.description: United Force 2 is a great shooting game. You are special forces soldier and your mission is to use your weapon aim skills to shoot enemy soldiers and survive in this shooter game.

ultimate-target-2.name: Ultimate Target 2
ultimate-target-2.description: Ultimate Target 2 is a great shooting game. You are a soldier of the elite anti-terrorist squad and your mission is to eliminate all terrorist.

bug-slayer.name: Bug Slayer
bug-slayer.description: You have 12 days to save your garden from the Bug bosses. Upgrade your butterfly to the teeth in this bullet hell game.

the-ghost-hunt.name: The Ghost Hunt
the-ghost-hunt.description: Few villages in the country are found be haunted. You are supposed to hunt them and destroy them with some mystic objects. Clear maximum Ghosts to unlock new villages and move on. The game comprises of 10 villages to play and you are supposed to complete them with in time limit. Game is sponsored by Dhoola

zombie-wrangle.name: Zombie Wrangle
zombie-wrangle.description: You've been left all alone to take out the enemy Zombies who are attacking your base! Load up your gun and save the world by taking them all out earning money along the way.With the money earned at the end of each round you have the options to upgrade your ammo or buy new guns and upgrades to help take out any oncoming waves!Play across 4 different maps and finally defeat the Zombie Boss to complete the game and save humanity!

valentines-bubbles.name: Valentines Bubbles
valentines-bubbles.description: Where are the bubbles coming from? What do they mean? Does Cupid's quiver hold enough arrows to stop them from taking over the screen? So many questions and only one answer: You. This Valentines Day it's game on when an invading cellular rainbow dares threaten the boundaries of EARTH.

submarine-war.name: Submarine War
submarine-war.description: The submarine war is a type of naval battles game, Players need to control their submarine to finish mission. On the way, will encounter a lot of enemies, complete mission after destroy them. When destory an enemy will get money, Only reasonable upgrade weapons level to becom strong.

soccer-knockdown.name: Soccer KnockDown
soccer-knockdown.description: Knock out all images from the screen with your trusty slingshot and soccer balls. Go through 18 challenging levels that will require strong nerves and steady hand.

lightningman-operation.name: Lightningman Operation
lightningman-operation.description: Game story:Lightning superman is the angel of justice, this time he received a task, into the interior of the evil forces, dangerous there, let's adventure together with him. Controls:A. D to move, W to jump, user mouse to aim and shot.

eat-my-nuts.name: Eat My Nuts
eat-my-nuts.description: The squirrels are hungry and they want your nuts. Do not be greedy and do not be shy! Share your nuts to the poor rodents and make them happy. Let them chew it! Let them taste your delicious nuts!

heavy-shooter.name: Heavy Shooter
heavy-shooter.description: Heavy Shooter is a post apocalypse fps first person shooter game where you are a rogue female assassin and killing is your duty. Shoot it out in four different battle fields; War Zone, Radiation, Crash Site and Quarantine. Accumulate skulls in game and upgrade your assault weapon and game perks. Your shooter skills will be put to test on the front line! Clear waves of enemies, unlock new levels and complete side challenges. A true call to arms.

infinity-2.name: Infinity 2
infinity-2.description: Lost behind enemy lines in the infinite depths of space, warding off waves of drones, warlords and the witchdoctor, you must fight to survive.  Collect health orbs to retain structural integrity and gold bars to auto-upgrade for the massive fire-power needed to fight the torrent of bullet rain of alien warlords in this unrelenting retro shoot 'em up.

zombie-extreme-shooting.name: Zombie Extreme Shooting
zombie-extreme-shooting.description: Join now a brand new zombie game, one of the most addicting and entertaining, intense zombie-blasting action game play in one of the most addictive zombie survival games! Use your shooting experience and career you have create by yourself in our previous game and start exploring the world of a zombies war. It all started with an ugly virus that spread all over the world. From the very first second, people who got in touch with this virus became zombies. Shoot all the zombies now!

counter-shooter.name: Counter Shooter
counter-shooter.description: Use your assault rifle and your shooting skills to eliminate all special forces soldiers on each level. Use the mouse to play.

air-combat-revenge.name: Air Combat Revenge
air-combat-revenge.description: Ready for a Combat? Air Combat Revenge is taking you to a huge air battle with loads of enemy's and different guns!

prince-vs-zombies.name: Prince VS Zombies
prince-vs-zombies.description: A castle has been invaded by a group of transformed zombies. They have a strong capability and weapons. In order to prevent them from spreading rapidly and destruction everywhere, the prince pick up weapon to counter it!Controls:use mouse to aim and fire, '1, 2, 3' to select weapon, 'Q' to switch weapon, 'R' to reload, SPACEBAR to zoom.

save-the-spiderman.name: Save the Spiderman
save-the-spiderman.description: Biker Gang wants Spiderman dead or a live. Your mission is to save Spiderman car and finish all levels.

the-most-wanted-bandito-2.name: The Most Wanted Bandito 2
the-most-wanted-bandito-2.description: Bandito is back! Accompanied with friends on a mission to protect what's his. Pick your most wanted bandito and unleash anarchy with his skills of shooting and horse riding, combined into a lethal weapon.

cs-zombies-battle.name: CS Zombies Battle
cs-zombies-battle.description: Because of an accident, the personnel of the biochemical laboratory all become zombies. You are in charge of the blockade of the laboratory to prevent zombies come out from laboratory. Headshot means more damage and higher score. After battle you can buy medicine bag, all kinds of ammo and more powerful guns. The game will become more and more difficult as the amount and type of zombies will increase! Wish you good luck!

planet-smash.name: Planet Smash
planet-smash.description: Arcade retro shooter. shoot down the aliens with loads of upgrades

rapid-gun-2.name: Rapid Gun 2
rapid-gun-2.description: 3D first person shooter. Explore the enemy territory and eliminate all enemy soldiers. Clear the area to complete your mission.

zombudoy.name: Zombudoy
zombudoy.description: Hungry zombies are trying to steal your food. Defend it and don't let them do so. Many kinds of zombies, many kinds of weapons, pure fun!

little-bullets-2.name: Little Bullets 2
little-bullets-2.description: POOR THUMB - A little small bullet hell shoot'em up for testing your reflexes. Fly and shoot as many enemy as you can!

american-unit-3.name: American Unit 3
american-unit-3.description: American Unit 3 is a great first person shooter game.You are US Army special forces soldier and your  mission is to use your weapon aim skills to  shoot enemy terorist  and survive in this  shooter game.

dora-archery.name: Dora Archery
dora-archery.description: Help Dora Pop the target number of bloons to pass each level using a arrow and a bow

knights-invasion.name: Knights Invasion
knights-invasion.description: Ready to be the winner at this battle? In this game you will become an archer who will try to defend your country from knights attack . Let's shoot knights with your bow until they die and can't reach the wall. Buy new weapons in the shop to get more powerfull power to win the battle. Let's be a great archer!

zombie-redemption.name: Zombie Redemption
zombie-redemption.description: The Zombies have taken over the neighborhood, your job is to shoot them until there is no more left. They are every where, kill them before they get to you.

comprehensive-on-fire.name: Comprehensive On Fire
comprehensive-on-fire.description: This is a first person shooter game. Contains a number of classic scene Cross Fire inside! Shooting the head and body of the score is different. A total of 5 levels. All through the can go into survival mode. So we can better practice marksmanship. The fifth awards for Razer submachine gun. Cross Fire fans should not miss!

face-shot-2.name: Face Shot 2
face-shot-2.description: Use your pistol or sniper to shoot the balloon faces in each level. Use the objects around to bounce or change directions of the bullets. A unique twist of shooter and physics style game.

mass-mayhem-2099-ad.name: Mass Mayhem - 2099 A.D.
mass-mayhem-2099-ad.description: Set in the future 2099 A.D. there is even more Government opression and corporate domination. But you can take them all down with Mass Mayhem!

mario-shoot-balloon.name: Mario Shoot Balloon
mario-shoot-balloon.description: Mario Shoot Balloon is a fun physics puzzle game. Please help mario use his cannon to shoot the balloons! Make all balloons burst to complete a level! Hold your mouse, concentrates your mind, try to complete all levels with 3 stars!

stickman-of-duty.name: Stickman of Duty
stickman-of-duty.description: You have to defeat the waves of enemies in a 3D town, finding them and eliminating them before they do.Shoot all stickman characters that you will find on your way. Use your radar to locate them, collect ammunition so you have a chance to survive, get more time to get a higher score and beat your friends in the global rankings.Controls:Arrow Keys to move around the 3D stickman town.Z and C – To move sidewards.X- To Shoot.

buxle-the-descent.name: Buxle The Descent
buxle-the-descent.description: A Cave with 300 people need your defense against all the Zombies. If You miss a zombie alive in the cave, then they will return with at least 10 more zombified people. It may become impossible to stay alive!

golden-sniper-cf.name: Golden Sniper CF
golden-sniper-cf.description: Golden Sniper CF is a shooting game with cool sniper files. there are three levels for you to choose.your aim is to survive in different area.in order to finish your order,come on baby!

cf-street-war.name: CF Street War
cf-street-war.description: It is a CF shooting game, Terrorists occupied the corner of New York, surrounded by policeman . pick up your bombs, and destroy all the terrorists!

booger-rush-2.name: Booger Rush 2
booger-rush-2.description: Your mission in this weird game is to fling and hurl your booger to your fellow nerds for no reason. Lets just say, you are doing this for fun because you can not really perform this kinda of stuff in real life. So, what are you waiting for? Stretch that mucus and make that sticky projectile reach your target!

robin-shoot-apple.name: Robin Shoot Apple
robin-shoot-apple.description: "Three feet of ice cold day, Will not just one day cold"-this is a very famous proverb in China. It means if someone wants to be succeed, His has to work very hard. It is suit for Robin too. When his was youth, He try to shoot again and again. This time his is try to shoot apple. Help him to shoot all of the apples.

super-mario-defend-peach.name: Super Mario - Defend Peach
super-mario-defend-peach.description: Mario is finally retired and has a happy life with Peach. They are just married in peach's big castle. But Mario's old life is chasing him. He takes a gun from Wario to start defending peach. Mario will finish this once and for all. Are you able to defeat Bowser and his fighters for the last time?

free-fred.name: Free Fred
free-fred.description: As a kid, your best friend was a dolphin, some bad guys kidnapped it and now, while you are older, you are going to fight them. Upgrade your abilities and ship till you'll win.

dragon-world-war.name: Dragon World War
dragon-world-war.description: Welcome to the Mystery Land! Here all the dragons are fighting against the airplanes. Your goal is to shoot all the planes and to help the dragons to complete the levels. Use your fantastic skills and finish the adventure as a champion. It is up to you to decide how the world war is going to end. Do your best and try to finish it fast. Dragon World War is a fun game for kids and not only. Try it!

dark-ops-shooter.name: Dark Ops Shooter
dark-ops-shooter.description: You are elite forces soldier and your mission is to use your sub-machine gun to shoot all enemy forces, try to aim fast to survive and successfully eliminate all enemies in order to progress to the next levels. Use the mouse to play.

spongebob-shootout.name: SpongeBob Shootout
spongebob-shootout.description: Guys, get ready for shootout! Plankton created army of evil clones in order to conquer Krusty Krab restaurant. SpongeBob must defend the restaurant and take out all the clones! Kill all the clones to advance to next level. Don't forget to use the bomb to disable vehicles! Good luck!

alien-assault.name: Alien Assault
alien-assault.description: Defends your base from the Alien Assault. Hordes of alien creatures are trying to blow up your buildings. Make sure you keep hope alive for humanity by destroying them all, before they get a chance to do the same to you. At the start of each wave you will be shown where the enemy invasion is coming from, so be sure to use those few seconds to rearrange your troops and come up with a strategy. Take command of your little soldiers and decide where they will shoot.

sky-knight-2.name: Sky Knight 2
sky-knight-2.description: In Sky Knight 2, it's make or break as you take on the menacing sky battalion, armed only with your plane, your guns, and if you're lucky... a friend. Be a one-man air army, or team up with a fellow sky knight to defeat the unrelenting enemy force. Either way, you'll be outnumbered, so stay sharp!

save-bank-money-car.name: Save Bank Money Car
save-bank-money-car.description: Start a new shooting adventure. The city mafia wants to capture the bank money car and your mission is to make sure that this car will safely arrive at the bank to deliver the money. Use your shooting dexterity in this shooting game, earn money and buy the most sophisticated guns. Also you can buy more help from police by choosing maximum 2 police cars and 2 police motorcycles to help you. This will bring you more life. Good Luck!

the-most-wanted-bandito.name: The Most Wanted Bandito
the-most-wanted-bandito.description: Welcome to the Wild West! Shoot bandits, jump over obstacles and become the most wanted bandito, on your quest to apprehend the most dangerous bandit of them all - Elmuerto!

robot-revolt.name: Robot Revolt
robot-revolt.description: Robot Revolt is a space themed defense shooting game in which you will be trying ti fight off oncoming enemy waves of robots who are trying to attack your base! Shoot them to earn space cogs and spend what you earn at the end of each wave in the upgrade store.

anti-terrorist-sniper.name: Anti Terrorist Sniper
anti-terrorist-sniper.description: Angeles has a high crime rate in the early 1960s, Facing growing violent problem , Angeles police organization began to establish a team of special police who are quick response, well-trained, well-equipped and able to respond to major emergencies.

counter-flash-2.name: Counter Flash 2
counter-flash-2.description: Aim and fire as fast as you can to eliminate all enemy troopers on each level in this shooter game. Instructions: Mouse to Shoot.

counter-force.name: Counter Force
counter-force.description: Counter Force Tray to use your gun the best as you can. You must kill all enemy's or most of them so if you like to go on the next level. Each level is harder then level before. In highest level you can use sniper rifle. Use mouse to move, left click to shoot and R to reload.

counter-kill.name: Counter Kill
counter-kill.description: In Counter Kill, you must fight your way through 3 intense levels to find a stolen priceless relic! Shoot down waves of enemy soldiers and progress your way into the enemy fortress to regain possession of the golden cross!

counter-strike-de-hiekka.name: Counter Strike De Hiekka
counter-strike-de-hiekka.description: Practice your shooting skills with a high power sniper rifle. Practice in three scenes from the map De Hiekka.

where-is-cat.name: Where Is Cat?
where-is-cat.description: Where Is Cat? is a game in which you own a black cat. The cat is unbelievably mischievous and it keeps hiding around to tease you. You have to show that you are smarter than the cat by finding the cat and clicking on it. You need to have excellent observational abilities to find the cat over and over again.

tank-world-hero.name: Tank World Hero
tank-world-hero.description: Tank World Hero is a side scrolling game that contains 10 distinct levels with increasing difficulty. You have got to drive your tank to the end of each level killing all the enemies that you face on your way. Drive carefully because the tracks are not easy to drive on.

idle-tree.name: Idle Tree
idle-tree.description: Idle Tree is a very interesting idle game. You will have fun playing this game. You just got to go on clicking on the tree to grow the leaves on it. You may also get gems at times. You can use the leaves to avail upgrades that will make your clicks even more productive.

donald-trump-pinball.name: Donald Trump Pinball
donald-trump-pinball.description: Donald Trump Pinball is a fun filled online game in which you will get a very nice pinball set in which you can see the images of the popular celebrity and leader. Launch the ball and then use the pedals very effectively to keep the ball in play for as long as possible.

bread-pit.name: Bread Pit
bread-pit.description: Bread Pit is a physics based game that has 28 awesome levels. There will be a slice of bread and some pieces of cheese in each level of the game. You have to click on the various objects in the play screen in the correct order to let the slice of bread and the pieces of cheese reach the toaster.

escape-the-game.name: Escape The Game
escape-the-game.description: Escape The Game is a point and click escape game in which you have entered the game that you had been playing on your computer. Now you must interact with the characters in the game and solve the puzzles using the clues that you find in order to find a way to escape from the game.

whack-your-neighbour.name: Whack Your Neighbour
whack-your-neighbour.description: Whack Your Neighbor is a game that will have many bloody scenes. You should avoid playing the game if you do not want to see gore scenes. You have a neighbor who is a very annoying and a very interfering person. You have to find all possible ways to kill the jerk.

g-switch-2.name: G-Switch 2
g-switch-2.description: G-Switch 2 is a fast paced platform adventure game in which you will be in control of the main character. He is a mechanical character and he can switch gravity at will. He will be running forward all the time and you have to help him use his special ability to go as far as possible.

escape-from-l33t.name: Escape From L33T
escape-from-l33t.description: This building that you are in is not a safe place to be in. You have to find a way to leave the building although it will not be an easy thing to do. However, there is no better option than to try. You either try and be successful or get killed while trying.

avoid.name: Avoid
avoid.description: Avoid is a very challenging online game in which you are supposed to control the main character of the game. Help the character move carefully to avoid the moving spikes in order to survive for as long as possible. The coins that appear randomly in the play area are worth collecting.

school-bus-frenzy.name: School Bus Frenzy
school-bus-frenzy.description: School Bus Frenzy is a game that lets you play in Arcade Mode or Survival Mode. Your task in the game is to bring the specified number of kids to the school bus. You can then choose the upgrades according to the availability and the requirement. Be careful, there will be other moving vehicles on the road and they can run over the kids.

orange-runner.name: Orange Runner
orange-runner.description: Orange Runner is who you will be as you play this online game. The side scrolling game will have you control the main character. You are supposed to let the character run fast and jump with very good timing to collect certain items, avoid certain dangers and beat the opponents that appear in the scene.

block-town-parking.name: Block Town Parking
block-town-parking.description: Block Town Parking is a game that comes with 68 very difficult parking spots spread across 15 distinct levels. The game also allows you to choose from different difficulty modes and different vehicles. The primary task in the game is to drive your vehicle very skillfully to get it parked perfectly in the designated parking spots.

the-torture-game-2.name: The Torture Game 2
the-torture-game-2.description: This is a gore game and you should void playing it if you cannot tolerate bloody scenes on your screen. You are given the permission to torture the character that you see inside the torture room. There will be so many different tools available in the room. You can use them to carry out the torture.

building-demolisher-2.name: Building Demolisher 2
building-demolisher-2.description: Building Demolisher 2 is a game in which there 25 fantastic levels. You will need physics skills while using the various tools to carry out the demolition task in each level of the game. Bear in mind that you will have limited options available in each level and to be successful you ought to use those options in the most effective way.

spike-a-love-story.name: Spike - A Love Story
spike-a-love-story.description: Spike - A Love Story is a game that is bloody in nature. You are a deadly spike who falls in love with the humans that come by. Strangely you will be killing them to keep for yourself. All the humans will try to escape unhurt but you should not let them escape. Smash them into small pieces.

bubble-struggle-3.name: Bubble Struggle 3
bubble-struggle-3.description: Bubble Struggle 3 is game that can be played in single player or two players mode. You will have a weapon that you must use very effectively to shoot at the bouncing bubbles to break them into smaller pieces until they disappear. Avoid getting touched by the bubble because it will be the end.

heart-surgery.name: Heart Surgery
heart-surgery.description: Heart Surgery is a game where you are a surgeon and today you have a patient who is a young boy. The boy has a serious heart condition and he will need to be put through an immediate surgery. Seek the help of your assistant and perform the surgery in the correct way to save the life of the boy.

nyan-cat-fever.name: Nyan Cat Fever
nyan-cat-fever.description: This is a side scrolling and fast paced online game in which you must control the cat that is hungry and will need your help to eat up as many food items as possible. There will be some enemies that the cat must avoid during the food hunt. The scores that you earn during the game play will reflect your performance. Play for high scores.

eye-surgery.name: Eye Surgery
eye-surgery.description: Eye Surgery is what you will be performing here in this online game in which you are a doctor. You will have an expert team to assist you during the surgery but remember that it is your calls and moves that will be counted and you must not go wrong at any point.

soccer-doctor-2.name: Soccer Doctor 2
soccer-doctor-2.description: Soccer Doctor 2 is a game in which play as an amateur doctor who is supposed to take care of the star player and perform a surgery to save his life after he has been badly injured before a match. You will have to use the various tools in the correct way to carry out the surgery.

epic-combo-redux.name: Epic Combo Redux
epic-combo-redux.description: Epic Combo Redux is a fun filled and a very addictive free online game. The stickman who is the main character of the game has a huge mallet that he has to use very effectively to smash maximum number of turtles as they pass across the screen. The money earned can be spent on useful upgrades and better weapons.

arm-surgery-2.name: Arm Surgery 2
arm-surgery-2.description: Arm Surgery 2 is a game in which you are a surgeon and you have an experienced nurse who will be assisting you during the surgery. The patient today is a young girl who has a broken arm and the only option left is to perform a surgery. You will have to use the various tools in the correct way to perform the surgery successfully.

night-rider-turbo.name: Night Rider Turbo
night-rider-turbo.description: Night Rider Turbo is a game in which you will be returning from a late night party. You probably had too much drink at the party and that is going to make driving all that more difficult. Let us see if you are still in control of yourself and if you can drive back home without hitting or getting hit by the other vehicles on the road.

lol-eater-2.name: Lol Eater 2
lol-eater-2.description: Lol Eater 2 is a game in which you must show fast reflexes while moving the eater. You should let the eater consume the green memes that will be seen on the screen. However, the screen will have other types of memes that must be avoided very skillfully. The score that you earn will be the reflection of your performance.

n-game-2.name: N Game 2
n-game-2.description: N Game 2 is a fast paced platform adventure game in which you have unlimited lives but limited time. You will have to move, jump, slide and do everything possible to collect all the gold pieces, to overcome all the hurdles and to reach the exit of each level. There are many levels in the game and that will keep you busy for a rather long time.

tonsil-surgery.name: Tonsil Surgery
tonsil-surgery.description: Tonsil Surgery is a game in which you will be a doctor who has to carry out a surgery on a teenager to remove the tonsils that are infected. You will have a senior doctor to guide you through the entire process but you are the one who will make the finals calls and hopefully you do a good job.

mario-war-escape.name: Mario War Escape
mario-war-escape.description: Bowser is flying his clown car to attack Mario and Luigi. Bowser will shoot fireballs at them and burn mario and Luigi. Help mario and Luigi place the breaks in the right spot to protect them!

fireball-space.name: Fireball Space
fireball-space.description: One big task, Avoid the sun! How long can you survive?

sapphires-room-escape.name: Sapphire's Room Escape
sapphires-room-escape.description: Sapphire Room Escape is a very trick room escape game. At first it seems simple to solve but it'll take a lot of effort of you.

galactic-odyssey-solitaire.name: Galactic Odyssey Solitaire
galactic-odyssey-solitaire.description: New patience game with two types of gameplay and a lot of levels. You are Galactic Odyssey knocking about the cosmic world. Move from one planet to another and return to the Earth where Penelope is waiting. There are twenty planets with 5 levels in each, so 100 levels in sum for your continuous pleasure.  The game combines two types of the popular solitaire: Tripeaks and Match2 with different rules.

space-survivors.name: Space Survivors
space-survivors.description: Did you ever dream of being in zero gravity? This spaceship was crashed and now you are supposed to evacuate spacemen avoiding different dangers, such as swamping holes, hungry aliens, sharp spikes, blowing fans, etc. Push the spaceman to the exit avoiding various dangers. Partly physic puzzle and partly action. 20 various levels. 2 difficulty modes.

hanger-2.name: Hanger 2
hanger-2.description: Use your rope to swing your way through each level. Try not to lose too many body parts along the way! Can you make it through each level alive?

bieber-ultimate-quiz.name: Bieber Ultimate quiz
bieber-ultimate-quiz.description: How well do you know Justin Bieber? You have one minute to answer as many questions as possible and test your Bieber knowledge.

catch-and-avoid.name: Catch and Avoid
catch-and-avoid.description: Catch missiles with one mochi while avoiding them with the other

impulse-2.name: Impulse 2
impulse-2.description: Trapped on an ever shrinking island of ice and unable to swim, killer ice balls are hailing down and penguin must dodge for his life.

christmas-spot-the-difference-game.name: Christmas - Spot The Difference Game
christmas-spot-the-difference-game.description: Find all 7 differences between each pair of images to progress in this spot the difference game.

skillball.name: SkillBall
skillball.description: SkillBall is a great new Arkanoid/Breakout game clone with 20 beautiful and well designed levels of increasing difficulty.

turbulent-tundra.name: Turbulent Tundra
turbulent-tundra.description: A one button, arcade game with an addictive nature. Will you help the penguin escape the collapsing ice flow? No, you won't but see how far you get anyway!

monster-ball.name: Monster Ball
monster-ball.description: Swing your tennis ball around and bop the 541 monsters.  See how many you can get!

12-towers.name: 12 Towers
12-towers.description: 12 Towers is a fast paced matching game with a funny challenge, You have to demolish the blocks of building, in order to keep them away from planes.

cheese-adventure.name: Cheese Adventure
cheese-adventure.description: Playing for a mouse get to the royal cheese. Breaking the barriers swipe the mouse across 20 interesting levels.

dino-breath.name: Dino Breath
dino-breath.description: The dino are having fun out there near the river. Somehow they found the statues of themself. Thestatues are lack of color. The dino have to use their breath to color all the status as the same color as themself. Use arrow to guide the breath of reaching the status. Have Funuse mouse to play

donkey-light-fire.name: Donkey Light Fire
donkey-light-fire.description: A long time ago,There is no electricity.So all animals has to light up the fire to keep it light. In this game,A cute donkey wants to light up all the fire.Help him. Good luck.

red-flappy-bird.name: Red Flappy Bird
red-flappy-bird.description: Another remake of the fabled flappy bird game. Navigate your way through the maze of evil Block towers, and try to score as many points as you can.

dragons-flight.name: Dragons Flight
dragons-flight.description: A new dragon has been born on your ranch. It is your duty to train him. Guide the dragon through the caves and into the world without hitting any objects. Go forth and awaken the golden dragon that lies within.

break-free-pirate-ship.name: Break Free Pirate Ship
break-free-pirate-ship.description: You were on vacation and feel asleep on the beach. When you woke up you were on a pirate ship! Now you must search around and figure out how to break free! Good Luck!

collapsing-blocks.name: Collapsing Blocks
collapsing-blocks.description: Mr Tom is one of the most skilled builders. In this game he will build a strong wall, and your mission is to break it down completely. Collect at least two bricks of the same color and click on them. Tour goal is to destroy them all. Lets see who will be able to complete the game! You will experience adventure, adrenaline and quality action. Enjoy the game!

doggy-dental-care.name: Doggy Dental Care
doggy-dental-care.description: Doggy needs your attention because he has some tooth problems lately. Check out his mouth and see which are the problems. If you think you can handle this situation then take the cute doggy to your office and start solving the tooth problems. Help the dog to go through this and reward him with a delicious bone as a prize. It is fun to play and the kids love this game. Enjoy being a vet dentist doctor and take care of the lovely pets!

nut-crazy.name: Nut Crazy
nut-crazy.description: This squirrel is Nut Crazy! Help him get all the nuts

baby-nora-flappy-adventure.name: Baby Nora Flappy Adventure
baby-nora-flappy-adventure.description: Baby Nora is sleeping and dreaming that she is an angel. Can you help her avoid all obstacles and reach the finish in this baby flappy game.

paper-balls.name: Paper Balls
paper-balls.description: They all laughed at your new hairstyle! It really made you upset!  Pick up the paper balls and throw at them!

monsters-vs-evil.name: Monsters Vs Evil
monsters-vs-evil.description: The little cute orange monster are having fun on a platform, but suddenly a big purple monster appear on the platformas well. It is disturbing the little monsters fun. Help the orange monster reach purple monster and get him out of there.Use orange monster friend black,green and red monster to help him out.use mouse to click and play

medieval-rooms-escape.name: Medieval Rooms Escape
medieval-rooms-escape.description: Great Researcher reached the medieval room to discover the ancient object and things. While cleaning the items they were locked inside the room by touching the wrong one. How they can escape from the ancient room, they need your help. Serve them to elude from the situation quickly by obtaining the gold balls and work the puzzle quickly.

teddies-monsters.name: Teddies & Monsters
teddies-monsters.description: Free the teddies from monsters. Push evil monsters in the lava, and don't let teddies to fall, through 24 challenging levels. Fun and unique physics shooting skill game.

ice-ball-fire-ball.name: Ice Ball Fire Ball
ice-ball-fire-ball.description: Ice Ball Fire Ball is an interesting puzzle flash game, the lover want to be together.but there are always so many obstacles on their way. click your mouse to eliminate all obstacles and make them together!

bubble-shooter-a-new-challenge.name: Bubble Shooter A New Challenge
bubble-shooter-a-new-challenge.description: This is a special bubble shooter game in which you will find a rounding wheel of bubbles. In each level you need to reach to a target score number. Shoot the bubble towards the wheel to make the group of same color bubbles. Bigger group gives better score than smaller groups. If you surplus the score for a level, it will be a good help to pass the next levels.

megastar-sliding.name: Megastar Sliding
megastar-sliding.description: A super version of 2048 game with merging the same type of stars by sliding them. Keep merging until you get the Megastar. The reunion feature will add a great thing to its game play. Use keyboard (Recommended) or mouse (if you prefer) to play this game.

pou-lovely-kiss-2.name: Pou Lovely Kiss 2
pou-lovely-kiss-2.description: Pou is in love with the pink pou. He wants to reach the pink pou in order to kiss his love. The pink pouwill be located at different location in each level. Help the pou reach her and kiss her. Collectbaby pou to gain extra points. use mouse to play

slappy-turd.name: Slappy Turd
slappy-turd.description: Miss your Flappy game or want something different? The parody is here! Slappy Turd is a challenging and addictive game which will entertain you for hours. The goal is easy . . . flap your turd as far as you can and try to beat your highscore. Good luck► Fly your turd as far as you can. ► Try to beat your best score. ► Funny and addictive. ► You'll have a smelly fun time!

ben-10-cross-the-hell.name: Ben 10 Cross The Hell
ben-10-cross-the-hell.description: Ben 10 is in a embarrassing situation, it is stuck in hell, help him to escape

right-brain-left-brain.name: Right Brain Left Brain
right-brain-left-brain.description: Right Brain Left Brain is a skill game whick the art is simple , but the content is creative and the way to play is good. You have to use your right brain andleft brain to control two ball run different road and reach different target. It's hard to make this in the same time. You can hava a try. WASD control Red ball, Arrow keys control green ball.

class-room-escapes.name: Class Room Escapes
class-room-escapes.description: End of the day all your mates went out of the classroom when the overbell rung. When you see, you were the one left alone in the classroom with the the doors locked. Take this as challenge and risk your self from the classroom using clues and solving puzzles to escape.

dummy-never-fails.name: Dummy Never Fails
dummy-never-fails.description: Throw crash dummies like a ragdoll to reach the goal, less pain the better! Play 52 levels to unlock 51 different dummy skins! Have Fun!

satanorium.name: Satanorium
satanorium.description: Your car broke down at an abandoned mental hospital. It's up to you to go looking around for parts to get the car working and to save the trapped girls!

dummy-never-fails-community.name: Dummy Never Fails: Community
dummy-never-fails-community.description: Dummy returns after the great success of the original game! Now with over 110 new levels and 50 skins to unlock!

pharaoh-mahjong.name: Pharaoh Mahjong
pharaoh-mahjong.description: Discover Pharaoh Culture in ancient Egypt civilization playing this mahjong game. The game includes large set of numbers and letters symbols, your goal is to clear the playing area of tiles by matching pairs in the shortest time possible.

kingdom-reaction.name: Kingdom Reaction
kingdom-reaction.description: Kingdom Reaction is a chain reaction game with medieval theme. Features:- Explode 9 kinds of enemies each with unique explosion type to make the chain reaction and pass the level- Pass through 40 levels and free your castle- Break bottles with acid and explosive to make the chain reaction bigger- Collect coins, chests, keys, make combos to get the higher score- Save princesses- Earn achievements and break records

dino-break-away.name: Dino Break Away
dino-break-away.description: The little green dino is trapped inside a cage under the ground. The only way for him to escape is reachthe portal that lead to the outside world. Use your skill to bring the green dino to the portal and freeit.use mouse to play

go-home-block.name: Go Home Block
go-home-block.description: Help the block to reach the exit in each level (24 levels). The block can not be moved directly, click away other blocks and let the TNT explode to set the block in motion. Mouse to click the blocks to activate (TNT etc).

goomba-treasure.name: Goomba Treasure
goomba-treasure.description: Help Goomba to collect all the hidden treasures inside the cave. Watch out for the stones when you take the items beneath and avoid being spot by Boo the phantom. After you find all the collectable items such as coins, mushrooms, flowers, gems and alike head out for the door to advance to the next level. There are also five medal awards for you to achieve while playing online.

horror-room-escape.name: Horror Room Escape
horror-room-escape.description: I don’t know where I am and it seems to be strange place. I could not remember how I came here…. Oh No! Someone did a murder here, I feel i am estranged. Help me to escape from here.

mini-heads.name: Mini Heads
mini-heads.description: All the Mini Heads have fancy hats on their head! Shoot off the hat as fast as you can to collect the highest score. 24 levels of shooting challenge!

super-marshmallow-kingdom.name: Super Marshmallow Kingdom
super-marshmallow-kingdom.description: Super Marshmallow Kingdom is one toasts battle against the evil forces of marshmallows, cats, tarts, pigs and more! Sent from king marshmallow who is upset after you ate his muffin. With explosions galore dodge your way through 10 action packed levels while upgrading your crumby abilities.

fox-farm-attack.name: Fox Farm Attack
fox-farm-attack.description: The Fox is hungry and want to steal some food from your farm. Use ball to destroy the object and usefire to kill the fox. In some case, you will have to use chicken to lure the fox out and kill them withtraps. Protect your farm from the starving fox. use mouse to play

icy-girl-tooth-problems.name: Icy Girl Tooth Problems
