icy-girl-tooth-problems.description: Frozen needs your help doctor, so in this dentist game online you will need to help her get her teeth nice and shiny in order for her to look amazing and smile all the time as she poses on the red carpet.

royal-baby-ear-doctor.name: Royal Baby Ear Doctor
royal-baby-ear-doctor.description: Today you will be helping the royal couple as their baby has some ear problems in this baby doctor game. You will have to make sure that the baby will be healthy and happy once he leaves your office so the parents will be happy as well.

hungry-angrybirds.name: Hungry Angrybirds
hungry-angrybirds.description: This is a puzzle game, Green pigs broke into the home of Angrybirds, angry birds angry again, can not wait to eat nasty green pigs. Come to find ways to help the birds to destroy green pigs.

bubbly-bubble.name: Bubbly Bubble
bubbly-bubble.description: Your task while playing the ‘Bubbly Bubble’ fun game will be to guide a floating bubble in its super fun adventure through the world! Don’t you imagine is going to be an easy task… there will be a lot of pipes in your way, some of them up and others down, and you will have to avoid them in order to take your bubbly bubble as far as possible! Are you ready? Goooo!!

potato-hero.name: Potato Hero
potato-hero.description: Potato Hero wants to be French fry. But other vegetables are not letting him to be french fry. Let potato hero pass through the kitchen and reach his goal of becoming frenchfry. Arrow keys to moveSpacebar to jump

dodge-copter.name: Dodge Copter
dodge-copter.description: Survive as long as you can in this mini-game. Use your mouse to control the helicopter, avoid the bombs and collect gold to buy ammo.

crazy-bee-the-game.name: Crazy Bee The Game
crazy-bee-the-game.description: This is a very fun and addictive game!Enjoy playing CRAZY BEE THE GAME. Click the mouse to boost the bee and fly throught the beehives. Have fun!

hungry-fish.name: Hungry Fish
hungry-fish.description: In the sea, you are a fish, you need to find your way home. on the road, you need to constantly eat and grow up, but also take care do not to be eaten by stronger fish.

swing-copter.name: Swing Copter
swing-copter.description: Tom has his own helicopter because he has air missions every day. In this great online game you will test your skills so lets see how you handle this helicopter. Click the mouse to change the directions and while doing that make sure you do not hit the obstacles. This game will improve your skills and your sense of direction so you will be better at this after you play the game. We wish you good luck!

chick-cannon-2.name: Chick Cannon 2
chick-cannon-2.description: In this funny game you must help the chick to return to her house. Shoot the cannonballs and use the items in the level to get the chick rolling or flying. It is a funny physics puzzle game. There are 30 unique levels, high quality graphics and fun gameplay.

flooded-village-holland.name: Flooded Village Holland
flooded-village-holland.description: Welcome to the Netherlands! Dig rivers and flip switches to guide water through the village. Water the cows, help the sailors set sail, but be careful not to drown the villagers! This game has innovative game-play, challenging puzzles, a whole new cast of cute characters, animations and special effects, high quality stereo sound and custom soundtrack, and 28 brand new levels!

cute-penguin-escape.name: Cute Penguin Escape
cute-penguin-escape.description: Help this cute penguin to escape by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Good Luck!

autumn-harvest-match.name: Autumn Harvest Match
autumn-harvest-match.description: Farmer Charlotte is getting ready for collect her Autumn Harvest! Help her collect everything she's grown by clicking the baskets and making matchesInstruction: Use your mouse to click the cards to flip them over. Find the matches to earn points and move on to the next level. Click the falling pumpkin for bonus points.

pou-pirate-shot.name: Pou Pirate Shot
pou-pirate-shot.description: Pou become a pirate and is seeking for treasure. He found treasure on an island in the middle of the ocean. However, there are other pirates that already landed on the island. Pou would have to defeat all of them and keep the treasure to himself. In order to defeat other pirates, pou would have to use his cannon to launch cannon ballsat them.

furtive-dao.name: Furtive Dao
furtive-dao.description: A enthralling action-puzzle in Chinese style! Help the Red Panda to raise money for the shelter!

saga-of-ragnar.name: Saga Of Ragnar
saga-of-ragnar.description: Ragnar is ascending to Odin in this fun skill game and you will have to help him collect as many shields as he can on the way up and also you will have to avoid the other vikings with axes.

hungry-insects.name: Hungry Insects
hungry-insects.description: Physics puzzle game with 20 levels where you have to help hungry insects reach the food or bring the food to them. Actions takes place in a house hold environment so objects used are from the house. Controls: Keyboard buttons 1, 2, 3, 4 for switching objects (or you can switch them with mouse left button), mouse for moving objects, and left mouse button for droping objects.

minion-on-rocket.name: Minion On Rocket
minion-on-rocket.description: Minion On Rocket is a Skill game on GaHe. Com. You can play Minion On Rocket in your browser for free. Come play the best Minion games for kids where you can choose your Minion to combat with each other Minion to prove who is the number one!

gibbets-4.name: Gibbets 4
gibbets-4.description: Use your bow and arrow to shoot the ropes and to save the innocent people being hanged! Aim carefully, and be sure not to shoot the people instead!

bunny-hop.name: Bunny Hop
bunny-hop.description: Hop around in this fun jumping game Bunny Hop! Can you jump as far you can between the right time?

the-beautiful-melody-lovely-dress.name: The Beautiful Melody Lovely Dress
the-beautiful-melody-lovely-dress.description: In this dreamy melodies, who do you think is the "Mitsubishi mirror Queen"? You like the pure love of benign or frank warm law dance, or the beauty of tone is unremittingly and forthright lovely around? Into their dream dance you want to?Play with your mouse

poop-clicker.name: Poop Clicker
poop-clicker.description: Do you want to feel a real power?This game can give you opportunity to feel it. By clicking and buying new things, you can make your own game better. You can buy what do you want - from baby to government and even heaven!And in what way should you pay? Just by making poops! Take into account the amount of different interesting upgrades, it comprises 90 points, with the help of which, you will come out on the top.

mario-plane-rescue.name: Mario Plane Rescue
mario-plane-rescue.description: This time Mario is fighting Bowser in the air. Mario's friends are fighting alone and they are in great danger. Prepare the counter attack and rescue all Mario's friends from being captured by Bowser. Rescue everyone in the air without being hit down by Bowser and his army. Use mouse to play and Unlock Achievements. More instructions in the game.

repstyle.name: Repstyle
repstyle.description: Repstyle is a casual game where you must swing a chameleon from hook to hook in various exciting and challenging puzzle levels. Achieve the various goals such as catch the fly or collect all the coins by swinging. Buy special items to help you swing through the levels. A fun and addicting puzzle game for all ages. Good luck!

the-sun-for-the-vampire.name: The Sun For The Vampire
the-sun-for-the-vampire.description: Play the new amazing puzzle platformer about the Vampire who want to see the Sun. You must help him to learn magic secret and finally see it. You can transform into the bat and fly, push the boxes and guards, control mechanisms and doors. There are 30 interesting levels, a lot of dangerous traps and enemies. Play it awesome game and you enjoy it!

army-stacker.name: Army Stacker
army-stacker.description: Help the army's engineering team to build a tower up to the goal! Use various elements to reach the needed height, go for the most stars!

dragon-hero.name: Dragon Hero
dragon-hero.description: Here we have Dragon Hero. Dragon Hero, is a young guy that has a tame Dragon at his command. You must guide him, and his dragon though a maze of flying rock and debris. Try to collect all the Dragon eggs on your way. Have fun

mario-super-jump-game.name: Mario Super Jump Game
mario-super-jump-game.description: Mario meets many monsters along the way. Please help mario jump on them to kill! Destroy certain amount of monsters in a limited time to go to the next level!

mario-bros-together.name: Mario Bros Together
mario-bros-together.description: Mario Bros Together. A great physics game developed by www. anolegames. com. Your mission is to help Mario and Luigi get together. Have fun!

royal-baby-nose-doctor.name: Royal Baby Nose Doctor
royal-baby-nose-doctor.description: Do your best to help the royal baby in this nose doctor game as the prince and duchess will be glad to know that you have made their baby healthy. Enjoy your time spent with the cute toddler.

escape-animal-playground.name: Escape Animal Playground
escape-animal-playground.description: Escape from the animal playground by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Good Luck!

flappy-mario-and-yoshi.name: Flappy Mario And Yoshi
flappy-mario-and-yoshi.description: Help Mario & Yoshi to through the obstacles. Have fun!!!

math-monster-addition-subtraction.name: Math Monster Addition Subtraction
math-monster-addition-subtraction.description: Your box of chocolates look tasty. The monsters think so too! Keep them from stealing your chocolates by solving the addition and subtraction problems.

wake-up-music-boy.name: Wake Up Music Boy
wake-up-music-boy.description: Wake Up Music Boy. A great physics game developed by www. anolegames. com. Wake up the boy who is crazy in music. It has 16 levels. Have fun!

bald-defense-war.name: Bald Defense War
bald-defense-war.description: Armed with machine guns, fire it, against the forces of darkness. Go all the way, collect coins, upgrade attribute, let him become more powerful.

medievals-room-escape.name: Medievals Room Escape
medievals-room-escape.description: Great Researcher reached the medieval room to discover the ancient object and things. While cleaning the items they were locked inside the room by touching the wrong one. How they can escape from the ancient room, they need your help. Serve them to elude from the situation quickly by obtaining the gold balls and work the puzzle quickly.

rolling-hero-3.name: Rolling Hero 3
rolling-hero-3.description: Use your skills to evade hostile aliens and reach the gateway to the next level.

mummys-path.name: Mummy's Path
mummys-path.description: Make the mummy's head roll till it reaches the body, taking as much diamonds as you can, and collect all the gold bugs to unlock all levels. FClick on buttons and drop them in the right position to make the head follow the right path for freedom.

devil-fall-2.name: Devil Fall 2
devil-fall-2.description: The little white angel fell down from heaven to the hell. There are all kinds of devils living in the hell. The white angel need to stay away from those devils so it can be safe. Use bombs to explode the devils into the inferno fire so they will burn to dead and white angel can be safe. use mouse to place the bomb and click the detonator to explode it

get-the-rum.name: Get The Rum
get-the-rum.description: This is an arcade puzzle with physics. "Get the rum" and take up the challenge of getting three stars on every level, for rum, for victory and for fun!The sailor can throw a single coconut at the target marked by where it is clicked upon. Unless it rolls back to him. The farther you click, the more powerful the shot becomes.

whack-a-rat.name: Whack A Rat
whack-a-rat.description: Whack this rat in the head as fast as you can before it steal your cheese and disappear.

clandestine-island-escape.name: Clandestine Island Escape
clandestine-island-escape.description: The Helicopter crashed and fell along the clandestine island. A man only alive and he did not know how to get out lonely. But you can help the Man by finding needed objects and work out simple puzzles. Can you try this and assist the man to escape from the horrible situation?

hello-kitty-defend-the-flowers.name: Hello Kitty Defend The Flowers
hello-kitty-defend-the-flowers.description: Hello Kitty has a beautiful garden. Water them to have beautiful flowers and Be careful of the enemies!

flappy-propeller-mario.name: Flappy Propeller Mario
flappy-propeller-mario.description: Flappy Propeller Mario is flying true amazing pipe world Click here to use Left Mouse btn to fly or     Pres SPACE or UP keys to fly     Pick up stars for bonus points

stone-age-trouble.name: Stone Age Trouble
stone-age-trouble.description: Save the evolution! Escape from the volcanic eruptions and rescue so many eggs as you can. Stone Age Trouble is a endless runner and you get a higher speed and more points through rescuing the eggs. Instructions:1. Press the left Mouse Button to jump. 2. Hold it longer to jump higher. 3. Save so many eggs as possible. 4. Avoid obstacles.

pokemon-travel.name: Pokemon Travel
pokemon-travel.description: Pokemon spend most of their time running or travelling. Let's see how far pikachu can run! When there is a trap or tower, hold the mouse and then release it to jump!

talking-tom-hand-doctor.name: Talking Tom Hand Doctor
talking-tom-hand-doctor.description: Invite your friend inside in this Talking Tom hand doctor game and start treating his injured paw as soon as possible. Follow the instructions for a nice experience, as they will guide you every step of the way.

cannon-basketball-2.name: Cannon Basketball 2
cannon-basketball-2.description: The game combines classic cannon play with competetive puzzles to give you the challenge you've never faced thus far. You will have to find unlocking mechanism for clearing your way to the basket first before you can put a ball into it. On some stages, you will have to use a teleporter to reach the basket. The game becomes more addictive as you climb up the level ladder and open new puzzles and new ways of reaching the basket.

when-i-am-running.name: When I am Running
when-i-am-running.description: When i am running is a fun run game. Checkout the obstacles and change your color to match with exit gate color to reach your destination.Have fun!

monkey-in-trouble-2.name: Monkey In Trouble 2
monkey-in-trouble-2.description: Are you smarter then the big Gorilla? Collect all the fruit by letting it fall down to the ground before the Gorilla gets to you. Shoot bananas at the Gorilla with the space bar and walk over the fruit to let it fall down. Control your monkey with the arrow keys.

factory-escape.name: Factory Escape
factory-escape.description: Platform cooperation puzzler. Combine forces, find all wrenches and escape the factory. Move your workers with the arrow keys and WASD keys; attack with the space bar and X key. Combine your power together to push heavy obstactles.

pig-run.name: Pig Run
pig-run.description: Collect all the food and find the exit to advance to the next level. You control your Pig with the arrow keys (jump and run). You can break the special bricks below you with the space bar.

trapped-ball-oxide.name: Trapped Ball Oxide
trapped-ball-oxide.description: Try to reach the exit into a labyrinth where is full of traps and puzzles. Games has two modes: 1 player and 2 players.

rose-land.name: Rose Land
rose-land.description: Girls here is a puzzle game for girls. You will have to find the hidden objects. There are three levels of this game. Try and play this game and win all the levels

baby-dino-daycare.name: Baby Dino Daycare
baby-dino-daycare.description: Baby Dino Daycare, it won't be an easy job, each and every one of them want your attention, affection and care, it will be exhausting, but if you started this daycare, you know what is waiting for you.

nervous-ladybug.name: Nervous Ladybug
nervous-ladybug.description: There are many colorful and lovely ladybugs, and the most amazing thing is that they can test your response speed. Do you dare give it a try?

2long-2park.name: 2Long 2Park
2long-2park.description: Maybe you consider yourself to be a good driver. There is only one way to find out! Test your driving skills by playing 2Long 2Park and see if you can drive something a little bigger than what you are used to!

icy-walk.name: Icy Walk
icy-walk.description: Let's go for a walk at the North Pole! It's Gotten cold already? Wait until you play this game. . . Icy Walk is a funny little game in which you have to control a penguin collecting fishes, jump over the spikes and find your way through the heaps of snow. Make your penguin jump with the UP Arrow Key and avoid getting spiked. Now go on and help your little penguin collect as many fishes as you can. Have Fun.

fruits-catching.name: Fruits Catching
fruits-catching.description: Help baby tiger collect as many fruits as possible by typing the letter on the fruit!

hidden-car-tires.name: Hidden Car Tires
hidden-car-tires.description: Find all the hidden car tires in all three of these pictures!

frozen-elsa-room-cleaning-time.name: Frozen Elsa Room Cleaning Time
frozen-elsa-room-cleaning-time.description: Elsa had big party yesterday in her castle and her guests left her quite a mess. Can you help her and clean all room? Have fun.

sticky-blocks-mania.name: Sticky Blocks Mania
sticky-blocks-mania.description: Sticky Blocks Mania is a new and very addictive and challenging blocks puzzle game. Your objective in this game is to place similar colored smiley together to remove them from the board. Remove all smiley to solve the puzzle and get to the next level. Click More Help for more instructions. Once you advance to next levels the game will become more fun and a little complex, so it will be more and more challenging. Good Luck!

angrybird-up.name: Angrybird Up
angrybird-up.description: Angry birds play trampoline game, but hateful green pig appear everywhere. Step on the green pig and let bird fly high!

tower-breaker-2-across-the-seas.name: Tower Breaker 2 Across The Seas
tower-breaker-2-across-the-seas.description: The Great Volcano erupted, our king must relocate his kingdom. Help him do this. Physics shooting game with breakable objects, and upgrades.

celebrity-gold-room-escape.name: Celebrity Gold Room Escape
celebrity-gold-room-escape.description: Escape from the Gold Room by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden in room. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Finally, Escape from the Gold Room. Good Luck!

pou-jelly-world.name: Pou Jelly World
pou-jelly-world.description: Pou just transformed into a jelly. Now it can move like a jelly where it can turn into any shade. Help Pou reach the platform successfully without falling. use mouse to play

take-me-home.name: Take Me Home
take-me-home.description: This FREE and amusing game has 15 unique and challenging levels where your objective is to help Bob the ball to go to his basket. For this you will have to guide him with a lines. Which lines? How much lines? It's up to you. You can download it for FREE for Android.

pikachu-run-run.name: Pikachu Run Run
pikachu-run-run.description: Pikachu likes fruits. There are many fruits scattered around the green land. Pikachu must collect them by itself and avoid other Pocket Monsters! Pikachu Run! Run! Collect all the fruits!

running-wizard-2.name: Running Wizard 2
running-wizard-2.description: Run as far as you can, destroying castles on your way with mouse click. Destroy red castles, but don't click on blue ones.

talking-angela-nose-doctor.name: Talking Angela Nose Doctor
talking-angela-nose-doctor.description: You have a very special patient in this Talking Angela nose doctor game as he came to you with a serious problem. Her voice sounds funny because of his cute nose so now you have to make her feel like new.

frozen-anna-give-birth-a-baby.name: Frozen Anna Give Birth A Baby
frozen-anna-give-birth-a-baby.description: Anna gets marriage with Kristoff. After two years of married life, she was pregnant. Now Anna will give a birth to her baby. Can you help her? Come on! First, giving a battery of tests to Anna. Then, prepare for assisting the birth of baby. Last, Weigh the baby and note down. Do not forget to help the baby wear swaddling clothes. It will be the most happiness for Anna and Kristoff. Lets share the happiness together. Have fun

brown-living-room-escape.name: Brown Living Room Escape
brown-living-room-escape.description: Escape from the Yellow King Room by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden in room. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Finally, Escape from the Room. Good Luck!

step-it-up-2.name: Step it up 2
step-it-up-2.description: Think you've got what it takes to be part of the Ultimate Dance Crew?

robotrun.name: RobotRun
robotrun.description: Help your robot to avoid all obstacles in his way. Jump the explosive tanks, bypass the saw blades, stoop under the plasma and collect as many stars as possible to win more points.

minipassage-2.name: MiniPassage 2
minipassage-2.description: Three perilous paths to pick, all leading through imminent death and worse. Will infinite life allow you to cheat your trap filled passage?

roll-me.name: Roll Me
roll-me.description: The Little Purple is trap inside the ground. The only way for him to escape is to get himself to the warp. On each platform, there is going to have obstacle that can kill the purple monster. use your clickskill to help the monster get to the warp without being kill.use mouse to click and play

thrift-shop.name: Thrift Shop
thrift-shop.description: In this fun time management game you girls will be playing the role of a very skillful top-seller, the person in charge to help some young fashionistas find and buy the clothing pieces and the accessory items they are looking for! As a top-seller your main preoccupation will be to keep your customers happy and deliver them the desired items in the shortest time possible, of course. Do you think you can handle it?

sleeping-beauties.name: Sleeping Beauties
sleeping-beauties.description: Do you remember a story about sleeping beauty? But what to do when there are too many beauties? The knight is in lovewith all the three beauties, and he wants to wake all of them up. Help knight shoot the heart at the beauties so they can wake up tobe together with the knight. A combination of ricochet shooter and puzzle games in a funny knight, princess castles setting. use mouse to aim and shoot the heart

scoobydoo-castle-escape.name: ScoobyDoo Castle Escape
scoobydoo-castle-escape.description: ScoobyDoo Is Stuck in a Castle Which is hunted, Help Scoobydoo to get out of the castle. Upgrades :- There are two kind of upgrade in the game Speed and LifeSpeed Increase the running Speed and Life help u continue the game.

flappy-angry-bird.name: Flappy Angry Bird
flappy-angry-bird.description: A very fun and addictive game based on the hit trending app.

hit-hit.name: Hit Hit
hit-hit.description: Hit Hit Game Its a simple game with fun try your luck to hit the blocks. Use minimum balls to hit the block for extra score. Simple game with 18 Levels. Just hit the blocks.

sports-memory.name: Sports Memory
sports-memory.description: A very charming pair matching game based on Sport Icons. Open and memorize the cards to make completed fast.

pairs-the-memory-game.name: Pairs - The Memory Game
pairs-the-memory-game.description: The object of the game is to remove all the cards of the tableu (52 cards, 4 rows of 13 cards each). Most of the cards are covered and only a small number are visible. Select a couple of cards and if they match (same rank) they are discarded. Try to match all the cards before time runs out. When a couple of cards match, a score bonus as well a time bonus is earned. Click on a card to select it. Matching two cards of the same color results in twice the score bonus and time bonus.

ball-mania.name: Ball Mania
ball-mania.description: Do you remember the popular game called Zuma? This game is even better than zuma. Your task is to make the balls disappear before they reach the frog. Gain at least three balls of the same color and they will transform into points. Move as fast as you can and complete all the levels. You can choose between the easy mode, the medium one and the harder mode. Choose the one you think you can handle. Good luck!

violet-living-room-escape.name: Violet Living Room Escape
violet-living-room-escape.description: Escape from Violet Living Room by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden in room. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Finally, Escape from the Room. Good Luck!

aliens-go-home.name: Aliens Go Home
aliens-go-home.description: The Zerc and Kyamt are at war. After a long chase, one Zerc ship is intercepted and falls on planet earth, in the backyard of your house. Now the world is in danger and only you can save it from a terrible catastrophe. Pack up the little alien and send him home in his box-ship! Try to find all the stars behind the boxes to win more points

artist-room-escape.name: Artist Room Escape
artist-room-escape.description: One fine evening I visited the artist room to know the secrets besides his painting. After entering into the room, the door was locked and I could not find the path to get away from that situation. Later I found the frames in the artist room were left hollow and it remains to be strange in that spot. Help me to recover the secrets behind the empty frame and find the keys to go rapidly.

old-green-room-escape.name: Old Green Room Escape
old-green-room-escape.description: Escape from the Old Green Room by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Finally, Escape from the Old Green RoomGood Luck!

checkers-draughts-3d.name: Checkers / Draughts 3D
checkers-draughts-3d.description: Checkers / Draughts 3D is the digital version of the classic and relaxing board game. You can play alone against the AI or against a friend on an exciting challenge. You can choose to use the white pieces or those blacks and you can choose whether or not the rule of "Huffing". What else to say, good game of Checkers / Draughts 3D!

bubble-buster-live.name: Bubble Buster Live
bubble-buster-live.description: This is a fun and addictive skill games where you need to pop all the bubbles in the level.

icegirl-fireboy-adventure.name: Icegirl Fireboy Adventure
icegirl-fireboy-adventure.description: This is an interesting skill game.  Fireboy must protect Icegirl and complete his duty.

factory-kingdom.name: Factory Kingdom
factory-kingdom.description: The aim of Factory Kingdom is to start your own clothing company and make it a huge success. Start with just a small floor space and enough money to employ just a few staff. Create work stations for them and watch the money start coming in. When you have money starts flowing you can start to expand, create more floor space and move in more workers, but don't forget to keep them happy and productive with restaurants, toilets, games and even décor.

pirate-bullets.name: Pirate Bullets
pirate-bullets.description: The pirates are here... for treasure! They serve as bullets in your cannon! Aim for the best shots in this nice and polished physics block shooting game. Can you get most of the treasure boxes?

the-last-ninja-from-another-planet-2.name: The Last Ninja From Another Planet 2
the-last-ninja-from-another-planet-2.description: After killing all the mutants and its creator, the ninja wants to go back to his planet. But because his power has not fully recovered, he instead arrives to the planet where controlled by the mafia. The ninja accidentally hearing mafia evil plan, they want to attack many planets and ruling it. Knowing this, the ninja decides to kill all mafias before they lead to destruction.

ninjas-never-die.name: Ninjas Never Die
ninjas-never-die.description: Your goal is to get all the golden coins and escape the labyrinth as quickly as you can. To move the ninja, you have to rotate the labyrinth.

baby-girl-bedroom-escape.name: Baby Girl Bedroom Escape
baby-girl-bedroom-escape.description: Escape from Baby Girl Bedroom by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden in room. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Finally, Escape from the Room. Good Luck!

tree-house-escape.name: Tree House Escape
tree-house-escape.description: One Day on a wooden forest I found a tree house and it presented so beautifully. When I stepped inside the house, the doors were locked and I could not see the way to get out of the mansion. Try to find objects that help me to open the tree house and reach the safer place quickly.

crime-story-investigation.name: Crime Story Investigation
crime-story-investigation.description: You suspect something is wrong during the investigation and you reached the murder spot to know the truth of it. By fault, you were locked inside the room. Try to find the ways to escape from the investigation spot by finding clues and keys.

escape-rest-room.name: Escape Rest Room
escape-rest-room.description: Escape from the Rest Room by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden in room. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Finally, Escape from the Room. Good Luck!

escape-blue-bedroom.name: Escape Blue Bedroom
escape-blue-bedroom.description: Escape from the Blue Bed room by finding all the clues and objects carefully hidden in room. Match all the objects, find the correctly combinations and solve the puzzles with the clues. Finally, Escape from the Room. Good Luck!

elsa-foot-doctor.name: Elsa Foot Doctor
elsa-foot-doctor.description: Help your patient in this Elsa foot doctor game because she is in pretty bad shape. Try to treat her foot as fast as you can because she is quite in a bit of pain and discomfort.

basket-ball.name: Basket & Ball
basket-ball.description: This is a game that combines basketball with platform adventure. The task for you in each level of this game is to guide the ball through all the difficult areas to get it into the basket. Collect all the stars from the surrounding and complete each level within the given time.

england-premier-league.name: England Premier League
england-premier-league.description: England Premier League is a soccer game that you will love to play and replay a number of times. You can choose your team and start playing the game in which you should beat a number of opponents to become the champion. It is all about scoring more goals than your opponents.

football-fizzix.name: Football Fizzix
football-fizzix.description: Football Fizzix is a game that you can play in the regular mode or in the two players mode. In the regular mode your team will be up against the computer controlled team. You are supposed to control the players of your team to score more goals than the players of the opposing team.

soccer-star.name: Soccer Star
soccer-star.description: Soccer Star is who you are but you have to prove it in front of the huge crowd gathered to watch their favorite player show off his soccer skills. Shoot the ball to hit the targets in order to earn points. Shoot the ball to the sides to divert the focus of the goalkeeper who will otherwise block your shots.

world-cup-penalty-shootout.name: World Cup Penalty Shootout
world-cup-penalty-shootout.description: Choose your favorite team and represent that team while playing this exciting soccer game. You will be playing as the striker as well as the goalkeeper. You have to score goals by beating the goalkeeper and block the shots of the rival striker to prevent him from scoring goals. Let us see if you have it in you to win the matches for your team.

sports-heads-basketball-championship.name: Sports Heads: Basketball Championship
sports-heads-basketball-championship.description: Sports Heads: Basketball Championship is a basketball based game in which all the participating teams want to be the champion. Do you have it in you to become the champion? Pick the team that you would want to represent and start playing the game. Help your player score more than the opposition by putting the ball into basket more often than the opposition.

the-football-quiz.name: The Football Quiz
the-football-quiz.description: Test your knowledge of the EPL.

gryfka-and-zoniek.name: Gryfka And Zoniek
gryfka-and-zoniek.description: Choose one: Gryfka or Zoniek - and then bounce the ping pong ball until you get to the finish line. In the game you will find different obstacles, which should not touch the ball. There are also colored balls that you should collect. Use mouse to move and press left mouse button to increase power. You can also use arrow keys on a keyboard.

goal-wall-shooting.name: Goal Wall Shooting
goal-wall-shooting.description: Shoot goals through holes of a soccer goal wall.

prison-pockets.name: Prison Pockets
prison-pockets.description: Make as many shots as you can. Has bonus holes

crazy-golf-cart-2.name: Crazy Golf Cart 2
crazy-golf-cart-2.description: Continue of very successful Crazy Golf Cart. Race through the golf course with usual and not so usual obstacles.

dirt-road-race.name: Dirt Road Race
dirt-road-race.description: Venture yourself into the off-road “jungle” and impose your supremacy as a dirt-road, 4x4 car driver, learning to handle all that intense speed and to control your massive vehicle while doing your best to eliminate all your rivals off the highway!

frosted-winter-race.name: Frosted Winter Race
frosted-winter-race.description: Race your way to finish and destroy all the enemies that you encounter in your way. Brand new game with awesome graphics. We have made this new challenge special for you. So show us that you've got what it takes to beat the winter blizzard, and that an icy road and snow cannot stay in your way to finish this game. But don't forget to also check our other awesome games.

3d-star-driver.name: 3D Star Driver
3d-star-driver.description: Get behind the wheel of your stunning sports car and get ready to burn some rubber on the track as you speed race like a madman, going for all those precious target stars and valuable golden coins scattered all over the circuit. If to all these you add the mind-blowing 3D effects and all the other cars rolling down like crazy on the highway, that will do their best to slow you down and discourage you, you get the perfect “recipe” for a highly addictive car race!

imminent-crash.name: Imminent Crash
imminent-crash.description: Drive the white car along the high way. Be careful not to damage your car. Find the destined targets and destroy them so you can drive further in the game. Grab the health boosts and the nitro to win faster and safer. Win the game and show your friends what you are made of.

graveyard-penalty-cup.name: Graveyard Penalty Cup
graveyard-penalty-cup.description: Soccer penalty shootout game, featuring various evil (and not so evil) species. You thought that undead can't play football? You are dead wrong!

football-chain.name: Football Chain
football-chain.description: Move the ball with the mouse and click anywhere to cause chain reactions. Follow the instructions in the game and try to finish all the levels.

vasofla.name: Vasofla
vasofla.description: Become a Vasofla specialist. You will need your best soccer ball skills to get this one finished. 20 Levels of pure adrenaline.

ronaldos-valentines-day-exhibition.name: Ronaldo's Valentine's Day Exhibition
ronaldos-valentines-day-exhibition.description: Ronaldo has set up an exhibition for his adoring fans. Score points by scoring goals, hitting hearts and knocking down that goofy big heart streaker.

daily-driver.name: Daily Driver
daily-driver.description: We brought up a brand new adventure just for you to enjoy. We got a bright red little car for you to handle. Grab the wheel and drive along the neighborhood to find the location where your passenger needs to be. Pay attention to the road and try not to crash your car.

bigfoot-truck.name: Bigfoot Truck
bigfoot-truck.description: Race away in your fearless Bigfoot truck and take the golden cup for each of the 24 adrenaline rising levels. Jump over obstacles and land safely back to the ground to drive your way through the finish line in record time.

volleyball-champion.name: Volleyball Champion
volleyball-champion.description: Play as your favorite country, and play with your friends in 2 player mode or alone against the computer!

hero-nekketsu-soccer.name: Hero Nekketsu Soccer
hero-nekketsu-soccer.description: Brazil world cup has entered the quarterfinals, our super heroes also step forward bravely, composed of super hot blooded foot corps. In the game, game player can not only experience shooting, passing, goals have fun, also joined the battle the elements. Between the different Corps hero can use force to get the ball. Instruction:WSAD to move, J to Attack and shooting, K to pass, L to skill shooting.

kaban-racetrack.name: Kaban Racetrack
kaban-racetrack.description: Kaban the running boar starts a sports career. Take part in race at tracks. Run as many laps as possible. Accelerate! Be as fast as light! Explore tracks and find best paths, avoid obstacles, jump, fly with jet packs, buy upgrades, earn achievements and reach incredible speeds. Become champion of the RACETRACK.

basketball-shooting-skill-challenge.name: Basketball Shooting Skill Challenge
basketball-shooting-skill-challenge.description: Show off your shooting skills and made enough shots to move to the next round.

gold-medal.name: Gold Medal
gold-medal.description: Easy and fun one button-game. Try to kick the ball with as much power as you can. Aim for the golden medals and the players standing in the way. Save up some points and buy upgrades to keep the ball running even further!

3d-stunt-pilot-san-francisco.name: 3D Stunt Pilot San Francisco
3d-stunt-pilot-san-francisco.description: Put on your aviators and grab your fur-lined jacket -- it's time to fly in this realistic aerobatics simulator! Using either the mouse or the keyboard, guide your plane through the air and successfully fly through the obstacles to win! Impress the ladies with your amazing stunts -- but don't crash! Choose to invert the y-axis for a more realistic experience!Also available on iTunes http://goo. gl/FKMk4f and Google Play http://goo. gl/41qpDC

sports-day.name: Sports Day
sports-day.description: Sports Day is a new collection of mini-games inspired by classic school sports day games. Take part in six events including Welly Wanging, Egg & Spoon, Tug of War, Leap Frog, Super Sack Race and Sand Pit Jump. With Sports Day, you get to relive those fond memories from school and make new ones along the way! As well as taking part in the events, you can also complete in-game achievements to unlock accessories and upgrades!

dodge-and-crash.name: Dodge And Crash
dodge-and-crash.description: Dodge and Crash, the ultimate pursuit game is here. Dodge the cars in traffic to get to your target and crash it. Each level has several targets so pay attention to your car's health. After crashing all your targets prepare for an even more challenging experience. Finish in one piece and be the king of the roads.

javelin.name: Javelin
javelin.description: Javelin is the adrenaline pumping sports game placing you in the role of an esteemed Javelin thrower in the FOG Olympics Decathlon event. You get 5 rounds of 3 throws to try and beat your opponent. Its not easy to master the art of the javelin so you might need a few goes to get a high score. A tip is to make sure you click in the green areas of the power bars.

smashtastic-cricket-world-cup-hero.name: Smashtastic Cricket: World Cup Hero
smashtastic-cricket-world-cup-hero.description: Fun arcade style Cricket game with RPG Career Mode. Create your own batsmen and play through 6 World Cups.

sport-car-parking.name: Sport Car Parking
sport-car-parking.description: Sport car parking is a fresh new cool parking game where you have to park your exotic sport car in the indicated spots. Parking games are fun. So start parking until there are no more places to park. Have fun.

trap-a-tuna.name: Trap-a-Tuna
trap-a-tuna.description: Trap a Tuna - Become a professional fisher, beat all the challenges, and leave your mark online and trap a tuna!

world-cup-2014.name: World Cup 2014
world-cup-2014.description: Play World Cup 2014 in Brazil with your favorite team. Choose to play the official or random groups. Start the qualifying group trying to classify in the first two positions to gain access to the final stages. Shoot Free kicks and collect the stars to try the super shoot, an unstoppable shot for any goalkeeper!

poolmaster.name: PoolMaster
poolmaster.description: Play pool like a Master in this cool pool game.

basket-shots.name: Basket Shots
basket-shots.description: Basketshots is a great 2d basketball game. Try to make as much score as you can under the given time. You can even be listed on leaders board if you have enough high score.

penalty-king.name: Penalty King
penalty-king.description: This game is about penalty kicks, as the title sugests. In the game you will have to kick the ball into the net, past the keeper.

football-launch.name: Football Launch
football-launch.description: Shoot the ball and see how far you can reach.

the-tractor-factor.name: The Tractor Factor
the-tractor-factor.description: Do you really think that living on a farm is all about riding the horses, playing with the puppies or having fun feeding the hens? Well, you're wrong! Take the dare of stepping into the shoes of a real farmer driving his little tractor along a bumpy off road track, covered with big rocks and logs to climb over, to the nearby farm, all while carrying a “fragile” load of animals in its trailer! Add a few drops of adrenaline to your “serene” life at the countryside!

classic-carrace.name: Classic CarRace
classic-carrace.description: Start the adventure of your life in an all-time classic car race and prove to everyone that you are the best driver that ever claimed the racing trophy. Reach the finish line in record time and upgrade your vehicle with the bonus cash collected.

hooligan-boxing.name: Hooligan Boxing
hooligan-boxing.description: Well, we believe you are brave to really accept this challenge and so hopefully, you'll be good in advancing this game little by little. The controls for playing this game are placed on the key Z, to do a left punch, X, to hit with an uppercut, C for the right punch and finally, to block the opponent's kicks, you will need to use the spacebar control from the keyboard. So, your opponent is waiting to check your boxing quality, show him what you can!

space-football.name: Space Football
space-football.description: Your goal in this game is to shoot on the goal precisely and score! But to be able to achieve that, you will have to select the angle and the velocity of the kick that will follow. So, to have influence on these two parameters, you need to know that the controls are place on the mouse. So, try to be better than the goalkeeper by shooting and scoring precisely! Enjoy these football kicks in space!

flicking-soccer.name: Flicking Soccer
flicking-soccer.description: Awesome and realistic table soccer game. Choose your national team and compete in the soccer world tournament! You have 3 minutes to score more goals than your opponent. Select a player by clicking on it and choose direction and power to shot. You have 3 shots available before changing turn. Use arrow bar on stage sides to scroll camera on the field!

free-kick-duel.name: Free Kick Duel
free-kick-duel.description: Shoot from various positions on the field bending it over and around the wall. It's you against a big name player. First to score 3 goals wins.

bowls.name: Bowls
bowls.description: Test your skill and accuracy in this classic calm, competitive bowling game! Play alone, or challenge a friend!

basketball-shots.name: Basketball Shots
basketball-shots.description: It's time to hit the court and shoot some hoops. The NBA is knocking on your door but your coach wants you to brush up on your skills. Show him you have what it takes to take on the big guys!

paul-vaulting.name: Paul Vaulting
paul-vaulting.description: A little game about Paul playing pole vaulting. Test your reflexes and your luck!

naruto-boxing-game.name: Naruto Boxing Game
naruto-boxing-game.description: Even if he took a lot of punches, he is not easy to beat. No, Naruto is a strong guy and he will fight until he get the title of this competition. Join him in this boxing game, and help him win against each player. He already trained for this, so try to conserve his power.

field-hockey.name: Field Hockey
field-hockey.description: Field hockey game with a selection of real world cup teams. Try to score as many goals and earn as many points in one minute + additional earned bonus time. First 4 shots are from a static position, after that you have to hit a moving ball passed from the left.

urban-moto-trial.name: Urban Moto Trial
urban-moto-trial.description: Live dangerously, get your dirt bike and compete in this moto trial challenge. Lots of ramps and obstacles like barrels, crates and car tires. It sure is entertaining watching, but do you have the guts to actually participate in such competitions? Let's see.

guy-doing-sports.name: Guy Doing Sports
guy-doing-sports.description: Guy Doing Sports is game made for Mochi July contest. You play though four different sports - hurdling, basketball, swimming and shooting.

zombie-baseball-madness.name: Zombie Baseball Madness
zombie-baseball-madness.description: You are trapped in an old baseball camp. All the people turned into zombies, the people in the hospital are still normal, only they can help you. Hit the baseball and shoot it to the hospital. Hit it hard so it will fly out of the stadium. Upgrade your bat so you can hit the ball harder. You are looking to the topview of the bat in the game.

mugalon-soccer-world-cup.name: Mugalon Soccer World Cup
mugalon-soccer-world-cup.description: Mugalon Soccer is a penalty shoot-out game. Upgrade your team or chat with other players Players take part in an innovative multiplayer league mode where you can challenge opponents even when they are offline.

dangerous-racers.name: Dangerous Racers
dangerous-racers.description: Dangerous racers is a brand new game prepared special for you. We have got the blue beast waiting to be driven to victory. Grab the wheel and show us your best score. Pass the other drivers and win on the first place to unlock the next levels and bonuses.

horse-jumping-champs.name: Horse Jumping Champs
horse-jumping-champs.description: Love horses and competition? Think you are a master of riding or want to be one? Riding games online bring you closer to the joy and rush of riding a horse in a jumping competition.

cargo-retriever.name: Cargo Retriever
cargo-retriever.description: In this new game your task as you might understand from the title is to retrieve cargo. This cargo was lost during transport by some of your coworkers. The time is limited, depending on which difficulty level you choose to play. So try to collect all the lost crates before time runs out.

world-cup-cricket-practice.name: World Cup Cricket Practice
world-cup-cricket-practice.description: Get your batting practice in for the Cricket World Cup. Get as many runs as you can as you've only got one wicket to prove yourself ready for the team.

christmas-ice-skating.name: Christmas Ice Skating
christmas-ice-skating.description: Hop into your skates and start ice skating in the joyful Christmas atmosphere, skate to your collection points to collect tokens and try to get the best score. Be careful not to slip and injure yourself though!

flight-3d-aerobatic-training.name: Flight 3D Aerobatic Training
flight-3d-aerobatic-training.description: So you think you can fly? Well take the stick and fly through the rings in your aerobatics training. Keep an eye on your fuel level though, I don't want us to fall out of the sky!

squash.name: Squash
squash.description: Prove your skills by hitting the ball against the wall in attempt to make your opponent miss the rebound! Be careful though, you have to hit it above the line, and the opponent will also try and throw you off from hitting the ball too!

monster-bus.name: Monster-Bus
monster-bus.description: Make your way through the dark forest and reach the finish line. Gather all the fireflies and stay away from the evil eyes from the dark. Complete your quest and set the high score. Have fun with the bus and don't forget to amaze us with your driving skills. Nothing is better in the summer vacation than driving a monster school bus that can destroy everything in it's path. Show us all what you're made of and drive the bus.

twilight-bmx.name: Twilight BMX
twilight-bmx.description: Go go go! A massive tornado is hot on your tail and all you've got on your side is your old trusty bike. Take on the tough terrain and various obstacles as you go for the ride of your life! Everything is at stake!

3d-quick-pool.name: 3D Quick Pool
3d-quick-pool.description: Test your skills and accuracy on a small pool table. Pot all your balls into the holes in this challenging mini 3D pool game.

dolphin-volleyball.name: Dolphin VolleyBall
dolphin-volleyball.description: Play volleyball as a dolphin against the computer or against friends. Instructions: Hit the ball back and forth with your opponent. Win points by getting the ball to hit the water on your opponent's side of the course, or by getting your opponent to hit the ball out of bounds.

big-jump-challenge.name: Big Jump Challenge
big-jump-challenge.description: Grab as much air as you can, pull off tricks and land it!

plane-revenge.name: Plane Revenge
plane-revenge.description: Enemy planes have infiltrated your town and they destroyed an important building. Your mission is to identify and eliminate the enemy planes as indicated in every level to get revenge. Use the arrow keys to control your plane  and the space key to shoot the enemy planes. Stay away from other planes because you will damage yours and fail the mission. Good luck!

farm-truck-race.name: Farm Truck Race
farm-truck-race.description: Are you looking for adventure? Drive your truck to the farm. Your opponents are waiting for the next farm truck race. Try to finish all the levels on time to prove you're the best truck farm racer in the world. Good luck and have fun!

ping-pong.name: Ping Pong
ping-pong.description: Bounce the ball as many times as you can. How long can you go?

hello-kitty-table-hockey.name: Hello Kitty Table Hockey
hello-kitty-table-hockey.description: Hello Kitty likes playing table hockey. Would you like to play with hello kitty? There are many different props you can use in this game. Come and experience it!

basketball-skill-challenge-2013.name: Basketball Skill Challenge 2013
basketball-skill-challenge-2013.description: This year you're compete in basketball shooting skills challenge. Your goal is to score enough point before the time expires.

dangerous-drifting.name: Dangerous Drifting
dangerous-drifting.description: Jump in the field of action with our new racing game Dangerous Drifting. You can choose from three supercars, two of them that you have to unlock first throughout the ten levels available. The levels are filled with dangerous obstacles and explosives so it's not really a walk in the park. You also have three difficulty modes, easy, normal and hard so if you think the easy mode is to easy try the other ones. It's going to be challenging to finish the game on all three modes but also a lot of fun.

homerun-in-berzerk-land.name: Homerun in Berzerk Land
homerun-in-berzerk-land.description: Welcome to Berzerk Land! Its play ball time and the Berzerk Crew is ready to teach Comeau the nerd a good lesson! Bash the hell out of this geek all the way through Berzerk Land, earn money to buy new gear and gain experience to increase the power of your character! Rack up big scores, submit them and show the world what you have got!

farball.name: FarBall
farball.description: Score as many baskets as possible!

bowler.name: Bowler
bowler.description: Bowler is a full 3D high-scores bowling game with realistic physics and 3D effects! Simple left mouse button gameplay! Choose a color of ball to play with! Press the left mouse button to setup the direction, power and angle! Get the best score in 10 rounds! Press CAM button to turn on/off a camera.

popeye-baseball.name: Popeye Baseball
popeye-baseball.description: Popeye has eaten a lot of spinach and wants to release his energy. He decided to play baseball, can you help him?

fog-tennis-cup.name: FOG Tennis Cup
fog-tennis-cup.description: Game, Set and Match. The three magical words to any Tennis player around the world. Grab your racquet and your sweatbands as you play through the tournament to win that trophy.

mini-sports-challenge.name: Mini Sports Challenge
mini-sports-challenge.description: Run, jump, swim and paddle in 4 different competitions in this fun sports game. Prepare your fingers and your mind to this speed challenge. Press quickly ‘a’ and ‘s’ to run, ‘r’ and ‘s’ to swim, and ‘space’ to jump and row. Can you get a gold medal in all sports?

home-run-hitter.name: Home Run Hitter
home-run-hitter.description: Step up to the plate and see how many home runs you can smack out of the park in this high score baseball game.

park-ride.name: Park Ride
park-ride.description: Ride your skateboard in through park. Are you able to conquer all parcours? It might look easy, but it is harder than you think!

lucky-fisherman.name: Lucky Fisherman
lucky-fisherman.description: A gold Miner type fishing game. Pull in as many fish as you can before time runs out. You can buy upgrades with the money you earn after each level.

taz-run.name: Taz Run
taz-run.description: Taz Run is a great funny, action games.Tasmanian Devil start to play football with his friend(Woody, Flamy, Stony, Watery and Sniow Star). Use mouse or keyboard (number 1-5) to beat all friends.In evry new level you must be faster. Enjoy!

billiard-blitz-pool-skool.name: Billiard Blitz: Pool Skool
billiard-blitz-pool-skool.description: Put your skills to the test in a high score battle against other players in this great pool game.

parking-fast.name: Parking Fast
parking-fast.description: Parking fast is a thrilling new skill parking game that will keep your attention as you progress from one level to another. The time limit will keep your senses sharpened, making you find the shortest way from one parking spot to another. Show us you can be a professional driver and have fun.

small-town-racing.name: Small Town Racing
small-town-racing.description: The annual racing competition has just started in this small town. Everyone is excited about the speed rush. And you compete for your town. Everyone home is counting on you so make them proud. Have fun.

spring-challenge.name: Spring Challenge
spring-challenge.description: Spring is back, grass and trees are all green. What better chance to start a new adventure in the wild rocky nature. We have five levels ready for you to drive through. Each level contains ten stars that you will have to collect and a lot of rocks and boulders for you to climb with a small car. Pay attention, if you flip the car you will have to start over.

santas-footy-challenge.name: Santa's Footy Challenge
santas-footy-challenge.description: Control Santa in a game of soccer/football against the elves.

jumping-long.name: Jumping Long
jumping-long.description: Jump as far as you can in this addicting one button sports game. Get upgrades to better your jump and try to beat the World Record!

free-kick-specialist-2.name: Free Kick Specialist 2
free-kick-specialist-2.description: The popular online free kick game is back with 20 levels and more defenders.

tv-darts-show.name: TV Darts Show
tv-darts-show.description: Keep your eye on the prize in this exciting rendition of darts. TV Darts show has you stepping up to the oche and throwing your arrows at specific points on the dart board. But things aren't as easy as they sound, moving targets, danger zones and time limits are against you as you strive for the prize.

hockey-all-star.name: Hockey All-Star
hockey-all-star.description: Fun for all audiences, we've re-created the magic of the NHL All-Star competition in this exciting mini-game collection. Three main events pulled right from the big leagues

5-a-side-football.name: 5 A Side: Football
5-a-side-football.description: Who does not love Football? Come and join your own team, come up with names for the players choose the colors of the shirts and select a field to play on!

police-run.name: Police Run
police-run.description: Make a run for it as you prove the police run is a fun engaging adventure spree, that allows you to break speeds in the police car. Get tot he finish line in record time and enjoy racing games like this Police Run spree.

3d-la-supercars-2.name: 3D LA Supercars 2
3d-la-supercars-2.description: Welcome to L. A. , to one of the most famous illegal races taking place on its streets! Only the most daring, the most cunning and nonetheless the most skillful racers can make it to the very last finish line.

outdoor-basketball.name: Outdoor Basketball
outdoor-basketball.description: Ready for some Outdoor Basketball? Choose between time trail or challenge and try to score as many points you can!

gone-to-the-dogs.name: Gone to the Dogs
gone-to-the-dogs.description: Gone to the Dogs is the latest in sports gambling on dog racing entertainment. The player is a dog trainer just starting out in the racing world.

mad-moto-skills.name: Mad Moto Skills
mad-moto-skills.description: Drive your dirt bike like a pro on this difficult jaw braking obstacle course where metal barrels, giant gears and steel rails are your arch enemies and driving paste them without tipping over is probably the most difficult task you ever had to do. Perfect your dirt bike skills in this dangerous environment where falling over is almost guaranteed and learn to handle your bike even batter than before, with slicker moves and daring stunts.

2-on-2-fuuty.name: 2 On 2 Fuuty
2-on-2-fuuty.description: Fast-paced, top-down view, 2 on 2 football game made in style of old, 16-bit hits. So, what are you waiting for? Pick your country and win that World cup. Controls are WASD+V, or ARROWS+ CTRL, depending of the side of the field that you choose.

x-pong-armageddon-tournament-edition.name: X-Pong Armageddon: Tournament Edition
x-pong-armageddon-tournament-edition.description: Has Ping Pong ever seemed a bit boring to you? Do you feel it needs more to be a bit more extreme? Well then X-PONG ARMAGEDDON: TOURNAMENT EDITION is just the game for you, prove to the world that you are the best ping pong player out there. Each match starts out simple but the longer you play and the higher your combo increases the more insane it gets.

dkicker-2-world-cup.name: Dkicker 2 World Cup
dkicker-2-world-cup.description: Special version of 'Dkicker 2' football shootout game, dedicated to World Cup 2014.

neymar-can-play.name: Neymar Can Play
neymar-can-play.description: Neymar is injured with just weeks to go until the World Cup in Brasil. Help him prepare even though he's still on crutches. Kick, head and bicycle kick Neymar into shape.

dusk-racers.name: Dusk Racers
dusk-racers.description: Chase the outlaw racers on the crowded highway into the dusk. Catch up with them and take them out. Collect coins so you can buy power-ups like full health kit and speed boost so you could use them in the race. Avoid other cars and be the hero of the day before the night comes.

real-goal.name: Real Goal
real-goal.description: Real Goal is a great sports game. European Champions start new are Galacticos. Pick one of 4 Real players:Ronaldo, James, Ramos or Bale and then use the mouse to move the target cursor to the desired  position. Hold left click down to gain desired power from the power meter. Release left click to shoot the ball. Different power will result in movement of the ball position.Play all 3 rounds and aim to get 30 points by getting the ball in the goal or hitting the red targets that appear.

track-racer.name: Track Racer
track-racer.description: This game is all about testing your driving skills in a bird view track setting. It features tracks with well designed curves so that you feel challenged while playing. To win you have to finish all three tracks as fast as possible with your super sports car.

car-parking-expert.name: Car Parking Expert
car-parking-expert.description: It is the game that consists of 6 levels. It is called Car Parking Expert game. You can play this game with your arrow keys. However, you need to be careful while you are playing. If you are make a minor mistake even, the game is over. Watch out for not crashing anywhere. You also should pay attention to pedestrians in that game. If not, game is again over.

catch-the-ball.name: Catch The Ball
catch-the-ball.description: The basic concept in this game is to reach or catch the ball. So, you are in a control of something that looks like a goalkeeper launcher and on each level you will notice that more than one ball are located in different positions. So, launch the goalkeeper figures in the direction that will succeed catching the balls on the way and to achieve that, you need to be very, very precise each time! It's very interesting!

motocross-mayhem.name: Motocross Mayhem
motocross-mayhem.description: Start engine of your moto and take part in car crushing motocross competition. Destroy as many cars as possible and collect the highest amount of points tp reach next level. Take care of your moto and don't crush it

football-shooter.name: Football Shooter
football-shooter.description: This is Bubbleshooter like game, Use mouse to shoot balls with best football countries flag.  All three balls with the same flag will be destroyed. Destroy all balls and don't allow them to reach the bottom

cowboy-stunt.name: Cowboy stunt
cowboy-stunt.description: Here cowboy takes jumps in different locations. Each jump requires a accelerator which was in back side of bike used by cowboy. The stunt speed and motion depends on how much acceleration given by the player. cowboy has to cross small lakes. Each level has it own backgrounds. The player feels real stunt experience on each play.

star-drive.name: Star Drive
star-drive.description: Clear all levels escape from the metal rods and bricks. Don't take too much damage or run out of time. Collect stars to boost your score

gears-of-car.name: Gears of car
gears-of-car.description: This game contains 10 levels. Each level must be complete with in time otherwise game will be over. If player complete the level in time then he upgrade to next level. To control the truck use up arrow for speed, down arrow for backward direction and escape form toggles use Shift+G. For control the gears use space bar. Game end when player not reach destination with in time. So change your gears carefully to won the game!!!!

football-crush.name: Football Crush
football-crush.description: Play a match of this exciting football championship! Crush those balls by matching three or more of the same nation, like Brazil, Argentinia, Mexico or Spain. Reach the next level by breaking an always increasing amount of balls. The more footballs you can crush with one click, the higher your scores will be. Challenge your friends in this football crushing championship!

car-hazard.name: Car hazard
car-hazard.description: use left and right arrow keys to dodge obstacles in the road and collect the money bags.

timepass-poke.name: Timepass poke
timepass-poke.description: Catch the 13 -playing card numbers and drag into a below box to match Try to arrange as early as possible.

angry-balls.name: Angry Balls
angry-balls.description: Player is supposed to aim the ball at enemy that is being placed with obstacles in the path. Game contains 25 levels

brasil-goal.name: Brasil Goal
brasil-goal.description: Brasil Goal is a great sports game. Pick one of 4 Brasil players:Oscar, Neymar, Ramires or Willian and then use the mouse to move the target cursor to the desired  position. Hold left click down to gain desired power from the power meter. Release left click to shoot the ball. Different power will result in movement of the ball position.Play all 3 rounds and aim to get 30 points by getting the ball in the goal or hitting the red targets that appear.

root-stunt.name: Root Stunt
root-stunt.description: clear all levels escape from the metal rods and bricks. Don't take too much damage or run out of time. Collect bombs to boost your score

coped-chopper.name: Coped Chopper
coped-chopper.description: The path of robbers vehicle.Here we can face various roots in various cities.Each root has its own style in grid form.Here first we can see the path of robbers vehicle,then the gamer has to trace the path of robbers vehicle in the same order as it gone.Here we can get the real chasing experience,while tracing the vehicles path.

roadster.name: Roadster
roadster.description: Be a Roadster to collect the money bags escaping from all the other objects like cars, animals, bomb blast etc., and add dollars to your pocket. There would be only four chances try to escape from the objects and collect as many money bags as possible.

rio-cup.name: RIO Cup
rio-cup.description: RIO Cup is the ultimate soccer game to play during the World Cup 2014. Different but fun. Try to hit all the football players with the ball. Kick as many as you can. But watch out for the whistle blowers, they will end your run with a red card. Buy upgrades and just have lots of fun in this RIO Cup game.

shooters-field.name: Shooters Field
shooters-field.description: shooter can stay static with horizontal movement of rifle. He has to shoot the movable target, which is moving towards the marksman.The shooter can be faced with multiple targets in the duration of shoot, each can be managed evenly. Here shooter can achieve medals Player will go through ten verities of levels.You can use mouse for flexible alignment of target. Lets start the shoot.....

bike-trial-4.name: Bike Trial 4
bike-trial-4.description: Ride a trial motorbike over a variety of challenging obstacles. Try to get through all levels without falling off the motorbike.

graveyard-tycoon-2.name: Graveyard Tycoon 2
graveyard-tycoon-2.description: Graveyard Tycoon 2 is a management based online game that will require you to show very good strategy making abilities. You will be managing a graveyard and you have to serve the needs of all the clients who come to you. Make money and invest wisely to make the business a very profitable one.

galaxy-siege-3.name: Galaxy Siege 3
galaxy-siege-3.description: Galaxy Siege 3 is a game that supposedly takes place in space. You are there to spread your territory and rule the galaxy. It will not be easy with the amount of resilience that you will be facing but be strong. Pimp your spacecraft and start launching attacks on the enemies in space to eliminate them.

5-minutes-to-kill-yourself-airport.name: 5 Minutes To Kill Yourself: Airport
5-minutes-to-kill-yourself-airport.description: 5 Minutes To Kill Yourself: Airport is a game in which you can customize your character before going to the airport where you face very frustrating situation. You are so frustrated that you want to kill yourself. Well, what are you waiting for? Go around finding creative ways to get yourself killed.

fruit-defense-5.name: Fruit Defense 5
fruit-defense-5.description: Fruit Defense 5 is a game in which your farm will be attacked by waves of enemies. You are supposed to arrange your mutant fruits to set up a strong line of defense to stop the waves of enemies before they trespass into your farm. The defense task will keep getting difficult because the attacking enemies will keep getting aggressive wave after wave.

age-of-defense-8.name: Age Of Defense 8
age-of-defense-8.description: Age Of Defense 8 is a game in which you take the role of a brave warrior. You will be armored by three different types of weapons. You will have to use these weapons and other available options to defeat the enemies in order to protect your base from the enemy onslaught.

traffic-jam.name: Traffic Jam
traffic-jam.description: Traffic Jam is a very challenging car driving game in which you are supposed to move your car very skillfully to let it get to the exit point. There is a high chance that you can get blocked by the other cars. If that happens, you can move the other cars to make space for your main car.

age-of-war-2.name: Age Of War 2
age-of-war-2.description: Age Of War 2 is a strategy based online game in which you are going to be sending out various troops to fight against the enemies to defeat them and to take over their base. As the game progresses, your clan will evolve and modernize but so will the enemies.

grow-rpg.name: Grow RPG
grow-rpg.description: Grow RPG is a turn based online game in which you are the hero. You have a devilish opponent to beat during the game play. You must think smartly and place the correct objects in the growing area to take over most of the places before the devil destroys those places.

jacksmith.name: Jacksmith
jacksmith.description: Jacksmith is who you will be while you play this fabulous time management game. Your responsibility as the Jacksmith will be to make powerful weapons for the soldiers who will be using those weapons to take part in the battles against the enemy army. All the soldiers will have specific requirements and you have to make the weapons accordingly.

idle-web-tycoon.name: Idle Web Tycoon
idle-web-tycoon.description: Idle Web Tycoon is a very nice online strategy game wherein your main goal will be to get rich by running your website successfully. Start your own website make wise moves to let the website attract maximum traffic and maximum gain. A series of correct calls will eventually make you a tycoon.

virus-wars.name: Virus Wars
virus-wars.description: Virus Wars is a strategy based online game in which you have to let the immune system send out units to defeat the organisms that have infected the various organs. Once the organs have been completely captured they can be used to send out units to invade other infected organs.

living-dead-tower-defense.name: Living Dead Tower Defense
living-dead-tower-defense.description: Place towers to kill the zombies that are coming for you!

spectromancer-truth-and-beauty.name: Spectromancer: Truth and Beauty
spectromancer-truth-and-beauty.description: Spectromancer Truth and Beauty is an online fantasy card game. Play magical duels against other wizards. Summoning all kinds of creatures and casting spells in this strategic game. A fantasy game with amazing game play. Use up to 5 special magical elements each duel.Select and summon the cards with the mouse. See the in game instructions for more details.

hd-spectralis.name: HD Spectralis
hd-spectralis.description: Sci-fi collectible card game. This new version of HD features new cards, additional gameplay modes and multiplayer.

elite-forces-defense.name: Elite Forces: Defense
elite-forces-defense.description: There are two playable heroes on the map that will assist you in your defense. 60+ unique towers are divided into 9 groups. You can upgrade towers, and sell towers that you don`t want anymore. Be careful with roads, because enemies will build their own ro

hexa-shift.name: Hexa Shift
hexa-shift.description: Take over hexagons by placing higher valued hexagons next to them, play against up to three computer controlled opponents in this basic strategy game.

2010-poker-league.name: 2010 Poker League
2010-poker-league.description: Multiplayer Texas Holdem Poker. Lobby and Avatarsystem.

energoid.name: Energoid
energoid.description: Jump into this space action defense game! Energoid has 27 cool defense levels in space. You need to win your own energy back and send out the Energoids to win them back for you!

rascals-apple-panic.name: Rascal's Apple Panic
rascals-apple-panic.description: Rascal the Raccoon is collecting apples to bring home to his family! Help him gather apples by knocking the leaves off the tree and catching the falling apples. Instruction: Press spacebar to launch the ball and use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move rascal left and right.

kamikaze-cat.name: Kamikaze Cat
kamikaze-cat.description: The Cat Empire, that were living with joy since very long time, has become the new objective of the Devil King and his Army of Darkness.Lead the Cat Empire Royal Airforce to defeat the Devil King once and for all.Use your brain to eliminate the Army of Darkness troops using your different aircraft.4 different worlds, with several levels each, of this action-puzzle game.Can you take the challenge?

pokemon-great-defense-2.name: Pokemon Great Defense 2
pokemon-great-defense-2.description: A bunch of wild pokemon are attacking professor Oak laboratory. Ash would have to help defensethe laboratory using his own pokemon. Defense the laboratory using different pokemon to attack the incoming enemy. Collect jewels and fruit to upgrade pokemon level in both attack and defense. use mouse to play

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Commander, our allies are coming and the enemy is fleeing! Now is our chance to destroy them! Prepare for an ambush! Deploy your units near the road. When the enemy is in range, choose when to give the fire command. Be careful, the enemy will return fire and your troops may be killed. Do not worry, allied airplanes are here to help.

brave-knights.name: Brave Knights
brave-knights.description: Funny Tower Defense! Your task is to quickly build towers and do not let the Knights get to the princes.

spacepets.name: SpacePets
spacepets.description: Help save space pets! Teleport everyone to safety. Dogs and cats usualy do not like beeing teleported with each other, so take care when you set up the teleportation zones. Three planets are waiting for you! Gamers of all ages will enjoy this cute and funny puzzle game featuring panting puppies and purring kittens.

lost-heroes.name: Lost Heroes
lost-heroes.description: Lost Heroes is a fun strategy game. Your job is to help little heroes to find their home. Clear the obstacles with their unique abilities. Collect fruits to score points.Have Fun!

frenzy-gas-station.name: Frenzy Gas Station
frenzy-gas-station.description: Lisa is back in the frenzy business! This time she or her father has to make sure all customers leave the gas station with a full fuel tank. Provide various other services and earn the daily goals. Buy big improvements and see the station grow bigger and better!Instructions:Drag and drop the customer to the right order.

i-will-die-2.name: I Will Die 2
i-will-die-2.description: A Second series of I will Die game. Play your favorite game in three different worlds. A new strategy game with unique concept with classic sad instrumental theme. He don't want to live without her and hence he decided to die. Help him die to pass each level. Die without armor or without using any weapons.

click-battle-madness.name: Click Battle Madness
click-battle-madness.description: A dynamic, colorful strategy. Help the magician's, to repel all attacks Vikings for five months!

the-keeper-of-4-elements.name: The Keeper Of 4 Elements
the-keeper-of-4-elements.description: Dark Lord came with his army to the mystical island to find the secrets of ancient magic and use them for their evil deeds. But the island has a defender and all the forces of nature on his side. Enjoy the mystical atmosphere. Defend yourself in the interesting locations. Use the power of the Four Elements, build various towers and develop your magic skills to fight the invasion of various enemies.

pokemon-tower-defense.name: Pokemon Tower Defense
pokemon-tower-defense.description: When a pack of wild Rattata attack Professor Oak's lab, it is up to you to stop them. Set out on your own Pokemon journey, to catch and train all pokemon and try to solve the mystery behind these attacks. Featuring the original 151 pokemon! Use your Mouse to Play.

the-three-towers.name: The Three Towers
the-three-towers.description: The Three Towers is a tower defense game. The goal of the game is to defend your pizza from the hungry insects by using your three towers to take them down! You control one tower yourself, while the other two automatically fire at the enemy. Use the money earned by defeating enemies to heal and upgrade your towers! A useful hint would be to be prepared, not all enemies follow the normal path!

sweet-planet.name: Sweet Planet
sweet-planet.description: Great Tower Defense with unique mechanics - to increase scores necessary to build a towers for the production of sugar from the core of the Sweet Planet.

record-shop-tycoon-2.name: Record Shop Tycoon 2
record-shop-tycoon-2.description: Record Shop Tycoon 2 is the sequel to the very successful Recordshop Tycoon (ya rly). What’s new? Well what isn’t new. There are new objects, new stores in a new town, new events, you can build your own store, you can customize it, there are competitors and much much more!

siege-of-troy-2.name: Siege Of Troy 2
siege-of-troy-2.description: Siege Of Troy 2 harkens the return of the classic archery game series! Troy is under threat once again, and the enemy is stronger than ever before! Fortunately, so are you! Your technology has advanced immensely since the last war, and now you have some real firepower on your side! Huge volleys of flaming arrows, burning rocks, and landscape-tearing boulders. So long as you keep your aim sharp, and your timing perfect, you can win this war once again!

galaxy-defense.name: Galaxy Defense
galaxy-defense.description: The galaxy is under attack by a horde of alien space ships. It is up to you to defend the galaxy and stop the invasion. You have to place tower in strategical points and make sure you upgrade them with the latest technology. You will have to show how good you are as a leader . May the light be with you in this mission. Good Luck.

tower-empire-2.name: Tower Empire 2
tower-empire-2.description: It is war and enemies are attacking. Soon they will reach your land and the only way to stop enemy units is to place defense towers in their way. Eliminate them all, nobody should pass your defense.

warlords-epic-conflict.name: Warlords: Epic Conflict
warlords-epic-conflict.description: Control an army of epic warlords and wage war against opposing armies. Have you got what it takes to conquer the lands?

big-bubble-shooter.name: Big Bubble Shooter
big-bubble-shooter.description: A really big bubble shooter game.

city-wizard.name: City Wizard
