city-wizard.description: How big can you grow your city in this strategic puzzle game? As the City Wizard you have the power to create a bush from 3x flowers. A tree from 3x bushes. . And so on. . It won't be so easy though! Those pesky Zombies will try to make it difficult for you! Use your MOUSE for all. For gameplaying hints check the in-game tutorial.

carrot-fantasy-extreme-2.name: Carrot Fantasy Extreme 2
carrot-fantasy-extreme-2.description: Carrot Fantasy Extreme 2 is a fantasy-themed tower defense game! Defend your Carrot from undersea monsters by building various weapons along the enemies path to help slow down and destroy the enemies. Each creature has a different ability, so use your weapons wisely. You can also upgrade your weapons to make things easier! Don't forget to destroy surrounding objects as they may be hiding secret weapons.

land-defender-td.name: Land Defender TD
land-defender-td.description: Build labirints of towers to defend your lands from enemies!

overhaul.name: Overhaul
overhaul.description: Mine minerals on a hostile planet, a mix of Match-3 and Tower Defense. Protect your mining station by placing and combining the modules falling from the sky. Match three modules to create one higher level module. Click on a module to show information. Discover new abilities and modules as the game progresses, enhanche them and use all opportunities to win.

hotel-baron.name: Hotel Baron
hotel-baron.description: Build and manage your own hotel and try to achieve a five star rating. Upgrade the building, add floors and rooms, decorate the yard, hire and manage staff, build pools, establish services, adjust pricing and improve customer satisfaction, revenue and profits!

spectromancer-plus-edition.name: Spectromancer Plus Edition
spectromancer-plus-edition.description: Spectromancer Plus Edition is a special version. It is a fantasy card game. In this special version all wizards are unlocked. Beat other wizards and destroy their creatures. Cast spells to score points. An amazing fantasy card game with wizards and all kinds of creatures. Select the easy, medium or hard mode. There are a lot of options available in this addicting game. Have fun in this special edition!

dark-corporation.name: Dark Corporation
dark-corporation.description: You own the Dark Corporation. Your aim is to invade big factories all over the world. Hack some research facilities to unlock new soldiers. Invade factories to increase your customer population and income. Employ Advertisers to increase your income. Employ Generals to increase your army capacity. Upgrade corporation level to increase advertiser and general capacity. Press Spacebar to toggle speed 1x - 8xUse Mouse for everything else.

merry-invasion.name: Merry Invasion
merry-invasion.description: Train workers of different IQs to man different stations to run the economy and defend against the zombie invaders

frenzy-school.name: Frenzy School
frenzy-school.description: Help Lisa and her team to manage and upgrade the first frenzy school. The local school board has also noticed Lisa and invited her team to attend school management. Accompany all new students to the right place and make sure that the school continues to run properly. Drag and drop the students through the building, and keep in mind that this school also has a second floor! Buy upgrades, earn money and reach daily goals to keep business going. Instructions:Drag and drop the student to the right order.

shoot-and-defend.name: Shoot And Defend
shoot-and-defend.description: Shoot the Missiles on one side of the screen and play tower defense on the other side of the screen in this fun dual-game game.

king-of-math.name: King Of Math
king-of-math.description: Defend your castle from Zombie Hordes! Answer Math Questions to defeat your enemies. Outlast your enemies and become the Math King! Collect gold by answering questions correctly to build your defences, but be careful every 3 wrong answers ill spawn more unruly undead! Buy upgrades to strengthen your castle and recruit solders to your cause.

senet.name: Senet
senet.description: Senet is a board game from ancient Egypt. Senet is one of the oldest known board games. Throw the dice (big blue spot), move 1 of your pyramids and be the first to bear them all off the board to win the game.

frenzy-mart.name: Frenzy Mart
frenzy-mart.description: The frenzy franchise is everywhere these days! In this frenzy game you have to manage and run Lisa's new Frenzy mart. Sell products to the customers and earn money. Upgrade the mart with new services, products and equipments. you can play as different characters like Sarah, or Elly. each character has different ability. Instructions:Drag and drop the customer to the right order.

carrot-fantasy-2-desert.name: Carrot Fantasy 2: Desert
carrot-fantasy-2-desert.description: Carrot Fantasy 2: Desert is the colourful, fun sequel to the challenging defences game, Carrot Fantasy! With more weapons at your disposal than ever, your objective is to protect your somewhat delicious carrot from being eaten by all sorts of nasty, monstrous foes! With limited funds, you've got to be at the top of your game to make the most of your defences, so think about where you place them!

the-vikings-revenge-level-pack.name: The Viking's Revenge Level Pack
the-vikings-revenge-level-pack.description: Train your brain controlling the forces. Complete all 20 levels as fast as possible! Will triumph in all sea battles!

fluffy-the-game.name: Fluffy - The Game
fluffy-the-game.description: Match 3 action with a twist - help the Fluffies find their buddies for some classic fun! Colors and patterns are added as you progress increasing the challenge and extending playability!

fiqa-defender.name: Fiqa Defender
fiqa-defender.description: Your kingdom is under siege. New dragons tribe is attacking your lands. Protect your treasures and princesses.Build towers, send guards, make sure no princess will lost!

village-tower-defense.name: Village Tower Defense
village-tower-defense.description: Enemies are coming to occupy your village! As the head of village, you must lead your villagers to defense your hometown. Give them a lecture!

ninjas-vs-pirates-tower-defense-3.name: Ninjas Vs Pirates Tower Defense 3
ninjas-vs-pirates-tower-defense-3.description: Use ten different types of Ninja towers to defeat many different types of pirates. Use skills to upgrade your ninjas.

tesla-war-of-currents.name: Tesla: War Of Currents
tesla-war-of-currents.description: Tesla vs Edison, keep your team alive and blast your way through each level. Upgrade your squad, unlock hidden units, and take Edison's inventions down!instructions: Help Telsa reach the exit point without dying. Hire units by clicking the top-left icon. Click the arrow symbols on the map to change Tesla's direction. Use the MOUSE for all. Alternative Keyboard controls: ARROW Keys (or Mouse) to scroll the map. SHIFT to change the game speed. CTRL to manage your team. Press SPACEBAR for tactic mode.

learn-to-fly-2.name: Learn To Fly 2!
learn-to-fly-2.description: You were able to learn how to fly, but Icebergs stopped you and crushed your dreams. Now you’re back for revenge!

be-a-lovely-winner.name: Be A Lovely Winner
be-a-lovely-winner.description: Be A Lovely Winner is a simple and interesting flash game. In it destroy the adjacent similar blocks by clicking on them. There will be many power-ups which will help you in achieving highest score.

snake-blox.name: Snake Blox
snake-blox.description: Move the blocks around collecting other blocks. Each block you collect makes the block snake bigger. Try not to hit the walls. Or it is game over! ~ xp5. net

defense-1942.name: Defense 1942
defense-1942.description: Tower Defense game that took place in World World 2! In 1942 at Singapore the Japanese army took the largest ever surrender of British fighting forces - with a bluff! Can you defend Singapore?

hospital-frenzy-3.name: Hospital Frenzy 3
hospital-frenzy-3.description: Hospital frenzy is back with new challenges, new facilities, and new achievements. Equipped with helicopter rescue service, emergency ambulance, scientist lab and mart. Reach the daily goals and unlock fancy upgrades for the hospital.

nuke-defense.name: Nuke Defense
nuke-defense.description: The monsters are attacking!!! Quick, Defend your Kingdom! Use your skills to kill the monsters and prevent their attack. The more you kill, the more skills you learn to help you kill harder, meaner monsters later. Use your 3 attack skills wisely to aid you in your battle. You will also be rewarded by killing the evil invaders, make sure you collect the money to buy extra skills to help you.

droids-at-the-gates.name: Droids at the Gates
droids-at-the-gates.description: A new take on the Tower Defense genre. Take down the droids before they overrun your gate!
